country_event = { #Smugglers of the Amur and Ussuri
	id = russia.610
	title = russia.610.t
	desc = russia.610.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_aigun
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { RUS_is_demrus = yes }
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.610 option russia.610.a"
		name = russia.610.a
		add_manpower = -5000
		add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
			type = infantry_equipment
			amount = -500
		}
		add_stability = 0.03
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.610 option russia.610.b"
		name = russia.610.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_dolgorukov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_kartashyov_ai
				}
				RUS_vasily_maklakov = { is_country_leader = yes }
			}
		}
		add_manpower = -5000
		add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
			type = infantry_equipment
			amount = -500
		}
		add_political_power = -50
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = 4 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		657 = { increase_state_category_by_one_level = yes }
		560 = { increase_state_category_by_one_level = yes }
		561 = { increase_state_category_by_one_level = yes }
		if = {
			limit = { has_active_mission = RUS_political_apathy }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_apathy_var = -1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_apathy_decrease_tt
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_active_mission = RUS_bold_promises }
			add_days_mission_timeout = {
				mission = RUS_bold_promises
				days = 30
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_active_mission = RUS_titov_SR_demands }
			add_days_mission_timeout = {
				mission = RUS_titov_SR_demands
				days = 30
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { is_monarchy = yes }
			RUS_increase_imperial_popularity = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.610 option russia.610.c"
		name = russia.610.c
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #Trial of the Idiots
	id = russia.611
	title = {
		trigger = { RUS_savinkov = yes }
		text = russia.611.t.szrs
	}
	title = {
		trigger = { has_socialist_government = yes }
		text = russia.611.t.soc
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS_savinkov = yes }
		text = russia.611.d.szrs
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_socialist_government = yes }
		text = russia.611.d.soc
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_trial_2
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.611 option russia.611.a"
		name = russia.611.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = 1 }
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -4 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.611 option russia.611.b"
		name = russia.611.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
			}
		}
		add_manpower = -1
		if = {
			limit = { has_socialist_government = yes }
			add_popularity = { ideology = totalist popularity = 0.02 }
		}
		else = {
			add_war_support = 0.04
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
			RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Semyonov's Return
	id = russia.615
	title = russia.615.t
	desc = russia.615.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_semyonov
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_socialist_government = yes
			RUS_savinkov = yes
		}
		has_country_flag = RUS_semyonov_uprising
		FER = { has_character = RUS_grigory_semyonov }
		NOT = { has_war_with = JAP }
	}

	fire_only_once = yes
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			FER = { FER_setup_far_eastern_army = yes }
			FNG = { country_event = russia.617 }
			JAP = { country_event = russia.617 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.615 option russia.615.a"
		name = russia.615.a #Semyonov is a traitor to Russia!
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.615 option russia.615.b"
		name = russia.615.b #Semyonov is a goddamn hero
		trigger = { is_ai = no }
		FER = { change_tag_from = ROOT }
	}
}

country_event = { #Semyonov's Trial
	id = russia.616
	title = russia.616.t
	desc = russia.616.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_trial_2
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			RUS_savinkov = yes
			has_socialist_government = yes
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.616 option russia.616.a"
		name = russia.616.a #No Mercy for traitors! Execute them all!
		ai_chance = {
			base = 80
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				OR = {
					has_government = social_democrat
					has_government = social_liberal
					has_government = market_liberal
				}
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.025
		FER = {
			every_unit_leader = {
				kill_character = yes
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.616 option russia.616.b"
		name = russia.616.b #Spare those who will repent - imprison Semyonov and the rest
		trigger = {
			has_socialist_government = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				has_authoritarian_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_government = social_conservative
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				OR = {
					has_government = social_democrat
					has_government = social_liberal
					has_government = market_liberal
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -55
		FER = {
			every_unit_leader = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_character = RUS_fyodor_bredov
						is_character = RUS_viktorin_molchanov
						is_character = RUS_nikolay_protopopov
						is_character = RUS_leonid_skipetrov
					}
				}
				set_nationality = ROOT
			}
		}
	}
}

### NatPop Anger Events ###

country_event = { #Military Anger 6
	id = russia.910
	title = russia.910.t
	desc = russia.910.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army2
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		has_government = national_populist
		is_subject = no
		check_variable = { RUS_military_anger > 5 }
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.910 option russia.910.a"
		name = russia.910.a
		add_stability = -0.03
		add_popularity = { ideology = paternal_autocrat popularity = 0.05 }
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { check_variable = { RUS_military_anger > 6 } }
				country_event = { id = russia.911 days = 4 random_days = 4 }
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Military Anger 8 - Attempted Coup
	id = russia.912
	title = russia.912.t
	desc = russia.912.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army2
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		has_government = national_populist
		RUS_boris_savinkov = { is_country_leader = yes }
		is_subject = no
		check_variable = { RUS_military_anger > 7 }
		NOT = {
			AND = {
				is_ai = yes
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_aftermath option = RUS_AFTERMATH_DICTATORSHIP }
					AND = {
						NOT = { has_war_with = GER }
						has_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_ai
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.912 option russia.912.a"
		name = russia.912.a #The coup succeeds
		trigger = {
			country_exists = GER
			OR = {
				NOT = { has_war_with = GER }
				RUS_pyotr_wrangel = { is_army_chief = yes }
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { base = 75 }
		add_stability = -0.1
		set_country_flag = { flag = RUS_looming_coup days = 10 }
		country_event = { id = russia.914 days = 4 random_days = 4 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.912 option russia.912.b"
		name = russia.912.b #The coup fails
		ai_chance = {
			base = 25
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_aftermath option = DEFAULT } }
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -5 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = RUS_military_purges
			days = 180
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { check_variable = { RUS_military_anger > 8 } }
				country_event = { id = russia.913 days = 4 random_days = 4 }
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Military Anger 9
	id = russia.913
	title = russia.913.t
	desc = russia.913.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army2
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		has_government = national_populist
		is_subject = no
		check_variable = { RUS_military_anger > 8 }
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_looming_coup
			AND = {
				is_ai = yes
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_aftermath option = RUS_AFTERMATH_DICTATORSHIP }
					AND = {
						NOT = { has_war_with = GER }
						has_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_ai
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.913 option russia.913.a"
		name = russia.913.a
		add_popularity = { ideology = national_populist popularity = -0.10 }
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_military_purges }
			add_political_power = -50
		}
		else = {
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_military_purges
				days = 180
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { check_variable = { RUS_military_anger > 9 } }
				country_event = { id = russia.914 days = 4 random_days = 4 }
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Military Anger 10 - Savinkov Assassinated
	id = russia.914
	title = {
		trigger = { NOT = { has_war_with = GER } }
		text = russia.914.t
	}
	title = {
		trigger = { has_war_with = GER }
		text = russia.914.t2
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { NOT = { has_war_with = GER } }
		text = russia.914.d
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_war_with = GER }
		text = russia.914.d2
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army2
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		has_government = national_populist
		is_subject = no
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_looming_coup
			AND = {
				is_ai = yes
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_aftermath option = RUS_AFTERMATH_DICTATORSHIP }
					AND = {
						NOT = { has_war_with = GER }
						has_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_ai
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_war_with = GER
					NOT = { RUS_pyotr_wrangel = { is_army_chief = yes } }
				}
				activate_advisor = RUS_pyotr_wrangel_army_chief
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.914 option russia.914.a"
		name = russia.914.a
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_vladimir_nabokov = { is_advisor = yes } }
			hidden_effect = { retire_character = RUS_vladimir_nabokov }
		}
		add_stability = -0.1
		if = {
			limit = { has_war_with = GER }
			add_popularity = { ideology = national_populist popularity = -0.1 }
		}
		kill_country_leader = yes
		RUS_military_restore_republic = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #Popular Anger 6
	id = russia.920
	title = russia.920.t
	desc = russia.920.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_protest
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		has_government = national_populist
		is_subject = no
		check_variable = { RUS_popular_anger > 5 }
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.920 option russia.920.a"
		name = russia.920.a
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_VRBO }
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = RUS_VRBO
				add_idea = RUS_VRBO_2
			}
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = radical_socialist popularity = 0.04 }
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				region = 135 #North Caucasus
				has_active_resistance = yes
			}
			add_resistance = 15
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { check_variable = { RUS_popular_anger > 6 } }
				country_event = { id = russia.921 days = 14 random_days = 14 }
			}
		}
	}
}

		name = russia.921.b #Nonsense
		add_stability = -0.05
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -5 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes

			if = {
				limit = { check_variable = { RUS_popular_anger > 7 } }
				country_event = { id = russia.922 days = 14 random_days = 14 }
			}
		}
	}

country_event = { #Popular Anger 8 - Attempted Uprising
	id = russia.922
	title = russia.922.t
	desc = russia.922.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army2
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		has_government = national_populist
		RUS_boris_savinkov = { is_country_leader = yes }
		is_subject = no
		check_variable = { RUS_popular_anger > 7 }
		NOT = {
			AND = {
				is_ai = yes
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_aftermath option = RUS_AFTERMATH_DICTATORSHIP }
					AND = {
						NOT = { has_war_with = GER }
						has_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_ai
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.922 option russia.922.a"
		name = russia.922.a #uprising succeeds
		trigger = { NOT = { has_war_with = GER } }
		ai_chance = { base = 50 }
		add_stability = -0.1
		country_event = russia.924
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.922 option russia.922.b"
		name = russia.922.b #uprising fails
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		add_political_power = -50
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_VRBO_2 }
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = RUS_VRBO_2
				add_idea = RUS_VRBO_3
			}
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = radical_socialist popularity = 0.05 }
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { check_variable = { RUS_popular_anger > 8 } }
				country_event = { id = russia.923 days = 14 random_days = 14 }
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Popular Anger 9
	id = russia.923
	title = russia.923.t
	desc = russia.923.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army2
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		has_government = national_populist
		is_subject = no
		check_variable = { RUS_popular_anger > 8 }
		NOT = {
			AND = {
				is_ai = yes
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_aftermath option = RUS_AFTERMATH_DICTATORSHIP }
					AND = {
						NOT = { has_war_with = GER }
						has_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_ai
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.923 option russia.923.a"
		name = russia.923.a
		add_stability = -0.05
		add_political_power = -50
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { check_variable = { RUS_popular_anger > 9 } }
				country_event = { id = russia.924 days = 14 random_days = 14 }
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Popular Anger 10 - Savinkov Assassinated
	id = russia.924
	title = russia.924.t
	desc = russia.924.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_savinkov2
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		has_government = national_populist
		RUS_boris_savinkov = { is_country_leader = yes }
		is_subject = no
		date < 1939.1.1
		NOT = {
			has_war_with = GER
			AND = {
				is_ai = yes
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_aftermath option = RUS_AFTERMATH_DICTATORSHIP }
					AND = {
						NOT = { has_war_with = GER }
						has_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_ai
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.924 option russia.924.a"
		name = russia.924.a
		add_stability = -0.1
		add_war_support = -0.15
		kill_country_leader = yes
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = radical_socialist
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_boris_kamkov_sic
		set_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_socialist_uprising
		hidden_effect = {
			add_ideas = RUS_post-savinkov_economy #Replaces Savinkov economic ideas
			RUS_remove_savinkov = yes
			country_event = { id = russia.925 days = 1 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Socialist Provisional Government
	id = russia.925
	title = russia.925.t
	desc = russia.925.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_crowd1
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.925 option russia.925.a"
		name = russia.925.a
		set_country_flag = RUS_spiridonova_revolt
		add_popularity = { ideology = radical_socialist popularity = 0.05 }
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					date < 1937.12.31
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							check_variable = { RUS_military_anger > 4 }
							AND = {
								is_ai = yes
								has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_aftermath option = RUS_AFTERMATH_SOCIALIST }
							}
						}
					}
					custom_effect_tooltip = rus_925_tt_1
					RUS_vladimir_manstein = {
						unit_leader_event = { id = russia.926 days = 2 } #Manstein's coup attempt
					}
				}
				else = {
					custom_effect_tooltip = rus_925_tt_2
					var:army_chief = {
						unit_leader_event = { id = russia.927 days = 2 } #Denikin/Wrangel take power
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				custom_effect_tooltip = rus_925_tt_3
				var:army_chief = {
					unit_leader_event = { id = russia.927 days = 2 } #Denikin/Wrangel take power
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

unit_leader_event = { #Manstein Coup Attempt
	id = russia.926

	desc = russia.926.d
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.926 option russia.926.a"
		name = russia.926.a

		add_stability = -0.05
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		RUS_vladimir_manstein = { kill_character = yes }
		hidden_effect = {
			random_other_country = {
				limit = { is_ai = yes }
				news_event = rusnews.8
			}
			RUS = { RUS_initialise_socrus = yes }
		}
	}
}

			}
		}

### Triggered Anger Events ###

country_event = { #Anger from casualties
	id = russia.961
	title = russia.961.t
	desc = russia.961.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army3
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		original_tag = RUS
		has_war = yes
		OR = {
			has_idea = RUS_military_anger
			has_idea = RUS_military_anger_dem
		}
		casualties_k > 1000
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = { months = 2 }

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.961 option russia.961.a"
		name = russia.961.a
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #Anger from surrender progress
	id = russia.962
	title = russia.962.t
	desc = russia.962.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_border

	trigger = {
		surrender_progress > 0.1
		OR = {
			has_idea = RUS_military_anger
			has_idea = RUS_military_anger_dem
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.962 option russia.961.a"
		name = russia.961.a
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #Reduced anger from winning a war
	id = russia.963
	title = russia.963.t
	desc = russia.963.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army_1
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_idea = RUS_military_anger
			has_idea = RUS_military_anger_dem
		}
	}
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.963 option russia.963.a"
		name = russia.963.a
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { RUS_military_anger > 0 } }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
			RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		}
		else = {
			add_war_support = 0.03
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Renaming of states
	id = russia.964
	title = russia.964.t
	desc = russia.964.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_savinkov1
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.964 option russia.964.a"
		name = russia.964.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				owns_state = 5 #Konigsberg
			}
			5 = {
				set_global_flag = konigsberg_renamed_savinkov
				set_state_name = STATE_5_KALEDINGRAD
				set_province_name = { id = 6332 name = VICTORY_POINTS_6332_KALEDINGRAD }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				owns_state = 777 #Masuria
			}
			777 = {
				set_global_flag = allenstein_renamed_savinkov
				custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
				set_province_name = { id = 9346 name = VICTORY_POINTS_9346_ROPSHINGRAD }
			}
		}
		253 = {
			set_global_flag = ivanovovznesensk_renamed_savinkov
			custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
			set_province_name = { id = 357 name = VICTORY_POINTS_357_NECHAYEV }
		}
		248 = {
			set_global_flag = rybinsk_renamed_savinkov
			set_victory_points = { province = 6167 value = 3 }
			set_province_name = { id = 6167 name = VICTORY_POINTS_6167_SAVINKOVSK }
		}
		### Possible names to add - Svobodinsk, Belovsk
	}
}

country_event = { #Ukraine in Flames
	id = russia.1100
	title = russia.1100.t
	desc = russia.1100.d
	immediate = {
		set_variable = { RUS_USNS_cp_cost = 30 }
		set_variable = { RUS_USNS_speed = 50 }
		set_variable = { RUS_UKR_governor_compliance = 3 }
	}
	trigger = {
		202 = { #Kyiv
			is_owned_and_controlled_by = ROOT
		}
		is_russian_tag = yes
		has_socialist_government = no
		NOT = { has_war_with = GER }
		is_subject = no
	}
	fire_only_once = yes
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia.1127 days = 25 } #Belarusian Resistance
			country_event = { id = russia.1103 days = 21 } #Commander of the Ukrainian Military District
			country_event = { id = russia.1116 days = 80 } #The Kharkov Trials
		}
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_rally
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1100 option russia.1100.a"
		name = russia.1100.a
		add_ideas = RUS_UKR_resistance
		792 = { #Volhynia, AGAIN
			add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_USNS_rebels }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { UKR = { is_monarchy = no } }
			201 = { #Zhitomir
				add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_USNS_rebels }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { UKR = { has_government = national_populist } }
			199 = { #Proskurov
				add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_USNS_rebels }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { UKR = { has_socialist_government = yes } }
			192 = { #Odessa
				add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_USNS_rebels }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { UKR = { has_completed_focus = UKR_partisan_training } }
			997 = { #Polesia
				add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_USNS_rebels }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { 202 = { NOT = { has_state_flag = ukraine_state } } } #Kyiv
			95 = { #Pinsk
				add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_USNS_rebels }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_neighbor_country = {
					has_socialist_government = yes
					OR = {
						tag = POL
						tag = LIT
						tag = GAL
						tag = HUN
					}
				}
			}
			93 = { #Brest-Litovsk
				add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_USNS_rebels }
			}
		}
		activate_mission = RUS_USNS_spreading
		activate_targeted_decision = { target = ROOT decision = RUS_finish_resistance }
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_USNS_rebels }
			}
			ROOT = { activate_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_counter_insurgency target = PREV } }
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { is_core_of = UKR }
			add_resistance = 50
			add_compliance = -10
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Administrative Division of Ukraine
	id = russia.1101
	title = russia.1101.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_unitary_state }
		text = russia.1101.d.unitary
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_unitary_state } }
		text = russia.1101.d
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_central_rada
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			add_to_array = { RUS.RUS_novorossia = 221.id } #Kharkiv
			add_to_array = { RUS.RUS_novorossia = 228.id } #Starobyelsk
			add_to_array = { RUS.RUS_novorossia = 227.id } #Yuzovka
			add_to_array = { RUS.RUS_novorossia = 821.id } #Pavlograd
			add_to_array = { RUS.RUS_novorossia = 200.id } #Aleksandrovsk
			add_to_array = { RUS.RUS_novorossia = 196.id } #Taurida
			137 = { remove_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = UKR_crimean_autonomy } }
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_core_of = UKR
						state = 91 #Lviv
						state = 89 #Stanislviv
						state = 80 #Cernauti
						state = 1088 #Chelm
						state = 73 #Transcarpathia
						state = 78 #Bessarabia
					}
					NOT = {
						is_in_array = { RUS.RUS_novorossia = THIS }
						state = 137 #Crimea
					}
				}
				add_to_array = { RUS.RUS_small_ukraine = THIS }
			}
			country_event = { id = russia.1104 days = 180 } #Tereschenko and Protofis
			country_event = { id = russia.1105 days = 250 } #Minister of Ukrainian Matters
			country_event = { id = russia.1106 days = 360 } #Kharkiv, the City of Liberation
			country_event = { id = russia.1107 days = 450 } #With Russia or with Communism
			country_event = { id = rusfla.135 days = 500 random_days = 365 } #The Future of Ukraine
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1101 option russia.1101.a"
		name = russia.1101.a #Ukrainian Autonomy
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				OR = {
					has_left_democratic_government = yes
					has_country_leader = { character = RUS_vasily_maklakov }
					has_country_leader = { character = RUS_nikolay_nekrasov }
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 5
				RUS_savinkov = yes
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_towards_unitary_state
				has_country_flag = RUS_unitary_state
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -50
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_core_of = UKR
					state = 91 #Lviv
					state = 89 #Stanislviv
					state = 80 #Cernauti
					state = 78 #Bessarabia
					state = 73 #Transcarpathia
					state = 1088 #Chelm
				}
				NOT = { state = 137 } #Crimea
			}
			set_state_flag = ukraine_state
			add_compliance = 5
			add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_ukraine_modifier_autonomy }
		}
		#weaken USNS
		add_to_variable = { RUS_USNS_speed = 15 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_UKR_resistance_reduce
		set_country_flag = RUS_full_UKR_autonomy
		activate_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_crimean_self_rule target = 137 } #Crimea
		hidden_effect = {
			add_days_mission_timeout = {
				mission = RUS_USNS_spreading
				days = 15
			}
			country_event = { id = russia.1102 days = 20 } #Government of Ukraine
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1101 option russia.1101.b"
		name = russia.1101.b #Ukrainian and Novorossian Autonomies
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				OR = {
					has_country_leader = { character = RUS_anton_kartashyov }
					has_government = social_conservative
					has_government = authoritarian_democrat
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 5
				RUS_savinkov = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_left_democratic_government = yes
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_towards_unitary_state
				has_country_flag = RUS_unitary_state
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
		add_to_array = { RUS.RUS_novorossia = 226.id } #Ekaterinoslav
		add_to_array = { RUS.RUS_novorossia = 197.id } #Kherson
		add_to_array = { RUS.RUS_novorossia = 192.id } #Odessa
		remove_from_array = { RUS.RUS_small_ukraine = 226.id } #Ekaterinoslav
		remove_from_array = { RUS.RUS_small_ukraine = 197.id } #Kherson
		remove_from_array = { RUS.RUS_small_ukraine = 192.id } #Odessa
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_core_of = UKR
				is_in_array = { RUS.RUS_novorossia = THIS }
			}
			set_state_flag = novorus_state
			add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_novorussia_modifier_autonomy }
			add_resistance = 20
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						is_core_of = UKR
						is_in_array = { RUS.RUS_small_ukraine = THIS }
					}
					state = 91 #Lviv
					state = 89 #Stanislviv
					state = 80 #Cernauti
					state = 78 #Bessarabia
					state = 73 #Transcarpathia
					state = 1088 #Chelm
				}
			}
			set_state_flag = ukraine_state
			add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_ukraine_modifier_autonomy }
			add_resistance = 20
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_split_UKR
		activate_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_crimean_self_rule target = 137 } #Crimea
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia.1102 days = 20 } #Government of Ukraine
			country_event = { id = rusfla.138 days = 700 random_days = 200 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1101 option russia.1101.c"
		name = russia.1101.c #Ukrainian Autonomy + annex the east
		ai_chance = {
			base = 5
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				OR = {
					RUS_solonevich = yes
					has_government = authoritarian_democrat
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_left_democratic_government = yes
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_towards_unitary_state
				has_country_flag = RUS_unitary_state
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -25
		add_stability = -0.05
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_core_of = UKR
				is_in_array = { RUS.RUS_novorossia = THIS }
			}
			add_compliance = -10
			add_resistance = 40
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						is_core_of = UKR
						is_in_array = { RUS.RUS_small_ukraine = THIS }
					}
					state = 91 #Lviv
					state = 89 #Stanislviv
					state = 80 #Cernauti
					state = 78 #Bessarabia
					state = 73 #Transcarpathia
					state = 1088 #Chelm
				}
			}
			set_state_flag = ukraine_state
			add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_ukraine_modifier_autonomy }
			add_compliance = -10
			add_resistance = 40
		}
		activate_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_crimean_self_rule target = 137 } #Crimea
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia.1102 days = 20 } #Government of Ukraine
			country_event = { id = russia.1117 days = 50 } #Position of the Ukrainian and Belarusian Language
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1101 option russia.1101.e"
		name = russia.1101.e #Annex it all
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_ensure_federalism_law
				has_completed_focus = RUS_empower_autonomies
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.15
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { is_core_of = UKR }
			add_compliance = -40
			add_resistance = 80
		}
		subtract_from_variable = { RUS_USNS_speed = 15 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_UKR_resistance_boost
		set_country_flag = RUS_annexed_UKR
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_state = { #This is in case you already annexed Galicia and got autonomy modifiers there
				limit = { has_state_flag = ukraine_state }
				clr_state_flag = ukraine_state
				remove_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_ukraine_modifier_autonomy }
			}
			add_days_mission_timeout = {
				mission = RUS_USNS_spreading
				days = -15
			}
			country_event = { id = russia.1117 days = 50 } #Position of the Ukrainian and Belarusian Language
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Government of Ukraine
	id = russia.1102
	title = russia.1102.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_elected_government = yes }
		text = russia.1102.d.dem
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_government = national_populist }
		text = russia.1102.d.szrs
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = yes } }
		text = russia.1102.d.solonevich
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_elected_government = yes
				has_government = national_populist
				RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = yes }
			}
		}
		text = russia.1102.d
	}
	trigger = { controls_state = 202 }
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_dacha
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1102 option russia.1102.a"
		name = russia.1102.a #SHD-protofis
		trigger = {
			RUS_is_demrus = yes
			has_left_democratic_government = no
		}
		add_stability = 0.03
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { is_core_of = UKR }
			add_compliance = 3
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = paternal_autocrat popularity = 0.03 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1102 option russia.1102.b"
		name = russia.1102.b #Savinkovite
		trigger = { has_government = national_populist }
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { is_core_of = UKR }
			add_resistance = -5
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = national_populist popularity = 0.03 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1102 option russia.1102.c"
		name = russia.1102.c #Classocrats
		trigger = {
			has_completed_focus = RUS_duma_of_best_minds
			has_government = paternal_autocrat
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { is_core_of = UKR }
			add_compliance = 3
			add_resistance = -5
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = authoritarian_democrat popularity = 0.03 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1102 option russia.1102.e"
		name = russia.1102.e #elections
		trigger = {
			RUS_is_demrus = yes
			has_authoritarian_government = no
			NOT = { has_completed_focus = RUS_towards_unitary_state }
		}
		add_political_power = -35
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { is_core_of = UKR }
			add_compliance = 5
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_liberal popularity = 0.02 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_democrat popularity = 0.02 }
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia.1113 days = 10 }
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Commander of the Ukrainian Military District
	id = russia.1103
	title = russia.1103.t
	desc = russia.1103.d
	trigger = { controls_state = 202 }
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_troops2
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1103 option russia.1103.a"
		name = russia.1103.a
		trigger = {
			has_character = RUS_vladimir_manstein
			has_government = national_populist
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_UKR_manstein_tt
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { is_core_of = UKR }
			add_compliance = -6
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_UKR_risk_tt
		RUS_vladimir_manstein = {
			set_character_flag = RUS_UKR_governor
			ROOT = {
				set_variable = { RUS_UKR_governor_compliance = PREV.skill_level }
				multiply_variable = { RUS_UKR_governor_compliance = 2 }
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1103 option russia.1103.b"
		name = russia.1103.b
		trigger = { has_character = RUS_boris_shteyfon }
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { is_core_of = UKR }
			add_compliance = 2
			add_resistance = -5
		}
		add_command_power = 40
		multiply_variable = { RUS_USNS_cp_cost = 2 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_UKR_risk_tt
		RUS_boris_shteyfon = {
			set_character_flag = RUS_UKR_governor
			ROOT = {
				set_variable = { RUS_UKR_governor_compliance = PREV.skill_level }
				multiply_variable = { RUS_UKR_governor_compliance = 2 }
			}
		}
		add_to_variable = { RUS_USNS_speed = 30 }
		hidden_effect = {
			add_days_mission_timeout = {
				mission = RUS_USNS_spreading
				days = 30
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1103 option russia.1103.c"
		name = russia.1103.c
		trigger = {
			has_character = RUS_andrey_shkuro
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_abolished_cossack_hosts }
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { is_core_of = UKR }
			add_compliance = 3
			add_resistance = -3
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_template = "Kazachya diviziya" }
			random_owned_controlled_state = {
				prioritize = { 202 }
				limit = { valid_state_for_spawning_friendly_unit = yes }
				create_unit = {
					division = "division_template = \"Kazachya diviziya\" start_experience_factor = 0.6 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
					owner = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_democratic_government = no
					has_government = social_conservative
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = 4 }
			change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_UKR_risk_tt
		RUS_andrey_shkuro = {
			set_character_flag = RUS_UKR_governor
			ROOT = {
				set_variable = { RUS_UKR_governor_compliance = PREV.skill_level }
				multiply_variable = { RUS_UKR_governor_compliance = 2 }
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1103 option russia.1103.e"
		name = russia.1103.e
		trigger = {
			has_character = RUS_rodion_malinovsky
			is_monarchy = no
		}
		add_stability = 0.05
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { is_core_of = UKR }
			add_compliance = 5
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_UKR_risk_tt
		RUS_rodion_malinovsky = {
			set_character_flag = RUS_UKR_governor
			ROOT = {
				set_variable = { RUS_UKR_governor_compliance = PREV.skill_level }
				multiply_variable = { RUS_UKR_governor_compliance = 2 }
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1103 option russia.1103.f"
		name = russia.1103.f
		trigger = {
			has_character = RUS_andrei_grechko
			RUS_andrei_grechko = { skill > 1 }
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { is_core_of = UKR }
			add_compliance = 5
			add_resistance = -10
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_UKR_risk_tt
		RUS_andrei_grechko = {
			set_character_flag = RUS_UKR_governor
			ROOT = {
				set_variable = { RUS_UKR_governor_compliance = PREV.skill_level }
				multiply_variable = { RUS_UKR_governor_compliance = 2 }
			}
		}
	}

	id = russia.1113
	title = russia.1113.t

	}
	desc = { #Novorussia exists

		text = russia.1113.d.2
	}
	desc = { #Novorussia annexed
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_full_UKR_autonomy }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_split_UKR }
		}
		text = russia.1113.d.3
	}

		controls_state = 202
		has_democratic_government = yes
	}

		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_full_UKR_autonomy }

			limit = { is_core_of = UKR }
			add_compliance = 5
			add_resistance = -10
		}
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = RUS_UKR_opposition
			days = 730
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_democrat popularity = 0.02 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_liberal popularity = 0.04 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = market_liberal popularity = 0.03 }
		RUS_increase_democracy = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1113 option russia.1113.b"
		name = russia.1113.b
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_full_UKR_autonomy }
		add_stability = 0.04
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { is_core_of = UKR }
			add_compliance = 3
		}

		RUS_increase_democracy = yes

			limit = { is_core_of = UKR }
			add_compliance = 2
		}

			idea = RUS_UKR_opposition
			days = 365
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_liberal popularity = 0.04 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_conservative popularity = 0.04 }
		RUS_increase_democracy = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1113 option russia.1113.e"
		name = russia.1113.e
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_full_UKR_autonomy }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_split_UKR }
		}

			limit = { is_core_of = UKR }

		}

			days = 1825
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_democrat popularity = 0.04 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_liberal popularity = 0.04 }
		RUS_increase_democracy = yes
	}

country_event = { #uprising in ukraine
	id = russia.1120
	title = russia.1120.t
	desc = russia.1120.d

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		has_war_with = INT
		controls_state = 202 #Kyiv
		OR = {
			has_idea = RUS_UKR_resistance
			has_government = national_populist
			has_government = paternal_autocrat
		}
		OR = {
			any_owned_state = {
				is_core_of = UKR
				any_neighbor_state = { owner = { has_socialist_government = yes } }
			}
			773 = { owner = { has_socialist_government = yes } } #Constantinople
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1120 option russia.1120.a"
		name = russia.1120.a
		every_state = {
			limit = {
				is_core_of = UKR
				is_owned_by = RUS
				OR = {
					has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_USNS_rebels }
					resistance > 75
					state = 792 #Volyn
					state = 192 #Odessa
				}
			}
			remove_core_of = RUS
			UKR = { transfer_state = PREV }
			if = {
				limit = { has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_USNS_rebels } }
				remove_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_USNS_rebels }
			}
		}
		INT = { add_to_faction = UKR }
		UKR = {
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { NOT = { has_character = UKR_symon_petliura } }
					UKR_symon_petliura = { set_nationality = UKR }
					UKR_yurii_tiutiunnyk = { set_nationality = UKR }
					UKR_oleksandr_udovychenko = { set_nationality = UKR }
					UKR_omelian_volokh = { set_nationality = UKR }
				}
			}
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = radical_socialist
				elections_allowed = no
			}
			UKR_yurii_tiutiunnyk = {
				add_country_leader_role = {
					country_leader = {
						desc = UKR_yurii_tiutiunnyk_commander_desc
						ideology = social_democrat_subtype
						traits = { KR_respected_war_hero_sic }
					}
					promote_leader = yes
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				RUS = {
					declare_war_on = {
						target = UKR
						type = annex_everything
					}
				}
				drop_cosmetic_tag = yes
				set_cosmetic_tag = UKR_republic
				mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
				UKR_remove_hetmanate = yes
				set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:radical_socialist }
				add_to_coalition = yes
				set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:social_liberal }
				add_to_coalition = yes
				activate_advisor = UKR_mykhailo_poloz_sic
				activate_advisor = UKR_oleksandr_hrekiv_army_chief
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = totalist
					name = UKR_URVA_party
					long_name = UKR_URVA_party_long
				}
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = syndicalist
					name = UKR_URVA_party
					long_name = UKR_URVA_party_long
				}
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = radical_socialist
					name = UKR_USNS-L_party
					long_name = UKR_USNS-L_party_long
				}
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = social_democrat
					name = UKR_USNS-C_party
					long_name = UKR_USNS-C_party_long
				}
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = social_liberal
					name = UKR_USNS-R_party
					long_name = UKR_USNS-R_party_long
				}
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = market_liberal
					name = UKR_USNS-R_party
					long_name = UKR_USNS-R_party_long
				}
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = social_conservative
					name = UKR_USNS-R_party
					long_name = UKR_USNS-R_party_long
				}
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = authoritarian_democrat
					name = UKR_USNS-R_party
					long_name = UKR_USNS-R_party_long
				}
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = paternal_autocrat
					name = UKR_ZSLUN_party
					long_name = UKR_ZSLUN_party_long
				}
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = national_populist
					name = UKR_ZSLUN_party
					long_name = UKR_ZSLUN_party_long
				}
				add_ideas = war_economy
				add_ideas = extensive_conscription
				add_war_support = 0.5
				add_popularity = { ideology = radical_socialist popularity = 0.4 }
				add_manpower = 50000
				#add ideas?
				add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
					type = infantry_equipment_1
					amount = 3000
					producer = RUS
				}
				set_technology = { tech_irregulars = 1 popup = no }
				set_technology = { tech_militias = 1 popup = no }
				division_template = {
					name = "Dyviziia Opolchennia"
					division_names_group = UKR_MIL_01
					regiments = {
						irregular_infantry = { x = 0 y = 0 }
						irregular_infantry = { x = 0 y = 1 }
						irregular_infantry = { x = 0 y = 2 }
						irregular_infantry = { x = 1 y = 0 }
						irregular_infantry = { x = 1 y = 1 }
						irregular_infantry = { x = 1 y = 2 }
						irregular_infantry = { x = 2 y = 0 }
						irregular_infantry = { x = 2 y = 1 }
						irregular_infantry = { x = 2 y = 2 }
					}
				}
			}
			random_owned_controlled_state = {
				prioritize = { 792 }
				limit = { valid_state_for_spawning_friendly_unit = yes }
				create_unit = {
					division = "division_template = \"Dyviziia Opolchennia\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
					owner = PREV
					count = 2
				}
				create_unit = {
					division = "division_template = \"Kavaleriya Dyviziya\" start_experience_factor = 0.7 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
					owner = PREV
					count = 2
				}
			}
			random_owned_controlled_state = {
				prioritize = { 192 }
				limit = { valid_state_for_spawning_friendly_unit = yes }
				create_unit = {
					division = "division_template = \"Dyviziia Opolchennia\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
					owner = PREV
					count = 2
				}
			}
			random_owned_controlled_state = {
				limit = { valid_state_for_spawning_friendly_unit = yes }
				create_unit = {
					division = "division_template = \"Kavaleriya Dyviziya\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
					owner = PREV
					count = 2
				}
			}
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = { is_controlled_by = PREV }
				create_unit = {
					division = "division_template = \"Dyviziia Opolchennia\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
					owner = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Recovered Northwestern Gubernias
	id = russia.1125
	title = russia.1125.t
	desc = russia.1125.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_BLR_national_theatre
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia.1124 days = 200 } #Delatinisation of Belarusian Language
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1125 option russia.1125.a"
		name = russia.1125.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				OR = {
					has_government = social_conservative
					has_government = authoritarian_democrat
				}
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_towards_unitary_state
				has_country_flag = RUS_unitary_state
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -20
		RUS_cossack_division_check = yes
		random_owned_controlled_state = {
			prioritize = { 206 } #Minsk
			limit = { valid_state_for_spawning_friendly_unit = yes }
			create_unit = {
				division = "name = \"Diviziya Bulak-Balakhovich\" division_template = \"Kazachya diviziya\" start_experience_factor = 0.6"
				owner = ROOT
			}
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_controlled_by = ROOT
				is_core_of = BLR
			}
			set_state_flag = belarus_state
			add_resistance = -10
			add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_belarus_modifier_autonomy }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia.1128 days = 75 } #Ataman of Belarus
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1125 option russia.1125.b"
		name = russia.1125.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				OR = {
					has_left_democratic_government = yes
					has_country_leader = { character = RUS_vasily_maklakov }
					has_country_leader = { character = RUS_nikolay_nekrasov }
				}
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_dictatorship_government = yes
				has_completed_focus = RUS_towards_unitary_state
				has_country_flag = RUS_unitary_state
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -30
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_controlled_by = ROOT
				is_core_of = BLR
			}
			set_state_flag = belarus_state
			add_compliance = 3
			add_resistance = -5
			add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_belarus_modifier_autonomy }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia.1126 days = 125 } #Elections in Belarusian Automony
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1125 option russia.1125.c"
		name = russia.1125.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 5
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_government = authoritarian_democrat
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_left_democratic_government = yes
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_ensure_federalism_law
				has_completed_focus = RUS_empower_autonomies
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.075
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_controlled_by = ROOT
				is_core_of = BLR
			}
			add_compliance = -20
			add_resistance = 40
		}
	}
}

	id = russia.1127

	desc = russia.1127.d

		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1127 option russia.1127.a"
		name = russia.1127.a
		194 = { #Mozyr
			add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_generic_rebels }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { BLR = { has_completed_focus = BLR_Partisan_Warfare } }
			95 = { #Pinsk
				add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_generic_rebels }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					var:96.owner = { #Vilnius
						has_socialist_government = yes
					}
					BLR = { has_government = national_populist }
				}
			}
			204 = { #Novogrudok
				add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_generic_rebels }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { 206 = { NOT = { has_state_flag = belarus_state } } } #Minsk
			207 = { #Braslav
				add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_generic_rebels }
			}
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_generic_rebels }
			}
			ROOT = { activate_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_counter_insurgency target = PREV } }
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { is_core_of = BLR }
			add_resistance = 30
			add_compliance = -10
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Future of the Baltic Gubernias
	id = russia.1130
	title = russia.1130.t
	desc = russia.1130.d
	trigger = {
		13 = { is_owned_by_ROOT_or_ally = yes }
		11 = { is_owned_by_ROOT_or_ally = yes }
		842 = { is_owned_by_ROOT_or_ally = yes }
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_Forest_Brothers

	option = { #Pursue autonomy
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1130 option russia.1130.a"
		name = russia.1130.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				OR = {
					has_left_democratic_government = yes
					has_country_leader = { character = RUS_vasily_maklakov }
					has_country_leader = { character = RUS_nikolay_nekrasov }
				}
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_towards_unitary_state
				has_country_flag = RUS_unitary_state
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				owns_state = 13
				owns_state = 11
				owns_state = 842
			}
			add_political_power = -75
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				count_triggers = {
					amount = 2
					owns_state = 13
					owns_state = 11
					owns_state = 842
				}
			}
			add_political_power = -100
		}
		else = {
			add_political_power = -75
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_controlled_by = ROOT
				is_core_of = EST
			}
			set_state_flag = estonia_state
			add_resistance = -10
			add_compliance = 5
			add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_estonia_modifier_autonomy }
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_controlled_by = ROOT
				is_core_of = LAT
				NOT = { is_core_of = ROOT }
			}
			set_state_flag = latvia_state
			add_resistance = -10
			if = {
				limit = {
					ROOT = { RUS_karl_gopper = { is_hired_as_advisor = yes } }
				}
				add_compliance = 10
			}
			else = {
				add_compliance = 5
			}
			add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_latvia_modifier_autonomy }
		}
		880 = {
			clr_state_flag = dvinsk_state
			set_state_flag = latvia_state
			remove_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_dvinsk_modifier }
			add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_latvia_modifier_autonomy }
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_controlled_by = ROOT
				is_core_of = LIT
			}
			set_state_flag = lithuania_state
			add_resistance = -10
			add_compliance = 5
			add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_lithuania_modifier_autonomy }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				188 = { #Memel
					is_owned_by = ROOT
					is_claimed_by = ROOT
				}
			}
			188 = {
				set_state_flag = lithuania_state
				add_resistance = -10
				add_compliance = 5
				add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_lithuania_modifier_autonomy }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				97 = { #Bialystok
					is_owned_by = ROOT
					is_claimed_by = ROOT
				}
			}
			97 = {
				set_state_flag = lithuania_state
				add_resistance = -10
				add_compliance = 5
				add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_lithuania_modifier_autonomy }
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia.1135 days = 25 } #Baltic Resistance
		}
	}
	option = { #Pursue full integration
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1130 option russia.1130.b"
		name = russia.1130.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 5
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_government = market_liberal
						NOT = {
							has_country_leader = { character = RUS_vasily_maklakov }
							has_country_leader = { character = RUS_nikolay_nekrasov }
						}
					}
					has_government = social_conservative
					has_government = authoritarian_democrat
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_left_democratic_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				206 = { has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_belarus_modifier_autonomy } }
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_ensure_federalism_law
				has_completed_focus = RUS_empower_autonomies
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				owns_state = 13
				owns_state = 11
				owns_state = 842
			}
			add_stability = -0.075
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				count_triggers = {
					amount = 2
					owns_state = 13
					owns_state = 11
					owns_state = 842
				}
			}
			add_stability = -0.05
		}
		else = {
			add_stability = -0.025
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_controlled_by = ROOT
				is_core_of = LAT
				is_core_of = EST
				is_core_of = LIT
				NOT = { is_core_of = ROOT }
			}
			add_compliance = -15
			add_resistance = 25
		}
		880 = {
			clr_state_flag = dvinsk_state
			remove_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_dvinsk_modifier }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia.1135 days = 25 } #Baltic Resistance
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Puppet the Baltic allies?
	id = russia.1131
	title = russia.1131.t
	desc = russia.1131.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_Forest_Brothers

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #hell yeah hoe
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1131 option russia.1131.a"
		name = russia.1131.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				EST = {
					is_in_faction_with = RUS
					is_subject = no
				}
			}
			EST = { country_event = russia.1132 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				LAT = {
					is_in_faction_with = RUS
					is_subject = no
				}
			}
			LAT = { country_event = russia.1132 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				LIT = {
					is_in_faction_with = RUS
					is_subject = no
				}
			}
			LIT = { country_event = russia.1132 }
		}
	}
	option = { #nah I'm good
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1131 option russia.1131.b"
		name = russia.1131.b
		add_stability = 0.02
	}
}

country_event = { #Puppet the Baltic allies? (Baltic reaction to this)
	id = russia.1132
	title = russia.1132.t
	desc = russia.1132.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_Forest_Brothers

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Cringe! But I gotta do it!
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1132 option russia.1132.a"
		name = russia.1132.a
		RUS = {
			set_autonomy = {
				target = ROOT
				autonomy_state = autonomous_puppet
				end_wars = no
			}
			country_event = russia.1133
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					AND = {
						has_authoritarian_government = yes
						RUS = { has_elected_government = yes }
					}
				}
			}
			restore_previous_government_type = yes
		}
	}
	option = { #I have a death wish
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1132 option russia.1132.b"
		name = russia.1132.b
		add_war_support = 0.05
		leave_faction = yes
		RUS = {
			country_event = russia.1134
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Baltic state says yes
	id = russia.1133
	title = russia.1133.t
	desc = russia.1133.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_Forest_Brothers

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #yay
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1133 option russia.1133.a"
		name = russia.1133.a
		effect_tooltip = {
			RUS = {
				set_autonomy = {
					target = FROM
					autonomy_state = autonomous_puppet
					end_wars = no
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Baltic state says no
	id = russia.1134
	title = russia.1134.t
	desc = russia.1134.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_Forest_Brothers

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1134 option russia.1134.a"
		name = russia.1134.a
		create_wargoal = {
			type = annex_everything
			target = FROM
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Forest Brothers in Latvia/Estonia
	id = russia.1135
	title = russia.1135.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { #Latvia only
			owns_state = 842
			NOT = { owns_state = 13 }
		}
		text = russia.1135.d.latvia
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { #Estonia only
			owns_state = 13
			NOT = { owns_state = 842 }
		}
		text = russia.1135.d.estonia
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { #Estonia and Latvia
			owns_state = 842
			owns_state = 13
		}
		text = russia.1135.d.both
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_Forest_Brothers

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1135 option russia.1135.a"
		name = russia.1135.a
		if = {
			limit = { owns_state = 842 } #Riga
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					is_core_of = LAT
					NOT = { state = 842 }
				}
				add_resistance = 15
				add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_generic_rebels }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					842 = { #Riga
						NOT = { has_state_flag = latvia_state }
						is_owned_and_controlled_by = ROOT
					}
				}
				842 = { #Estonia
					add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_generic_rebels }
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_democratic_government = yes
					LAT = {
						OR = {
							has_authoritarian_government = yes
							has_socialist_government = yes
						}
					}
				}
				every_owned_state = {
					limit = { is_core_of = LAT }
					add_compliance = 5
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owns_state = 13 }
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					is_core_of = EST
				}
				add_resistance = 15
				add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_generic_rebels }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					13 = { #Estonia
						NOT = { has_state_flag = estonia_state }
						is_owned_and_controlled_by = ROOT
					}
				}
				13 = { #Estonia
					add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_generic_rebels }
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_democratic_government = yes
					EST = { has_authoritarian_government = yes }
				}
				every_owned_state = {
					limit = {
						is_core_of = EST
					}
					add_compliance = 5
				}
			}
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_generic_rebels }
			}
			ROOT = { activate_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_counter_insurgency target = PREV } }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia.1136 days = 30 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Lithuanian Resistance
	id = russia.1136
	title = russia.1136.t
	desc = russia.1136.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		owns_state = 96 #Vilnius
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_Forest_Brothers

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1136 option russia.1136.a"
		name = russia.1136.a
		if = {
			limit = { owns_state = 96 } #Vilnius
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					is_core_of = LIT
					NOT = { state = 94 }
					NOT = { state = 97 }
				}
				add_resistance = 15
				add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_generic_rebels }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					96 = { #Vilnius
						NOT = { has_state_flag = lithuania_state }
						is_owned_and_controlled_by = ROOT
					}
				}
				96 = { #Vilnius
					add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_generic_rebels }
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_democratic_government = yes
					LIT = {
						OR = {
							has_authoritarian_government = yes
							has_socialist_government = yes
						}
					}
				}
				every_owned_state = {
					limit = { is_core_of = LIT }
					add_compliance = 5
				}
			}
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_generic_rebels }
			}
			ROOT = { activate_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_counter_insurgency target = PREV } }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Fate of North Caucasus
	id = russia.1150
	title = russia.1150.t
	desc = russia.1150.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_caucasus

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = { has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_oskab_modifier } }
				remove_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_oskab_modifier }
				force_enable_resistance = { occupier = RUS clear = yes }
				clr_state_flag = oskab_state
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = russia.1150.a
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1150 option russia.1150.a"
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_autonomy_will_be_formed
		custom_effect_tooltip = north_caucasus_state
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		233 = {
			add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_oskab_modifier_autonomy }
			set_state_flag = north_caucasus_state
		}
		961 = {
			add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_oskab_modifier_autonomy }
			set_state_flag = north_caucasus_state
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_abolished_cossack_hosts }
				NOT = { 787 = { has_state_flag = terek_state } }
			}
			787 = {
				add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_cossack_host_modifier }
				set_state_flag = terek_state
			}
		}
		RUS_autonomy_effect = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.1150.b
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1150 option russia.1150.b"
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_autonomy_will_be_formed
		custom_effect_tooltip = kabard_state
		custom_effect_tooltip = chechen_state
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		233 = {
			add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_ethnic_autonomy }
			set_state_flag = kabard_state
		}
		961 = {
			add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_ethnic_autonomy }
			set_state_flag = chechen_state
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_abolished_cossack_hosts }
				NOT = { 787 = { has_state_flag = terek_state } }
			}
			787 = {
				add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_cossack_host_modifier }
				set_state_flag = terek_state
			}
		}
		#Kalmyk Autonomy is created through decision RUS_caspian_autonomies
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.1150.c
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1150 option russia.1150.c"
		add_stability = 0.01
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_abolished_cossack_hosts }
				NOT = { 787 = { has_state_flag = terek_state } }
			}
			787 = {
				add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_cossack_host_modifier }
				set_state_flag = terek_state
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Fate of South Caucasus
	id = russia.1152
	title = russia.1152.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS_savinkov = yes }
		text = russia.1152.d.szrs
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS_savinkov = no }
		text = russia.1152.d.dem
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_caucasus
	trigger = {
		has_socialist_government = no
		is_russian_tag = yes
		OR = {
			owns_state = 231 #Georgia
			owns_state = 230 #Armenia
			owns_state = 229 #Azerbaijan
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = russia.1152.a
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1152 option russia.1152.a"
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_towards_unitary_state
				has_country_flag = RUS_unitary_state
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -25
		if = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_autonomy_will_be_formed
			custom_effect_tooltip = georgian_state
			limit = {
				231 = {
					is_owned_by = ROOT
					NOT = { has_state_flag = georgian_state }
				}
			}
			231 = {
				add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_georgia_modifier_autonomy }
				add_compliance = 10
				set_state_flag = georgian_state
			}
			if = {
				limit = { 585 = { is_owned_by = RUS } } #Batumi
				585 = {
					add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_georgia_modifier_autonomy }
					add_compliance = 10
					set_state_flag = georgian_state
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { 1080 = { is_owned_by = RUS } } #Abkhazia
				1080 = {
					add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_georgia_modifier_autonomy }
					add_compliance = 10
					set_state_flag = georgian_state
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				230 = {
					is_owned_by = ROOT
					NOT = { has_state_flag = armenian_state }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_autonomy_will_be_formed
			custom_effect_tooltip = armenian_state
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = { is_core_of = ARM }
				add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_armenia_modifier_autonomy }
				add_compliance = 10
				set_state_flag = armenian_state
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				229 = {
					is_owned_by = ROOT
					NOT = { has_state_flag = azeri_state }
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_autonomy_will_be_formed
			custom_effect_tooltip = azeri_state
			229 = {
				add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_azerbaijan_modifier_autonomy }
				add_compliance = 10
				set_state_flag = azeri_state
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owns_state = 1001 } #Lazistan
			1001 = {
				add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_georgia_modifier_autonomy }
				add_compliance = 10
				set_state_flag = georgian_state
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia.1153 days = 90 } #Resurgence of Caucasian Resistance
			if = {
				limit = {
					231 = {
						is_owned_by = RUS
						has_state_flag = georgian_state
					}
				}
				country_event = { id = russia.1154 days = 20 } #Georgian government
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.1152.b
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1152 option russia.1152.b"
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_ensure_federalism_law
				has_completed_focus = RUS_empower_autonomies
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_controlled_by = ROOT
				is_core_of = GEO
				is_core_of = AZR
				NOT = { is_core_of = ROOT }
			}
			add_compliance = -25
			add_resistance = 25
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_controlled_by = ROOT
				is_core_of = ARM
				NOT = { is_core_of = ROOT }
			}
			add_compliance = -15
			add_resistance = 15
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia.1153 days = 90 } #Resurgence of Caucasian Resistance
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Resurgence of Caucasian Resistance
	id = russia.1153
	title = russia.1153.t
	desc = russia.1153.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_caucasus

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1153 option russia.1153.a"
		name = russia.1153.a
		add_stability = -0.04
		add_manpower = -55000
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_core_of = GEO
				is_core_of = AZR
				is_core_of = ARM
				NOT = { is_core_of = ROOT }
			}
			add_compliance = -10
			add_resistance = 50
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1153 option russia.1153.b"
		name = russia.1153.b
		trigger = { NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_OSKAB_reformed } }
		add_stability = -0.02
		add_political_power = -50
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_core_of = GEO
				is_core_of = AZR
				is_core_of = ARM
				NOT = { is_core_of = ROOT }
			}
			add_resistance = 30
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1153 option russia.1153.c"
		name = russia.1153.c
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_OSKAB_reformed }
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_core_of = GEO
				is_core_of = AZR
				is_core_of = ARM
				NOT = { is_core_of = ROOT }
			}
			add_resistance = 10
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Georgian government
	id = russia.1154
	title = russia.1154.t
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			is_monarchy = no
			RUS_is_demrus = yes
			RUS_wrangel_path = no
			NOT = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_towards_unitary_state
				has_government = authoritarian_democrat
			}
		}
		text = russia.1154.d.dem
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_government = national_populist }
		text = russia.1154.d.szrs
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			RUS_solonevich = yes
			has_government = authoritarian_democrat
		}
		text = russia.1154.d.solonevich
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			is_monarchy = yes
			has_country_leader = { character = RUS_vladimir_romanov }
			has_country_flag = RUS_leonida_marriage
			NOT = {
				RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = yes }
				has_completed_focus = RUS_towards_unitary_state
			}
		}
		text = russia.1154.d.monarchy.leonida
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			is_monarchy = yes
			has_country_leader = { character = RUS_vladimir_romanov }
			NOT = {
				RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = yes }
				has_country_flag = RUS_leonida_marriage
				has_completed_focus = RUS_towards_unitary_state
			}
		}
		text = russia.1154.d.monarchy
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			is_monarchy = yes
			RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = yes }
			NOT = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_towards_unitary_state
			}
		}
		text = russia.1154.d.monarchy.solonevich
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			is_monarchy = yes
			RUS_wrangel_path = yes
			has_country_leader = { character = RUS_pyotr_wrangel }
			NOT = {
				RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = yes }
				has_completed_focus = RUS_towards_unitary_state
			}
		}
		text = russia.1154.d.monarchy.wrangel
	}

	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_completed_focus = RUS_towards_unitary_state
			NOT = { has_government = authoritarian_democrat }
		}
		text = russia.1154.d
	}
	trigger = { controls_state = 231 }
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_Georgia_tbilisi
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1154 option russia.1154.a"
		name = russia.1154.a #local bureaucrats
		trigger = {
			has_completed_focus = RUS_towards_unitary_state
			NOT = { has_government = authoritarian_democrat }
		}
		add_stability = 0.03
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { has_state_flag = georgian_state }
			add_compliance = 3
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = paternal_autocrat popularity = 0.03 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1154 option russia.1154.b"
		name = russia.1154.b #Savinkovite
		trigger = { has_government = national_populist }
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { has_state_flag = georgian_state }
			add_resistance = -5
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = national_populist popularity = 0.03 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1154 option russia.1154.c"
		name = russia.1154.c #traditionalists
		trigger = {
			RUS_solonevich = yes
			has_government = authoritarian_democrat
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { has_state_flag = georgian_state }
			add_compliance = 3
			add_resistance = -5
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = authoritarian_democrat popularity = 0.03 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1154 option russia.1154.e"
		name = russia.1154.e #elections
		trigger = {
			is_monarchy = no
			RUS_is_demrus = yes
			has_authoritarian_government = no
			NOT = { has_completed_focus = RUS_towards_unitary_state }
		}
		add_political_power = -35
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { has_state_flag = georgian_state }
			add_compliance = 5
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_liberal popularity = 0.02 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_democrat popularity = 0.02 }
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russia.1155 days = 180 } #Elections in Georgia
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1154 option russia.1154.f"
		name = russia.1154.f #no georgian king
		trigger = {
			is_monarchy = yes
			RUS_is_demrus = yes
			NOT = { has_completed_focus = RUS_towards_unitary_state }
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { has_state_flag = georgian_state }
			add_resistance = 5
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = no }
			}
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
			RUS_change_right_anger = yes
			add_popularity = { ideology = social_conservative popularity = 0.02 }
			add_popularity = { ideology = market_liberal popularity = 0.02 }
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = { id = russia.1155 days = 180 } #Elections in Georgia
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_stability = 0.03
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1154 option russia.1154.g"
		name = russia.1154.g #georgian king
		trigger = {
			is_monarchy = yes
			RUS_is_demrus = yes
			NOT = { has_completed_focus = RUS_towards_unitary_state }
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { has_state_flag = georgian_state }
			add_compliance = 5
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_georgian_monarchy
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = no }
			}
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
			RUS_change_right_anger = yes
			add_popularity = { ideology = social_democrat popularity = 0.02 }
			add_popularity = { ideology = social_liberal popularity = 0.02 }
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = { id = russia.1155 days = 180 } #Elections in Georgia
			}
			else = {
				add_popularity = { ideology = paternal_autocrat popularity = 0.03 }
				add_political_power = -35
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Elections in Georgia
	id = russia.1155
	title = russia.1155.t
	desc = russia.1155.d
	trigger = {
		controls_state = 231
		RUS_is_demrus = yes
	}
	picture = GFX_Georgia_tbilisi
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1155 option russia.1155.a"
		name = russia.1155.a
		add_stability = 0.03
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { has_state_flag = georgian_state }
			add_compliance = 10
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_democrat popularity = 0.03 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_liberal popularity = 0.03 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1155 option russia.1155.b"
		name = russia.1155.b
		add_stability = 0.05
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { has_state_flag = georgian_state }
			add_compliance = 5
			add_resistance = -15
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = market_liberal popularity = 0.04 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_conservative popularity = 0.03 }
	}
}

### DemRus Constituent Assembly and election events

unit_leader_event = { # 3rd Constitutional Asssembly
	id = ruselections.1
	title = ruselections.1.t
	desc = ruselections.1.d
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.1 option ruselections.1.a"
		name = ruselections.1.a
		hidden_effect = {
			var:country_leader = {
				unit_leader_event = { id = ruselections.2 days = 1 } #Opening speech
			}
		}
		set_variable = { RUS_soc_var = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_socdem_var = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_soclib_var = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_marlib_var = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_soccon_var = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_mil_var = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_temp_mil_anger = 1 }
		set_variable = { RUS_temp_right_anger = 1 }
		set_variable = { RUS_temp_left_anger = 1 }
		set_country_flag = RUS_ongoing_const_assembly
		unlock_decision_category_tooltip = RUS_3rd_constitutional_assembly
		activate_mission = RUS_military_pressure_mission
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_pyotr_wrangel = { is_country_leader = yes } }
			activate_mission = RUS_monarchism_mission
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_boldyrev = yes }
			set_country_flag = RUS_lost_wk2 #temporarily here
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		custom_effect_tooltip = ruselections.1.tt
	}
}

unit_leader_event = { # Opening speech
	id = ruselections.2
	title = ruselections.2.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS_anton_denikin = { is_country_leader = yes } }
		text = ruselections.2.d.denikin
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS_pyotr_wrangel = { is_country_leader = yes } }
		text = ruselections.2.d.wrangel
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_ongoing_const_assembly }
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.2 option ruselections.2.a"
		name = ruselections.2.a
		trigger = { RUS_anton_denikin = { is_country_leader = yes } }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.2 option ruselections.2.b"
		name = ruselections.2.b
		trigger = { RUS_pyotr_wrangel = { is_country_leader = yes } }
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_dmitry_romanov = {
				unit_leader_event = { id = ruselections.6 days = 2 }
			}
		}
	}
}

unit_leader_event = { # Crisis in the Kadet Faction
	id = ruselections.3
	title = ruselections.3.t
	desc = ruselections.3.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_ongoing_const_assembly }
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.3 option ruselections.3.a"
		name = ruselections.3.a
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_kadets_swayed_to_monarchism
		set_country_flag = RUS_kadets_swayed_to_monarchism
		if = {
			limit = { has_decision = RUS_russia_is_monarchy }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_support_marlib
			add_to_variable = { RUS_marlib_var = 1 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { # The constitution is accepted
	id = ruselections.4
	title = ruselections.4.t
	desc = ruselections.4.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { clr_country_flag = RUS_ongoing_const_assembly }

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.4 option ruselections.4.a"
		name = ruselections.4.a
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_enshrine_military_role_law }
			add_political_power = 50
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_active_mission = RUS_land_reform_in_progress
					has_country_flag = RUS_restricted_nationalisation_law
				}
				add_days_mission_timeout = {
					mission = RUS_land_reform_in_progress
					days = 90
				}
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_after_election_tt
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_repeal_communist_ban_law }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_temp_right_anger = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_temp_mil_anger = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_state_secularism_law }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_temp_right_anger = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_state_religion_law }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_temp_left_anger = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_enshrine_military_role_law }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_temp_mil_anger = -1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { is_monarchy = yes }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_temp_left_anger = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_temp_right_anger = -1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { RUS_soccon_var < 0 } }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_temp_right_anger = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { RUS_socdem_var < 0 } }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_temp_left_anger = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { RUS_socdem_var < 0 } }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_temp_mil_anger = 1 }
		}
		#if = {
		#	limit = { check_variable = { RUS_temp_right_anger > 0 } }
		#	set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = RUS_temp_right_anger }
		#	custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_right_anger
		#}
		#if = {
		#	limit = { check_variable = { RUS_temp_left_anger > 0 } }
		#	set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = RUS_temp_left_anger }
		#	custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_left_anger
		#}
		#if = {
		#	limit = { check_variable = { RUS_temp_mil_anger > 0 } }
		#	set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = RUS_temp_mil_anger }
		#	custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_mil_anger
		#}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_pyotr_wrangel = { is_country_leader = yes } }
			RUS_pyotr_wrangel = {
				unit_leader_event = { id = monrus.1 days = 2 } #Wrangel announces intention to return to monarchy
			}
		}
		var:army_chief = {
			unit_leader_event = { id = ruselections.10 days = 4 } #Announce elections
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_kadets_swayed_to_monarchism
	}
}

unit_leader_event = { # The Gunpoint Constitution
	id = ruselections.5
	title = ruselections.5.t
	desc = ruselections.5.d
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.5 option ruselections.5.a"
		name = ruselections.5.a
		trigger = { RUS_anton_denikin = { is_country_leader = yes } }
		clr_country_flag = RUS_ongoing_const_assembly
		set_country_flag = RUS_decrees_law
		set_country_flag = RUS_electoral_threshold_law
		set_country_flag = RUS_judicial_review_law
		set_country_flag = RUS_defensive_democracy_law
		set_country_flag = RUS_enshrine_military_role_law
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 3 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_left_anger
		add_to_variable = { RUS_temp_left_anger = 3 }
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_right_anger
		add_to_variable = { RUS_temp_left_anger = 1 }
		hidden_effect = {
			var:army_chief = {
				unit_leader_event = { id = ruselections.10 days = 2 } #Elections in 90 days
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.5 option ruselections.5.a"
		name = ruselections.5.a
		trigger = { RUS_pyotr_wrangel = { is_country_leader = yes } }
		clr_country_flag = RUS_ongoing_const_assembly
		set_country_flag = RUS_decrees_law
		set_country_flag = RUS_electoral_threshold_law
		set_country_flag = RUS_judicial_review_law
		set_country_flag = RUS_defensive_democracy_law
		set_country_flag = RUS_enshrine_military_role_law
		clr_country_flag = RUS_kadets_swayed_to_monarchism
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 4 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_left_anger
		add_to_variable = { RUS_temp_left_anger = 4 }
		hidden_effect = {
			var:army_chief = {
				unit_leader_event = { id = ruselections.10 days = 2 } #Elections in 90 days
				unit_leader_event = { id = monrus.1 days = 1 } #Wrangel becomes the imperial regent
			}
		}
	}
}
