	id = ruselections.10
	title = ruselections.10.t
	desc = ruselections.10.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army3
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { RUS_is_demrus = yes }

		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.10 option ruselections.10.a"
		name = ruselections.10.a
		complete_national_focus = RUS_democracy_restored
		set_variable = { RUS_RDP_var = 1 }
		set_variable = { RUS_PSR_var = 2 }
		set_variable = { RUS_kadet_var = 2 }
		set_variable = { RUS_VPP_var = 1 }
		activate_mission = RUS_election_timer
		hidden_effect = {
			meta_effect = {
				text = {
					set_politics = {
						ruling_party = paternal_autocrat
						last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
						election_frequency = 3
						elections_allowed = yes
					}
				}
				CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
			}
			RUS_vasily_maklakov = {
				unit_leader_event = { id = ruselections.11 days = 2 } #Kadet intro
			}
		}
	}
}
unit_leader_event = { #Kadet intro
	id = ruselections.11
	title = ruselections.11.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { is_monarchy = no }
		text = ruselections.11.d.republic
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { is_monarchy = yes }
		text = ruselections.11.d.monarchy
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		RUS_is_demrus = yes
		has_active_mission = RUS_election_timer
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.11 option ruselections.11.a"
		name = ruselections.11.a
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_favored_by_establishment_tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_boost_kadet
		add_to_variable = { RUS_kadet_var = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_anton_denikin = { is_country_leader = yes } }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_favored_by_general_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_boost_kadet
			add_to_variable = { RUS_kadet_var = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_electoral_threshold_law }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_favored_by_theshold_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_boost_kadet
			add_to_variable = { RUS_kadet_var = 1 }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { is_monarchy = yes }
				RUS_ilya_fondaminsky = {
					unit_leader_event = { id = ruselections.12 days = 2 } #SR intro
				}
			}
			else = {
				RUS_vladimir_rikhter = {
					unit_leader_event = { id = ruselections.12 days = 2 } #SR intro
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_favored_by_propsys_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_boost_PSR
			add_to_variable = { RUS_PSR_var = 1 }

			}
		}

unit_leader_event = { #RDP intro
	id = ruselections.13
	title = ruselections.13.t
	desc = ruselections.13.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		RUS_is_demrus = yes
		has_active_mission = RUS_election_timer
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.13 option ruselections.13.a"
		name = ruselections.13.a
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_repeal_communist_ban_law }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_favored_by_com_repeal_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_boost_RDP
			add_to_variable = { RUS_RDP_var = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_proportional_system_law }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_favored_by_propsys_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_boost_RDP
			add_to_variable = { RUS_RDP_var = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_repeal_communist_ban_law } }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_harmed_by_com_repeal_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_lower_RDP
			add_to_variable = { RUS_RDP_var = -1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_electoral_threshold_law }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_harmed_by_theshold_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_lower_RDP
			add_to_variable = { RUS_RDP_var = -1 }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_aleksandr_golitsyn = {
				unit_leader_event = { id = ruselections.14 days = 2 } #VPP intro
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Cooperation with communists?
	id = ruselections.16
	title = ruselections.16.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_repeal_communist_ban_law }
		text = ruselections.16.d.communist
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_repeal_communist_ban_law } }
		text = ruselections.16.d.ban
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		RUS_is_demrus = yes
		has_active_mission = RUS_election_timer
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_levitsky
	option = { #Yes
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.16 option ruselections.16.a"
		name = ruselections.16.a
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_rdp_pov
				has_stability < 0.49
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 100
				has_country_flag = RUS_sulimov_ai
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_boost_RDP
		add_to_variable = { RUS_RDP_var = 1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_after_election_tt
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_left_anger
		add_to_variable = { RUS_temp_left_anger = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_rdp_pov } }
			country_event = { id = ruselections.19 days = 5 } #Protests against military
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_repeal_communist_ban_law
				RUS_boldyrev = no
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_radical_RDP_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				RUS_vladimir_levitsky = {
					unit_leader_event = { id = ruselections.17 days = 5 } #Titov ousted
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			hidden_effect = {
				RUS_aleksandr_titov = {
					unit_leader_event = { id = ruselections.18 days = 5 } #Titov stays
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { #No
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.16 option ruselections.16.b"
		name = ruselections.16.b
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_rdp_pov
				has_stability > 0.5
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_titov_ai
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.03
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_rdp_pov }
				RUS_aleksandr_titov = {
					unit_leader_event = { id = ruselections.18 days = 5 } #Titov stays
				}
			}
			else = {
				country_event = { id = ruselections.19 days = 5 } #Protests against military
			}
		}
	}
}
unit_leader_event = { #Titov ousted
	id = ruselections.17
	title = ruselections.17.t
	desc = ruselections.17.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		RUS_is_demrus = yes
		has_active_mission = RUS_election_timer
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.17 option ruselections.17.a"
		name = ruselections.17.a
		clr_country_flag = RUS_RDP_leader_titov
		set_country_flag = RUS_RDP_leader_levitsky
		add_country_leader_role = {
			character = RUS_daniil_sulimov
			country_leader = {
				desc = RUS_daniil_sulimov_leader_desc
				ideology = social_democrat_subtype
			}
			promote_leader = yes
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = 0.03 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_after_election_tt
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_decrease_left_anger
		add_to_variable = { RUS_temp_left_anger = -1 }
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = ruselections.19 days = 5 } #Protests against military
		}
	}
}
unit_leader_event = { #Titov stays

	title = ruselections.18.t

			character = RUS_aleksandr_titov
			ideology = social_democrat_subtype
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_democrat popularity = 0.03 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_after_election_tt
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_left_anger
		add_to_variable = { RUS_temp_left_anger = 1 }
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = ruselections.19 days = 5 } #Protests against military
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Protests against military
	id = ruselections.19
	title = ruselections.19.t
	desc = ruselections.19.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_protest
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		RUS_is_demrus = yes
		has_active_mission = RUS_election_timer
	}
	option = { #Disperse protests
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.19 option ruselections.19.a"
		name = ruselections.19.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_vpp_ai
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.02
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_after_election_tt
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_left_anger
		add_to_variable = { RUS_temp_left_anger = 1 }
		hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = ruselections.20 days = 5 } } #Socialists harassed
	}
	option = { #Let them protest
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.19 option ruselections.19.b"
		name = ruselections.19.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_rdp_ai
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_sr_ai
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_kadet_ai
			}
		}
		add_war_support = -0.04
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_boost_RDP
		add_to_variable = { RUS_RDP_var = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = { is_monarchy = yes }
			add_stability = -0.04
		}
		else = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_after_election_tt
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_mil_anger
			add_to_variable = { RUS_temp_mil_anger = 1 }
		}
		hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = ruselections.20 days = 5 } } #Socialists harassed
	}
}
country_event = { #Socialists harassed
	id = ruselections.20
	title = ruselections.20.t
	desc = ruselections.20.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_Spiridonova
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		RUS_is_demrus = yes
		has_active_mission = RUS_election_timer
	}
	option = { #Hinder their campaign every mean available
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.20 option ruselections.20.a"
		name = ruselections.20.a
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_lower_RDP
		add_to_variable = { RUS_RDP_var = -1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_after_election_tt
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_left_anger
		add_to_variable = { RUS_temp_left_anger = 1 }
		hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = ruselections.21 days = 4 } } #Corruption
	}
	option = { #Just try to keep the peace
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.20 option ruselections.20.b"
		name = ruselections.20.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_rdp_ai
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_sr_ai
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_kadet_ai
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_vpp_ai
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { is_monarchy = yes }
			add_political_power = -20
		}
		else = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_after_election_tt
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_mil_anger
			add_to_variable = { RUS_temp_mil_anger = 1 }
		}
		hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = ruselections.21 days = 4 } } #Corruption
	}
	option = { #Fight fire with fire!
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.20 option ruselections.20.c"
		name = ruselections.20.c
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_rdp_pov
				has_country_flag = RUS_psr_pov
			}
			is_monarchy = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_psr_pov }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_boost_PSR
			add_to_variable = { RUS_PSR_var = 1 }
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_boost_RDP
		add_to_variable = { RUS_RDP_var = 1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_after_election_tt
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_right_anger
		add_to_variable = { RUS_temp_right_anger = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = { is_monarchy = yes }
			add_stability = -0.04
		}
		else = {
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_mil_anger
			add_to_variable = { RUS_temp_mil_anger = 1 }
			add_stability = -0.02
		}
		hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = ruselections.21 days = 4 } } #Corruption
	}
}

	id = ruselections.21
	title = ruselections.21.t
	desc = ruselections.21.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		RUS_is_demrus = yes
		has_active_mission = RUS_election_timer
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.21 option ruselections.21.a"
		name = ruselections.21.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_sr_ai
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_kadet_ai
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_vpp_ai
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 25
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_boost_kadet
		add_to_variable = { RUS_kadet_var = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_psr_pov }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_boost_PSR
			add_to_variable = { RUS_PSR_var = 1 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_vpp_pov }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_boost_VPP
			add_to_variable = { RUS_VPP_var = 1 }
		}
		activate_mission = RUS_pay_back_backers
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = ruselections.22 days = 4 } #Appealing to nationalists
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.21 option ruselections.21.b"
		name = ruselections.21.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_rdp_ai
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -20
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_after_election_tt
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_temp_left_anger = -1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_decrease_left_anger
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = ruselections.22 days = 4 } #Appealing to nationalists
		}
	}
}

		}
	}

	id = ruselections.26
	title = ruselections.26.t
	desc = ruselections.26.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy1
	trigger = {
		RUS_is_demrus = yes
		has_country_flag = RUS_spiridonova_revolt
		has_active_mission = RUS_election_timer
	}
	immediate = { clr_country_flag = RUS_spiridonova_revolt }
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.26 option ruselections.26.a"
		name = ruselections.26.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_vpp_ai
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -20
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.26 option ruselections.26.b"
		name = ruselections.26.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_rdp_ai
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_sr_ai
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_kadet_ai
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_boost_RDP
		add_to_variable = { RUS_RDP_var = 1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_lower_kadet
		add_to_variable = { RUS_kadet_var = -1 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = radical_socialist popularity = 0.02 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = 0.02 }
	}
}
country_event = { #Campaigning over minorities?
	id = ruselections.27
	title = ruselections.27.t
	desc = ruselections.27.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kazakhs
	trigger = {
		RUS_is_demrus = yes
		has_active_mission = RUS_election_timer
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.27 option ruselections.27.a"
		name = ruselections.27.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_sr_ai
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_vpp_ai
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_boost_PSR
		add_to_variable = { RUS_PSR_var = 1 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_liberal popularity = 0.01 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = radical_socialist popularity = 0.01 }
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = ruselections.28 days = 4 } #Ex-svobodniks?
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.27 option ruselections.27.b"
		name = ruselections.27.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_rdp_ai
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_kadet_ai
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -15
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_boost_RDP
		add_to_variable = { RUS_RDP_var = 1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_boost_kadet
		add_to_variable = { RUS_kadet_var = 1 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_democrat popularity = 0.01 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = market_liberal popularity = 0.01 }
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = ruselections.28 days = 4 } #Ex-svobodniks?
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Ex-svobodniks?
	id = ruselections.28
	title = ruselections.28.t
	desc = ruselections.28.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_Savinkov_rally
	trigger = {
		RUS_is_demrus = yes
		has_active_mission = RUS_election_timer
	}
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { is_monarchy = no }
				RUS_ivan_solonevich = {
					unit_leader_event = { id = ruselections.29 days = 4 } #Solonevich coups VPP?
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.28 option ruselections.28.a"
		name = ruselections.28.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_sr_ai
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_vpp_ai
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_boost_PSR
		add_to_variable = { RUS_PSR_var = 1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_boost_VPP
		add_to_variable = { RUS_VPP_var = 1 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = authoritarian_democrat popularity = 0.03 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.28 option ruselections.28.b"
		name = ruselections.28.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_rdp_ai
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_boost_VPP
		add_to_variable = { RUS_VPP_var = 1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_boost_RDP
		add_to_variable = { RUS_RDP_var = 1 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = authoritarian_democrat popularity = 0.02 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = 0.02 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.28 option ruselections.28.c"
		name = ruselections.28.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_kadet_ai
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.01
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_after_election_tt
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_right_anger
		add_to_variable = { RUS_temp_right_anger = 1 }
	}
}

country_event = { #Duma election results
	id = ruselections.30
	title = ruselections.30.t
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_duma
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_VPP_victory }
		text = ruselections.30.d.soccon
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_PSR_victory
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_RDP_victory
					is_monarchy = yes
				}
			}
		}
		text = ruselections.30.d.soclib
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_RDP_victory
			is_monarchy = no
		}
		text = ruselections.30.d.socdem
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_kadet_victory }
		text = ruselections.30.d.marlib
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { RUS_is_demrus = yes }
	immediate = {
		set_country_flag = RUS_had_first_election
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_mission = RUS_election_timer
			complete_national_focus = RUS_elections
			country_event = { id = demrus.120 days = 150 random_days = 50 } #General reveals the war plan
			news_event = { id = rusnews.5 days = 1 }
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.30 option ruselections.30.a"
		name = ruselections.30.a
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_RDP_victory
			is_monarchy = no
		}
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = social_democrat
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_RDP_leader_levitsky }
			add_popularity = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = 0.05 }
			country_event = ruselections.31 #Sulimov forms his government
		}
		else = {
			add_popularity = { ideology = social_democrat popularity = 0.05 }
			country_event = ruselections.32 #Titov forms his government
		}
		complete_national_focus = RUS_socdems
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.30 option ruselections.30.b"
		name = ruselections.30.b
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_PSR_victory
				AND = {
					is_monarchy = yes
					has_country_flag = RUS_RDP_victory
				}
			}
		}
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = social_liberal
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		if = {
			limit = { is_monarchy = yes }
			add_popularity = { ideology = social_liberal popularity = 0.05 }
			RUS_ilya_fondaminsky = { unit_leader_event = ruselections.38 } #Tsar appoints SR PM
		}
		else = {
			add_popularity = { ideology = social_liberal popularity = 0.05 }
			country_event = ruselections.34 #Rikhter forms his government
		}
		complete_national_focus = RUS_soclibs
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.30 option ruselections.30.c"
		name = ruselections.30.c
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_kadet_victory }
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = market_liberal
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = market_liberal popularity = 0.05 }
		if = {
			limit = { is_monarchy = yes }
			country_event = ruselections.39 #Tsar appoints Kadet PM
		}
		else = {
			country_event = ruselections.35 #Maklakov forms his government
		}
		complete_national_focus = RUS_marlibs
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.30 option ruselections.30.e"
		name = ruselections.30.e
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_VPP_victory }
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = social_conservative
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_conservative popularity = 0.05 }
		if = {
			limit = { is_monarchy = yes }
			country_event = ruselections.40 #Tsar appoints VPP PM
		}
		else = {
			country_event = ruselections.36 #Solonevich forms his government
		}
		complete_national_focus = RUS_soccons
	}
}
country_event = { #Sulimov Sworn in
	id = ruselections.31
	title = ruselections.31.t
	desc = ruselections.31.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { RUS_is_demrus = yes }
	immediate = { RUS_setup_demrus = yes }
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_sulimov
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.31 option ruselections.31.a"
		name = ruselections.31.a
		activate_mission = RUS_rightwing_obscurantism
		activate_advisor = RUS_vladimir_levitsky_sic
		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:radical_socialist }
		add_to_coalition = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes

	}
}
country_event = { #Titov Sworn in
	id = ruselections.32
	title = ruselections.32.t
	desc = ruselections.32.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { RUS_is_demrus = yes }
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_titov
	immediate = {
		RUS_setup_demrus = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = demrus.50 days = 60 } #Emboldened Labour Movement
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.32 option ruselections.32.a"
		name = ruselections.32.a
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				var = RUS_PSR_var
				value = RUS_kadet_var
				compare = greater_than_or_equals
			}
		}
		activate_mission = RUS_titov_SR_demands
		activate_advisor = RUS_sergey_melgunov_sic
		activate_advisor = RUS_vladimir_rikhter_advisor
		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:social_liberal }
		add_to_coalition = yes
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			activate_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_increase_farmer_subsidies target = ROOT }
			activate_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_increase_wages target = ROOT }
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.32 option ruselections.32.b"
		name = ruselections.32.b
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				var = RUS_kadet_var
				value = RUS_PSR_var
				compare = greater_than_or_equals
			}
		}
		activate_mission = RUS_titov_kadet_demands
		activate_advisor = RUS_sergey_melgunov_sic
		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:market_liberal }
		add_to_coalition = yes
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			activate_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_subsidy_private_enterprise target = ROOT }
			activate_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_increase_wages target = ROOT }
		}
	}
}

	id = ruselections.34
	title = ruselections.34.t
	desc = ruselections.34.d

		activate_mission = RUS_rightwing_obscurantism_rikhter

		}

	}
}
country_event = { #Maklakov Sworn in
	id = ruselections.35
	title = ruselections.35.t
	desc = ruselections.35.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { RUS_is_demrus = yes }
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_maklakov

	immediate = {
		RUS_setup_demrus = yes
		set_variable = { RUS_apathy_var = 1 }
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = russia.10006
			country_event = { id = rusfla.177 days = 90 random_days = 30 }
			}	# Leader-choosing event for AI
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.35 option ruselections.35.a"
		name = ruselections.35.a
		activate_mission = RUS_political_apathy
		if = {
			limit = { is_ai = yes }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_apathy_var = -1 }
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_nikolay_nekrasov_sic
		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:social_liberal }
		add_to_coalition = yes
		country_event = { id = demrus.60 days = 3 } #Control of the State Council
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			activate_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_pass_progressive_legislation target = ROOT }
			activate_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_maklakov_resign target = ROOT }
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.35 option ruselections.35.b"
		name = ruselections.35.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_RDP_leader_levitsky }
		}
		activate_mission = RUS_political_apathy
		if = {
			limit = { is_ai = yes }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_apathy_var = -1 }
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_nikolay_nekrasov_sic
		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:social_democrat }
		add_to_coalition = yes
		country_event = { id = demrus.60 days = 3 } #Control of the State Council
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			activate_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_pass_progressive_legislation target = ROOT }
			activate_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_maklakov_resign target = ROOT }
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.35 option ruselections.35.c"
		name = ruselections.35.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_maklakov_ai
			}
		}
		activate_mission = RUS_political_apathy
		activate_advisor = RUS_nikolay_nekrasov_sic
		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:social_conservative }
		add_to_coalition = yes
		if = {
			limit = { is_ai = no }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_apathy_var = 1 }
		}
		else = {
			add_to_variable = { RUS_apathy_var = -1 }
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_apathy_increase_tt
		country_event = { id = demrus.60 days = 3 } #Control of the State Council
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			activate_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_pass_progressive_legislation target = ROOT }
			activate_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_maklakov_resign target = ROOT }
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Solonevich Sworn in
	id = ruselections.36
	title = ruselections.36.t
	desc = ruselections.36.d

	trigger = { RUS_is_demrus = yes }

		hidden_effect = { country_event = russia.10006 }	# Leader-choosing event for AI
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.36 option ruselections.36.a"
		name = ruselections.36.a
		add_ideas = RUS_party_versus_president
		activate_mission = RUS_VPP_tension
		### Activate mission: promises to the common people (agrarian populism)
		### Activate mission: promises to old guard (hunt communists)
		activate_advisor = RUS_aleksandr_golitsyn_sic
		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:authoritarian_democrat }
		add_to_coalition = yes
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			activate_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_take_over_the_party target = ROOT }
			activate_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_tour_the_sports target = ROOT }
			country_event = { id = demrus.70 days = 1 } #People's Russia Rises!
			country_event = { id = rusfla.90 days = 100 random_days = 160 } #Solonevich Attacked
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Tsar Appoints Conservative Cabinet
	id = ruselections.40
	title = ruselections.40.t
	desc = ruselections.40.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { RUS_is_demrus = yes }
	immediate = { RUS_setup_demrus = yes }
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_golitsyn
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.40 option ruselections.40.a"
		name = ruselections.40.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 25
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_GOLITSYN_SOCCON } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_ROMANOV_SOCCON } }
			}
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_aleksandr_golitsyn_sic
		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:authoritarian_democrat }
		add_to_coalition = yes
		add_political_power = 80
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = monrus.103 days = 400 random_days = 150 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.40 option ruselections.40.b"
		name = ruselections.40.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 25
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_VERNADSKY_SOCCON } }
			}
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_georgy_vernadsky_sic
		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:market_liberal }
		add_to_coalition = yes
		add_stability = 0.1
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = monrus.102 days = 400 random_days = 150 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.40 option ruselections.40.c"
		name = ruselections.40.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_SOLONEVICH_SOCCON } }
			}
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_ivan_solonevich_sic
		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:authoritarian_democrat }
		add_to_coalition = yes
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		 ### Starts Solonevich monarchy path
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_conservative popularity = 0.05 }
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = demrus.71 days = 30 } #Ascension of the People's Monarchists
			country_event = { id = rusfla.90 days = 100 random_days = 160 } #Solonevich Attacked
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #President's agenda
	id = ruselections.50
	title = ruselections.50.t
	desc = ruselections.50.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_duma
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		is_monarchy = no
		has_elected_government = yes
		NOT = { var:country_leader = { has_character_flag = RUS_traits_assigned } }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.50 option ruselections.50.a"
		name = ruselections.50.a
		trigger = { RUS_sulimov = yes }
		add_country_leader_trait = RUS_sulimov_1_off
		var:country_leader = { set_character_flag = RUS_traits_assigned }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_president_trait_tt
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.50 option ruselections.50.a"
		name = ruselections.50.a
		trigger = { RUS_titov = yes }
		add_country_leader_trait = RUS_titov_1_off
		add_country_leader_trait = RUS_titov_2_off
		add_country_leader_trait = RUS_titov_3_off
		var:country_leader = { set_character_flag = RUS_traits_assigned }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_president_trait_tt
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.50 option ruselections.50.a"
		name = ruselections.50.a
		trigger = { RUS_rikhter = yes }
		add_country_leader_trait = RUS_rikhter_1_off
		add_country_leader_trait = RUS_rikhter_2_off
		add_country_leader_trait = RUS_rikhter_3_off
		var:country_leader = { set_character_flag = RUS_traits_assigned }

	}
	option = {

	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.50 option ruselections.50.a"
		name = ruselections.50.a
		trigger = { RUS_sorokin = yes }
		add_country_leader_trait = RUS_sorokin_1_off
		add_country_leader_trait = RUS_sorokin_2_off

		var:country_leader = { set_character_flag = RUS_traits_assigned }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_president_trait_tt
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.50 option ruselections.50.a"
		name = ruselections.50.a
		trigger = { RUS_maklakov = yes }
		if = {
			limit = { is_in_coalition_with_social_liberal = yes }
			add_country_leader_trait = RUS_maklakov_1_off
		}
		add_country_leader_trait = RUS_maklakov_2_off
		add_country_leader_trait = RUS_maklakov_3_off
		var:country_leader = { set_character_flag = RUS_traits_assigned }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_president_trait_tt
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.50 option ruselections.50.a"
		name = ruselections.50.a
		trigger = { RUS_kartashyov = yes }
		#Array for checking tags for quest 1
		add_to_array = { array = RUS_kartashyov_targets value = BLR }
		add_to_array = { array = RUS_kartashyov_targets value = UKR }
		add_to_array = { array = RUS_kartashyov_targets value = ROM }
		add_to_array = { array = RUS_kartashyov_targets value = SER }
		add_to_array = { array = RUS_kartashyov_targets value = GRE }
		add_to_array = { array = RUS_kartashyov_targets value = BUL }
		add_to_array = { array = RUS_kartashyov_targets value = GEO }
		add_to_array = { array = RUS_kartashyov_targets value = ETH }
		add_to_array = { array = RUS_kartashyov_targets value = MNT }
		add_to_array = { array = RUS_kartashyov_targets value = ARM }

		add_country_leader_trait = RUS_kartashyov_1_off
		add_country_leader_trait = RUS_kartashyov_2_off
		add_country_leader_trait = RUS_kartashyov_3_off
		var:country_leader = { set_character_flag = RUS_traits_assigned }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_president_trait_tt
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.50 option ruselections.50.a"
		name = ruselections.50.a
		trigger = { RUS_dolgorukov = yes }
		add_country_leader_trait = RUS_dolgorukov_1_off
		add_country_leader_trait = RUS_dolgorukov_2_off
		add_country_leader_trait = RUS_dolgorukov_3_off
		var:country_leader = { set_character_flag = RUS_traits_assigned }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_president_trait_tt
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.50 option ruselections.50.a"
		name = ruselections.50.a
		trigger = { RUS_golitsyn = yes }
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_country_leader = { character = RUS_dmitry_romanov } }
			}
			add_country_leader_trait = RUS_golitsyn_1_off
		}
		add_country_leader_trait = RUS_golitsyn_2_off
		add_country_leader_trait = RUS_golitsyn_3_off
		var:country_leader = { set_character_flag = RUS_traits_assigned }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_president_trait_tt
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.50 option ruselections.50.a"
		name = ruselections.50.a
		trigger = { RUS_solonevich = yes }
		#Array for checking relevant tags for quest 3
		add_to_array = { array = RUS_solonevich_targets value = BLR }
		add_to_array = { array = RUS_solonevich_targets value = UKR }
		add_to_array = { array = RUS_solonevich_targets value = ROM }
		add_to_array = { array = RUS_solonevich_targets value = SER }
		add_to_array = { array = RUS_solonevich_targets value = MNT }
		add_to_array = { array = RUS_solonevich_targets value = GRE }
		add_to_array = { array = RUS_solonevich_targets value = BUL }
		add_to_array = { array = RUS_solonevich_targets value = POL }
		add_to_array = { array = RUS_solonevich_targets value = LIT }
		add_to_array = { array = RUS_solonevich_targets value = LAT }
		add_to_array = { array = RUS_solonevich_targets value = EST }
		add_to_array = { array = RUS_solonevich_targets value = FIN }
		add_to_array = { array = RUS_solonevich_targets value = SLO }
		add_to_array = { array = RUS_solonevich_targets value = CZE }
		add_to_array = { array = RUS_solonevich_targets value = CRO }

		add_country_leader_trait = RUS_solonevich_1_off
		add_country_leader_trait = RUS_solonevich_2_off
		add_country_leader_trait = RUS_solonevich_3_off
		var:country_leader = { set_character_flag = RUS_traits_assigned }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_president_trait_tt
	}

country_event = { #Future elections for republic
	id = ruselections.51
	title = ruselections.51.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS_pyotr_dolgorukov = { is_country_leader = no } }
		text = ruselections.51.d
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS_pyotr_dolgorukov = { is_country_leader = yes } }
		text = ruselections.51.d2
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_election
	trigger = {
		is_monarchy = no
		RUS_is_demrus = yes
		RUS_wrangel_path = no
		has_country_flag = RUS_had_first_election
		NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_had_second_election }
		NOT = { has_war_with = GER }
		NOT = { has_war_with = INT }
	}
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_idea = RUS_deadlocked_duma }
				remove_ideas = RUS_deadlocked_duma
			}
			country_event = { id = ruselections.50 days = 30 } #President's agenda
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						has_government = social_democrat
						is_in_coalition_with_social_democrat = yes
						is_in_coalition_with_radical_socialist = yes
					}
				}
				country_event = { id = demrus.173 days = 30 } # Demands from the Socialists
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_had_second_election
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.51 option ruselections.51.a"
		name = ruselections.51.a #Titov wins
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_RDP_split
				has_completed_focus = RUS_values_of_february
				has_idea = RUS_guided_democracy
			}
			OR = {
				RUS_titov = yes
				RUS_sorokin = yes
				AND = {
					is_ai = yes
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_SOCDEM }
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_SOCDEM } }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_titov_ai }
			}
		}
		RUS_aleksandr_titov = { promote_character = { ideology = social_democrat_subtype } }
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = social_democrat
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_titov = no }
			add_popularity = { ideology = social_democrat popularity = 0.1 }
			set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:social_liberal }
			add_to_coalition = yes
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_sergey_melgunov_sic
		set_country_flag = { flag = RUS_peaceful_election_change days = 1 }
		RUS_increase_democracy = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.51 option ruselections.51.b"
		name = ruselections.51.b #Rikhter re-elected
		trigger = { RUS_rikhter = yes }
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_RIKHTER_SOCLIB } }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_sr_ai }
			}
		}
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = social_liberal
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_nikolay_martyanov_sic
		set_country_flag = { flag = RUS_peaceful_election_change days = 1 }
		RUS_increase_democracy = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.51 option ruselections.51.e"
		name = ruselections.51.e #Sorokin elected
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_idea = RUS_guided_democracy
				has_completed_focus = RUS_values_of_february
			}
			OR = {
				has_left_democratic_government = yes
				RUS_maklakov = yes
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_RIKHTER_SOCLIB } }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_sr_ai }
			}
		}
		RUS_pitirim_sorokin = { promote_character = { ideology = social_liberal_subtype } }
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = social_liberal
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_government = social_liberal } }
			add_popularity = { ideology = social_liberal popularity = 0.1 }
			set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:social_democrat }
			add_to_coalition = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { is_in_coalition_with_market_liberal = yes }
			activate_advisor = RUS_nikolay_nekrasov_sic
			add_popularity = { ideology = market_liberal popularity = 0.05 }
		}
		else = {
			activate_advisor = RUS_konstantin_takhtarev_sic
		}
		set_country_flag = { flag = RUS_peaceful_election_change days = 1 }
		RUS_increase_democracy = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.51 option ruselections.51.f"
		name = ruselections.51.f #Fondaminsky elected
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_idea = RUS_guided_democracy }
			OR = {
				RUS_sorokin = yes
				RUS_fondaminsky = yes
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_FONDAMINSKY_SOCLIB } }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_sr_ai }
			}
		}
		RUS_ilya_fondaminsky = { promote_character = { ideology = social_liberal_subtype } }
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = social_liberal
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_government = social_liberal } }
			add_popularity = { ideology = social_liberal popularity = 0.1 }
			set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:market_liberal }
			add_to_coalition = yes
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_vladimir_zenzinov_sic
		set_country_flag = { flag = RUS_peaceful_election_change days = 1 }
		RUS_increase_democracy = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.51 option ruselections.51.g"
		name = ruselections.51.g #Kartashyov elected
		trigger = {
			has_right_democratic_government = yes
			RUS_maklakov = no
			RUS_solonevich = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_KARTASHYOV_MARLIB } }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_kadet_ai }
			}
		}
		RUS_anton_kartashyov = { promote_character = { ideology = market_liberal_subtype } }
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = market_liberal
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_government = market_liberal } }
			add_popularity = { ideology = market_liberal popularity = 0.1 }
			set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:social_conservative }
			add_to_coalition = yes
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_pavel_gronsky_sic
		set_country_flag = { flag = RUS_peaceful_election_change days = 1 }
		RUS_increase_democracy = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.51 option ruselections.51.h"
		name = ruselections.51.h #Nekrasov elected
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					has_left_democratic_government = yes
					RUS_rikhter = no
				}
				RUS_maklakov = yes
				RUS_dolgorukov = yes
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_MAKLAKOV_MARLIB } }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_kadet_ai }
			}
		}
		RUS_nikolay_nekrasov = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_ideology = market_liberal_subtype }
				promote_character = market_liberal_subtype
			}
			else = {
				add_country_leader_role = {
					country_leader = {
						desc = RUS_nikolay_nekrasov_sic_desc
						ideology = market_liberal_subtype
					}
					promote_leader = yes
				}
			}
		}
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = market_liberal
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_government = market_liberal } }
			add_popularity = { ideology = market_liberal popularity = 0.1 }
			set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:social_liberal }
			add_to_coalition = yes
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_mikhail_kalugin_sic
		set_country_flag = { flag = RUS_peaceful_election_change days = 1 }
		RUS_increase_democracy = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.51 option ruselections.51.i"
		name = ruselections.51.i #Solonevich re-elected
		trigger = {
			RUS_solonevich = yes
			OR = {
				AND = {
					social_conservative > 0.4
					count_triggers = {
						amount = 4
						has_completed_focus = RUS_restrict_foreign_business
						has_completed_focus = RUS_banking_act
						has_completed_focus = RUS_state_orthodoxy
						has_completed_focus = RUS_symphony_of_authorities
						has_completed_focus = RUS_white_empire
					}
				}
				AND = {
					is_ai = yes
					has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_ai
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_SOLONEVICH_SOCCON } }
			}
		}
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = social_conservative
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_re-elected
		add_political_power = 100
		activate_advisor = RUS_boris_suvorin_sic
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.51 option ruselections.51.j"
		name = ruselections.51.j #Golitsyn elected
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_government = social_conservative
				RUS_kartashyov = yes
			}
			NOT = {
				count_triggers = {
					amount = 4
					has_completed_focus = RUS_restrict_foreign_business
					has_completed_focus = RUS_banking_act
					has_completed_focus = RUS_state_orthodoxy
					has_completed_focus = RUS_symphony_of_authorities
					has_completed_focus = RUS_white_empire
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = DEFAULT } }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_vpp_ai }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_solonevich = yes }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_solonevich_election_fail
		}
		RUS_aleksandr_golitsyn = { promote_character = { ideology = social_conservative_subtype } }
		hidden_effect = { RUS_restore_VPP = yes }
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = social_conservative
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_government = social_conservative } }
			add_popularity = { ideology = social_conservative popularity = 0.1 }
			set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:market_liberal }
			add_to_coalition = yes
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_georgy_vernadsky_sic
		add_stability = 0.05
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.51 option ruselections.51.k"
		name = ruselections.51.k #Dmitry Romanov elected
		trigger = {
			has_government = social_conservative
			OR = {
				has_country_leader = { character = RUS_dmitry_romanov }
				NOT = {
					count_triggers = {
						amount = 4
						has_completed_focus = RUS_restrict_foreign_business
						has_completed_focus = RUS_banking_act
						has_completed_focus = RUS_state_orthodoxy
						has_completed_focus = RUS_symphony_of_authorities
						has_completed_focus = RUS_white_empire
					}
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_ROMANOV_SOCCON } }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_vpp_ai }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_solonevich = yes }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_solonevich_election_fail
		}
		RUS_dmitry_romanov = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_ideology = social_conservative_subtype }
				promote_character = social_conservative_subtype
			}
			else = {
				add_country_leader_role = {
					country_leader = {
						desc = RUS_dmitry_romanov_leader_desc
						ideology = social_conservative_subtype
					}
					promote_leader = yes
				}
			}
		}
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = social_conservative
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		hidden_effect = { RUS_restore_VPP = yes }
		activate_advisor = RUS_georgy_vernadsky_sic
		add_political_power = 50
	}
}

country_event = { #Future elections for empire
	id = ruselections.52
	title = ruselections.52.t
	desc = ruselections.52.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_election
	trigger = {
		is_monarchy = yes
		RUS_wrangel_path = no
		has_elected_government = yes
		has_country_flag = RUS_had_first_election
		NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_had_second_election }
		NOT = { has_war_with = GER }
		NOT = { has_war_with = INT }
	}
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_idea = RUS_deadlocked_duma }
				remove_ideas = RUS_deadlocked_duma
			}
			if = {
				limit = { is_in_coalition_with_social_democrat = yes }
				country_event = { id = demrus.173 days = 30 } # Demands from the Socialists
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_had_second_election
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.52 option ruselections.52.a"
		name = ruselections.52.a #Fondaminsky re-elected
		trigger = {
			has_government = social_liberal
			RUS_ilya_fondaminsky = { is_second_in_command = yes }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_FONDAMINSKY_SOCLIB } }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_fondaminsky_ai }
			}
		}
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = social_liberal
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_liberal popularity = 0.1 }
		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:market_liberal }
		add_to_coalition = yes
		set_country_flag = { flag = RUS_peaceful_election_change days = 1 }
		activate_advisor = RUS_ilya_fondaminsky_sic
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_postponed_elections }
			clr_country_flag = RUS_postponed_elections
		}
		RUS_increase_democracy = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.52 option ruselections.52.b"
		name = ruselections.52.b #Left-Kadet
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_government = social_conservative }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_NEKRASOV_MARLIB } }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_kadet_ai }
			}
		}
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = market_liberal
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = market_liberal popularity = 0.1 }
		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:social_liberal }
		add_to_coalition = yes
		activate_advisor = RUS_nikolay_nekrasov_sic
		set_country_flag = { flag = RUS_peaceful_election_change days = 1 }
		RUS_increase_democracy = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.52 option ruselections.52.c"
		name = ruselections.52.c #Right-Kadet
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_GRONSKY_MARLIB } }
			}
			modifier = {

				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_kadet_ai }

country_event = { #The Red Regiments Strike
	id = ruselections.53
	title = ruselections.53.t
	desc = ruselections.53.d

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		has_country_flag = RUS_had_first_election
		RUS_is_demrus = yes
		RUS_wrangel_path = no
		OR = {
			has_war_with = GER
			has_war_with = INT
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event ruselections.53 option ruselections.53.a"
		name = ruselections.53.a
		set_country_flag = RUS_postponed_elections
		if = {
			limit = { has_government = social_democrat }
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = social_democrat
				elections_allowed = no
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_government = social_liberal }
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = social_liberal
				elections_allowed = no
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_government = market_liberal }
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = market_liberal
				elections_allowed = no
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_government = social_conservative }
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = social_conservative
				elections_allowed = no
			}
		}
	}
}

### Democratic Russia Events ###

country_event = { #Small White Terror
	id = demrus.1
	title = demrus.1.t
	desc = demrus.1.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army3
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_government = paternal_autocrat
		has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_socialist_uprising
		RUS_boldyrev = no
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.1 option demrus.1.a"
		name = demrus.1.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_empire_ai
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.05
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_left_anger
		add_to_variable = { RUS_temp_left_anger = 1 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = radical_socialist popularity = -0.04 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = -0.03 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.1 option demrus.1.b"
		name = demrus.1.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 1
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_rdp_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_empire_ai
				}
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.05
		if = {
			limit = { is_monarchy = no }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_mil_anger
			add_to_variable = { RUS_temp_mil_anger = 1 }
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = -0.02 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = paternal_autocrat popularity = -0.03 }
	}
}

country_event = { #Crimes of the Past (fired by focus)
	id = demrus.19
	title = demrus.19.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_global_flag = RUS_socrus_happened }
		text = demrus.19.d.socialist
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_socrus_happened } }
		text = demrus.19.d.szrs
	}

	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_trial_2

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.19 option demrus.19.a"
		name = demrus.19.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_right_democratic_government = no
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				check_variable = { RUS_left_anger > 7 }
			}
		}
		army_experience = -40
		add_stability = 0.1
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = RUS_socrus_happened }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
			RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		}
		else = {
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
			RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.19 option demrus.19.b"
		name = demrus.19.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_left_democratic_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				check_variable = { RUS_right_anger > 7 }
			}
		}
		army_experience = -20
		add_stability = 0.05
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = RUS_socrus_happened }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
			RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		}
		else = {
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
			RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Trial Revelations
	id = demrus.20
	title = demrus.20.t
	desc = demrus.20.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_trial_2
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { RUS_is_demrus = yes }

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.20 option demrus.20.a"
		name = demrus.20.a #It belongs to the state, now
		ai_chance = {
			base = 5
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				NOT = {
					has_government = market_liberal
					has_government = social_liberal
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_dolgorukov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_kartashyov_ai
				}
				RUS_vasily_maklakov = { is_country_leader = yes }
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 80
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.20 option demrus.20.b"
		name = demrus.20.b #Return it to those who have proven loyal
		ai_chance = {
			base = 5
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				OR = {
					has_government = market_liberal
					has_government = social_liberal
				}
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = 5 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		add_stability = 0.05
		if = {
			limit = { has_left_democratic_government = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
			RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_left_democratic_government = no }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
			RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_active_mission = RUS_political_apathy }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_apathy_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_apathy_increase_tt
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.20 option demrus.20.c"
		name = demrus.20.c #Return all of it, no questions asked
		ai_chance = {
			base = 5
			modifier = {
				factor = 4
				check_variable = { RUS_right_anger > 7 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_dolgorukov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_kartashyov_ai
				}
				RUS_vasily_maklakov = { is_country_leader = yes }
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.1
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #The New Land Reforms
	id = demrus.21
	title = demrus.21.t
	desc = demrus.21.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_farming
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { RUS_is_demrus = yes }
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = demrus.125 days = 180 } #Agronomic Crisis on Long Fuse
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.21 option demrus.21.a"
		name = demrus.21.a #Peasants
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_government = social_liberal
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_dolgorukov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_kartashyov_ai
				}
				RUS_vasily_maklakov = { is_country_leader = yes }
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = 5 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		add_stability = 0.05
		add_political_power = 50
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.21 option demrus.21.b"
		name = demrus.21.b #Mechanisation
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_government = social_conservative
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				check_variable = { RUS_left_anger > 6 }
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 100
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					state = 260
					state = 265
					state = 239
					state = 401
				}
			}
			add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 1
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		if = {
			limit = { has_active_mission = RUS_political_apathy }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_apathy_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_apathy_increase_tt
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Boldyrev wishes to return #
	id = demrus.22
	title = demrus.22.t
	desc = demrus.22.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_boldyrev
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		RUS_is_demrus = yes
		RUS_sulimov = no
		NOT = { has_character = RUS_vasily_boldyrev }
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.22 option demrus.22.a"
		name = demrus.22.a #Boldyrev returns
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_government = social_conservative
				has_authoritarian_government = yes
			}
		}
		RSA = {
			RUS_vasily_boldyrev = {
				add_unit_leader_trait = RUS_republican_officer
				set_nationality = ROOT
			}
		}
		RUS_vasily_boldyrev = {
			add_advisor_role = {
				character = RUS_vasily_boldyrev
				advisor = {
					slot = air_chief
					idea_token = RUS_vasily_boldyrev_air_chief
					desc = RUS_vasily_boldyrev_army_chief_desc
					traits = { KR_air_chief_ground_support_1 }
					cost = 75
				}
			}
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_liberal popularity = 0.02 }
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = rusfla.105 days = 60 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.22 option demrus.22.b"
		name = demrus.22.b #Meh
	}
}

country_event = { #The Old Guard Generals fired by decision RUS_sideline_monarchists
	id = demrus.24
	title = demrus.24.t
	desc = demrus.24.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_wrangel
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		RUS_is_demrus = yes
		is_monarchy = no
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.24 option demrus.24.a"
		name = demrus.24.a #They've been professional thus far!
		trigger = { RUS_rikhter = no }
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				check_variable = { RUS_left_anger > 6 }
			}
		}
		every_character = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_character = RUS_anton_turkul
					is_character = RUS_yevgeny_miller
					is_character = RUS_pyotr_glazenap
					is_character = RUS_mikhail_diterikhs
					MON = { MON_roman_ungern_sternberg = { is_character = PREV.PREV } }
				}
			}
			retire = yes
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_conservative popularity = 0.05 }
		add_political_power = 30
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.24 option demrus.24.b"
		name = demrus.24.b #Here's a nice office job in Siberia
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				check_variable = { RUS_right_anger > 6 }
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.02
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_conservative popularity = -0.04 }
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		every_character = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_character = RUS_anton_turkul
					is_character = RUS_yevgeny_miller
					is_character = RUS_pyotr_glazenap
					is_character = RUS_mikhail_diterikhs
					MON = { MON_roman_ungern_sternberg = { is_character = PREV.PREV } }
				}
			}
			retire = yes
		}
		every_army_leader = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_character = RUS_mikhail_drozdovsky
					is_character = RUS_pyotr_wrangel
					is_character = RUS_pavel_shatilov
				}
			}
			add_unit_leader_trait = RUS_sidelined
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.24 option demrus.24.c"
		name = demrus.24.c #Pressure them to retire
		trigger = { NOT = { has_government = social_conservative } }
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				check_variable = { RUS_right_anger > 6 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				check_variable = { RUS_military_anger > 6 }
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 50
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_conservative popularity = -0.05 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = paternal_autocrat popularity = -0.05 }
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		every_character = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_character = RUS_mikhail_drozdovsky
					is_character = RUS_pyotr_wrangel
					is_character = RUS_pavel_shatilov
					is_character = RUS_anton_turkul
					is_character = RUS_yevgeny_miller
					is_character = RUS_pyotr_glazenap
					is_character = RUS_mikhail_diterikhs
					MON = { MON_roman_ungern_sternberg = { is_character = PREV.PREV } }
				}
			}
			retire = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_active_mission = RUS_bold_promises }
			add_days_mission_timeout = {
				mission = RUS_bold_promises
				days = 90
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_republican_purge_tt
	}
}

			base = 0

				add = 1
				has_country_flag = RUS_rdp_ai
			}

				add = 1
				has_country_flag = RUS_sr_ai
			}
		}

		add_popularity = { ideology = social_democrat popularity = 0.04 }

		name = demrus.30.c #Keep critical companies nationalised, privatise the rest.

			}
		}

		add_political_power = -40
		add_one_random_civilian_factory = yes
		add_one_random_civilian_factory = yes

	}

country_event = { #Remove Denikin
	id = demrus.31
	title = demrus.31.t
	desc = demrus.31.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_denikin2

	trigger = {
		RUS_is_demrus = yes
		RUS_anton_denikin = { is_army_chief = yes }
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.31 option demrus.31.a"
		name = demrus.31.a
		retire_character = RUS_anton_denikin
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_unit_leader = {
					is_field_marshal = yes
					skill > 3
					NOT = { has_advisor_role = army_chief }
					NOT = { is_character = RUS_mikhail_drozdovsky }
					NOT = { is_character = RUS_pyotr_wrangel }
					NOT = { is_character = RUS_anton_denikin }
					NOT = { is_character = RUS_sergey_markov }
				}
			}
			random_unit_leader = {
				limit = {
					is_field_marshal = yes
					skill > 3
					NOT = { has_advisor_role = army_chief }
					NOT = { is_character = RUS_mikhail_drozdovsky }
					NOT = { is_character = RUS_pyotr_wrangel }
					NOT = { is_character = RUS_anton_denikin }
					NOT = { is_character = RUS_sergey_markov }
				}
				add_advisor_role = {
					activate = yes
					advisor = {
						slot = army_chief
						traits = { KR_army_chief_offensive_3 }
						cost = 200
						can_be_fired = no
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_character = RUS_sergey_markov }
			activate_advisor = RUS_sergey_markov_army_chief
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -2 }
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = demrus.37 days = 90 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Denikin retires
	id = demrus.32
	title = demrus.32.t
	desc = demrus.32.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { has_character = RUS_anton_denikin }
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_denikin2

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.32 option demrus.32.a"
		name = demrus.32.a
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_anton_denikin = { is_army_chief = yes } }
			if = {
				limit = { RUS_sergey_markov = { NOT = { has_advisor_role = army_chief } } }
				RUS_sergey_markov = {
					add_advisor_role = {
						activate = yes
						advisor = {
							slot = army_chief
							idea_token = RUS_sergey_markov_army_chief
							traits = { KR_army_chief_manoeuvre_3 }
							cost = 200
							can_be_fired = no
						}
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				activate_advisor = RUS_sergey_markov_army_chief
			}
		}
		retire_character = RUS_anton_denikin
	}
}

			}

		}

	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.34 option demrus.34.b"
		name = demrus.34.b #Grant them some special rights
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.2
				check_variable = { RUS_right_anger > 6 }
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -50
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -5 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
	}
}

	desc = demrus.35.d

		RUS_is_demrus = yes
		has_active_mission = RUS_land_reform_in_progress
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.35 option demrus.35.a"
		name = demrus.35.a
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		add_stability = -0.04
		add_days_mission_timeout = {
			mission = RUS_land_reform_in_progress
			days = 290
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.35 option demrus.35.b"
		name = demrus.35.b
		ai_chance = { base = 10 }
		add_political_power = -40
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_liberal popularity = 0.015 }
		add_days_mission_timeout = {
			mission = RUS_land_reform_in_progress
			days = 180
		}
	}
}

	id = demrus.36
	title = demrus.36.t
	desc = demrus.36.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_at_arms
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		RUS_is_demrus = yes
		is_monarchy = no
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.36 option demrus.36.a"
		name = demrus.36.a #This is insane.
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_dolgorukov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_kartashyov_ai
				}
				RUS_vasily_maklakov = { is_country_leader = yes }
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.36 option demrus.36.b"
		name = demrus.36.b #Admirable idea!
		ai_chance = { base = 1 }
		add_political_power = -30
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = 5 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		add_war_support = 0.05
		if = {
			limit = { has_active_mission = RUS_political_apathy }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_apathy_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_apathy_increase_tt
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Republicanisation of the Army Succesful
	id = demrus.37
	title = demrus.37.t
	desc = demrus.37.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_at_arms
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		RUS_is_demrus = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.37 option demrus.37.a"
		name = demrus.37.a
		add_political_power = 100
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			popularity = -0.1
		}
		add_war_support = 0.1
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_removal = RUS_military_anger }
		multiply_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_removal = -1 }
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = RUS_anger_removal }
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		RUS_yury_sablin = {
			set_nationality = ROOT
			add_trait = { trait = RUS_republican_officer }
		}
		RUS_andrey_vlasov = { set_nationality = ROOT }
		RUS_georgy_zhukov = { set_nationality = ROOT }
		RUS_vasily_chuykov = { set_nationality = ROOT }
	}
}

			}

				add = 5

			}

		add_political_power = 20
	}

country_event = { #The Military-Industrial Complex
	id = demrus.39
	title = demrus.39.t
	desc = demrus.39.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_tank2
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		RUS_is_demrus = yes
		NOT = { has_war_with = GER }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.39 option demrus.39.a"
		name = demrus.39.a
		add_one_random_military_factory = yes
		if = {
			limit = { has_dlc_aat = yes }
			random_military_industrial_organization = { add_mio_funds = 500 }
			random_military_industrial_organization = { add_mio_funds = 500 }
			random_military_industrial_organization = { add_mio_funds = 500 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_active_mission = RUS_political_apathy }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_apathy_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_apathy_increase_tt
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_left_democratic_government = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -7 }
			change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.39 option demrus.39.b"
		name = demrus.39.b
		trigger = { has_left_democratic_government = yes }
		add_stability = 0.03
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
	}
}

#SR Events

country_event = { #Boris Viktorovich Sends His Regards
	id = demrus.40
	title = demrus.40.t
	desc = demrus.40.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_rikhter
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { RUS_rikhter = yes }

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.40 option demrus.40.a"
		name = demrus.40.a
		kill_country_leader = yes
		add_stability = -0.1
		end_coalition = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -4 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -2 }
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_sorokin_csc }
			promote_character = {
				character = RUS_pitirim_sorokin
				ideology = social_liberal_subtype
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = { id = demrus.48 days = 180 } #Program of Integralism
			}
		}
		else = {
			promote_character = {
				character = RUS_ilya_fondaminsky
				ideology = social_liberal_subtype
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = { id = demrus.49 days = 180 } #Towards True Narodism
			}
		}
		country_event = { id = demrus.44 days = 7 } #[ROOT.GetLeader]'s Government
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #Fate of ex-Svobodniks
	id = demrus.43
	title = demrus.43.t
	desc = demrus.43.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_Savinkov_rally
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_government = social_liberal
			is_in_coalition_with_social_liberal = yes
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.43 option demrus.43.a"
		name = demrus.43.a #No mercy
		RUS_increase_democracy = yes
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_rikhter = yes }
			add_popularity = { ideology = social_liberal popularity = 0.05 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.43 option demrus.43.b"
		name = demrus.43.b #Not everyone was as brave as Vladimir Nikolayevich
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_rikhter = yes }
			add_political_power = 60
		}
		else = {
			add_political_power = 30
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_liberal popularity = 0.05 }
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #[ROOT.GetLeader]'s Government
	id = demrus.44
	title = demrus.44.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS_fondaminsky = yes }
		text = demrus.44.d.fondaminsky
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS_sorokin = yes }
		text = demrus.44.d.sorokin
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_duma
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { has_government = social_liberal }
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = ruselections.50 days = 30 } #President's agenda
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.44 option demrus.44.a"
		name = demrus.44.a
		trigger = { RUS_sorokin = yes }
		activate_advisor = RUS_konstantin_takhtarev_sic
		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:social_democrat }
		add_to_coalition = yes
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_democrat popularity = 0.05 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.44 option demrus.44.b"
		name = demrus.44.b
		trigger = { RUS_fondaminsky = yes }
		activate_advisor = RUS_vladimir_zenzinov_sic
		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:market_liberal }
		add_to_coalition = yes
		add_popularity = { ideology = market_liberal popularity = 0.05 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_conservative popularity = 0.05 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.44 option demrus.44.c"
		name = demrus.44.c
		activate_advisor = RUS_nikolay_nekrasov_sic
		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:market_liberal }
		add_to_coalition = yes
		add_popularity = { ideology = market_liberal popularity = 0.05 }
	}
}

country_event = { #The Moderate Revolution
	id = demrus.46
	title = demrus.46.t
	desc = demrus.46.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_crowd1
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { has_government = social_liberal }
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.46 option demrus.46.a"
		name = demrus.46.a
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_republican_guard }
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = RUS_republican_guard
				add_idea = RUS_republican_guard_2
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_narodovolets_idea }
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = RUS_narodovolets_idea
				add_idea = RUS_narodovolets_idea_2
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_strict_anti_socialist_laws }
			remove_ideas = RUS_strict_anti_socialist_laws
		}
	}
}

	desc = demrus.50.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_moscow
	is_triggered_only = yes

		name = demrus.50.a
		activate_mission = RUS_titov_demands_from_left
		add_popularity = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = 0.05 }
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = demrus.53 days = 120 random_days = 120 } #The Red Wave
		}
	}

country_event = { #Revolt of the Left
	id = demrus.51
	title = demrus.51.t
	desc = demrus.51.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_levitsky

	trigger = {
		has_government = social_democrat
		OR = {
			is_ai = no
			has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = DEFAULT }
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.51 option demrus.51.a"
		name = demrus.51.a
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_democrat popularity = -0.1 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = 0.1 }
		set_country_flag = RUS_RDP_split
		effect_tooltip = {
			RUS_vladimir_levitsky = { remove_political_advisor_role = yes }
			RUS_gergard_zeller = { remove_political_advisor_role = yes }
		}
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = RUS_strike_season
			days = 120
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
	}
}
