country_event = { #Social Democratic Central Union
	id = demrus.55
	title = demrus.55.t
	desc = demrus.55.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_zeller
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { RUS_titov = yes }

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.55 option demrus.55.a"
		name = demrus.55.a
		add_stability = 0.05
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_tomsky_versus_titov }
			remove_ideas = RUS_tomsky_versus_titov
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_tomsky_versus_titov_2 }
			remove_ideas = RUS_tomsky_versus_titov_2
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_socdem_unions
	}
}

country_event = { #The President of Holy Rus'
	id = demrus.59
	title = demrus.59.t
	desc = demrus.59.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kartashev
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { RUS_kartashyov = yes }

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.59 option demrus.59.a"
		name = demrus.59.a
		add_stability = 0.01
	}
}

country_event = { #Maklakov Resigns
	id = demrus.61
	title = demrus.61.t
	desc = demrus.61.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy1
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { RUS_maklakov = yes }
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			uncomplete_national_focus = {
				focus = RUS_free_fair_russia
				uncomplete_children = no
			}
			uncomplete_national_focus = {
				focus = RUS_progressive_literature_clubs
				uncomplete_children = yes
			}
			uncomplete_national_focus = {
				focus = RUS_democratic_education
				uncomplete_children = yes
			}
			remove_ideas = {
				RUS_literary_clubs
				RUS_democratic_foundation
				RUS_democratic_education_idea
				RUS_democratic_foundation_2
			}
			country_event = { id = ruselections.50 days = 14 } #President's agenda
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.61 option demrus.61.a"
		name = demrus.61.a
		trigger = { NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_dolgorukov_csc } }
		retire_character = RUS_vasily_maklakov
		promote_character = {
			character = RUS_anton_kartashyov
			ideology = market_liberal_subtype
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_pavel_gronsky_sic
		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:social_conservative }
		add_to_coalition = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_ally_army
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:paternal_autocrat }
				add_to_coalition = yes
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = demrus.59 days = 300 } #The President of Holy Rus'
		}
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.61 option demrus.61.a"
		name = demrus.61.a
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_dolgorukov_csc }
		retire_character = RUS_vasily_maklakov
		promote_character = {
			character = RUS_pyotr_dolgorukov
			ideology = market_liberal_subtype
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_mikhail_kalugin_sic
		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:social_liberal }
		add_to_coalition = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_ally_army
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:paternal_autocrat }
				add_to_coalition = yes
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = demrus.58 days = 300 } #Old Man of the Kadets
		}
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
	}
}

	id = demrus.62

	desc = demrus.62.d

		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.62 option demrus.62.a"
		name = demrus.62.a
		add_political_power = 40
		add_popularity = { ideology = market_liberal popularity = 0.04 }
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		if = {
			limit = { has_active_mission = RUS_political_apathy }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_apathy_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_apathy_increase_tt
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.62 option demrus.62.b"
		name = demrus.62.b
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_conservative popularity = 0.04 }
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		if = {
			limit = { has_active_mission = RUS_political_apathy }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_apathy_decrease_tt
			add_to_variable = { RUS_apathy_var = -1 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Solving Strikes
	id = demrus.63
	title = demrus.63.t
	desc = demrus.63.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_protest
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_government = market_liberal
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.63 option demrus.63.a"
		name = demrus.63.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				add = 5
				has_political_power < -50
			}
			modifier = {
				add = -5
				check_variable = { RUS_left_anger > 2 }
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 40
		add_popularity = { ideology = market_liberal popularity = 0.04 }
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.63 option demrus.63.b"
		name = demrus.63.b
		add_stability = 0.02
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_dolgorukov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_kartashyov_ai
				}
				RUS_vasily_maklakov = { is_country_leader = yes }
			}
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = market_liberal popularity = -0.06 }
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		if = {
			limit = { has_active_mission = RUS_political_apathy }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_apathy_decrease_tt
			add_to_variable = { RUS_apathy_var = -1 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.63 option demrus.63.c"
		name = demrus.63.c
		ai_chance = { base = 20 }
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_VSTPF
				has_completed_focus = RUS_new_russian_capitalism
				RUS_pavel_gronsky = { is_second_in_command = yes }
				RUS_kartashyov = yes
			}
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = market_liberal popularity = -0.03 }
		if = {
			limit = { is_in_coalition_with_social_democrat = no }
			add_political_power = -75
		}
		else = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_solving_strikes_tt
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_maklakov_labour_negotiations
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_solving_strikes_tt2
		show_ideas_tooltip = RUS_state_economic_committee_5
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #Law on Russian Freedoms
	id = demrus.64
	title = demrus.64.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS_maklakov = yes }
		text = demrus.64.d.rep
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS_dolgorukov = yes }
		text = demrus.64.d.rep2
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			is_monarchy = yes
			RUS_nikolay_nekrasov = { is_second_in_command = yes }
		}
		text = demrus.64.d.nekrasov
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			is_monarchy = yes
			OR = {
				RUS_pavel_gronsky = { is_second_in_command = yes }
				RUS_anton_kartashyov = { is_second_in_command = yes }
			}
		}
		text = demrus.64.d.gronsky
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_maklakov
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			RUS_maklakov = yes
			RUS_dolgorukov = yes
			AND = {
				is_monarchy = yes
				has_government = market_liberal
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.64 option demrus.64.a"
		name = demrus.64.a
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				RUS_nikolay_nekrasov = { is_second_in_command = yes }
				RUS_pyotr_dolgorukov = { is_country_leader = yes }
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_law_on_freedoms_tt
		random_list = {
			10 = {
				modifier = { add = 10 check_variable = { RUS_apathy_var < 1 } }
				modifier = { add = 2 check_variable = { RUS_apathy_var < 3 } }
				modifier = { add = 2 check_variable = { RUS_apathy_var < 5 } }
				modifier = { add = 2 social_liberal > 0.15 }
				modifier = { add = 2 social_democrat > 0.15 }
				modifier = { add = 2 market_liberal > 0.15 }
				modifier = { add = 1 has_country_leader = { character = RUS_kirill_romanov } }
				modifier = { add = 3 has_country_leader = { character = RUS_vladimir_romanov } }
				modifier = { add = 2 RUS_vladimir_rikhter = { is_hired_as_advisor = yes } }
				modifier = { add = 2 RUS_aleksandr_titov = { is_hired_as_advisor = yes } }
				country_event = demrus.67 #'Law on Russian Freedoms' Passes the Duma!
			}
			5 = {
				modifier = { add = RUS_apathy_var has_active_mission = RUS_political_apathy }
				modifier = { add = 5 check_variable = { RUS_apathy_var > 9 } }
				modifier = { add = RUS_right_anger has_idea = RUS_right_anger }
				modifier = { add = RUS_military_anger has_idea = RUS_military_anger_dem }
				modifier = { add = 5 is_in_coalition_with_social_conservative = yes }
				country_event = demrus.68 #'Law on Russian Freedoms' Is Killed in the Duma!
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.64 option demrus.64.b"
		name = demrus.64.b
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				RUS_nikolay_nekrasov = { is_second_in_command = yes }
				RUS_pyotr_dolgorukov = { is_country_leader = yes }
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_law_on_freedoms_tt
		country_event = demrus.69 #Watered Down 'Law on Russian Freedoms' Passes the Duma!
		if = {
			limit = { has_active_mission = RUS_political_apathy }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_apathy_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_apathy_increase_tt
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.64 option demrus.64.c"
		name = demrus.64.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 50
				has_country_flag = RUS_maklakov_ai
			}
		}
		trigger = { RUS_maklakov = yes }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_law_on_freedoms_tt
		add_political_power = -80
		add_popularity = { ideology = market_liberal popularity = 0.04 }
		country_event = demrus.67 #'Law on Russian Freedoms' Passes the Duma!
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.64 option demrus.64.e"
		name = demrus.64.e
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		trigger = { RUS_nikolay_nekrasov = { is_second_in_command = yes } }
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		add_popularity = { ideology = market_liberal popularity = -0.05 }
		if = {
			limit = { has_active_mission = RUS_political_apathy }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_apathy_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_apathy_increase_tt
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.64 option demrus.64.f"
		name = demrus.64.f
		trigger = {
			is_monarchy = yes
			OR = {
				RUS_pavel_gronsky = { is_second_in_command = yes }
				RUS_anton_kartashyov = { is_second_in_command = yes }
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		if = {
			limit = { has_active_mission = RUS_SVR_activity }
			add_days_mission_timeout = {
				mission = RUS_SVR_activity
				days = 60
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Collapse of the Coalition
	id = demrus.65
	title = demrus.65.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { is_in_coalition_with_social_liberal = yes }
		text = demrus.65.d.psr
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { is_in_coalition_with_social_democrat = yes }
		text = demrus.65.d.rdp
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { is_in_coalition_with_market_liberal = yes }
		text = demrus.65.d.kadet
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { is_in_coalition_with_social_conservative = yes }
		text = demrus.65.d.vpp
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy3
	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		RUS_is_demrus = yes
		OR = {
			is_ai = no
			has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = DEFAULT }
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.65 option demrus.65.a"
		name = demrus.65.a
		ai_chance = { base = 2 }
		end_coalition = yes
		add_ideas = RUS_deadlocked_duma
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_deadlock_tt
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.65 option demrus.65.b"
		name = demrus.65.b #Offer deal to VPP
		ai_chance = { base = 20 }
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_government = social_conservative }
			set_temp_variable = { coalition_target = token:social_conservative }
			has_coalition_with_target = no
		}
		add_political_power = -100
		end_coalition = yes
		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:social_conservative }
		add_to_coalition = yes
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_conservative popularity = 0.1 }
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.65 option demrus.65.c"
		name = demrus.65.c #Offer deal to SRs
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_government = social_liberal }
			set_temp_variable = { coalition_target = token:social_liberal }
			has_coalition_with_target = no
		}
		ai_chance = { base = 20 }
		if = {
			limit = { has_government = social_conservative }
			add_political_power = -150
		}
		else = {
			add_political_power = -100
		}
		end_coalition = yes
		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:social_liberal }
		add_to_coalition = yes
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_liberal popularity = 0.1 }
		if = {
			limit = { has_government = social_conservative }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
			RUS_change_right_anger = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
			RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.65 option demrus.65.e"
		name = demrus.65.e #Offer deal to RDP
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_government = social_democrat }
			set_temp_variable = { coalition_target = token:social_democrat }
			has_coalition_with_target = no
		}
		ai_chance = { base = 20 }
		if = {
			limit = { has_government = social_democrat }
			add_political_power = -150
		}
		else = {
			add_political_power = -100
		}
		end_coalition = yes
		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:social_democrat }
		add_to_coalition = yes
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_democrat popularity = 0.1 }
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.65 option demrus.65.f"
		name = demrus.65.f #Offer deal to Kadets
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_government = market_liberal }
			set_temp_variable = { coalition_target = token:market_liberal }
			has_coalition_with_target = no
		}
		ai_chance = { base = 20 }
		add_political_power = -100
		end_coalition = yes
		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:market_liberal }
		add_to_coalition = yes
		add_popularity = { ideology = market_liberal popularity = 0.1 }
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_government = social_conservative } }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
			RUS_change_left_anger = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
			RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		}
	}
}

	}

	}

		trigger = { is_monarchy = no }
		text = demrus.70.d.dem

		}

country_event = { #Ascension of the People's Monarchists
	id = demrus.71
	title = demrus.71.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { is_monarchy = yes }
		text = demrus.71.d.mon
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { is_monarchy = no }
		text = demrus.71.d.rep
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_solonevich_3
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { has_government = social_conservative }
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.71 option demrus.71.a"
		name = demrus.71.a
		set_country_flag = RUS_nmd_formed
		effect_tooltip = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = social_conservative
				long_name = RUS_paternal_autocrat2_party_long_tt
				name = RUS_paternal_autocrat2_party
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { is_monarchy = no }
			activate_advisor = RUS_boris_suvorin_sic
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = social_conservative
				long_name = RUS_paternal_autocrat2_party_long
				name = RUS_paternal_autocrat2_party
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Relationship with SOR
	id = demrus.72
	title = demrus.72.t
	desc = demrus.72.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_shulgin
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { has_government = social_conservative }

	option = {
		name = demrus.72.a
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.72 option demrus.72.a"
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_pop_increase = party_popularity@authoritarian_democrat }
		hidden_effect = {
			add_popularity = { ideology = authoritarian_democrat popularity = -1 }
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_conservative popularity = RUS_pop_increase }
		effect_tooltip = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = authoritarian_democrat
				long_name = RUS_social_conservative_party_long_tt
				name = RUS_social_conservative_party
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = authoritarian_democrat
				long_name = RUS_social_conservative_party_long
				name = RUS_social_conservative_party
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.72 option demrus.72.b"
		name = demrus.72.b
		add_stability = 0.02
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #The Stabs-Captains Against Communism!
	id = demrus.73
	title = demrus.73.t
	desc = demrus.73.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_solonevich
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { RUS_is_demrus = yes }
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = demrus.74 days = 50 random_days = 50 } #President's Paramilitary?
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.73 option demrus.73.a"
		name = demrus.73.a
		trigger = {
			has_left_democratic_government = no
			RUS_maklakov = no
		}
		add_political_power = 30
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_democrat popularity = -0.03 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = radical_socialist popularity = -0.03 }
		if = {
			limit = { has_active_mission = RUS_SVR_activity }
			add_days_mission_timeout = {
				mission = RUS_SVR_activity
				days = 30
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.73 option demrus.73.b"
		name = demrus.73.b
		add_stability = 0.02
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.73 option demrus.73.c"
		name = demrus.73.c
		add_political_power = -30
		add_stability = 0.03
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.73 option demrus.73.e"
		name = demrus.73.e
		trigger = {
			has_conservative_government = no
			NOT = { has_government = paternal_autocrat }
		}
		add_political_power = -40
		add_stability = 0.06
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_conservative popularity = -0.05 }
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		RUS_ivan_solonevich = { remove_political_advisor_role = yes }
	}
}

### Anger Events

country_event = { #Rightwing Exploiting Anger
	id = demrus.100
	title = demrus.100.t
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kremlin4
	desc = demrus.100.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		has_idea = RUS_military_anger_dem
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.100 option demrus.100.a"
		name = demrus.100.a #We will work with the opposition to make this better
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 4
				check_variable = { RUS_right_anger > 7 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 4
				check_variable = { RUS_military_anger > 7 }
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -75
		add_war_support = 0.05
		add_popularity = { ideology = paternal_autocrat popularity = 0.05 }
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { RUS_right_anger > RUS_military_anger } }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
			RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		}
		else = {
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
			RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.100 option demrus.100.b"
		name = demrus.100.b #Try to appease these groups as best we can
		ai_chance = { base = 50 }
		add_political_power = -35
		add_popularity = { ideology = paternal_autocrat popularity = 0.075 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.100 option demrus.100.c"
		name = demrus.100.c #And make the opposition look better? Nonsense!
		ai_chance = { base = 50 }
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { RUS_right_anger < RUS_military_anger } }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
			RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		}
		else = {
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
			RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Role of the Military
	id = demrus.101
	title = demrus.101.t
	desc = demrus.101.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army4
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_idea = RUS_military_anger_dem
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.101 option demrus.101.a"
		name = demrus.101.a #We'll make them an integral part of the process
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				has_left_democratic_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_right_democratic_government = yes
			}
		}
		RUS_decrease_democracy = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		if = {
			limit = { has_active_mission = RUS_political_apathy }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_apathy_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_apathy_increase_tt
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = paternal_autocrat popularity = 0.05 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.101 option demrus.101.b"
		name = demrus.101.b #They can have an advisory role only
		ai_chance = { base = 50 }
		add_political_power = -50
		add_popularity = { ideology = paternal_autocrat popularity = 0.05 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.101 option demrus.101.c"
		name = demrus.101.c #The military is supposed to be apolitical
		ai_chance = { base = 25 }
		add_stability = 0.025
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		if = {
			limit = { has_active_mission = RUS_political_apathy }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_apathy_decrease_tt
			add_to_variable = { RUS_apathy_var = -1 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #The Generals' Letter
	id = demrus.102
	title = demrus.102.t
	desc = demrus.102.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_troops
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_idea = RUS_military_anger_dem
		RUS_anton_denikin = { is_army_chief = yes }
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.102 option demrus.102.a"
		name = demrus.102.a #Shut up, will you?
		add_political_power = -15
		add_popularity = { ideology = paternal_autocrat popularity = 0.05 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.102 option demrus.102.b"
		name = demrus.102.b #Divert them extra funds...
		add_war_support = 0.05
		add_political_power = -30
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_controlling_the_military
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_extra_army_funding }
			}
			activate_decision = RUS_army_extra_funding
		}
		else = {
			complete_national_focus = RUS_controlling_the_military
			activate_decision = RUS_army_extra_funding
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = paternal_autocrat popularity = 0.05 }
	}
}

country_event = { #Coup in the Kremlin
	id = demrus.103
	title = demrus.103.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_prewar_coup }
		text = demrus.103.d.prewar
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_prewar_coup } }
		text = demrus.103.d
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_moscow
	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		has_idea = RUS_military_anger_dem
		has_democratic_government = yes
		is_monarchy = no
		RUS_golitsyn = no
		is_ai = no
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { RUS_anton_denikin = { is_army_chief = yes } }
				RUS_anton_denikin = {
					promote_character = { ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype }
				}
			}
			else = {
				activate_advisor = RUS_sergey_markov_army_chief
				RUS_sergey_markov = {
					if = {
						limit = { has_ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype }
						promote_character = { ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype }
					}
					else = {
						add_country_leader_role = {
							country_leader = {
								desc = RUS_sergey_markov_leader_desc
								ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype
							}
							promote_leader = yes
						}
					}
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -9 }
			RUS_change_military_anger = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -5 }
			RUS_change_right_anger = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -3 }
			RUS_change_left_anger = yes
			remove_ideas = {
				RUS_embers_of_democracy
				RUS_weak_democracy
				RUS_unstable_democracy
				RUS_strenghtening_democracy
				RUS_strong_democracy
				RUS_genuine_democracy
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_completed_focus = RUS_republicanisation_of_army }
				uncomplete_national_focus = { focus = RUS_republicanisation_of_army }
				remove_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_ideological_officer_curriculum target = ROOT }
				remove_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_promote_young_blood target = ROOT }
				remove_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_sideline_monarchists target = ROOT }
				remove_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_remove_denikin target = ROOT }
			}
			set_country_flag = RUS_mil_anger_coup
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.103 option demrus.103.a"
		name = demrus.103.a
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = paternal_autocrat
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		add_ideas = RUS_rule_by_decree
		if = {
			limit = { syndicalist > 0.1 }
			add_popularity = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = -0.2 }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			activate_advisor = RUS_vasily_shulgin_sic
			country_event = { id = demrus.104 days = 7 } #Establishment of 'enforced democracy'
			RUS_daniil_sulimov = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_trait = RUS_sulimov_1_off }
					remove_trait = { trait = RUS_sulimov_1_off ideology = social_democrat_subtype }
					clr_character_flag = RUS_traits_assigned
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Establishment of 'enforced democracy'
	id = demrus.104
	title = demrus.104.t
	desc = demrus.104.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_trial_1
	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = ruselections.50 days = 14 } #President's agenda
			RUS_clear_earlier_demrus_focuses = yes
			remove_ideas = {
				RUS_narodovolets_idea
				RUS_narodovolets_idea_2
				RUS_republican_guard
				RUS_republican_guard_2
				RUS_new_russian_capitalism_idea
				RUS_new_russian_capitalism_idea_2
				RUS_republican_constitutional_clubs_idea
				RUS_liberal_intelligentsia
				RUS_liberal_intelligentsia_2
				RUS_liberal_intelligentsia_3
				RUS_deadlocked_duma
				RUS_win_back_peasants_idea
				RUS_literary_clubs
				RUS_democratic_education_idea
				RUS_democratic_foundation
				RUS_democratic_foundation_2
				RUS_fighting_democracy_campaign
				RUS_russian_civil_society_1
				RUS_russian_civil_society_2
				RUS_russian_civil_society_3
				RUS_russian_civil_society_4
				RUS_democratic_artels
				RUS_vsodes
				RUS_vsodes_2
				RUS_civil_militia
				RUS_tomsky_versus_titov
				RUS_tomsky_versus_titov_2
				RUS_labour_peace
				RUS_party_versus_president
				RUS_party_versus_president_2
				RUS_party_versus_president_3
				RUS_party_versus_president_4
				RUS_party_versus_president_5
				RUS_establishment_opposition
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.104 option demrus.104.a"
		name = demrus.104.a
		RUS_aleksandr_golitsyn = {
			promote_character = { ideology = social_conservative_subtype }
		}
		swap_ideas = {
			remove_idea = RUS_rule_by_decree
			add_idea = RUS_guided_democracy
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_republic_under_watch }
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = RUS_republic_under_watch
				add_idea = RUS_republic_under_watch_2
			}
		}
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = social_conservative
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_georgy_vernadsky_sic
		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:authoritarian_democrat }
		add_to_coalition = yes
		complete_national_focus = RUS_soccons
		if = {
			limit = {
				threat > 0.75
				NOT = { has_war_with = GER }
			}
			load_oob = RUS_preemptive_war_focus
		}
	}
}

	}

		add_political_power = -30

				set_party_name = {
					ideology = national_populist

					name = RUS_national_populist2_party

				set_party_name = {
					ideology = national_populist
					long_name = RUS_national_populist2_party_long
					name = RUS_national_populist2_party
				}
			}
		}
	}

		ai_chance = {

			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_active_mission = RUS_demands_from_unions_monarchy
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.02
		add_popularity = { ideology = national_populist popularity = 0.05 }
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_circle_of_st_george_in_russia } }
			effect_tooltip = {
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = national_populist
					long_name = RUS_national_populist2_party_long_tt
					name = RUS_national_populist2_party
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = national_populist
					long_name = RUS_national_populist2_party_long
					name = RUS_national_populist2_party
				}
			}
		}
	}

country_event = { #Faith in Russia
	id = demrus.106
	title = demrus.106.t
	desc = demrus.106.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_orthodox
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_idea = RUS_right_anger
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.106 option demrus.106.a"
		name = demrus.106.a #Fight fire with fire
		ai_chance = { base = 50 }
		add_political_power = -50
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_conservative popularity = -0.05 }
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		if = {
			limit = { has_active_mission = RUS_bold_promises }
			add_days_mission_timeout = {
				mission = RUS_bold_promises
				days = 30
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.106 option demrus.106.b"
		name = demrus.106.b #They have the right to say it
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				check_variable = { RUS_right_anger > 6 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_government = social_conservative }
			add_popularity = { ideology = authoritarian_democrat popularity = 0.05 }
		}
		else = {
			add_popularity = { ideology = social_conservative popularity = 0.05 }
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.106 option demrus.106.c"
		name = demrus.106.c #The state must support and promote the church
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				check_variable = { RUS_left_anger > 6 }
			}
		}
		trigger = { NOT = { has_government = social_democrat } }
		add_stability = 0.04
		if = {
			limit = { has_government = social_conservative }
			add_popularity = { ideology = authoritarian_democrat popularity = 0.05 }
		}
		else = {
			add_popularity = { ideology = social_conservative popularity = 0.05 }
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { is_core_of = RUS }
				is_central_asia = yes
			}
			add_compliance = -10
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #The Patriots March
	id = demrus.108
	title = demrus.108.t
	desc = demrus.108.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army2
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_idea = RUS_right_anger
		has_elected_government = yes
		is_ai = no
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.108 option demrus.108.a"
		name = demrus.108.a #Keep the order
		ai_chance = { base = 10 }
		if = {
			limit = { has_completed_focus = RUS_expand_okhrana }
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_nationalist_marches
				days = 25
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_okhrana_expanded_tt
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { RUS_titov = no }
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_nationalist_marches
				days = 50
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_nationalist_marches
				days = 70
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.108 option demrus.108.b"
		name = demrus.108.b #Dismiss left-wing ministers
		trigger = {
			RUS_titov = no
			RUS_sulimov = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_government = social_democrat
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_dolgorukov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_kartashyov_ai
				}
				RUS_vasily_maklakov = { is_country_leader = yes }
			}
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			RUS_aleksandr_titov = { remove_political_advisor_role = yes }
			RUS_sergey_melgunov = { remove_political_advisor_role = yes }
			RUS_nikolay_oganovsky = { remove_political_advisor_role = yes }
			RUS_vladimir_levitsky = { remove_political_advisor_role = yes }
			RUS_vladimir_karelin = { remove_political_advisor_role = yes }
			RUS_aleksandr_finn_yenotayevsky = { remove_political_advisor_role = yes }
			RUS_gergard_zeller = { remove_political_advisor_role = yes }
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -2 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		set_country_flag = RUS_purged_social_democrats
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_democrat popularity = -0.05 }
		if = {
			limit = { has_active_mission = RUS_political_apathy }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_apathy_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_apathy_increase_tt
		}
		if = {
			limit = { is_in_coalition_with_social_democrat = yes }
			country_event = demrus.65 #Collapse of the Coalition
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.108 option demrus.108.c"
		name = demrus.108.c #Pass stricter anti-socialist laws
		trigger = {
			RUS_titov = no
			RUS_sulimov = no
		}
		ai_chance = { base = 50 }
		RUS_decrease_democracy = yes
		add_ideas = RUS_strict_anti_socialist_laws
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -2 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -2 }
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		if = {
			limit = { has_active_mission = RUS_political_apathy }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_apathy_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_apathy_increase_tt
		}
		if = {
			limit = { is_in_coalition_with_social_democrat = yes }
			country_event = demrus.65 #Collapse of the Coalition
		}
	}
}

	id = demrus.114
	title = demrus.114.t
	desc = demrus.114.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_demonstration
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		has_idea = RUS_left_anger
		NOT = { has_completed_focus = RUS_tripartite_labour_negotiation }
		is_ai = no
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.114 option demrus.114.a"
		name = demrus.114.a #Disperse the strikes as illegal
		add_stability = -0.06
		add_war_support = -0.07
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -8 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		add_manpower = -1123
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		if = {
			limit = { has_active_mission = RUS_political_apathy }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_apathy_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_apathy_increase_tt
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.114 option demrus.114.b"
		name = demrus.114.b #Negotiate and give them some concession
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_dolgorukov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_kartashyov_ai
				}
				RUS_vasily_maklakov = { is_country_leader = yes }
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -60
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = RUS_strike_season
			days = 60
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #At the Precipe of a Revolution
	id = demrus.115
	title = demrus.115.t
	desc = demrus.115.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kremlin2
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		has_country_flag = RUS_confidence_votes_law
		has_idea = RUS_left_anger
		RUS_sulimov = no
		is_ai = no
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.115 option demrus.115.a"
		name = demrus.115.a #Give in and appoint a more left-wing government
		trigger = { is_ai = no }
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_aftermath option = DEFAULT } }
			}
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = social_democrat
			elections_allowed = yes
			election_frequency = 60
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_government = social_democrat }
			activate_advisor = RUS_vladimir_levitsky_sic
			add_popularity = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = 0.06 }
		}
		else = {
			activate_advisor = RUS_aleksandr_titov_sic
			add_popularity = { ideology = social_democrat popularity = 0.06 }
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_deadlock_tt
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -3 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { is_monarchy = yes }
				country_event = { id = monrus.70 days = 1 } #Coup in the Kremlin (Monarchy)
			}
			else = {
				country_event = { id = demrus.103 days = 1 } #Coup in the Kremlin
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.115 option demrus.115.b"
		name = demrus.115.b #Not on my watch
		add_stability = -0.12
		add_political_power = -100
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -9 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -5 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -2 }
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -2 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
	}
}

	id = demrus.120

		trigger = { is_monarchy = yes }

	}
}

country_event = { #Shatilov Report
	id = demrus.122
	title = demrus.122.t
	desc = demrus.122.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_shatilov
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		original_tag = RUS
		date > 1939.5.1
		threat > 0.7
		RUS_is_demrus = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
		NOT = {
			has_war_with = GER
			has_global_flag = second_weltkrieg_has_started
			has_completed_focus = RUS_preemptive_war
			has_completed_focus = RUS_triumphant_russian_nation
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.122 option demrus.122.a"
		name = demrus.122.a
		add_war_support = 0.04
		add_named_threat = {
			threat = 2
			name = demrus.122.t
		}
		GER = {
			add_opinion_modifier = {
				target = ROOT
				modifier = KR_outraged
			}
			add_intel = {
				target = ROOT
				civilian_intel = 1
				army_intel = 1
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = demrus.123 days = 30 } #Emergency Meeting of the Cabinet
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.122 option demrus.122.b"
		name = demrus.122.b
		add_stability = 0.01
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = demrus.123 days = 30 } #Emergency Meeting of the Cabinet
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Emergency Meeting of the Cabinet
	id = demrus.123

		activate_mission = RUS_oncoming_war
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.123 option demrus.123.b"
		name = demrus.123.b
		ai_chance = { base = 100 }
		trigger = { has_left_democratic_government = no }
		activate_mission = RUS_oncoming_war
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.123 option demrus.123.c"
		name = demrus.123.c
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		trigger = { NOT = { has_government = social_conservative } }
		add_war_support = -0.05
		set_country_flag = RUS_refused_war

			if = {
				limit = { is_monarchy = yes }

			}
			else = {
				country_event = { id = demrus.103 days = 4 } #Coup in the Kremlin
			}
		}
	}
}

		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
	}
}

### Demrus post-war events

country_event = { #Russian puppet regimes in Europe get elections
	id = demrus.151
	hidden = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		country_event = { id = demrus.151 days = 1460 }
	}

	option = { #PatAut
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.151 option 1"
		trigger = {
			FROM = { has_completed_focus = RUS_return_to_tradition }
			NOT = { tag = POL }
			NOT = { has_cosmetic_tag = ITA_federation }
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = paternal_autocrat
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			popularity = 0.25
		}
	}

	option = { #AuthDem
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.151 option 2"
		trigger = {
			NOT = { tag = POL }
			OR = {
				has_cosmetic_tag = ITA_federation
				FROM = { has_completed_focus = RUS_first_party_of_russia }
				FROM = { has_completed_focus = RUS_european_policeman }
				FROM = { has_completed_focus = RUS_return_to_tradition }
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				FROM = { has_government = authoritarian_democrat }
			}
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = authoritarian_democrat
			election_frequency = 48
			elections_allowed = yes
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = authoritarian_democrat
			popularity = 0.25
		}
	}

	option = { #SocCon
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.151 option 3"
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_cosmetic_tag = ITA_federation }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				FROM = {
					has_government = social_conservative
					has_country_flag = RUS_controlled_european_democracy
				}
			}
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = social_conservative
			election_frequency = 48
			elections_allowed = yes
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_conservative
			popularity = 0.2
		}
		random_list = {
			33 = {
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = paternal_autocrat
					popularity = 0.1
				}
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = authoritarian_democrat
					popularity = 0.1
				}
			}
			33 = {
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = market_liberal
					popularity = 0.1
				}
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = social_liberal
					popularity = 0.1
				}
			}
			33 = {
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = social_liberal
					popularity = 0.1
				}
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = social_democrat
					popularity = 0.1
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { #MarLib
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.151 option 4"
		trigger = {
			NOT = { FROM = { has_completed_focus = RUS_return_to_tradition } }
			NOT = { tag = POL }
			NOT = { has_cosmetic_tag = ITA_federation }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				FROM = {
					has_government = market_liberal
					has_country_flag = RUS_controlled_european_democracy
				}
			}
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = market_liberal
			election_frequency = 48
			elections_allowed = yes
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = market_liberal
			popularity = 0.2
		}
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = social_conservative
					popularity = 0.1
				}
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = social_liberal
					popularity = 0.1
				}
			}
			50 = {
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = social_liberal
					popularity = 0.1
				}
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = social_democrat
					popularity = 0.1
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { #SocLib
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.151 option 5"
		trigger = {
			NOT = { FROM = { has_completed_focus = RUS_return_to_tradition } }
			NOT = { has_cosmetic_tag = ITA_federation }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				FROM = {
					has_government = social_liberal
					has_country_flag = RUS_controlled_european_democracy
				}
			}
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = social_liberal
			election_frequency = 48
			elections_allowed = yes
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_liberal
			popularity = 0.2
		}
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = social_conservative
					popularity = 0.1
				}
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = market_liberal
					popularity = 0.1
				}
			}
			50 = {
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = market_liberal
					popularity = 0.1
				}
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = social_democrat
					popularity = 0.1
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { #SocDem
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.151 option 6"
		trigger = {
			NOT = { FROM = { has_completed_focus = RUS_return_to_tradition } }
			NOT = { has_cosmetic_tag = ITA_federation }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				FROM = {
					has_government = social_democrat
					has_country_flag = RUS_controlled_european_democracy
				}
			}
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = social_democrat
			election_frequency = 48
			elections_allowed = yes
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			popularity = 0.2
		}
		random_list = {
			33 = {
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = radical_socialist
					popularity = 0.1
				}
			}
			33 = {
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = social_conservative
					popularity = 0.1
				}
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = market_liberal
					popularity = 0.1
				}
			}
			33 = {
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = market_liberal
					popularity = 0.1
				}
				add_popularity = {
					ideology = social_liberal
					popularity = 0.1
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #civil war, healed
	id = demrus.160
	title = demrus.160.t
	desc = demrus.160.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_happy_crowd

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.160 option demrus.160.a"
		name = demrus.160.a
		add_war_support = -0.15
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_strong_democracy }
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = RUS_strong_democracy
				add_idea = RUS_genuine_democracy
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #retvrn
	id = demrus.164
	title = demrus.164.t
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_intro
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS_solonevich = yes }
		text = demrus.164.d.solonevich_republic
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = yes } }
		text = demrus.164.d.peoples_monarchy
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_completed_focus = RUS_authdems }
		text = demrus.164.d.SOR
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.164 option demrus.164.a"
		name = demrus.164.a
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_solonevich = yes }
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = authoritarian_democrat
				long_name = RUS_social_conservative_party_long
				name = RUS_social_conservative_party
			}
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_pop_increase = party_popularity@social_conservative }
			divide_temp_variable = { RUS_pop_increase = 2 }
			add_popularity = { ideology = authoritarian_democrat popularity = RUS_pop_increase }
			hidden_effect = {
				multiply_temp_variable = { RUS_pop_increase = -1 }
				add_popularity = { ideology = social_conservative popularity = RUS_pop_increase }
			}
			set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:social_conservative }
			add_to_coalition = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Taking up the Mantle
	id = demrus.165
	title = demrus.165.t

country_event = { #Dvinsk Referendum
	id = demrus.166
	title = demrus.166.t
	desc = demrus.166.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy3
	trigger = {
		LAT = {
			exists = yes
			is_subject_of = RUS
		}
		RUS = {
			OR = {
				has_government = market_liberal
				has_left_democratic_government = yes
				has_socialist_government = yes
			}
			owns_state = 880 #Latgale
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.166 option demrus.166.a"
		name = demrus.166.a
		add_political_power = 75
		add_stability = 0.02
		880 = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_state_flag = dvinsk_state }
				clr_state_flag = dvinsk_state
				remove_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_dvinsk_modifier }
			}
			transfer_state_to = LAT
			remove_core_of = ROOT
		}
		LAT = {
			add_opinion_modifier = { target = ROOT modifier = KR_returned_land }
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.166 option demrus.166.b"
		name = demrus.166.b
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		add_war_support = 0.04
		LAT = {
			add_opinion_modifier = { target = ROOT modifier = KR_displeased }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Rebirth of Russian Socialism
	id = demrus.170
	title = demrus.170.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS_aleksandr_titov = { is_country_leader = yes } }
		text = demrus.170.d
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS_aleksandr_titov = { is_country_leader = no } }
		text = demrus.170.d2
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_shliapnikov
	trigger = {
		country_exists = INT
		country_exists = FRA
		has_dictatorship_government = no
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.170 option demrus.170.a"
		name = demrus.170.a
		RUS_decrease_democracy = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.170 option demrus.170.b"
		name = demrus.170.b
		add_political_power = -30
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_democrat popularity = -0.03 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = 0.03 }
		effect_tooltip = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = syndicalist
				name = RUS_social_democrat3_party
				long_name = RUS_social_democrat3_party_long_tt
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_VSRP_formed
		hidden_effect = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = syndicalist
				name = RUS_social_democrat3_party
				long_name = RUS_social_democrat3_party_long
			}
			country_event = { id = demrus.176 days = 265 random_days = 100 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.170 option demrus.170.c"
		name = demrus.170.c
		add_war_support = -0.03
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_democrat popularity = -0.06 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = 0.06 }
		effect_tooltip = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = syndicalist
				name = RUS_social_democrat3_party
				long_name = RUS_social_democrat3_party_long_tt
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_VSRP_formed
		hidden_effect = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = syndicalist
				name = RUS_social_democrat3_party
				long_name = RUS_social_democrat3_party_long
			}
			country_event = {
				id = demrus.176 days = 265 random_days = 100
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Spread of the Revolutionary Cells
	id = demrus.171
	title = demrus.171.t
	desc = demrus.171.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_protest
	trigger = {
		country_exists = INT
		country_exists = FRA
		has_left_democratic_government = no
		has_socialist_government = no
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.171 option demrus.171.a"
		name = demrus.171.a
		trigger = { RUS_savinkov = yes }
		add_political_power = -50
		add_stability = 0.04
		add_popularity = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = -0.06 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = totalist popularity = -0.06 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.171 option demrus.171.b"
		name = demrus.171.b
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_idea = RUS_embers_of_democracy }
			}
			RUS_decrease_democracy = yes
		}
		add_political_power = -100
		add_popularity = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = -0.06 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = totalist popularity = -0.04 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.171 option demrus.171.c"
		name = demrus.171.c
		trigger = {
			RUS_savinkov = no
		}
		add_stability = -0.03
		add_popularity = { ideology = totalist popularity = 0.04 }
	}
}

country_event = { #Strikes Against the War!
	id = demrus.172
	title = demrus.172.t
	desc = demrus.172.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { has_war_with = INT }
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_strike

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.172 option demrus.172.a"
		name = demrus.172.a
		add_war_support = -0.1
		if = {
			limit = { has_left_democratic_government = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -6 }
		}
		else = { set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -4 } }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		RUS_decrease_democracy = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.172 option demrus.172.b"
		name = demrus.172.b
		add_war_support = -0.1
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = RUS_strike_season
			days = 120
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event demrus.172 option demrus.172.c"
		name = demrus.172.c
		add_political_power = -100
		add_war_support = -0.05
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = 3 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
	}
}

### Monarchist Russia Events ###

unit_leader_event = { #Wrangel becomes imperial regent
	id = monrus.1
	title = monrus.1.t
	desc = monrus.1.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.1 option monrus.1.a" #Normal Monarchy
		name = monrus.1.a
		trigger = { NOT = { has_war_with = GER } }
		set_cosmetic_tag = RUS_empire
		RUS_pyotr_wrangel = { set_character_as_regent = yes }
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = monrus.2 days = 20 } #Crown Kirill/Vladimir
			country_event = { id = demrus.120 days = 150 random_days = 50 } #Wrangel reveals the war plan
			country_event = { id = monrus.6 days = 100 } #Union for the Revival of the Republic
			country_event = { id = monrus.29 days = 600 random_days = 600 } #Orthodoxy, Constitution, People
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Crowning the Tsar
	id = monrus.2
	title = monrus.2.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { date < 1938.8.2 }
		text = monrus.2.d.kirill
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { date > 1938.8.1 }
		text = monrus.2.d.vladimir
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_coronation

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.2 option monrus.2.a"
		name = monrus.2.a
		add_stability = 0.05
		RUS_create_monarchy = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			random_other_country = {
				limit = { is_ai = yes }
				news_event = rusnews.6
			}
			country_event = { id = monrus.28 days = 365 } #The Day of Restoration
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Death of Kirill
	id = monrus.5
	title = monrus.5.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { is_monarchy = yes }
		text = monrus.5.d.mon
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_socialist_government = yes }
		text = monrus.5.d.soc
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			is_monarchy = no
			has_socialist_government = no
		}
		text = monrus.5.d.dem
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kirill2
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { is_monarchy = yes }
				RUS_create_vladimir = yes
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.5 option monrus.5.a"
		name = monrus.5.a
		trigger = { is_monarchy = yes }
		effect_tooltip = { promote_character = RUS_vladimir_romanov }
		hidden_effect = { RUS_add_vladimir_traits = yes }
		RUS_kirill_romanov = { kill_character = yes }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.5 option monrus.5.b"
		name = monrus.5.b
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_socialist_government = yes
				has_government = national_populist
			}
		}
		RUS_kirill_romanov = { kill_character = yes }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.5 option monrus.5.c"
		name = monrus.5.c
		trigger = {
			is_monarchy = no
			has_socialist_government = no
			NOT = { has_government = national_populist }
		}
		RUS_kirill_romanov = { kill_character = yes }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.5 option monrus.5.e"
		name = monrus.5.e
		trigger = {
			is_monarchy = no
			has_socialist_government = no
			has_conservative_government = yes
		}
		add_political_power = -30
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_conservative popularity = 0.02 }
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		RUS_kirill_romanov = { kill_character = yes }
	}
}

			type = infantry_equipment
			amount = -1000
		}

			mission = RUS_SVR_activity

		}

			idea = RUS_strike_season
			days = 30
		}

	}

		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.7 option monrus.7.b"
		name = monrus.7.b
		ai_chance = { base = 100 }
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_government = social_liberal
				has_government = market_liberal
			}
			NOT = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_press_controls
				has_completed_focus = RUS_entrench_kadets
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -40
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_democrat popularity = 0.05 }
		country_event = { id = monrus.9 days = 5 } #Negotiations with the Labour Unions
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.7 option monrus.7.c"
		name = monrus.7.c
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = RUS_strike_season
			days = 30
		}

		add_popularity = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = 0.05 }

country_event = { #Peasant Marches
	id = monrus.8
	title = monrus.8.t
	desc = monrus.8.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_riot2
	trigger = { is_monarchy = yes }
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.8 option monrus.8.a"
		ai_chance = { base = 20 }
		name = monrus.8.a
		add_manpower = -5000
		add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
			type = infantry_equipment
			amount = -1000
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		add_days_mission_timeout = {
			mission = RUS_SVR_activity
			days = 40
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_government = social_liberal } }
			add_popularity = { ideology = social_liberal popularity = 0.025 }
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = radical_socialist popularity = 0.025 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.8 option monrus.8.b"
		name = monrus.8.b
		ai_chance = { base = 5 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = yes }
					has_government = social_liberal
				}
			}
			add_political_power = -30
		}
		else = {
			add_political_power = -50
		}
		add_stability = 0.02
		add_days_mission_timeout = {
			mission = RUS_SVR_activity
			days = 40
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_liberal popularity = 0.025 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.8 option monrus.8.c"
		name = monrus.8.c
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		add_stability = -0.05
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_government = social_liberal } }
			add_popularity = { ideology = social_liberal popularity = 0.05 }
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = radical_socialist popularity = 0.05 }
	}
}

	id = monrus.10
	title = monrus.10.t
	desc = monrus.10.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy3
	trigger = {
		is_monarchy = yes
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.10 option monrus.10.a"
		name = monrus.10.a
		activate_mission = RUS_promised_jobs
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				add = -5
				has_political_power > 50
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_sr_ai
				has_country_flag = RUS_empire_ai
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.10 option monrus.10.b"
		name = monrus.10.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				add = 5
				has_political_power > 50
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 5
				check_variable = { RUS_left_anger > 3 }
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -50
		add_days_mission_timeout = {
			mission = RUS_SVR_activity
			days = 90
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.10 option monrus.10.c"
		name = monrus.10.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				add = 5
				has_political_power > 50
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 5
				check_variable = { RUS_left_anger > 3 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 5
				has_stability < 0.15
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_sr_ai
			}
		}
		activate_mission = RUS_promised_jobs
		add_political_power = -50
		add_days_mission_timeout = {
			mission = RUS_SVR_activity
			days = 90
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
	}
}

				factor = 0
				has_active_mission = RUS_demands_from_unions_monarchy

		}

		add_popularity = { ideology = totalist popularity = -0.03 }
	}

		add_popularity = { ideology = national_populist popularity = -0.08 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = radical_socialist popularity = -0.04 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = -0.04 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = totalist popularity = -0.04 }
	}
}

country_event = { #Operation Against SVR
	id = monrus.13
	title = monrus.13.t
	desc = monrus.13.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_gun
	trigger = { is_monarchy = yes }
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.13 option monrus.13.a"
		name = monrus.13.a
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -2 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		RUS_decrease_democracy = yes
		remove_mission = RUS_SVR_activity
		add_popularity = { ideology = paternal_autocrat popularity = 0.04 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_democrat popularity = -0.04 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_liberal popularity = -0.03 }
		set_country_flag = RUS_destroyed_SVR
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = monrus.17 days = 70 } #Expansion of Anti-Communist Laws
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Imperial Decree on Protection of the People and the State
	id = monrus.14
	title = monrus.14.t
	desc = monrus.14.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_duma
	trigger = { is_monarchy = yes }
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.14 option monrus.14.a"
		name = monrus.14.a
		if = {
			limit = { has_government = social_liberal }
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_protection_decree_soclib
				days = 730
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_government = market_liberal }
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_protection_decree_marlib
				days = 730
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_protection_decree
				days = 730
			}
		}
		RUS_decrease_democracy = yes
		add_days_mission_timeout = {
			mission = RUS_SVR_activity
			days = 90
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_state_protection_decree
	}
}
country_event = { #Imperial Cabinet Falls
	id = monrus.15
	title = monrus.15.t
	desc = monrus.15.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_conference1

	trigger = {
		is_ai = no
		is_monarchy = yes
		country_exists = GER
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			end_coalition = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.15 option monrus.15.a"
		name = monrus.15.a
		trigger = { has_government = social_conservative }
		add_stability = -0.1
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -5 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = market_liberal
			elections_allowed = yes
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_pavel_gronsky_sic
		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:social_conservative }
		add_to_coalition = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -3 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -3 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			complete_national_focus = RUS_marlibs
			uncomplete_national_focus = { focus = RUS_soccons }
			uncomplete_national_focus = {
				focus = RUS_empower_MVD
				uncomplete_children = yes
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.15 option monrus.15.b"
		name = monrus.15.b
		trigger = { has_government = social_liberal }
		add_stability = -0.1
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -5 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = market_liberal
			elections_allowed = yes
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_sergey_melgunov_sic
		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:social_democrat }
		add_to_coalition = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -3 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -3 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			complete_national_focus = RUS_marlibs
			RUS_remove_sr_monarchist_govt = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.15 option monrus.15.c"
		name = monrus.15.c
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_government = social_conservative
				has_government = social_liberal
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.1
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -5 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = social_conservative
			elections_allowed = yes
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_aleksandr_golitsyn_sic
		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:authoritarian_democrat }
		add_to_coalition = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -3 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -3 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			complete_national_focus = RUS_soccons
			uncomplete_national_focus = { focus = RUS_marlibs }
			uncomplete_national_focus = {
				focus = RUS_future_direction_of_liberalism
				uncomplete_children = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Socialist-Revolutionary Brothers' War
	id = monrus.16
	title = monrus.16.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_fondaminsky_victory }
		text = monrus.16.d.fondaminsky
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_fondaminsky_victory } }
		text = monrus.16.d.rikhter
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_fondaminsky
	trigger = {
		is_monarchy = yes
		has_government = social_liberal
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.16 option monrus.16.a"
		name = monrus.16.a
		add_stability = -0.05
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_fondaminsky_victory }
			retire_character = RUS_vladimir_rikhter
			add_political_power = 50
		}
		else = {
			add_popularity = { ideology = social_liberal popularity = -0.05 }
			country_event = { id = monrus.15 days = 3 } #Imperial Cabinet Falls
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #The Garde Equipage
	id = monrus.20
	title = monrus.20.t
	desc = monrus.20.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kirill2
	trigger = {
		is_monarchy = yes
		RUS_wrangel = no
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.20 option monrus.20.a"
		name = monrus.20.a #Yes, Garde Equipage will be restored
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				check_variable = { RUS_left_anger > 3 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_political_power < -20
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			division_template = {
				name = "Imperskiy Gvardeyskaya"
				division_names_group = RUS_CAV_02
				regiments = {
					cavalry = { x = 0 y = 0 }
					cavalry = { x = 0 y = 1 }
					cavalry = { x = 0 y = 2 }
					cavalry = { x = 1 y = 0 }
					cavalry = { x = 1 y = 1 }
					cavalry = { x = 1 y = 2 }
					cavalry = { x = 2 y = 0 }
					cavalry = { x = 2 y = 1 }
					cavalry = { x = 2 y = 2 }
					cavalry = { x = 3 y = 0 }
					cavalry = { x = 3 y = 1 }
					cavalry = { x = 3 y = 2 }
				}
				support = {
					mot_recon = { x = 0 y = 0 }
					artillery = { x = 0 y = 1 }
				}
			}
		}
		add_war_support = 0.01
		random_owned_controlled_state = {
			prioritize = { 219 } #Moscow
			limit = { valid_state_for_spawning_friendly_unit = yes }
			create_unit = {
				division = "division_template = \"Imperskiy Gvardeyskaya\" start_experience_factor = 1"
				owner = ROOT
			}
		}
		add_manpower = -9500
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.20 option monrus.20.b"
		name = monrus.20.b #Grant him a smaller token guard
		ai_chance = { base = 10 }
		add_political_power = -20
		add_manpower = -800
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.20 option monrus.20.c"
		name = monrus.20.c #What is this, the 19th century?
		ai_chance = {
			base = 15
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				check_variable = { RUS_right_anger > 5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				check_variable = { RUS_right_anger < 3 }
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -4 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #The Doctrine of the Tsar-Redeemer
	id = monrus.24
	title = monrus.24.t
	desc = monrus.24.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kirill
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			RUS_is_demrus = yes
			tag = FER
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.24 option monrus.24.a"
		name = monrus.24.a #Support the canonisation
		if = {
			limit = { is_monarchy = no }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
			RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_government = social_conservative
					has_authoritarian_government = yes
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = 5 }
			change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		}
		else = {
			add_popularity = { ideology = social_conservative popularity = 0.05 }
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		set_country_flag = RUS_imperial_family_martyrs
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.24 option monrus.24.b"
		name = monrus.24.b #Why would one man matter?
		trigger = { tag = RUS }
		if = {
			limit = { is_monarchy = no }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
			RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		}
		else = { add_political_power = -35 }
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
	}
}
country_event = { #Chairman of the High Imperial Council
	id = monrus.25
	title = monrus.25.t
	desc = monrus.25.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_duma
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.25 option monrus.25.a"
		name = monrus.25.a
		RUS_dmitry_romanov = {
			add_trait = {
				slot = political_advisor
				trait = RUS_high_imperial_council_member
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.02
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.25 option monrus.25.b"
		name = monrus.25.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 50
				RUS_aleksandr_golitsyn = { is_second_in_command = yes }
			}
		}
		RUS_aleksandr_golitsyn = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_advisor_role = second_in_command }
				add_trait = {
					slot = second_in_command
					trait = RUS_high_imperial_council_member
				}
			}
			else = {
				add_trait = {
					slot = political_advisor
					trait = RUS_high_imperial_council_member
				}
			}
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_conservative popularity = 0.03 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.25 option monrus.25.c"
		name = monrus.25.c
		RUS_georgy_vernadsky = {
			add_trait = {
				slot = second_in_command
				trait = RUS_high_imperial_council_member
			}
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_conservative popularity = 0.03 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.25 option monrus.25.e"
		name = monrus.25.e
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_invite_SOR
				RUS_wrangel_path = yes
			}
		}
		RUS_ivan_ilyin = {
			add_trait = {
				slot = political_advisor
				trait = RUS_high_imperial_council_member
			}
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = authoritarian_democrat popularity = 0.03 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.25 option monrus.25.f"
		name = monrus.25.f
		trigger = {
			RUS_ivan_solonevich = {
				is_second_in_command = no
				is_country_leader = yes
			}
		}
		RUS_ivan_solonevich = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_advisor_role = second_in_command }
				add_trait = {
					slot = second_in_command
					trait = RUS_high_imperial_council_member
				}
			}
			else = {
				add_trait = {
					slot = political_advisor
					trait = RUS_high_imperial_council_member
				}
			}
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_conservative popularity = 0.03 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.25 option monrus.25.g"
		name = monrus.25.g
		trigger = { is_in_coalition_with_market_liberal = yes }
		RUS_anton_kartashyov = {
			add_trait = {
				slot = political_advisor
				trait = RUS_high_imperial_council_member
			}
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = market_liberal popularity = 0.03 }
	}
}

country_event = { #Enshrining Family Values in the Law
	id = monrus.27
	title = monrus.27.t
	desc = monrus.27.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kremlin_1
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_government = national_populist
			is_monarchy = yes
			has_right_democratic_government = yes
			has_authoritarian_government = yes
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.27 option monrus.27.a"
		name = monrus.27.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_government = market_liberal
					has_government = social_liberal
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -3 }
			change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		}
		else = {
			set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = 3 }
			change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_demrus = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
			RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.27 option monrus.27.b"
		name = monrus.27.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_government = national_populist
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -20
	}
}

country_event = { #Coup in the Kremlin (Monarchy)
	id = monrus.70
	title = monrus.70.t
	desc = monrus.70.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army2
	trigger = { is_monarchy = yes }
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -9 }
			RUS_change_military_anger = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -5 }
			RUS_change_right_anger = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -3 }
			RUS_change_left_anger = yes
			remove_ideas = {
				RUS_embers_of_democracy
				RUS_weak_democracy
				RUS_unstable_democracy
				RUS_strenghtening_democracy
				RUS_strong_democracy
				RUS_genuine_democracy
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_completed_focus = RUS_NMD }
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = paternal_autocrat
					long_name = RUS_paternal_autocrat_party_long
					name = RUS_paternal_autocrat_party
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_mil_anger_coup
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.70 option monrus.70.a"
		name = monrus.70.a
		add_stability = -0.1
		add_ideas = RUS_rule_by_decree
		add_advisor_role = {
			character = RUS_pyotr_wrangel
			activate = yes
			advisor = {
				slot = second_in_command
				idea_token = RUS_pyotr_wrangel_sic
				desc = RUS_pyotr_wrangel_leader_desc
				traits = { KR_old_general_sic }
			}
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = paternal_autocrat
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		if = {
			limit = { threat > 0.75 }
			load_oob = RUS_preemptive_war_focus
		}
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = 5 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #Restoration of Civilian Government
	id = monrus.71
	title = monrus.71.t
	desc = monrus.71.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_duma
	trigger = { is_monarchy = yes }
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_ideas = {
				RUS_embers_of_democracy
				RUS_weak_democracy
				RUS_unstable_democracy
				RUS_strenghtening_democracy
				RUS_strong_democracy
				RUS_genuine_democracy
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.71 option monrus.71.a"
		name = monrus.71.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_vps }
			}
		}
		swap_ideas = {
			remove_idea = RUS_rule_by_decree
			add_idea = RUS_guided_democracy
		}
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = social_conservative
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_aleksandr_golitsyn_sic
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = 10 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.71 option monrus.71.b"
		name = monrus.71.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_vps
			}
		}
		swap_ideas = {
			remove_idea = RUS_rule_by_decree
			add_idea = RUS_guided_democracy
		}
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = authoritarian_democrat
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_vasily_shulgin_sic
	}
}

unit_leader_event = { #Wrangel's regency
	id = monrus.80
	title = monrus.80.t
	desc = monrus.80.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_wrangel2
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.80 option monrus.80.a"
		name = monrus.80.a
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = allow_sound_events_flag }
				scoped_play_song = "god_save_the_tsar"
			}
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = paternal_autocrat
				long_name = RUS_paternal_autocrat3_party_long
				name = RUS_paternal_autocrat3_party
			}
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = authoritarian_democrat
				long_name = RUS_authoritarian_democrat_party_long
				name = RUS_authoritarian_democrat_party
			}
			country_event = { id = monrus.79 days = 10 } #Imperial Govt
			clr_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_ai
			set_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_path
			RUS_create_monarchy = yes
			mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		}
		complete_national_focus = RUS_black_baron
		activate_advisor = RUS_vasily_shulgin_sic
		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:authoritarian_democrat }
		add_to_coalition = yes
	}
}

	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_wrangel2
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.90 option monrus.90.a"
		name = monrus.90.a
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		add_stability = 0.05
		country_event = { id = monrus.93 days = 21 } #Coronation of Young Tsar
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.90 option monrus.90.b"
		name = monrus.90.b
		ai_chance = { base = 100 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_enables_auth_monarchy_tt
		country_event = { id = monrus.91 days = 14 } #Referendum on Wrangel's Coronation
	}
}

country_event = { #Referendum on Wrangel's coronation
	id = monrus.91
	title = monrus.91.t
	desc = monrus.91.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_wrangel2
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.91 option monrus.91.a"
		name = monrus.91.a
		country_event = { id = monrus.92 days = 7 } #Coronation of Black Baron
	}
