country_event = { #Coronation of Wrangel
	id = monrus.92
	title = monrus.92.t
	desc = monrus.92.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_coronation
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.92 option monrus.92.a"
		name = monrus.92.a
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { RUS_mikhail_drozdovsky = { has_advisor_role = army_chief } } }
			add_advisor_role = {
				character = RUS_mikhail_drozdovsky
				advisor = {
					slot = army_chief
					idea_token = RUS_mikhail_drozdovsky_army_chief
					desc = RUS_mikhail_drozdovsky_commander_desc
					traits = { KR_army_chief_morale_3 }
					cost = 100
					can_be_fired = no
				}
				activate = yes
			}
		}
		else = {
			activate_advisor = RUS_mikhail_drozdovsky_army_chief
		}
		RUS_increase_imperial_popularity = yes
		RUS_pyotr_wrangel = {
			set_portraits = {
				civilian = { large = GFX_portrait_RUS_pyotr_wrangel_civilian_large }
			}
			set_character_name = RUS_pyotr_wrangel_regnal
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_trait = RUS_imperial_regent }
					remove_trait = {
						trait = RUS_imperial_regent
						ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { has_trait = RUS_ruler_of_state }
					remove_trait = {
						trait = RUS_ruler_of_state
						ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype
					}
				}
				add_trait = {
					ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype
					trait = RUS_emperor_of_all_russias_wrangel
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { news_event = rusnews.7 }
	}
}

country_event = { #Tsar-Maker Wrangel crowns Vladimir
	id = monrus.93
	title = monrus.93.t
	desc = monrus.93.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_vladimir
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.93 option monrus.93.a"
		name = monrus.93.a
		RUS_create_vladimir = yes
		RUS_increase_imperial_popularity = yes
		activate_advisor = RUS_pyotr_wrangel_army_chief
		add_trait = {
			character = RUS_pyotr_wrangel
			slot = army_chief
			trait = RUS_tsar_maker
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #End of state of emergency and calls for elections
	id = monrus.94
	title = monrus.94.t
	desc = monrus.94.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_election
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.94 option monrus.94.a"
		name = monrus.94.a
		add_stability = 0.05
		add_popularity = { ideology = paternal_autocrat popularity = -0.1 }
		complete_national_focus = RUS_democracy_restored
		add_ideas = RUS_weak_democracy
		hidden_effect = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = paternal_autocrat
				long_name = RUS_paternal_autocrat_party_long
				name = RUS_paternal_autocrat_party
			}
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = national_populist
				long_name = RUS_national_populist2_party_long
				name = RUS_national_populist2_party
			}
			promote_character = { character = RUS_anastasy_vonsyatsky ideology = national_populist_subtype }
			country_event = { id = monrus.89 days = 7 } #Constitution of the Restored Monarchy
			country_event = { id = monrus.90 days = 21 } #Fate of Wrangel Regency
			country_event = { id = monrus.95 days = 60 } #The Opposition Bloc
			country_event = { id = monrus.96 days = 75 } #Socialist-Revolutionaries Split
			country_event = { id = monrus.97 days = 90 } #Shulgin's Scheme
			country_event = { id = monrus.99 days = 120 } #Elections
			meta_effect = {
				text = {
					set_politics = {
						ruling_party = authoritarian_democrat
						last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
						election_frequency = 4
						elections_allowed = yes
					}
				}
				CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Shulgin's Scheme
	id = monrus.97
	title = monrus.97.t
	desc = monrus.97.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_shulgin
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.97 option monrus.97.a"
		name = monrus.97.a #That would make us the new Savinkov
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_vps
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.97 option monrus.97.b"
		name = monrus.97.b #Yes, our achievements won't be squandered
		trigger = {
			has_country_leader = { character = RUS_pyotr_wrangel }
			OR = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_oaths_of_allegiance
				has_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_vps
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_vpp
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = monrus.98 days = 7 } #Alliance of the Right
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Alliance of the Right
	id = monrus.98
	title = monrus.98.t
	desc = monrus.98.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_shulgin
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.98 option monrus.98.a"
		name = monrus.98.a
		set_country_flag = RUS_VPS_formed
		effect_tooltip = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = authoritarian_democrat
				long_name = RUS_authoritarian_democrat3_party_long_tt
				name = RUS_authoritarian_democrat3_party
			}
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = social_conservative
				long_name = RUS_authoritarian_democrat3_party_long_tt
				name = RUS_authoritarian_democrat3_party
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_pop_increase = party_popularity@paternal_autocrat }
		hidden_effect = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = authoritarian_democrat
				long_name = RUS_authoritarian_democrat3_party_long
				name = RUS_authoritarian_democrat3_party
			}
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = social_conservative
				long_name = RUS_authoritarian_democrat3_party_long
				name = RUS_authoritarian_democrat3_party
			}
			add_popularity = { ideology = paternal_autocrat popularity = -1 }
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = authoritarian_democrat popularity = RUS_pop_increase }
	}
}

country_event = { #Post-War elections for Wrangel
	id = monrus.99
	title = monrus.99.t
	desc = monrus.99.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_election
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_clear_earlier_demrus_focuses = yes
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.99 option monrus.99.a"
		name = monrus.99.a
		trigger = { NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_VPS_formed } }
		set_country_flag = RUS_had_first_election
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_vps
					has_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_kadets
				}
			}
		}
		complete_national_focus = RUS_soccons
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_conservative popularity = 0.1 }
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = social_conservative
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:authoritarian_democrat }
		add_to_coalition = yes
		activate_advisor = RUS_aleksandr_golitsyn_sic
		RUS_increase_democracy = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.99 option monrus.99.b"
		name = monrus.99.b
		set_country_flag = RUS_had_first_election
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_pledge_of_democracy
				has_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_kadets
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_vps
					has_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_vpp
				}
			}
		}
		complete_national_focus = RUS_marlibs
		add_popularity = { ideology = market_liberal popularity = 0.15 }
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = market_liberal
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_anton_kartashyov_sic
		RUS_increase_democracy = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event monrus.99 option monrus.99.c"
		name = monrus.99.c
		set_country_flag = RUS_had_first_election
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_VPS_formed
				has_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_vps
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_vpp
					has_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_kadets
				}
			}
		}
		complete_national_focus = RUS_authdems
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = authoritarian_democrat
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_vasily_shulgin_sic
		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:social_conservative }
		add_to_coalition = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #Law on Workers' Representation (through DemRus)
	id = socrus.1
	title = socrus.1.t
	desc = socrus.1.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_levitsky

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.1 option socrus.1.a"
		name = socrus.1.a
		add_stability = 0.2
		add_political_power = 150
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = syndicalist
			elections_allowed = yes
		}
		promote_character = {
			character = RUS_vladimir_levitsky
			ideology = syndicalist_subtype
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_daniil_sulimov_sic
		add_popularity = { ideology = radical_socialist popularity = 0.15 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_democrat popularity = 0.1 }
		complete_national_focus = RUS_revolution_from_above
		RUS_initialise_socrus = yes
	}
}

		}

		add_popularity = { ideology = social_liberal popularity = -0.05 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = national_populist popularity = -0.05 }

			set_party_name = {
				ideology = radical_socialist
				long_name = RUS_SR_unified_party2_long
				name = RUS_SR_unified_party2
			}

		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }

		RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #Return of the Exiles
	id = socrus.30
	title = socrus.30.t
	desc = socrus.30.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army_1

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.30 option socrus.30.a"
		name = socrus.30.a
		RUS_restore_bolshevik_exiles = yes
		add_popularity = { ideology = totalist popularity = 0.02 }
		set_country_flag = RUS_exiles_have_returned
		country_event = { id = socrus.31 days = 30 random_days = 30 }
	}
}

country_event = { #Bolsheviks in the Officer Corps
	id = socrus.32
	title = socrus.32.t
	desc = socrus.32.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_frunze
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.32 option socrus.32.a"
		name = socrus.32.a #Keep them away from important posts
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
			RUS_RKP_relation = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
			RUS_SDS_relation = yes
		}
		add_stability = 0.05
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.32 option socrus.32.b"
		name = socrus.32.b #Promote some
		RUS_fix_army_soc = yes
		add_political_power = -40
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.32 option socrus.32.c"
		name = socrus.32.c #They have proved capable
		RUS_fix_army_soc = yes
		add_popularity = { ideology = totalist popularity = 0.1 }
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST = yes }
			RUS_decrease_VST_centre_unity = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
			RUS_RKP_relation = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
			RUS_PSR_relation = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #The Krasnaya Gorka Case
	id = socrus.33
	title = socrus.33.t
	desc = socrus.33.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_stalin
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { has_character = RUS_iosif_stalin }

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.33 option socrus.33.a"
		name = socrus.33.a #It would be a shame if something happened to him
		add_popularity = { ideology = radical_socialist popularity = 0.04 }
		add_political_power = -20
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST = yes }
			add_command_power = -15
			add_political_power = -30
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
			RUS_PSR_relation = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
			RUS_RKP_relation = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_maximalist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_suspicion_change = -2 }
			RUS_maximalist_suspicion = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_influence_change = -3 }
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_remove_stalin
		hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = socrus.34 days = 40 } }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.33 option socrus.33.b"
		name = socrus.33.b #Off to Siberia with him
		add_popularity = { ideology = radical_socialist popularity = 0.02 }
		add_political_power = -15
		retire_character = RUS_iosif_stalin
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
			RUS_PSR_relation = yes
			RUS_SDS_relation = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
			RUS_RKP_relation = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_maximalist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_suspicion_change = -1 }
			RUS_maximalist_suspicion = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 1 }
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.33 option socrus.33.c"
		name = socrus.33.c #He is right, though
		add_political_power = -10
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -3 }
			RUS_PSR_relation = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
			RUS_RKP_relation = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_maximalist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_suspicion_change = 3 }
			RUS_maximalist_suspicion = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 3 }
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Suicide of Comrade Vissarionovich
	id = socrus.34
	title = socrus.34.t
	desc = socrus.34.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_stalin

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.34 option socrus.34.a"
		name = socrus.34.a
		RUS_iosif_stalin = { kill_character = yes }
		clr_country_flag = RUS_remove_stalin
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 2 }
			RUS_PSR_relation = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -2 }
			RUS_RKP_relation = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_maximalist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_suspicion_change = -1 }
			RUS_maximalist_suspicion = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 1 }
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #The Great Bolshevik Trial #fired by focus
	id = socrus.35
	title = socrus.35.t
	desc = socrus.35.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_trial_2
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		NOT = { has_completed_focus = RUS_invite_sverdlov }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.35 option socrus.35.a"
		name = socrus.35.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { RUS_is_maximalist = yes }
			}
			add_popularity = { ideology = totalist popularity = -0.05 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_character = RUS_yakov_sverdlov }
			retire_character = RUS_yakov_sverdlov
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_character = RUS_mikhail_frunze
				RUS_mikhail_frunze = { is_army_chief = no }
			}
			retire_character = RUS_mikhail_frunze
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_character = RUS_grigory_zinovyev
				OR = {
					RUS_is_spiridonist = yes
					RUS_is_maximalist = yes
				}
			}
			retire_character = RUS_grigory_zinovyev
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_character = RUS_iosif_stalin
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_remove_stalin }
			}
			retire_character = RUS_iosif_stalin
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_purged_bolsheviks
	}
}

country_event = { #The Green Partisans
	id = socrus.37
	title = socrus.37.t
	desc = socrus.37.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_protest
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.37 option socrus.37.a"
		name = socrus.37.a
		add_political_power = -25
		add_ideas = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_3
		country_event = { id = socrus.38 days = 25 }
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
			RUS_PSR_relation = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_maximalist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_suspicion_change = -1 }
			RUS_maximalist_suspicion = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 1 }
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = 2 }
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.37 option socrus.37.b"
		name = socrus.37.b
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		add_command_power = -50
		add_ideas = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_2
		country_event = { id = socrus.44 days = 25 }
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
			RUS_RKP_relation = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_maximalist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 3 }
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Murder of Comrade Jurenko
	id = socrus.39
	title = socrus.39.t
	desc = socrus.39.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_gronsky2
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.39 option socrus.39.a"
		name = socrus.39.a #Accept Gronsky's proposal
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					RUS_VST = yes
					RUS_is_maximalist = yes
				}
			}
			add_political_power = -20
			add_command_power = -50
		}
		else = {
			add_political_power = 30
		}
		country_event = { id = socrus.44 days = 14 }
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
			RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_maximalist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 5 }
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_suspicion_change = 4 }
			RUS_maximalist_suspicion = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = -2 }
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.39 option socrus.39.b"
		name = socrus.39.b #This was an unavoidable tragedy
		trigger = { RUS_VST_left = no }
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = socrus.40 days = 7 }
		}
		RUS_increase_VST_left_radicalism = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
		RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_maximalist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 2 }
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = 4 }
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Revolt in the Duma
	id = socrus.40
	title = socrus.40.t
	desc = socrus.40.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_zinovyev
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_socialist_government = yes
		RUS_VST_left = no
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.40 option socrus.40.a"
		name = socrus.40.a #We have no choice but agree
		country_event = { id = socrus.44 days = 14 }
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST = yes }
			RUS_decrease_VST_centre_unity = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
			RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_maximalist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 5 }
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_suspicion_change = 2 }
			RUS_maximalist_suspicion = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = -1 }
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.40 option socrus.40.b"
		name = socrus.40.b #Let him shout
		add_stability = -0.05
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -10 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
			RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_maximalist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 3 }
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_suspicion_change = -2 }
			RUS_maximalist_suspicion = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = 3 }
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = socrus.41 days = 7 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #The General Strike
	id = socrus.41
	title = socrus.41.t
	desc = socrus.41.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_strike
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.41 option socrus.41.a"
		name = socrus.41.a #Implement their anti-peasant policy
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = RUS_soc_strike
			days = 14
		}
		add_command_power = -50
		RUS_decrease_VST_left_radicalism = yes
		country_event = { id = socrus.44 days = 14 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.41 option socrus.41.b"
		name = socrus.41.b #Just wait it out
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = RUS_soc_strike
			days = 70
		}
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -10 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
			RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_maximalist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_influence_change = -2 }
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = 3 }
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.41 option socrus.41.c"
		name = socrus.41.c #They must listen to reason
		trigger = { RUS_VST_centre = yes }
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = RUS_soc_strike
			days = 7
		}
		add_political_power = -100
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 2 }
		RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
		RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
		country_event = { id = socrus.42 days = 7 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.41 option socrus.41.e"
		name = socrus.41.e #Call an emergency meeting of the cabinet
		trigger = { has_government = radical_socialist }
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = RUS_soc_strike
			days = 7
		}
		country_event = socrus.43
	}
}

country_event = { #Emergency Meeting
	id = socrus.43
	title = socrus.43.t
	desc = socrus.43.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_conference1
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { has_government = radical_socialist }

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.43 option socrus.43.a"
		name = socrus.43.a #Call Levitsky to the next meeting
		ai_chance = { base = 10 }
		add_political_power = -50
		add_popularity = { ideology = radical_socialist popularity = -0.1 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = 0.05 }
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = 1 }
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_maximalist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_suspicion_change = -1 }
			RUS_maximalist_suspicion = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_influence_change = -1 }
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.43 option socrus.43.b"
		name = socrus.43.b #Prepare to remove Zinovyev
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				RUS_is_spiridonist = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_3
					has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_4
					has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_5
					has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_6
				}
			}
		}
		retire_character = RUS_grigory_zinovyev
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
			add_popularity = { ideology = totalist popularity = 0.1 }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = -5 }
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_maximalist = yes }
			add_popularity = { ideology = totalist popularity = 0.05 }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_suspicion_change = 1 }
			RUS_maximalist_suspicion = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 2 }
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
		}
		RUS_increase_antisoc_resistance = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #Fighting in the Countryside
	id = socrus.44
	title = socrus.44.t
	desc = socrus.44.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_riot1
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.44 option socrus.44.a"
		name = socrus.44.a
		RUS_increase_antisoc_resistance = yes
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_PLSR = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -10 }
		}
		else = { set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -5 } }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = socrus.45 days = 45 random_days = 15 } #Vozhd i Svoboda!
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Vozhd i Svoboda!
	id = socrus.45
	title = socrus.45.t
	desc = socrus.45.d

			country_event = { id = socrus.46 days = 45 } #Villagers Flock to Matroshka

			country_event = { id = socrus.50 days = 160 } #Society of the Godless
			country_event = { id = socrus.78 days = 365 } #Marx Against Muhammed
			country_event = { id = socrus.51 days = 280 } #Re-Education Labour Administration
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Villagers Flock to Matroshka
	id = socrus.46
	title = socrus.46.t
	desc = socrus.46.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_Spiridonova
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.46 option socrus.46.a"
		name = socrus.46.a #SRs must stand by the peasants
		if = {
			limit = { has_government = radical_socialist }
			add_political_power = -45
			if = {
				limit = { RUS_is_maximalist = yes }
				set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 3 }
				RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
				set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = 3 }
				RUS_add_faith = yes
			}
		}
		else = {
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
			RUS_PSR_relation = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = socrus.47 days = 7 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.46 option socrus.46.b"
		name = socrus.46.b #Building socialism is a greater goal
		trigger = { has_government = radical_socialist }
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_maximalist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_influence_change = -3 }
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = -5 }
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = socrus.48 days = 45 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #SRs walk out of Duma
	id = socrus.47
	title = socrus.47.t
	desc = socrus.47.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_leftsrs
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { RUS_VST = yes }

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.47 option socrus.47.a"
		name = socrus.47.a #Accept some demands
		ai_chance = { base = 10 }
		add_political_power = -50
		RUS_decrease_antisoc_resistance = yes
		add_popularity = { ideology = radical_socialist popularity = 0.05 }
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
		RUS_VST_centre_relation = yes
		RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		RUS_RKP_relation = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.47 option socrus.47.b"
		name = socrus.47.b #No compromises
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_3
					has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_4
					has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_5
					has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_6
				}
			}
		}
		RUS_increase_antisoc_resistance = yes
		add_popularity = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = 0.03 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = totalist popularity = 0.03 }
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
		RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		RUS_RKP_relation = yes
	}
}

	id = socrus.49
	title = socrus.49.t
	desc = socrus.49.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_orthodox
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.49 option socrus.49.a"
		name = socrus.49.a #Pressure the patriarch to act
		ai_chance = { base = 10 }
		add_political_power = -65
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = 3 }
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
			RUS_SDS_relation = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.49 option socrus.49.b"
		name = socrus.49.b #Imprison non-comformist priests
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_3
					has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_4
					has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_5
					has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_6
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_PLSR = yes }
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = radical_socialist
				popularity = -0.05
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_popularity = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = 0.03 }
			add_popularity = { ideology = totalist popularity = 0.03 }
		}
		RUS_increase_antisoc_resistance = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #Re-Education Labour Administration
	id = socrus.51
	title = socrus.51.t
	desc = socrus.51.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_industry
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.51 option socrus.51.a"
		name = socrus.51.a #Bare minimum
		trigger = { NOT = { has_completed_focus = RUS_reject_state_terror } }
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -3 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		add_ideas = RUS_reeducation_camps
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_maximalist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 3 }
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_suspicion_change = 4 }
			RUS_maximalist_suspicion = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = 2 }
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.51 option socrus.51.b"
		name = socrus.51.b #The ends justify the means
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_abramovich_ai
				}
			}
		}
		trigger = { RUS_VST_right = no }
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -6 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		add_ideas = RUS_reeducation_camps_2
		RUS_decrease_antisoc_resistance = yes
		RUS_increase_VST_left_radicalism = yes
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
			RUS_SDS_relation = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_maximalist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 5 }
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_suspicion_change = 5 }
			RUS_maximalist_suspicion = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
			add_political_power = 40
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.51 option socrus.51.c"
		name = socrus.51.c #No! Just arrest fewer people!
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_kamenev_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_zinovyev_ai
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_3
					has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_4
					has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_5
					has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_6
				}
			}
		}
		RUS_increase_antisoc_resistance = yes
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
			RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
			RUS_SDS_relation = yes
			RUS_PSR_relation = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_maximalist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_suspicion_change = -3 }
			RUS_maximalist_suspicion = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = 5 }
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Abolition of Cavalry?
	id = socrus.55
	title = socrus.55.t
	desc = socrus.55.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_cossacks_1
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_character = RUS_mikhail_tukhachevsky
		any_country_division = {
			division_has_majority_template = cavalry
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.55 option socrus.55.a"
		name = socrus.55.a
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.55 option socrus.55.b"
		name = socrus.55.b
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		every_country_division = {
			limit = { division_has_majority_template = cavalry }
			destroy_unit = yes
		}
		division_template = {
			name = "Motopekhotnaya Diviziya" # Motorised Division
			division_names_group = RUS_MOT_01
			regiments = {
				motorized = { x = 0 y = 0 }
				motorized = { x = 0 y = 1 }
				motorized = { x = 0 y = 2 }
				motorized = { x = 0 y = 3 }
				motorized = { x = 1 y = 0 }
				motorized = { x = 1 y = 1 }
				motorized = { x = 1 y = 2 }
				motorized = { x = 1 y = 3 }
			}
		}
		capital_scope = {
			create_unit = {
				division = "division_template = \"Motopekhotnaya Diviziya\" start_experience_factor = 0.5 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
				owner = ROOT
				count = 2
			}
		}
	}
}

	id = socrus.56
	title = socrus.56.t
	desc = socrus.56.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_navy
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.56 option socrus.56.a"
		name = socrus.56.a
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_character = RUS_nikolay_kuznetsov } }
			show_unit_leaders_tooltip = RUS_nikolay_kuznetsov
			hidden_effect = {
				RUS_nikolay_kuznetsov = { set_nationality = ROOT }
			}
		}
		else = {
			RUS_nikolay_kuznetsov = { add_max_trait = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				amount_taken_ideas = {
					amount < 1
					slots = { navy_chief }
				}
			}
			activate_advisor = RUS_nikolay_kuznetsov_navy_chief
		}
		else = {
			navy_experience = 15
		}
	}
}

	id = socrus.57
	title = socrus.57.t

			}
		}
		text = socrus.57.d.tukha
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				RUS_mikhail_frunze = { is_army_chief = yes }
				has_completed_focus = RUS_legacy_of_workers_army
				has_country_leader = { character = RUS_grigory_zinovyev }
			}
		}
		text = socrus.57.d.frunze
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army3
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

		name = socrus.57.a

			NOT = {
				RUS_mikhail_frunze = { is_army_chief = yes }
				has_completed_focus = RUS_legacy_of_workers_army

			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_speed_bonus
		set_country_flag = RUS_BLR_bonus
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_upon_taking_war_focus_tt
		effect_tooltip = {
			add_ideas = RUS_BLR_shock_plan
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.57 option socrus.57.b"
		name = socrus.57.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				RUS_mikhail_frunze = { is_army_chief = yes }
				has_completed_focus = RUS_legacy_of_workers_army
				has_country_leader = { character = RUS_grigory_zinovyev }
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_speed_bonus
		set_country_flag = RUS_UKR_bonus
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_upon_taking_war_focus_tt
		effect_tooltip = {
			add_ideas = RUS_UKR_shock_plan
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.57 option socrus.57.c"
		name = socrus.57.c
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				RUS_mikhail_frunze = { is_army_chief = yes }
				has_completed_focus = RUS_legacy_of_workers_army
				has_country_leader = { character = RUS_grigory_zinovyev }
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_long_war
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_upon_taking_war_focus_tt
		effect_tooltip = {
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_long_war
				days = 1095
			}
		}
	}
}

	desc = socrus.59.d

		add_political_power = -30
		add_stability = 0.05
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.59 option socrus.59.b"
		name = socrus.59.b
		RUS_increase_VST_left_radicalism = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					RUS_VST = yes
					RUS_is_maximalist = yes
				}
			}
			add_stability = -0.025
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = totalist popularity = 0.05 }

			limit = { RUS_is_maximalist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 1 }
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = -4 }
			RUS_add_faith = yes
			add_political_power = 50
		}
		else = {
			if = {
				limit = { RUS_VST_right = no }
				set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
				RUS_RKP_relation = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.62 option socrus.62.a"
		name = socrus.62.a
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST_centre = no }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
			RUS_VST_centre_relation = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST_left = no }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
			RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST_right = no }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
			RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
		RUS_SDS_relation = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #Economy of Free Association
	id = socrus.63
	title = socrus.63.t
	desc = socrus.63.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_economic_policy

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.63 option socrus.63.a"
		name = socrus.63.a
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST_right = no }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
			RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
			RUS_SDS_relation = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST_left = no }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
			RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST_right = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
			RUS_VST_centre_relation = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Zeller Quits the Workers' Coalition
	id = socrus.65
	title = socrus.65.t
	desc = socrus.65.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_zeller
	trigger = {
		if = {
			limit = { is_ai = no }
			RUS_VST_left = yes
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.65 option socrus.65.a"
		name = socrus.65.a
		add_stability = -0.05
		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:social_democrat }
		remove_from_coalition = yes
		if = {
			limit = { is_in_coalition_with_social_liberal = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:social_liberal }
			remove_from_coalition = yes
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_SDS_left_coalition
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.65 option socrus.65.b"
		name = socrus.65.b
		add_political_power = -50
		add_popularity = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = -0.05 }
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 2 }
		RUS_SDS_relation = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #Fate of the Workers' Coalition?
	id = socrus.69
	title = socrus.69.t
	desc = socrus.69.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_leftsrs
	trigger = { is_ai = no }

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.69 option socrus.69.a"
		name = socrus.69.a
		ai_chance = { base = 5 }
		add_political_power = -100
		add_popularity = { ideology = radical_socialist popularity = 0.1 }
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 4 }
		RUS_PSR_relation = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.69 option socrus.69.b"
		name = socrus.69.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 15
				has_government = totalist
				NOT = { country_exists = GER }
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:radical_socialist }
		remove_from_coalition = yes
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST_left = no }
			add_stability = -0.3
			add_war_support = -0.3
		}
		else = {
			add_stability = -0.15
			add_war_support = -0.1
		}
		RUS_increase_antisoc_resistance = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #High Anti-Soc resistance event
	id = socrus.75
	title = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				RUS_is_maximalist = yes
				RUS_VST_left = yes
			}
		}
		text = socrus.75.t.evil
	}
	title = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				RUS_is_maximalist = yes
				RUS_VST_left = yes
			}
		}
		text = socrus.75.t.idealist
	}
	desc = socrus.75.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_protest
	trigger = {
		has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_6
		has_socialist_government = yes
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.75 option socrus.75.a"
		name = socrus.75.a
		add_manpower = -37800
		swap_ideas = {
			remove_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_6
			add_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_4
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = -5 }
			RUS_add_faith = yes
			add_popularity = { ideology = radical_socialist popularity = -0.08 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST = yes RUS_VST_left = no }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -2 }
			RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -2 }
			RUS_PSR_relation = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -2 }
			RUS_SDS_relation = yes
			add_popularity = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = -0.05 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.75 option socrus.75.b"
		name = socrus.75.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				RUS_is_maximalist = yes
				RUS_VST_left = yes
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -50
		RUS_decrease_antisoc_resistance = yes
	}
}

		add_popularity = { ideology = social_liberal popularity = 0.06 }

				factor = 0

					has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_3
					has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_4
					has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_5

			}
		}

		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
		RUS_SDS_relation = yes

country_event = { #Abolition of the Emergency Powers
	id = socrus.80
	title = socrus.80.t
	desc = socrus.80.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_sulimov

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.80 option socrus.80.a"
		name = socrus.80.a
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_leader_with_trait = RUS_protector_of_revolution }
				remove_country_leader_trait = RUS_protector_of_revolution
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_leader_with_trait = RUS_protector_of_revolution_2 }
				remove_country_leader_trait = RUS_protector_of_revolution_2
			}
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = syndicalist
			elections_allowed = yes
			last_election = "1935.12.17"
			election_frequency = 36
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_aleksandr_shlyapnikov = { set_nationality = ROOT }
			country_event = { id = socrus.81 days = 30 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #New Premier is chosen
	id = socrus.81
	title = socrus.81.t
	desc = socrus.81.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_shliapnikov

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.81 option socrus.81.a"
		name = socrus.81.a
		ai_chance = { base = 20 }
		add_stability = 0.1
		RUS_daniil_sulimov = { promote_character = { ideology = syndicalist_subtype } }
		add_advisor_role = {
			character = RUS_aleksandr_shlyapnikov
			activate = yes
			advisor = {
				slot = second_in_command
				idea_token = RUS_aleksandr_shlyapnikov_sic
				desc = RUS_aleksandr_shlyapnikov_advisor_desc
				traits = { KR_economic_reformer_sic KR_vst_centre_shlyapnikov }
				can_be_fired = no
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.81 option socrus.81.b"
		name = socrus.81.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = DEFAULT } }
			}
		}
		add_country_leader_role = {
			character = RUS_aleksandr_shlyapnikov
			promote_leader = yes
			country_leader = {
				desc = RUS_aleksandr_shlyapnikov_advisor_desc
				ideology = syndicalist_subtype
				traits = { KR_union_advocate }
			}
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_sergey_kirov_sic
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
		RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
		RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.81 option socrus.81.c"
		name = socrus.81.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = DEFAULT } }
			}
		}
		RUS_mikhail_tomsky = { promote_character = { ideology = syndicalist_subtype } }
		add_advisor_role = {
			character = RUS_sergey_syrtsov
			activate = yes
			advisor = {
				slot = second_in_command
				idea_token = RUS_sergey_syrtsov_sic
				desc = RUS_sergey_syrtsov_advisor_desc
				traits = { KR_silent_workhorse_sic KR_vst_left_syrtsov }
				can_be_fired = no
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
		RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
		RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #Comrade Dan's Departure
	id = socrus.82
	title = socrus.82.t
	desc = socrus.82.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_dan
	trigger = {
		RUS_VST_left = no
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.82 option socrus.82.a"
		name = socrus.82.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_VST_centre = yes
				RUS_fyodor_dan = { is_second_in_command = yes }
			}
			add_advisor_role = {
				character = RUS_rafail_abramovich
				activate = yes
				advisor = {
					slot = second_in_command
					idea_token = RUS_rafail_abramovich_sic
					desc = RUS_rafail_abramovich_leader_desc
					traits = { KR_dream_of_democracy KR_vst_right_abramovich }
					can_be_fired = no
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_dan_retire_tt
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST_right = yes }
			add_advisor_role = {
				character = RUS_vladimir_shatov
				activate = yes
				advisor = {
					slot = second_in_command
					idea_token = RUS_vladimir_shatov_sic
					desc = RUS_vladimir_shatov_advisor_desc
					traits = { KR_socialist_industrializer_sic KR_vst_centre_shatov }
					can_be_fired = no
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
			RUS_VST_centre_relation = yes
		}
		retire_character = RUS_fyodor_dan
	}
}

# Left-SR Path
country_event = { #Shoot the Svobodniks
	id = socrus.100
	title = socrus.100.t
	desc = socrus.100.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_gun
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.100 option socrus.100.a"
		name = socrus.100.a #No mercy for the Svobodniks
		add_stability = 0.1
		add_manpower = -43000
		add_popularity = { ideology = national_populist popularity = -0.15 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.100 option socrus.100.b"
		name = socrus.100.b #We will wash away their sins
		add_stability = 0.05
		add_manpower = -11000
		add_political_power = 20
		add_popularity = { ideology = radical_socialist popularity = 0.05 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = national_populist popularity = -0.1 }
	}
}

country_event = { #Besieged Kronstadt
	id = socrus.101
	title = socrus.101.t
	desc = socrus.101.d
	picture = "GFX_report_event_RUS_kolchak"
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		RUS_aleksandr_kolchak = { is_navy_chief = yes }
		has_socialist_government = yes
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.101 option socrus.101.a"
		name = socrus.101.a
		add_political_power = 15
		retire_character = RUS_aleksandr_kolchak
	}
}

country_event = { #Through Struggle You Will Rise
	id = socrus.102
	title = socrus.102.t
	desc = socrus.102.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_left_srs
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { has_socialist_government = yes }

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.102 option socrus.102.a"
		name = socrus.102.a
		complete_national_focus = RUS_red_flag_over_kremlin
		clear_variable = RUS_military_anger
	}
}

country_event = { #Direction of the Revolutionary Struggle
	id = socrus.103
	title = socrus.103.t
	desc = socrus.103.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_BLR_sojm_meeting
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Spiridonovist side
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.103 option socrus.103.a"
		name = socrus.103.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 667
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_ustinov_ai
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_maria_spiridonova = { unit_leader_event = socrus.161 }
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_spiridonist_side
		custom_effect_tooltip = socrus.103.a.tt
		set_variable = { RUS_faith = 0 }
		add_ideas = RUS_parliamentarian_faith_0
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = socrus.164 days = 80 } #Rise of the Maximalists
			country_event = { id = socrus.162 days = 100 } #Siberian Direction
			country_event = { id = socrus.165 days = 450 } #Tambov Project
			country_event = { id = socrus.166 days = 600 } #The Romantic Esers
			country_event = { id = socrus.173 days = 900 } #PSR Conference
		}
	}

	option = { #Maximalist side
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.103 option socrus.103.b"
		name = socrus.103.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 333
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_zdobnov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_kamkov_ai
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_aleksey_ustinov = { unit_leader_event = socrus.141 }
			remove_trait = {
				character = RUS_andrey_kolegayev
				slot = political_advisor
				trait = KR_maximalist_kolegayev
			}
			remove_trait = {
				character = RUS_andrey_kolegayev
				slot = political_advisor
				trait = KR_peasant_populist_3
			}
			add_trait = {
				character = RUS_andrey_kolegayev
				slot = political_advisor
				trait = KR_peasant_populist
			}
			add_trait = {
				character = RUS_andrey_kolegayev
				slot = political_advisor
				trait = KR_maximalist_kolegayev
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_maximalist_side
		custom_effect_tooltip = socrus.103.b.tt
		activate_targeted_decision = { target = THIS decision = RUS_pro_coalition_rhetoric }
		set_variable = { RUS_maximalist_influence = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_maximalist_suspicion = 0 }
		add_ideas = RUS_maximalist_influence_0
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = socrus.106 days = 30 } #Declaration of Organic Socialism
			country_event = { id = socrus.133 days = 150 random_days = 100 } #Doctrine of Integral Socialism
			country_event = { id = socrus.127 days = 250 random_days = 10 } #Zdobnov assassination event chain
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Question of Econ Ministry
	id = socrus.104
	title = socrus.104.t
	desc = socrus.104.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_BLR_sojm_meeting
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Stanislav
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.104 option socrus.104.a"
		name = socrus.104.a
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = 0.07
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		custom_effect_tooltip = available_political_advisor
		show_ideas_tooltip = RUS_stanislav_strumilin_advisor
		set_country_flag = RUS_hired_strumilin
		hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = socrus.105 days = 2 } }
	}
	option = { #Yenotayevsky
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.104 option socrus.104.b"
		name = socrus.104.b
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = 0.03
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = totalist
			popularity = -0.02
		}
		add_stability = -0.04
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		custom_effect_tooltip = available_political_advisor
		show_ideas_tooltip = RUS_aleksandr_finn_yenotayevsky_advisor
		set_country_flag = RUS_hired_yenotayevsky
		hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = socrus.105 days = 2 } }
	}
	option = { #Kirov
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.104 option socrus.104.c"
		name = socrus.104.c
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = 0.03
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = totalist
			popularity = -0.02
		}
		add_stability = -0.04
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		custom_effect_tooltip = available_political_advisor
		show_ideas_tooltip = RUS_sergey_kirov_advisor
		set_country_flag = RUS_hired_kirov
		hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = socrus.105 days = 2 } }
	}
}

country_event = { #On Security Matters
	id = socrus.105
	title = socrus.105.t
	desc = socrus.105.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_BLR_sojm_meeting
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Zdobnov
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.105 option socrus.105.a"
		name = socrus.105.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_spiridonist = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = 5 }
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_maximalist = yes }
			custom_effect_tooltip = socrus.105.a.tt
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Hidden event for incrementing Maximalist Influence every 60 days
	id = socrus.107
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_promote_maximalist_news_outlets_flag
			has_country_flag = RUS_sway_peoples_militia_flag
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.107 option 1"
		country_event = { id = socrus.107 days = 59 }
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_promote_maximalist_news_outlets_flag }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 1 }
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
			RUS_change_maximalist_influence_spirit = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_sway_peoples_militia_flag }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 1 }
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
			RUS_change_maximalist_influence_spirit = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Democratic Bloc event chain: VST
	id = socrus.108
	title = socrus.108.t
	desc = socrus.108.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy1
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.108 option socrus.108.a"
		trigger = {
			NOT = { RUS_nikolay_zdobnov = { is_hired_as_advisor = yes } }
		}
		name = socrus.108.a
		custom_effect_tooltip = socrus.108.a.tt
		set_country_flag = RUS_vst_right_agree
		hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = socrus.109 days = 1 } }
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.108 option socrus.108.b"
		name = socrus.108.b
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { RUS_nikolay_zdobnov = { is_hired_as_advisor = yes } }
			}
			random_list = {
				60 = {
					custom_effect_tooltip = socrus.108.b.tt
					set_country_flag = RUS_levitsky_agree
					hidden_effect = { country_event = socrus.113 }
				}
				40 = {
					set_country_flag = RUS_levitsky_disagree
					hidden_effect = { country_event = socrus.113 }
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = socrus.108.b.tt
			set_country_flag = RUS_levitsky_agree
			hidden_effect = { country_event = socrus.113 }
		}
		hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = socrus.109 days = 1 } }
	}
}

country_event = { #Democratic Bloc event chain: SDS
	id = socrus.109
	title = socrus.109.t
	desc = socrus.109.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy1
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.109 option socrus.109.a"
		name = socrus.109.a
		add_political_power = -50
		set_country_flag = RUS_sds_agree
		custom_effect_tooltip = socrus.109.a.tt
		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:social_democrat }
		add_to_coalition = yes
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		custom_effect_tooltip = available_political_advisor
		show_ideas_tooltip = RUS_gergard_zeller_advisor
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_completed_focus = RUS_reforming_the_weapons_of_state } }
			custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
			custom_effect_tooltip = socrus.109.a2.tt
		}
		hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = socrus.111 days = 1 } }
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.109 option socrus.109.b"
		name = socrus.109.b
		RUS_increase_antisoc_resistance = yes
		add_political_power = 50
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = radical_socialist
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = socrus.111 days = 1 } }
	}
}

country_event = { #Mending the Rift with the Faithful
	id = socrus.110
	title = socrus.110.t
	desc = socrus.110.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_orthodox
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.110 option socrus.110.a"
		name = socrus.110.a
		add_ideas = RUS_concordance_with_the_church
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_maximalist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_suspicion_change = -2 }
			RUS_maximalist_suspicion = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = 5 }
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.110 option socrus.110.b"
		name = socrus.110.b
		add_ideas = RUS_concordance_with_the_church_alt
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_maximalist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 3 }
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
			RUS_change_maximalist_influence_spirit = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_suspicion_change = 2 }
			RUS_maximalist_suspicion = yes
		}
		else = {
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = -7 }
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Levitsky says yes (first event of negotiation chain)
	id = socrus.113
	title = socrus.113.t
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_levitsky_agree
		}
		text = socrus.113.d
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_levitsky_disagree
		}
		text = socrus.113.d2
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_levitsky

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.113 option socrus.113.a"
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_levitsky_agree }
		name = socrus.113.a
		custom_effect_tooltip = socrus.108.b.tt
		hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = socrus.109 days = 1 } }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.113 option socrus.113.b"
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_levitsky_disagree }
		name = socrus.113.b
		hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = socrus.109 days = 1 } }
	}
}

country_event = { #Land Socialisation Event
	id = socrus.124
	title = socrus.124.t
	desc = socrus.124.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_farming
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.124 option socrus.124.a"
		name = socrus.124.a
		add_political_power = 30
		add_stability = 0.05
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.124 option socrus.124.b"
		name = socrus.124.b
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				RUS_is_spiridonist = yes
				RUS_is_maximalist = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { RUS_is_maximalist = yes } }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = 4 }
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
		else = {
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = totalist
				popularity = 0.07
			}
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 6 }
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #SR-Maximalists: Alliance with Bolsheviks?
	id = socrus.125
	title = socrus.125.t
	desc = socrus.125.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_frunze

	option = { #alliance with Bolsheviks
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.125 option socrus.125.a"
		name = socrus.125.a
		set_country_flag = RUS_bolshevik_alliance
		custom_effect_tooltip = socrus.125.a.tt
		effect_tooltip = {
			country_event = socrus.126
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = totalist
				popularity = 0.1
			}
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 10 }
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_suspicion_change = 5 }
			RUS_maximalist_suspicion = yes
			custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		}
	}
	option = { #alliance with Bolsheviks
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.125 option socrus.125.b"
		name = socrus.125.b
		add_stability = 0.05
	}
}

	desc = socrus.128.d

country_event = { #Death of Zdobnov part 3
	id = socrus.129
	title = socrus.129.t
	desc = socrus.129.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_SWE_Gov_Report

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.129 option socrus.129.a"
		name = socrus.129.a
		activate_mission = RUS_appointment_of_interior_ministry
		activate_targeted_decision = { target = THIS decision = RUS_fearmonger_in_congress }
		activate_targeted_decision = { target = THIS decision = RUS_pressure_kamkov }
		activate_targeted_decision = { target = THIS decision = RUS_reach_out_to_blyumkin }
		activate_targeted_decision = { target = THIS decision = RUS_convince_the_vst }
	}
}

country_event = { #Appointment of the Interior Minister
	id = socrus.130
	title = socrus.130.t
	desc = socrus.130.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_targeted_decision = { target = THIS decision = RUS_fearmonger_in_congress }
			remove_targeted_decision = { target = THIS decision = RUS_pressure_kamkov }
			remove_targeted_decision = { target = THIS decision = RUS_reach_out_to_blyumkin }
			remove_targeted_decision = { target = THIS decision = RUS_convince_the_vst }
		}
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kolegayev

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.130 option socrus.130.a"
		name = socrus.130.a
		country_event = { id = socrus.134 days = 14 random_days = 7 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_free_political_advisor_slot = yes
				NOT = { RUS_andrey_kolegayev = { is_hired_as_advisor = yes } }
			}
			activate_advisor = RUS_andrey_kolegayev_advisor
		}
		else = {
			add_political_power = 150
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					RUS_interior_var < 10
				}
			}
			effect_tooltip = {
				add_stability = -0.02
				add_war_support = -0.02
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					RUS_interior_var > 9
				}
				check_variable = {
					RUS_interior_var < 20
				}
			}
			add_stability = 0.05
			add_war_support = 0.05
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					RUS_interior_var > 19
				}
				check_variable = {
					RUS_interior_var < 30
				}
			}
			add_stability = 0.05
			add_war_support = 0.05
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = totalist
				popularity = 0.05
			}
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 5 }
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					RUS_interior_var > 29
				}
				check_variable = {
					RUS_interior_var < 40
				}
			}
			add_stability = 0.05
			add_war_support = 0.05
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = totalist
				popularity = 0.05
			}
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 10 }
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_suspicion_change = -5 }
			RUS_maximalist_suspicion = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					RUS_interior_var > 39
				}
				check_variable = {
					RUS_interior_var < 50
				}
			}
			add_stability = 0.1
			add_war_support = 0.05
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = totalist
				popularity = 0.1
			}
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 10 }
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_suspicion_change = -5 }
			RUS_maximalist_suspicion = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					RUS_interior_var > 49
				}
			}
			add_stability = 0.1
			add_war_support = 0.05
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = totalist
				popularity = 0.1
			}
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 10 }
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_suspicion_change = -5 }
			RUS_maximalist_suspicion = yes
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_completed_focus = RUS_universal_labour_service
				}
				swap_ideas = {
					remove_idea = RUS_dignity_of_labour
					add_idea = RUS_dignity_of_labour_2
				}
			}
			else = {
				set_country_flag = RUS_universal_labour_service_buff
			}
		}
	}
}

	id = socrus.131
	title = socrus.131.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS_is_maximalist = yes }
		text = socrus.131.d.maximalist
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
		text = socrus.131.d.spiridonist
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS_VST = yes }
		text = socrus.131.d.VST
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy1

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.131 option socrus.131.a"
		name = socrus.131.a
		country_event = { id = socrus.132 days = 1 }
	}
}

country_event = { #Blyukher Report Part 2
	id = socrus.132
	title = socrus.132.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS_is_maximalist = yes }
		text = socrus.132.d.maximalist
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
		text = socrus.132.d.spiridonist
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS_VST = yes }
		text = socrus.132.d.VST
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy2

	option = { #Levandovsky, Maximalists
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.132 option socrus.132.a"
		trigger = { RUS_is_maximalist = yes }
		name = socrus.132.a
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = totalist
			popularity = 0.07
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_mikhail_levandovsky_army_chief
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_maximalist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 5 }
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_suspicion_change = 7 }
			RUS_maximalist_suspicion = yes
		}
	}
	option = { #Frunze, Maximalists
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.132 option socrus.132.b"
		name = socrus.132.b
		trigger = { RUS_is_maximalist = yes }
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = totalist
			popularity = 0.03
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_mikhail_frunze_army_chief
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_maximalist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 3 }
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_suspicion_change = 5 }
			RUS_maximalist_suspicion = yes
		}
	}
	option = { #Tukhachevsky
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.132 option socrus.132.c"
		name = socrus.132.c
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_sablin_only }
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_mikhail_tukhachevsky_army_chief
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = -5 }
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
		else = {
			add_war_support = 0.04
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
			RUS_PSR_relation = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
			RUS_RKP_relation = yes
		}
	}
	option = { #Levandonsky, Spiridonovists + VST
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.132 option socrus.132.a2"
		name = socrus.132.a2
		trigger = {
			RUS_is_maximalist = no
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_sablin_only }
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_mikhail_levandovsky_army_chief
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_PLSR = yes }
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = totalist
				popularity = 0.08
			}
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = -5 }
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
		else = {
			add_popularity = { ideology = totalist popularity = 0.025 }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
			RUS_PSR_relation = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
			RUS_SDS_relation = yes
		}
	}
	option = { #Sablin
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.132 option socrus.132.b2"
		name = socrus.132.b2
		trigger = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = 5 }
		RUS_add_faith = yes
	}
	option = { #Yegorov
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.132 option socrus.132.e"
		name = socrus.132.e
		trigger = { RUS_VST = yes }
		activate_advisor = RUS_aleksandr_yegorov_army_chief
		add_stability = 0.02
	}
	option = { #Frunze
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.132 option socrus.132.f"
		name = socrus.132.f
		trigger = {
			RUS_VST = yes
			has_character = RUS_mikhail_frunze
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_mikhail_frunze_army_chief
		add_popularity = { ideology = totalist popularity = 0.025 }
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 2 }
		RUS_RKP_relation = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
		RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
		RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -2 }
		RUS_PSR_relation = yes
	}
	option = { #Vasilevsky
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.132 option socrus.132.g"
		name = socrus.132.g
		trigger = {
			RUS_VST_right = yes
			has_character = RUS_aleksandr_vasilevsky
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_aleksandr_vasilevsky_army_chief
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_democrat popularity = 0.025 }
		add_political_power = -40
	}
}

country_event = { #Maximalist-Kamkov suspicion event 1
	id = socrus.136
	title = socrus.136.t
	desc = socrus.136.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.136 option socrus.136.a"
		name = socrus.136.a
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { RUS_maximalist_suspicion > 10 } }
			add_stability = -0.03
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_maximalist_suspicion > 19 }
				check_variable = { RUS_maximalist_suspicion < 30 }
			}
			add_stability = -0.05
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = totalist
				popularity = -0.02
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_maximalist_suspicion > 29 }
				check_variable = { RUS_maximalist_suspicion < 40 }
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = totalist
				popularity = -0.1
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_maximalist_suspicion > 39 }
				check_variable = { RUS_maximalist_suspicion < 50 }
			}
			add_stability = -0.1
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = totalist
				popularity = -0.1
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Maximalist-Kamkov suspicion event 5
	id = socrus.140
	title = socrus.140.t
	desc = socrus.140.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		is_ai = no
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.140 option socrus.140.a"
		name = socrus.140.a
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = totalist
			popularity = -0.15
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = totalist
				long_name = RUS_totalist2_party_long_tt
				name = RUS_totalist2_party
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_maximalist_failstate
		clr_country_flag = RUS_maximalist_side
		hidden_effect = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = totalist
				long_name = RUS_totalist2_party_long
				name = RUS_totalist2_party
			}
			remove_ideas = {
				RUS_maximalist_influence_0
				RUS_maximalist_influence_1
				RUS_maximalist_influence_2
				RUS_maximalist_influence_3
				RUS_maximalist_influence_4
				RUS_maximalist_influence_5
				RUS_maximalist_influence_6
				RUS_maximalist_influence_7
				RUS_maximalist_influence_8
				RUS_maximalist_influence_9
				RUS_maximalist_influence_10
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_aleksey_ustinov = { is_second_in_command = yes } }
			activate_advisor = RUS_boris_kamkov_sic
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_active_mission = RUS_appointment_of_interior_ministry }
			hidden_effect = {
				hidden_effect = {
					remove_targeted_decision = { target = THIS decision = RUS_fearmonger_in_congress }
					remove_targeted_decision = { target = THIS decision = RUS_pressure_kamkov }
					remove_targeted_decision = { target = THIS decision = RUS_reach_out_to_blyumkin }
					remove_targeted_decision = { target = THIS decision = RUS_convince_the_vst }
					remove_mission = RUS_appointment_of_interior_ministry
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #The Question of the Cossacks
	id = socrus.150
	title = socrus.150.t
	desc = socrus.150.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		original_tag = RUS
		has_socialist_government = yes
		is_subject = no
		date > 1938.10.1
	}
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = socrus.152 days = 90 random_days = 20 } #Pavlov's Rebellion
		}
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_cossacks_2
	option = { #We cannot trust the cossack
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.150 option socrus.150.a"
		name = socrus.150.a
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
			RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
			RUS_VST_centre_relation = yes
			RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
		}
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = 4 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = rusfla.154 days = 720 }
		}
	}
	option = { #They can change, like all of russia
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.150 option socrus.150.b"
		name = socrus.150.b
		trigger = {
			RUS_VST_left = no
			RUS_is_maximalist = no
		}
		add_political_power = -40
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -4 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		add_stability = 0.05
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = 2 }
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = socrus.151 days = 180 } #1st People's Cossack Cavalry Corps
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Don Cossacks Declare Independence
	id = socrus.152
	title = socrus.152.t
	desc = socrus.152.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_socialist_government = yes
		NOT = { has_war_with = GER }
		controls_state = 218 #Rostov
	}
	immediate = {
		set_country_flag = RUS_pavlov_rebellion_flag
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_cossacks_2

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.152 option socrus.152.a"
		name = socrus.152.a
		ai_chance = { base = 10 }
		set_variable = { RUS_pavlov_unrest = 1 }
		add_command_power = -100
		army_experience = -15
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_pavlov_instruction
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = RUS_pavlov_rebellion
			days = 365
		}
		RUS_increase_antisoc_resistance = yes
		RUS_don_resistance = yes
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = -3 }
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = socrus.153 days = 14 }
			country_event = { id = socrus.195 days = 30 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.152 option socrus.152.b"
		name = socrus.152.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_3
					has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_4
					has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_5
					has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_6
				}
			}
		}
		set_variable = { RUS_pavlov_unrest = 2 }
		add_command_power = -50
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_pavlov_power
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_pavlov_instruction
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = RUS_pavlov_rebellion
			days = 365
		}
		RUS_increase_antisoc_resistance = yes
		RUS_don_resistance = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = socrus.153 days = 14 }
			country_event = { id = socrus.195 days = 30 }
		}
	}
}

	id = socrus.153
	title = socrus.153.t
	desc = socrus.153.d
	is_triggered_only = yes

		has_socialist_government = yes
		NOT = { has_war_with = GER }

	}

		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_pavlov_power
		add_manpower = -13500
		RUS_kuban_resistance = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = socrus.157 days = 30 }
		}
	}

		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.153 option socrus.153.b"
		name = socrus.153.b
		add_to_variable = { RUS_pavlov_unrest = 1 }
		add_manpower = -43200
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -4 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = -4 }
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
		RUS_decrease_antisoc_resistance = yes
		RUS_kuban_resistance = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = socrus.157 days = 30 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.153 option socrus.153.c"
		name = socrus.153.c
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_future_for_the_rural_regions
				has_completed_focus = RUS_healthcare_reform
				has_completed_focus = RUS_countryside_concession
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_available_because_ruralism_tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_pavlov_power_decrease
		add_to_variable = { RUS_pavlov_unrest = -1 }
		add_political_power = -50
		RUS_kuban_resistance = yes
		country_event = { id = socrus.155 days = 30 }
	}
}

	id = socrus.154

	desc = socrus.154.d

		has_socialist_government = yes
		NOT = { has_war_with = GER }
	}

		add_manpower = -65700
		remove_ideas = RUS_pavlov_rebellion

			set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = -3 }
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
		### Possible add other path-specific variables

		set_variable = { RUS_pavlov_unrest = 1 }
	}

country_event = { #Pavlov's Rebellion Dies Down
	id = socrus.155
	title = socrus.155.t
	desc = socrus.155.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_socialist_government = yes
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_cossacks_3

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.155 option socrus.155.a"
		name = socrus.155.a
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = 3 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		remove_ideas = RUS_pavlov_rebellion
		RUS_decrease_antisoc_resistance = yes
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = -4 }
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_pavlov_rebellion_flag
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_pavlov_rebels } }
			add_resistance = -40
		}
		hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = socrus.158 days = 30 } }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.155 option socrus.155.b"
		name = socrus.155.b
		add_stability = 0.03
		remove_ideas = RUS_pavlov_rebellion
		RUS_decrease_antisoc_resistance = yes
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = 3 }
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_in_coalition_with_social_democrat = yes
					RUS_is_spiridonist = yes
				}
			}
			add_political_power = 50
		}
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -5 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		clr_country_flag = RUS_pavlov_rebellion_flag
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_pavlov_rebels } }
			add_resistance = -20
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #The Caspian Hosts
	id = socrus.157
	title = socrus.157.t
	desc = socrus.157.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_socialist_government = yes
		NOT = { has_war_with = GER }
		controls_state = 236 #Astrakhan
		has_idea = RUS_pavlov_rebellion
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_cossacks_3

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.157 option socrus.157.a"
		name = socrus.157.a
		add_to_variable = { RUS_pavlov_unrest = 2 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_pavlov_power
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = 1 }
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
		RUS_caspian_resistance = yes
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { RUS_pavlov_unrest < 4 } }
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = socrus.155 days = 30 } }
		}
		else = {
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = socrus.158 days = 30 } }
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.157 option socrus.157.b"
		name = socrus.157.b
		add_to_variable = { RUS_pavlov_unrest = 1 }
		army_experience = -20
		add_war_support = 0.05
		RUS_caspian_resistance = yes
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { RUS_pavlov_unrest < 4 } }
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = socrus.154 days = 30 } }
		}
		else = {
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = socrus.158 days = 30 } }
		}
	}
}
