country_event = { #The Pavlovites join Free Russian Army
	id = socrus.159
	title = socrus.159.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { tag = RUS }
		text = socrus.159.d.rus
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { NOT = { tag = RUS } }
		text = socrus.159.d.rsa
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		RSA = { exists = yes }
		has_war = yes
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_boldyrev
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.159 option socrus.159.a"
		name = socrus.159.a
		trigger = { tag = RUS }
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_pavlovite_effect = RUS_pavlov_unrest }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_pavlov_instruction_outcome
		divide_temp_variable = { RUS_pavlovite_effect = -50 }
		add_stability = RUS_pavlovite_effect
		multiply_temp_variable = { RUS_pavlovite_effect = 101165 }
		add_manpower = RUS_pavlovite_effect
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.159 option socrus.159.b"
		name = socrus.159.b
		trigger = { tag = RSA }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_pavlov_instruction_outcome_RSA
		set_temp_variable = { RSA_pavlovite_effect = RUS.RUS_pavlov_unrest }
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { has_template = "Svobodny Kazachya diviziya" } }
				division_template = {
					name = "Svobodny Kazachya diviziya"
					division_names_group = RUS_CAV_02
					regiments = {
						cavalry = { x = 0 y = 0 }
						cavalry = { x = 0 y = 1 }
						cavalry = { x = 0 y = 2 }
						cavalry = { x = 1 y = 0 }
						cavalry = { x = 1 y = 1 }
						cavalry = { x = 1 y = 2 }
					}
					support = {
						recon = { x = 0 y = 0 }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		random_owned_controlled_state = {
			prioritize = { 64 } #Berlin
			limit = { valid_state_for_spawning_friendly_unit = yes }
			create_unit = {
				division = "division_template = \"Svobodny Kazachya diviziya\" start_experience_factor = 0.2 start_equipment_factor = 1.0"
				owner = ROOT
				count = RSA_pavlovite_effect
			}
		}
		multiply_temp_variable = { RSA_pavlovite_effect = 10 }
		add_political_power = RSA_pavlovite_effect
		multiply_temp_variable = { RSA_pavlovite_effect = 1137 }
		add_manpower = RSA_pavlovite_effect
		hidden_effect = { RUS = { country_event = socrus.159 } }
	}
}

country_event = { #The Tambov Experiment
	id = socrus.165
	title = socrus.165.t
	desc = socrus.165.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_mechanized_farms

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.165 option socrus.165.a"
		name = socrus.165.a
		activate_mission = RUS_complete_the_tambov_experiment
		activate_targeted_decision = { target = THIS decision = RUS_devolution_of_authority }
		activate_targeted_decision = { target = THIS decision = RUS_incentivise_creation_of_rural_enterprises }
		activate_targeted_decision = { target = THIS decision = RUS_modernisation_of_agricultural_communes }
		activate_targeted_decision = { target = THIS decision = RUS_mordva_autonomies }
		activate_targeted_decision = { target = THIS decision = RUS_peoples_militia_reform }
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		custom_effect_tooltip = socrus.165.a.tt
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_ai = no
			}
			add_to_variable = { RUS_tambov_experiment_cost_var = 60 }
		}
		else = {
			add_to_variable = { RUS_tambov_experiment_cost_var = 40 }
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_tambov_experiment
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = socrus.184 days = 80 random_days = 60 }
			country_event = { id = socrus.197 days = 155 }
		}
	}
}

		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_siberian_direction_complete
					has_country_flag = RUS_completed_incentivise_creation_of_rural_enterprises
					has_country_flag = RUS_completed_modernisation_of_agricultural_communes

					has_country_flag = RUS_completed_peoples_militia_reform

				}
			}
		}
		text = socrus.167.d #Zdobnov
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_siberian_direction_complete
			has_country_flag = RUS_completed_incentivise_creation_of_rural_enterprises
			has_country_flag = RUS_completed_modernisation_of_agricultural_communes
			has_country_flag = RUS_completed_mordva_autonomies
			has_country_flag = RUS_completed_peoples_militia_reform

		}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.167 option socrus.167.a"
		name = socrus.167.a

		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_siberian_direction_complete
					has_country_flag = RUS_completed_incentivise_creation_of_rural_enterprises
					has_country_flag = RUS_completed_modernisation_of_agricultural_communes
					has_country_flag = RUS_completed_mordva_autonomies
					has_country_flag = RUS_completed_peoples_militia_reform

				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_zdobnov_victory

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.167 option socrus.167.b"
		name = socrus.167.b
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_siberian_direction_complete
			has_country_flag = RUS_completed_incentivise_creation_of_rural_enterprises
			has_country_flag = RUS_completed_modernisation_of_agricultural_communes
			has_country_flag = RUS_completed_mordva_autonomies
			has_country_flag = RUS_completed_peoples_militia_reform
			RUS_isaak_steinberg = { has_trait = KR_head_of_the_romanticists }
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_kamkov_victory
		custom_effect_tooltip = socrus.167.b.tt
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = socrus.185 days = 20 random_days = 20 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Towards the Future
	id = socrus.168
	title = socrus.168.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_zdobnov_victory }
		text = socrus.168.d
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_kamkov_victory }
		text = socrus.168.d2
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kremlin2

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.168 option socrus.168.a"
		name = socrus.168.a
		retire_character = RUS_maria_spiridonova
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_zdobnov_victory
			}
			promote_character = {
				character = RUS_nikolay_zdobnov
				ideology = radical_socialist_subtype
			}
		}
		else = {
			promote_character = {
				character = RUS_boris_kamkov
				ideology = radical_socialist_subtype
			}
			activate_advisor = RUS_isaak_steinberg_sic
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Future of the Worker's Parties
	id = socrus.169
	title = socrus.169.t
	desc = socrus.169.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_zdobnov

	option = {

country_event = { #Hidden event for incrementing Faith every 75 days
	id = socrus.172
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	trigger = {
		check_variable = { RUS_faith < 100 }
		OR = {
			has_idea = RUS_democratic_bloc_3
			has_idea = RUS_democratic_bloc_4
			has_idea = RUS_democratic_bloc_5
			has_idea = RUS_democratic_bloc_6
			has_idea = RUS_democratic_bloc_9
			has_idea = RUS_democratic_bloc_10
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.172 option 1"
		country_event = { id = socrus.172 days = 75 }
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = 1 }
		RUS_add_faith = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #PSR Conference hidden event to fire unit leader event
	id = socrus.173
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.173 option 1"
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_siberian_direction_complete
						has_country_flag = RUS_completed_incentivise_creation_of_rural_enterprises
						has_country_flag = RUS_completed_modernisation_of_agricultural_communes
						has_country_flag = RUS_completed_mordva_autonomies
						has_country_flag = RUS_completed_peoples_militia_reform
						RUS_isaak_steinberg = { has_trait = KR_head_of_the_romanticists }
					}
				}
			}
			RUS_nikolay_zdobnov = {
				unit_leader_event = { id = socrus.167 days = 1 } #PSR Conference
			}
		}
		else = {
			RUS_boris_kamkov = {
				unit_leader_event = { id = socrus.167 days = 1 } #PSR Conference
			}
		}
	}
}

			has_country_flag = UKR_had_auth_govt
			NOT = { RUS_is_maximalist = yes }
		}
		text = socrus.179.d
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = UKR_had_dem_govt
			NOT = { RUS_is_maximalist = yes }
		}
		text = socrus.179.d2
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS_is_maximalist = yes }
		text = socrus.179.d3
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_oleksandr_shumskyi
	trigger = {
		UKR = {
			is_subject_of = RUS
			NOT = { has_country_leader = { character = UKR_vlas_chubar } }
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.179 option socrus.179.a"
		name = socrus.179.a
		clr_country_flag = UKR_had_auth_govt
		clr_country_flag = UKR_had_dem_govt
	}
}

		}
	}

country_event = { #Renaming of Cities
	id = socrus.190
	title = socrus.190.t
	desc = socrus.190.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_Latinization

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.190 option socrus.190.a"
		name = socrus.190.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_VST = yes
			}
			217 = {
				set_global_flag = tsaritsyn_renamed_vst
				set_state_name = STATE_217_MININGRAD
				set_province_name = { id = 3529 name = VICTORY_POINTS_3529_MININGRAD }
			}
		}
		else = {
			217 = {
				set_global_flag = tsaritsyn_renamed
				set_state_name = STATE_217_VOLGOGRAD
				set_province_name = { id = 3529 name = VICTORY_POINTS_3529_VOLGOGRAD }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_maximalist = yes }
			653 = {
				set_global_flag = ekaterinburg_renamed_maximalist
				set_state_name = STATE_653_ZDOBNOVSK
				set_province_name = { id = 1821 name = VICTORY_POINTS_1821_ZDOBNOVSK }
			}
		}
		else = {
			653 = {
				set_global_flag = ekaterinburg_renamed
				set_state_name = STATE_653_CHERNOVSK
				set_province_name = { id = 1821 name = VICTORY_POINTS_1821_CHERNOVSK }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST = yes }
			250 = {
				set_global_flag = simbirsk_renamed_vst
				set_state_name = STATE_250_ULYANOVSK
				set_province_name = { id = 392 name = VICTORY_POINTS_392_ULYANOVSK }
			}
		}
		570 = {
			set_global_flag = novonikolayevsk_renamed
			set_state_name = STATE_570_NOVOSIBIRSK
			set_province_name = { id = 7274 name = VICTORY_POINTS_7274_NOVOSIBIRSK }
		}
		233 = {
			set_global_flag = vladikavkaz_renamed
			set_state_name = STATE_233_DZAUDZHIKAU
			set_province_name = { id = 9628 name = VICTORY_POINTS_9628_DZAUDZHIKAU }
		}
		961 = {
			set_global_flag = grozny_renamed
			custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
			set_province_name = { id = 3672 name = VICTORY_POINTS_3672_SOLZHAGALA }
		}
		232 = {
			set_global_flag = petrovsk_renamed
			custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
			set_province_name = { id = 3668 name = VICTORY_POINTS_3668_ANZHIKALA }
		}
		397 = {
			set_global_flag = ustsysolsk_renamed
			set_state_name = STATE_397_SYKYTYVDIN
			set_province_name = { id = 6121 name = VICTORY_POINTS_6121_SYKYTYVDIN }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Tambov Experiment Complete
	id = socrus.193
	title = socrus.193.t
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { RUS_tambov_var < 2 }
		}
		text = socrus.193.d
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { RUS_tambov_var > 1 }
			check_variable = { RUS_tambov_var < 4 }
		}
		text = socrus.193.d2
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { RUS_tambov_var = 4 }
		}
		text = socrus.193.d3
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_land_reform

	option = { #bad
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.193 option socrus.193.a"
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { RUS_tambov_var < 2 }
		}
		name = socrus.193.a
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = 0.1
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = radical_socialist
			popularity = -0.1
		}
	}
	option = { #mid
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.193 option socrus.193.b"
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { RUS_tambov_var > 1 }
			check_variable = { RUS_tambov_var < 4 }
		}
		name = socrus.193.b
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = 0.05
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = radical_socialist
			popularity = -0.05
		}
	}
	option = { #good
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.193 option socrus.193.c"
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { RUS_tambov_var = 4 }
		}
		name = socrus.193.c
	}
}

	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kamkov

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.203 option socrus.203.a"
		name = socrus.203.a
		retire_character = RUS_maria_spiridonova
		promote_character = {
			character = RUS_boris_kamkov
			ideology = radical_socialist_subtype
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_vladimir_karelin_sic
	}
}

country_event = { #Elections to Constituent Assembly
	id = socrus.300
	title = socrus.300.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_government = radical_socialist }
		text = socrus.300.d.radsoc
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_government = syndicalist }
		text = socrus.300.d.syndie
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_soviet_congress
	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = socrus.301 days = 3 }
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.300 option socrus.300.a"
		name = socrus.300.a
		if = {
			limit = { has_completed_focus = RUS_red_flag_over_kremlin }
			add_stability = 0.05
			add_popularity = { ideology = radical_socialist popularity = 0.08 }
			add_popularity = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = 0.06 }
		}
		else = {
			add_stability = 0.15
			add_popularity = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = 0.08 }
			add_popularity = { ideology = radical_socialist popularity = 0.06 }
			add_popularity = { ideology = social_democrat popularity = 0.02 }
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = totalist popularity = 0.04 }
	}
}

country_event = { #Matter of the Parliament
	id = socrus.301
	title = socrus.301.t
	desc = socrus.301.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_soviet_congress
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			set_cosmetic_tag = RUS_soc
			country_event = { id = socrus.302 days = 3 }
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.301 option socrus.301.a"
		name = socrus.301.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_zdobnov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_kamkov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_ustinov_ai
				}
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_const_left_option_tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		add_popularity = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = 0.02 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = totalist popularity = 0.01 }
		set_country_flag = RUS_const_left_option
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.301 option socrus.301.b"
		name = socrus.301.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_completed_focus = RUS_revolution_from_above
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_zdobnov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_kamkov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_ustinov_ai
				}
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_const_centre_option_tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		add_popularity = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = 0.02 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = radical_socialist popularity = 0.01 }
		set_country_flag = RUS_const_centre_option
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.301 option socrus.301.c"
		name = socrus.301.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 40
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_abramovich_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_levitsky_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_sulimov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_kamenev_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_zinovyev_ai
				}
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_const_right_option_tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		add_popularity = { ideology = radical_socialist popularity = 0.02 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = 0.01 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_democrat popularity = 0.01 }
		set_country_flag = RUS_const_right_option
	}
}

country_event = { #Matter of the HoS
	id = socrus.302
	title = socrus.302.t
	desc = socrus.302.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_soviet_congress
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Strong HoS
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.302 option socrus.302.a"
		name = socrus.302.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_zdobnov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_kamkov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_ustinov_ai
				}
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_const_executive_tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		add_popularity = { ideology = radical_socialist popularity = 0.01 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = totalist popularity = 0.01 }
		set_country_flag = RUS_const_executive
	}

	option = { #Weak HoS
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.302 option socrus.302.b"
		name = socrus.302.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_abramovich_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_levitsky_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_sulimov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_kamenev_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_zinovyev_ai
				}
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_const_parliamentarian_tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		add_popularity = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = 0.02 }
		set_country_flag = RUS_const_parliamentarian
	}
}

country_event = { #HoS Election
	id = socrus.303
	title = socrus.303.t
	desc = socrus.303.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_soviet_congress
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #SRs
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.303 option socrus.303.a"
		name = socrus.303.a
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					has_completed_focus = RUS_red_flag_over_kremlin
					has_country_flag = RUS_const_centre_option
				}
				has_country_flag = RUS_const_right_option
			}
			NOT = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_revolution_from_above
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_abramovich_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_levitsky_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_sulimov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_kamenev_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_zinovyev_ai
				}
			}
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = radical_socialist
			popularity = 0.06
		}
		complete_national_focus = RUS_radsocs
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = radical_socialist
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 48
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = totalist
				long_name = RUS_totalist3_party_long
				name = RUS_totalist3_party
			}
			RUS_aleksey_ustinov = { promote_character = { ideology = totalist_subtype } }
			set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:syndicalist }
			add_to_coalition = yes
			if = {
				limit = { is_ai = yes }
				add_political_power = 150
			}
		}
	}

	option = { #VST
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.303 option socrus.303.b"
		name = socrus.303.b
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_revolution_from_above
				has_country_flag = RUS_const_left_option
				has_country_flag = RUS_const_centre_option
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_zdobnov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_kamkov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_ustinov_ai
				}
			}
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = 0.06
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_government = syndicalist } }
			meta_effect = {
				text = {
					set_politics = {
						ruling_party = syndicalist
						last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
						election_frequency = 48
						elections_allowed = yes
					}
				}
				CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
			}
		}
		unlock_decision_category_tooltip = RUS_socrus_coalition_mechanic_decisions
		set_variable = { var = vst_centre_unity value = 6 }
		set_variable = { var = sr_var value = 3 }
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_const_centre_option }
			add_to_variable = { var = sr_var value = 1 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_const_right_option }
			add_to_variable = { var = sr_var value = 2 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_const_parliamentarian }
			add_to_variable = { var = sr_var value = 1 }
		}
		set_variable = { var = sds_var value = 2 }
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_const_right_option }
			add_to_variable = { var = sds_var value = 1 }
		}
		set_variable = { var = rkp_var value = 2 }
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_const_left_option }
			add_to_variable = { var = rkp_var value = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_const_executive }
			add_to_variable = { var = rkp_var value = 1 }
		}
		set_variable = { var = vst_left_var value = 2 }
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_const_left_option }
			add_to_variable = { var = vst_left_var value = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_const_executive }
			add_to_variable = { var = vst_left_var value = 1 }
		}
		set_variable = { var = vst_centre_var value = 5 }
		set_variable = { var = vst_right_var value = 3 }
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_const_right_option }
			add_to_variable = { var = vst_right_var value = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_const_parliamentarian }
			add_to_variable = { var = vst_right_var value = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_completed_focus = RUS_revolution_from_above }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_sulimov_buff_tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_VST_improve_all_relation_tt
			add_to_variable = { var = vst_right_var value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { var = vst_left_var value = 1 }
			add_to_variable = { var = vst_centre_unity value = 1 }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:radical_socialist }
			add_to_coalition = yes
			set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:totalist }
			add_to_coalition = yes
			country_event = { id = socrus.304 days = 2 }
			country_event = { id = socrus.11 days = 180 random_days = 180 } #One Class, Two Parties
			if = {
				limit = { is_ai = yes }
				add_political_power = 150
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Choice of Syndie Sub-Path
	id = socrus.304
	title = socrus.304.t
	desc = socrus.304.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_levitsky
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = socrus.320 days = 100 random_days = 100 } #Uglanov's Resignation
			country_event = { id = socrus.305 days = 300 } #VST Congress
		}
	}

	option = { #Mensheviks
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.304 option socrus.304.a"
		name = socrus.304.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_sulimov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_levitsky_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_kamenev_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_zinovyev_ai
				}
			}
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_fyodor_dan_sic
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 2 }
		RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
		RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
		RUS_SDS_relation = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
		RUS_RKP_relation = yes
		add_ideas = RUS_vst_party_unity_idea
		RUS_VST_party_check = yes
	}

	option = { #Centre
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.304 option socrus.304.b"
		name = socrus.304.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_abramovich_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_kamenev_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_zinovyev_ai
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_daniil_sulimov = { is_second_in_command = no }
			}
			activate_advisor = RUS_daniil_sulimov_sic
			custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		}
		RUS_increase_VST_centre_unity = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
		RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
		RUS_SDS_relation = yes
		RUS_RKP_relation = yes
		add_ideas = RUS_vst_party_unity_idea
		RUS_VST_party_check = yes
	}

	option = { #Left
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.304 option socrus.304.c"
		name = socrus.304.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_abramovich_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_sulimov_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_levitsky_ai
				}
			}
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_lev_kamenev_sic
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 2 }
		RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
		RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
		RUS_RKP_relation = yes
		RUS_SDS_relation = yes
		add_ideas = RUS_vst_party_unity_idea
		RUS_VST_party_check = yes
	}
}

country_event = { # Annual Congress of VST
	id = socrus.305
	title = socrus.305.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_war_with = GER }
		text = socrus.305.d.war
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_idea = RUS_vst_party_unity_idea #normal
				AND = { #what if somehow you don't fulfil any of the descs listed here? if so, use 305.d.stable - attempt at fixing issue #9347
					NOT = {
						has_war_with = GER
						has_idea = RUS_vst_party_unity_idea
						AND = {
							has_idea = RUS_vst_party_factionalism_idea
							check_variable = { vst_centre_unity > 3 }
						}
						has_idea = RUS_vst_party_streamlined_idea
						AND = {
							has_country_leader = { character = RUS_vladimir_levitsky }
							has_idea = RUS_vst_party_factionalism_idea
							OR = {
								RUS_lev_kamenev = { is_second_in_command = yes }
								RUS_daniil_sulimov = { is_second_in_command = yes }
							}
							check_variable = { vst_centre_unity < 4 }
							NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_VST_left_revolt }
						}
						AND = {
							has_country_leader = { character = RUS_vladimir_levitsky }
							has_idea = RUS_vst_party_factionalism_idea
							RUS_fyodor_dan = { is_second_in_command = yes }
							check_variable = { vst_centre_unity < 4 }
							NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_VST_right_revolt }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		text = socrus.305.d.stable
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_idea = RUS_vst_party_factionalism_idea
			check_variable = { vst_centre_unity > 3 }
		}
		text = socrus.305.d.factionalism
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_idea = RUS_vst_party_streamlined_idea }
		text = socrus.305.d.streamlined
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_country_leader = { character = RUS_vladimir_levitsky }
			has_idea = RUS_vst_party_factionalism_idea
			OR = {
				RUS_lev_kamenev = { is_second_in_command = yes }
				RUS_daniil_sulimov = { is_second_in_command = yes }
			}
			check_variable = { vst_centre_unity < 4 }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_VST_left_revolt }
		}
		text = socrus.305.d.kamenev
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_country_leader = { character = RUS_vladimir_levitsky }
			has_idea = RUS_vst_party_factionalism_idea
			RUS_fyodor_dan = { is_second_in_command = yes }
			check_variable = { vst_centre_unity < 4 }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_VST_right_revolt }
		}
		text = socrus.305.d.abramovich
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_soviet_congress
	immediate = {
		RUS_VST_party_check = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = socrus.305 days = 365 }
		}
	}

	option = { #United front
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.305 option socrus.305.a"
		name = socrus.305.a
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_war_with = GER
				has_idea = RUS_vst_party_streamlined_idea
				has_idea = RUS_vst_party_unity_idea
				is_ai = yes
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_levitsky_ai
					has_country_leader = { character = RUS_daniil_sulimov }
					has_country_leader = { character = RUS_rafail_abramovich }
					has_country_leader = { character = RUS_lev_kamenev }
					has_country_leader = { character = RUS_grigory_zinovyev }
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_leader = { character = RUS_vladimir_levitsky } }
			RUS_increase_VST_centre_unity = yes
			add_political_power = 80
			add_stability = 0.04
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST_centre = yes }
			RUS_increase_VST_centre_unity = yes
			add_political_power = 40
			add_stability = 0.04
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST_right = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
			RUS_VST_centre_relation = yes
			add_political_power = 40
			add_stability = 0.04
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST_left = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
			RUS_VST_centre_relation = yes
			add_political_power = 40
			add_stability = 0.04
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_war_with = GER }
			add_war_support = 0.05
		}
	}

	option = { #It descends into factionalist debate
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.305 option socrus.305.b"
		name = socrus.305.b
		trigger = {
			has_idea = RUS_vst_party_factionalism_idea
			if = {
				limit = { RUS_VST_centre = yes }
				check_variable = { vst_centre_unity > 3 }
			}
			else = {
				check_variable = { vst_centre_var < 4 }
			}
			NOT = { has_war_with = GER }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_leader = { character = RUS_vladimir_levitsky }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_levitsky_ai }
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -5 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
		RUS_VST_centre_relation = yes
		RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
	}

	option = { #Try to maintain peace!
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.305 option socrus.305.c"
		name = socrus.305.c
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_war_with = GER }
			has_idea = RUS_vst_party_factionalism_idea
			if = {
				limit = { RUS_VST_centre = yes }
				check_variable = { vst_centre_unity > 3 }
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_leader = { character = RUS_vladimir_levitsky }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_levitsky_ai }
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -75
	}

	option = { #Levitsky gets the boot, Abramovich takes over
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.305 option socrus.305.e"
		name = socrus.305.e
		trigger = {
			if = {
				limit = { is_ai = no }
				has_country_leader = { character = RUS_vladimir_levitsky }
				has_idea = RUS_vst_party_factionalism_idea
				RUS_fyodor_dan = { is_second_in_command = yes }
				check_variable = { vst_centre_unity < 4 }
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_VST_right_revolt }
			}
			else = {
				has_country_leader = { character = RUS_vladimir_levitsky }
				has_country_flag = RUS_abramovich_ai
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_abramovich_ai }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				has_country_flag = RUS_abramovich_ai
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_VST_conference_abramovich
		country_event = socrus.338
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -5 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
		RUS_VST_centre_relation = yes
	}

	option = { #Levitsky gets the boot, Kamenev takes over
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.305 option socrus.305.f"
		name = socrus.305.f
		trigger = {
			if = {
				limit = { is_ai = no }
				has_country_leader = { character = RUS_vladimir_levitsky }
				has_idea = RUS_vst_party_factionalism_idea
				OR = {
					RUS_lev_kamenev = { is_second_in_command = yes }
					RUS_daniil_sulimov = { is_second_in_command = yes }
				}
				check_variable = { vst_centre_unity < 4 }
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_VST_left_revolt }
			}
			else = {
				has_country_leader = { character = RUS_vladimir_levitsky }
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_kamenev_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_zinovyev_ai
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_zinovyev_ai }
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_kamenev_ai }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_kamenev_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_zinovyev_ai
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_VST_conference_kamenev
		country_event = socrus.338
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -5 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
		RUS_VST_centre_relation = yes
	}

	option = { #Make plans for Sulimov takeover
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.305 option socrus.305.g"
		name = socrus.305.g
		trigger = {
			has_country_leader = { character = RUS_vladimir_levitsky }
			if = {
				limit = { is_ai = no }
				has_country_flag = RUS_const_executive
				has_idea = RUS_vst_party_factionalism_idea
				OR = {
					has_completed_focus = RUS_revolution_from_above
					check_variable = { vst_centre_unity < 4 }
				}
			}
			else = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_sulimov_ai
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_sulimov_ai }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				has_country_flag = RUS_sulimov_ai
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_VST_sulimov_coup_tt
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = socrus.355 #Experiment in Blanquism
		}
	}
}

		add_to_coalition = yes

			set_party_name = {
				ideology = market_liberal
				name = RUS_social_democrat2_party
				long_name = RUS_social_democrat2_party_long_tt
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
		RUS_VST_centre_relation = yes

			set_party_name = {
				ideology = market_liberal
				name = RUS_social_democrat2_party
				long_name = RUS_social_democrat2_party_long
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.310 option socrus.310.b"
		name = socrus.310.b
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_democrat popularity = 0.02 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_liberal popularity = 0.02 }
		effect_tooltip = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = market_liberal
				name = RUS_social_democrat2_party
				long_name = RUS_social_democrat2_party_long_tt
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {

		}

		trigger = { NOT = { tag = RUS } }
		add_popularity = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = 0.01 }
	}

country_event = { # Speculation with the Prices
	id = socrus.314
	title = socrus.314.t
	desc = socrus.314.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_protest
	trigger = { has_socialist_government = yes }

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.314 option socrus.314.a"
		name = socrus.314.a
		add_stability = 0.05
		add_political_power = -50
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = 4 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = 2 }
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
		else = {
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
			RUS_PSR_relation = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.314 option socrus.314.b"
		name = socrus.314.b
		trigger = { NOT = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes } }
		add_stability = 0.025
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_conservative popularity = -0.03 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_liberal popularity = -0.03 }
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_PLSR = yes }
			add_popularity = { ideology = radical_socialist popularity = -0.06 }
		}
		else = {
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
			RUS_PSR_relation = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
			RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
			RUS_RKP_relation = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.314 option socrus.314.c"
		name = socrus.314.c
		RUS_decrease_antisoc_resistance = yes
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_democrat popularity = 0.06 }
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_PLSR = yes }
			add_popularity = { ideology = radical_socialist popularity = -0.05 }
		}
		else = {
			RUS_decrease_VST_centre_unity = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
			RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
			RUS_SDS_relation = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
			RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
			RUS_VST_centre_relation = yes
			RUS_RKP_relation = yes
		}
	}
}

unit_leader_event = { # Zinovyev boots Kamenev due to Radicalism
	id = socrus.329
	title = socrus.329.t
	desc = socrus.329.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kamenev
	trigger = {
		if = {
			limit = { is_ai = yes }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_kamenev_ai }
		}
	}

	option = { #Kamenev -> Zinovyev
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.329 option socrus.329.a"
		name = socrus.329.a
		add_stability = -0.1
		RUS_grigory_zinovyev = {
			promote_character = syndicalist_subtype
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		activate_advisor = RUS_lev_kamenev_sic
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		RUS_streamline_VST = yes
		RUS_convert_radicalism_to_totalist_popularity = yes
	}
}

country_event = { # Ministry - Finance
	id = socrus.330
	title = socrus.330.t
	desc = socrus.330.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_VST_Centre_fell_flag }
		check_variable = { vst_right_var > 0 }
		check_variable = { vst_left_var > 0 }
	}
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = socrus.335 days = 3 }
		}
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_conference1

	option = { #Strumlin
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.330 option socrus.330.a"
		name = socrus.330.a
		RUS_increase_VST_centre_unity = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
		RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
		add_popularity = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = 0.01 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		custom_effect_tooltip = socrus.330.a.tt
		set_country_flag = RUS_strumilin_ministry
	}

	option = { #Kamkov (SR)
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.330 option socrus.330.b"
		name = socrus.330.b
		RUS_decrease_VST_centre_unity = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
		RUS_PSR_relation = yes
		add_popularity = { ideology = radical_socialist popularity = 0.01 }
	}

	option = { #Finn-Yenotayevsky (Right)
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.330 option socrus.330.c"
		name = socrus.330.c
		RUS_decrease_VST_centre_unity = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
		RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
		RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		custom_effect_tooltip = socrus.330.c.tt
		set_country_flag = RUS_yenotayevsky_ministry

	}

	option = { #Kamenev (Left)
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.330 option socrus.330.e"
		name = socrus.330.e
		trigger = {
			RUS_lev_kamenev = { is_second_in_command = no }
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
		RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
		RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
	}
}

country_event = { # VST Centre Falling
	id = socrus.336
	title = socrus.336.t
	desc = socrus.336.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_country_leader = { character = RUS_vladimir_levitsky }
		OR = {
			check_variable = { vst_centre_unity < 1 }
			has_country_flag = RUS_VST_collapse
		}
	}
	immediate = {
		RUS_clear_zinovyev_minigame = yes
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_levitsky

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.336 option socrus.336.a"
		name = socrus.336.a
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_VST_power_struggle_tt
		add_stability = -0.1
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = socrus.338
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.336 option socrus.336.b"
		name = socrus.336.b
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_const_executive }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_VST_sulimov_coup_tt
		add_stability = -0.1
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = socrus.355 days = 1 } #Experiment in Blanquism
		}
	}
}

country_event = { # Change in Leadership
	id = socrus.338
	title = socrus.338.t
	desc = socrus.338.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_levitsky

	option = { #Right
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.338 option socrus.338.a"
		trigger = {
			if = {
				limit = { is_ai = no }
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_VST_conference_abramovich
					RUS_fyodor_dan = { is_second_in_command = yes }
					check_variable = { vst_right_var > vst_left_var }
				}
			}
			else = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_abramovich_ai
			}
		}
		name = socrus.338.a
		promote_character = {
			character = RUS_rafail_abramovich
			ideology = syndicalist_subtype
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_fyodor_dan_sic
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -5 }
		RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		RUS_RKP_relation = yes
		set_country_flag = RUS_VST_left_revolt
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = socrus.405 days = 200 random_days = 200 }
		}
	}

	option = { #Left
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.338 option socrus.338.b"
		trigger = {
			if = {
				limit = { is_ai = no }
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_centre_collapsing_to_left
					has_country_flag = RUS_VST_conference_kamenev
					RUS_grigory_zinovyev = { is_second_in_command = yes }
					check_variable = { vst_right_var < vst_left_var }
				}
			}
			else = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_kamenev_ai
					has_country_flag = RUS_zinovyev_ai
				}
			}
		}
		name = socrus.338.b
		promote_character = {
			character = RUS_lev_kamenev
			ideology = syndicalist_subtype
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_grigory_zinovyev_sic
		set_country_flag = RUS_VST_right_revolt
		country_event = socrus.328 # Dvoika formed
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -5 }
		RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
		RUS_SDS_relation = yes
		clr_country_flag = socrus340_fired
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = socrus.307 days = 60 } #Centralisation of Power
		}
	}
}

country_event = { # Radicalism warning at 8
	id = socrus.339
	title = socrus.339.t
	desc = socrus.339.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_zinovyev

	option = { #Switch to Zinovyev
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.339 option socrus.339.a"
		name = socrus.339.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_KAMENEV_SYNDIE }
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_grigory_zinovyev = { unit_leader_event = socrus.329 }
		}
	}

	option = { #Buy Time
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.339 option socrus.339.b"
		name = socrus.339.b
		add_political_power = -50
		RUS_decrease_VST_left_radicalism = yes
		set_country_flag = RUS_radicalism_postponed_flag
	}
}

	id = socrus.340
	title = socrus.340.t
	desc = socrus.340.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		NOT = { has_country_flag = socrus340_fired }
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_protest
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.340 option socrus.340.a"
		name = socrus.340.a
		trigger = { RUS_VST_left = yes }
		add_ideas = RUS_unions_fury
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_ideas = {
				RUS_congress_of_unions
				RUS_congress_of_unions_2
				RUS_congress_of_unions_3
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = socrus340_fired
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.340 option socrus.340.a"
		name = socrus.340.a
		trigger = { RUS_VST_left = no }
		add_stability = -0.05
		RUS_decrease_VST_centre_unity = yes
		set_country_flag = socrus340_fired
	}
}

country_event = { #The Zinovyev Manifesto
	id = socrus.350
	title = socrus.350.t
	desc = socrus.350.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_country_leader = { character = RUS_vladimir_levitsky }
		has_character = RUS_grigory_zinovyev
		NOT = {
			has_war_with = GER
			has_completed_focus = RUS_eternal_flame
		}
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_zinovyev

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.350 option socrus.350.a"
		name = socrus.350.a
		activate_mission = RUS_left_ultimatum
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -4 }
		RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		activate_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_expel_zinovietes target = ROOT }
		activate_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_expel_sds target = ROOT }
		activate_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_ideological_restriction target = ROOT }
		activate_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_appoint_bolsheviks target = ROOT }
		activate_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_bolshevik_operation target = ROOT }
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_in_coalition_with_radical_socialist = yes
			}
			activate_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_backing_from_esers target = ROOT }
		}
		### Add rest of decisions

		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = socrus.358 days = 7 } #War over the Central Committee
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Sulimov's Strike
	id = socrus.351
	title = socrus.351.t
	desc = socrus.351.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { has_country_leader = { character = RUS_vladimir_levitsky } }
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_sulimov

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.351 option socrus.351.a"
		name = socrus.351.a
		if = {
			limit = { is_in_coalition_with_totalist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:totalist }
			remove_from_coalition = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_completed_focus = RUS_invite_sverdlov }
			uncomplete_national_focus = {
				focus = RUS_invite_sverdlov
				uncomplete_children = yes
			}
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = totalist popularity = -0.1 }
		retire_character = RUS_yakov_sverdlov # Remember to unretire him for potential puppet?
		retire_character = RUS_mikhail_frunze
		if = {
			limit = { has_character = RUS_iosif_stalin }
			retire_character = RUS_iosif_stalin
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Rebellion of the Left
	id = socrus.352
	title = socrus.352.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_VST_collapse }
		text = socrus.352.d.rebellion
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_expelled_left }
		text = socrus.352.d.expulsion
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { check_variable = { vst_left_var < 1 } }
		text = socrus.352.d.coalition
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		if = {
			limit = { is_ai = no }
			has_government = syndicalist
		}
		else = {
			RUS_VST_right = yes
		}
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kamenev

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.352 option socrus.352.a"
		name = socrus.352.a
		set_country_flag = RUS_VST_left_revolt
		clr_country_flag = RUS_VST_collapse
		RUS_grigory_zinovyev = {
			remove_political_advisor_role = yes
		}
		RUS_ivan_gronsky = {
			remove_political_advisor_role = yes
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = totalist popularity = 0.05 }
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -6 }
		RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		if = {
			limit = { has_completed_focus = RUS_communists }
			uncomplete_national_focus = { focus = RUS_communists }
			hidden_effect = {
				uncomplete_national_focus = {
					focus = RUS_encourage_collectivisation
				}
				uncomplete_national_focus = {
					focus = RUS_invite_sverdlov
					uncomplete_children = yes
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_VST_right_revolt }
			country_event = socrus.336 #VST Centre Falling
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Rebellion of the Right
	id = socrus.353
	title = socrus.353.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_VST_collapse }
		text = socrus.353.d.rebellion
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { check_variable = { vst_right_var < 1 } }
		text = socrus.353.d.coalition
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		if = {
			limit = { is_ai = no }
			has_government = syndicalist
		}
		else = {
			RUS_VST_left = yes
		}
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_abramovich

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.353 option socrus.353.a"
		name = socrus.353.a
		set_country_flag = RUS_VST_right_revolt
		clr_country_flag = RUS_VST_collapse
		RUS_rafail_abramovich = {
			remove_political_advisor_role = yes
		}
		RUS_aleksandr_finn_yenotayevsky = {
			remove_political_advisor_role = yes
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -6 }
		RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
		if = {
			limit = { has_completed_focus = RUS_mensheviks }
			uncomplete_national_focus = {
				focus = RUS_mensheviks
				uncomplete_children = no
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_completed_focus = RUS_new_russian_socialism }
			uncomplete_national_focus = {
				focus = RUS_new_russian_socialism
				uncomplete_children = no
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_VST_left_revolt }
			country_event = socrus.336 #VST Centre Falling
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Break-up with the SDS
	id = socrus.357
	title = socrus.357.t
	desc = socrus.357.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { has_socialist_government = yes }
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_zeller

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.357 option socrus.357.a"
		name = socrus.357.a
		if = {
			limit = { is_in_coalition_with_social_democrat = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:social_democrat }
			remove_from_coalition = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_completed_focus = RUS_invite_zeller }
			uncomplete_national_focus = {
				focus = RUS_invite_zeller
				uncomplete_children = yes
			}
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_democrat popularity = -0.1 }
		retire_character = RUS_gergard_zeller # Remember to unretire him for Boldyrev use?
	}
}

country_event = { #War over the Central Committee
	id = socrus.358
	title = socrus.358.t
	desc = socrus.358.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kamenev

	trigger = { has_active_mission = RUS_left_ultimatum }

	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_lev_kamenev = {
				unit_leader_event = { id = socrus.359 days = 4 } #Crisis Meeting
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.358 option socrus.358.a"
		name = socrus.358.a
		add_stability = 0.02
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
		RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
		RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = socrus.356 days = 2 } #The Right is Unhappy
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.358 option socrus.358.b"
		name = socrus.358.b
		add_political_power = 20
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
		RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
		RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
	}
}
unit_leader_event = { #Levitsky meets Kamenev
	id = socrus.359
	title = socrus.359.t
	desc = socrus.359.d

	trigger = {
		has_active_mission = RUS_left_ultimatum
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.359 option socrus.359.a"
		name = socrus.359.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_sulimov_ai
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_SULIMOV_SYNDIE }
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 40
		add_days_mission_timeout = {
			mission = RUS_left_ultimatum
			days = 15
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.359 option socrus.359.b"
		name = socrus.359.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_levitsky_ai
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_path option = RUS_PATH_LEVITSKY_SYNDIE }
				}
			}
		}
		country_event = { id = socrus.360 days = 5 } #To Protect the Revolution
	}
}

country_event = { #To Protect the Revolution
	id = socrus.360
	title = socrus.360.t
	desc = socrus.360.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_sulimov

	trigger = {
		has_country_leader = { character = RUS_vladimir_levitsky }
		has_socialist_government = yes
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.360 option socrus.360.a"
		name = socrus.360.a
		promote_character = { character = RUS_daniil_sulimov ideology = syndicalist_subtype }
		set_country_flag = RUS_levitsky_resigned
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = syndicalist
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		RUS_streamline_VST = yes
		activate_advisor = RUS_sergey_kirov_sic
		activate_advisor = RUS_mikhail_tukhachevsky_army_chief
		add_popularity = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = -0.05 }
		set_country_flag = RUS_VST_right_revolt
		set_country_flag = RUS_VST_left_revolt
		hidden_effect = {
			set_country_leader_description = {
				ideology = syndicalist
				desc = RUS_daniil_sulimov_socrus_leader_desc
			}
			set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:radical_socialist }
			add_to_coalition = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_active_mission = RUS_left_ultimatum }
				remove_mission = RUS_left_ultimatum
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_active_mission = RUS_right_ultimatum }
				remove_mission = RUS_right_ultimatum
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Socialism through Innovation
	id = socrus.361
	title = socrus.361.t
	desc = socrus.361.d
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Tone it down
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.361 option socrus.361.a"
		name = socrus.361.a
		swap_ideas = {
			remove_idea = RUS_machism_idea_1
			add_idea = RUS_machism_idea_2
		}
		RUS_decrease_antisoc_resistance = yes
	}

	option = { #Full ideologisation
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.361 option socrus.361.b"
		name = socrus.361.b
		swap_ideas = {
			remove_idea = RUS_machism_idea_1
			add_idea = RUS_machism_idea_3
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
		RUS_VST_centre_relation = yes
		RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
		RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		RUS_RKP_relation = yes
	}
}
country_event = { #Defection of the Former Centre
	id = socrus.362
	title = socrus.362.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS_VST_left = yes }
		text = socrus.362.d.left
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS_VST_right = yes }
		text = socrus.362.d.right
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		if = {
			limit = { is_ai = no }
			has_socialist_government = yes
		}
		else = {
			has_government = totalist
		}
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_shliapnikov

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.362 option socrus.362.a"
		name = socrus.362.a
		set_country_flag = RUS_VST_centre_revolt
		RUS_aleksandr_shlyapnikov = {
			remove_political_advisor_role = yes
		}
		RUS_grigory_maksimov = {
			remove_second_in_command_role = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_completed_focus = RUS_internationalists }
			uncomplete_national_focus = {
				focus = RUS_internationalists
				uncomplete_children = yes
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.362 option socrus.362.b"
		name = socrus.362.b
		add_political_power = -50
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 2 }
		RUS_VST_centre_relation = yes
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST_right = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
			RUS_SDS_relation = yes
		}
		else = {
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
			RUS_RKP_relation = yes
		}
	}
}

		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }

		RUS_increase_VST_left_radicalism = yes
		remove_ideas = RUS_unions_fury
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = socrus.379 days = 7 }
		}
	}
}

	}
}

unit_leader_event = { #Friendly Exchange
	id = socrus.380
	title = socrus.380.t
	desc = socrus.380.d
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.380 option socrus.380.a"
		name = socrus.380.a
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
		RUS_VST_Centre_relation = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
		RUS_PSR_relation = yes
		RUS_grigory_zinovyev = {
			promote_character = syndicalist_subtype
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		activate_advisor = RUS_lev_kamenev_sic
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		RUS_streamline_VST = yes
		RUS_convert_radicalism_to_totalist_popularity = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #Reversed October
	id = socrus.381
	title = socrus.381.t
	desc = socrus.381.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_sverdlov

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.381 option socrus.381.a"
		name = socrus.381.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_leader = { character = RUS_lev_kamenev }
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_reversed_october_event_kamenev_tt
			set_temp_variable = { current_vst_left_radicalism = vst_left_radicalism }
			multiply_temp_variable = { current_vst_left_radicalism = 0.01 }
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = totalist
				popularity = current_vst_left_radicalism
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
			RUS_increase_VST_left_radicalism = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_leader = { character = RUS_grigory_zinovyev }
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = totalist
				popularity = 0.05
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		effect_tooltip = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = totalist
				name = RUS_totalist5_party
				long_name = RUS_totalist5_party_long_tt
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		set_country_flag = RUS_rkp_absorbed_by_vst
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_reversed_october_event_bolshevik_purge_tt
		hidden_effect = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = totalist
				name = RUS_totalist5_party
				long_name = RUS_totalist5_party_long
			}
			RUS_yakov_sverdlov = {
				retire = yes
			}
			RUS_mikhail_frunze = {
				remove_trait = {
					slot = political_advisor
					trait = KR_bolshevik_frunze
				}
				add_trait = {
					slot = political_advisor
					trait = KR_vst_left_frunze
				}
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		add_country_leader_role = {
			character = RUS_grigory_zinovyev
			country_leader = {
				desc = RUS_grigory_zinovyev_leader_desc
				ideology = totalist_subtype
				traits = { RUS_grishka_third_sic }
			}
			promote_leader = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Bringing Modernity to Russia
	id = socrus.384
	title = socrus.384.t
	desc = socrus.384.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_government = syndicalist
			has_government = totalist
		}
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_zinovyev

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.384 option socrus.384.a"
		name = socrus.384.a
		add_political_power = 100
		activate_mission = RUS_soc_industrialisation_plan
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		RUS_increase_VST_centre_unity = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
		RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			INT = { country_event = socrus.385 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.384 option socrus.384.b"
		name = socrus.384.b
		RUS_decrease_VST_centre_unity = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
		RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #Bringing Modernity to Russia for #FRA
	id = socrus.385
	title = socrus.385.t
	desc = socrus.385.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { has_socialist_government = yes }

		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.385 option socrus.385.a"
		name = socrus.385.a
		add_political_power = 20
	}
}

country_event = { #Against the Anti-Social Intelligentsia
	id = socrus.386
	title = socrus.386.t
	desc = socrus.386.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = { has_socialist_government = yes }
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_soviet_congress

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.386 option socrus.386.a"
		name = socrus.386.a
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = RUS_purged_universities
			days = 365
		}
		add_stability = 0.1
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_spiridonist = yes
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = radical_socialist
				popularity = 0.04
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_maximalist = yes
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = totalist
				popularity = 0.04
			}
		}
		else = {
			set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = 4 }
			change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
		RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
		RUS_SDS_relation = yes
		if = {
			limit = { has_government = radical_socialist }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 2 }
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = -2 }
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.386 option socrus.386.b"
		name = socrus.386.b
		add_political_power = -50
		add_stability = 0.05
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
		RUS_SDS_relation = yes
		if = {
			limit = { has_government = radical_socialist }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 1 }
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = -1 }
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.386 option socrus.386.c"
		name = socrus.386.c
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
		RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		RUS_RKP_relation = yes
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = 2 }
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
	}
}

			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { is_in_coalition_with_radical_socialist = no }
			set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:radical_socialist }
			add_to_coalition = yes
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 5 }
		RUS_PSR_relation = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = radical_socialist
				name = RUS_totalist6_party
				long_name = RUS_totalist6_party_long
			}
		}
	}

country_event = { #Devolution of State
	id = socrus.399
	title = socrus.399.t
	desc = socrus.399.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_maksimov
	trigger = {
		RUS_grigory_maksimov = { is_second_in_command = yes }
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.399 option socrus.399.a"
		name = socrus.399.a
		add_popularity = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = 0.05 }
		add_country_leader_role = {
			character = RUS_grigory_maksimov
			country_leader = {
				desc = RUS_grigory_maksimov_sic_desc
				ideology = syndicalist_subtype
				traits = { KR_syndicalist_visionary_sic }
			}
			promote_leader = yes
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_isaak_steinberg_sic
		set_cosmetic_tag = RUS_confederation
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_confederation_tt
		RUS_streamline_VST = yes
		if = {
			limit = { has_completed_focus = RUS_expansion_of_union }
			every_other_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_in_europe = yes
						tag = SRI
						tag = SWF
						tag = WLS
						tag = SCO
					}
				}
				add_to_array = { array = ROOT.RUS_SSTR_tags value = THIS }
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Association for Research of Western Totalism
	id = socrus.403
	title = socrus.403.t
	desc = socrus.403.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_gronsky2

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = socrus.404 days = 265 random_days = 100 }
		}
	}

	option = { #Allow them
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.403 option socrus.403.a"
		name = socrus.403.a
		trigger = {
			RUS_fyodor_dan = { is_second_in_command = no }
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
		RUS_VST_Right_relation = yes
		RUS_VST_Centre_relation = yes
		RUS_increase_VST_left_radicalism = yes
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = totalist
			popularity = 0.05
		}
	}

	option = { #Ban them
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.403 option socrus.403.b"
		name = socrus.403.b
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				RUS_lev_kamenev = { is_second_in_command = no }
				RUS_grigory_zinovyev = { is_second_in_command = no }
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
		RUS_VST_Left_relation = yes
		RUS_RKP_relation = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
		RUS_VST_Centre_relation = yes
		RUS_VST_Right_relation = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #In Defence of Totalism
	id = socrus.404
	title = socrus.404.t
	desc = socrus.404.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_zinovyev

	option = { #Reprimand him
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.404 option socrus.404.a"
		name = socrus.404.a
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
		RUS_VST_Left_relation = yes
		RUS_RKP_relation = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
		RUS_VST_Right_relation = yes
		RUS_SDS_relation = yes
		RUS_decrease_VST_left_radicalism = yes
	}

	option = { #Praise him
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.404 option socrus.404.b"
		name = socrus.404.b
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
		RUS_VST_Right_relation = yes
		RUS_SDS_relation = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
		RUS_VST_centre_relation = yes
		RUS_VST_Left_relation = yes
		RUS_RKP_relation = yes
		RUS_increase_VST_left_radicalism = yes
	}
}

		set_faction_name = kharkiv_accords

		set_faction_name = riga_accords

country_event = { #Collapse of Government
	id = socrus.430
	title = socrus.430.t
	desc = socrus.430.d
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.430 option socrus.430.a"
		name = socrus.430.a
		RUS_aleksandr_vasilevsky = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype }
				promote_character = { ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype }
			}
			else = {
				add_country_leader_role = {
					country_leader = {
						desc = RUS_aleksandr_vasilevsky_leader_desc
						ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype
					}
					promote_leader = yes
				}
			}
			add_unit_leader_trait = politically_connected
			add_max_trait = 1
			add_planning = 1
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = paternal_autocrat
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = -0.3 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = radical_socialist popularity = -0.3 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = totalist popularity = -0.3 }
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_in_faction_with = INT
					any_allied_country = {
						is_major = yes
						has_capitulated = no
						num_of_owned_factories > 50
					}
				}
				leave_faction = yes
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = { is_faction_leader = yes }
				dismantle_faction = yes
			}
			if = { #Triggered by RSA tree
				limit = {
					var:219.controller = {
						OR = {
							tag = RSA
							is_in_faction_with = RSA
						}
					}
				}
				country_event = { id = freerus.20 days = 1 } #Negotiations with Boldyrev
			}
		}
	}
}

#SocRus Foreign
country_event = { #The Eastern Front of the Internationale
	id = socrus.114
	title = socrus.114.t
	desc = socrus.114.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_Young_Pioneers

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.114 option socrus.114.a"
		name = socrus.114.a #Yes, let's join forces
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_government = totalist
				FROM = { any_owned_state = { is_claim_or_core_of_ROOT = yes } }
			}
		}
		leave_faction = yes
		set_global_flag = TEMPORARY_DISABLED_FACTION_POPUP
		var:FROM.faction_leader = { add_to_faction = ROOT }
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.114 option socrus.114.claims"
		name = socrus.114.claims #Yes, but for all of our claims
		trigger = {
			FROM = { any_owned_state = { is_claim_or_core_of_ROOT = yes } }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 1
				has_government = totalist
			}
		}
		FROM = { country_event = socrus.1150 }
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.114 option socrus.114.b"
		name = socrus.114.b #We'd rather stay with France
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
	}
}

country_event = { # An Invitation to the Internationale
	id = socrus.115
	title = socrus.115.t

	desc = {
		text = socrus.115.d.guaranteed
		trigger = { is_guaranteed_by = FROM }
	}
	desc = {
		text = socrus.115.d.invited
		trigger = {
			NOT = { is_guaranteed_by = FROM }
		}
	}

	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_Young_Pioneers

	trigger = {
		FROM = { is_in_faction = yes }
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.115 option socrus.115.a"
		name = socrus.115.a #Yes, let's join forces
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_government = totalist
				FROM = { any_owned_state = { is_claim_or_core_of_ROOT = yes } }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { FROM = { is_faction_leader = yes } }
			FROM = { add_to_faction = ROOT }
		}
		else = {
			var:FROM.faction_leader = { country_event = socrus.116 }
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.115 option socrus.115.claims"
		name = socrus.115.claims #Yes, but for all of our claims
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 1
				has_government = totalist
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			FROM = { any_owned_state = { is_claim_or_core_of_ROOT = yes } }
		}
		FROM = { country_event = socrus.1150 }
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.115 option socrus.115.b"
		name = socrus.115.b #We shouldn't provoke Germany...
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		FROM = { country_event = socrus.117 }
	}
}

country_event = { #Country wants their claims back
	id = socrus.1150
	title = socrus.1150.t
	desc = socrus.1150.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy1

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.1150 option socrus.1150.a"
		name = socrus.1150.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_government = totalist
			}
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			faction_leader = { add_to_faction = FROM }
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = { is_core_of = FROM }
				transfer_state_to = FROM
			}
			FROM = {
				every_core_state = {
					remove_claim_by = ROOT
					remove_core_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = { country_event = socrus.1151 }
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.1150 option socrus.1150.b"
		name = socrus.1150.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 1
				has_government = totalist
			}
		}
		FROM = { country_event = socrus.1152 }
	}
}

country_event = { #Russia accepts
	id = socrus.1151
	title = socrus.1151.t
	desc = socrus.1151.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy1

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.1151 option socrus.1151.a"
		name = socrus.1151.a
		leave_faction = yes
		set_global_flag = TEMPORARY_DISABLED_FACTION_POPUP
		FROM = {
			faction_leader = { add_to_faction = ROOT }
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = { is_core_of = ROOT }
				transfer_state_to = ROOT
			}
		}
		every_core_state = {
			remove_claim_by = FROM
			remove_core_of = FROM
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.1151 option socrus.1151.b"
		name = socrus.1151.b
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		var:FROM.faction_leader = { country_event = socrus.1153 }
	}
}

	desc = socrus.1152.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {

		add_political_power = -20
		effect_tooltip = {
			FROM = { faction_leader = { add_to_faction = ROOT } }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			FROM = { country_event = socrus.1154 }
		}
	}

		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.1152 option socrus.1152.b"
		name = socrus.1152.b
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }

		}

country_event = { # FROM Seeks Membership in the Internationale
	id = socrus.1153
	title = socrus.116.t

	desc = {
		text = socrus.116.d.guaranteed
		trigger = {
			FROM = { is_guaranteed_by = RUS }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = socrus.116.d.invited
		trigger = {
			FROM = { NOT = { is_guaranteed_by = RUS } }
		}
	}

	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_Young_Pioneers

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.1153 option socrus.116.a"
		name = socrus.116.a #Welcome, comrades
		add_to_faction = FROM
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS = {
				every_owned_state = {
					limit = { is_claim_or_core_of_FROM = yes }
					transfer_state_to = FROM
				}
			}
			FROM = {
				every_owned_state = {
					if = {
						limit = { is_claimed_by = RUS }
						remove_claim_by = RUS
					}
					if = {
						limit = { is_core_of = RUS }
						remove_core_of = RUS
					}
				}
				country_event = socrus.1180
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.1153 option socrus.116.b"
		name = socrus.116.b #No, we don't need them
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		FROM = { country_event = socrus.118 }
	}
}

country_event = { #RUS/INT offers to join the other side's wars
	id = socrus.121
	title = socrus.121.t
	desc = socrus.121.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.121 option socrus.121.a"
		name = socrus.121.a
		every_enemy_country = {
			limit = {
				has_offensive_war_with = ROOT
				NOT = { has_war_with = FROM }
			}
			FROM = {
				add_to_war = {
					targeted_alliance = ROOT
					enemy = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.121 option socrus.121.b"
		name = socrus.121.b
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
	}
}

	id = socrus.122
	title = socrus.122.t
	desc = socrus.122.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.122 option socrus.122.a"
		name = socrus.122.a
		FROM = {
			every_enemy_country = {
				limit = {
					has_offensive_war_with = FROM
					NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
				}
				ROOT = {
					add_to_war = {
						targeted_alliance = FROM
						enemy = PREV
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.122 option socrus.122.b"
		name = socrus.122.b
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
	}
}

country_event = { #Self-Determination Declaration
	id = socrus.410
	title = socrus.410.t
	desc = socrus.410.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { has_socialist_government = yes }

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.410 option socrus.410.a"
		name = socrus.410.a
		#### Fire event telling this for Ukraine and Belarus etc????
	}
}
country_event = { #The Union of Socialist Labour Republics
	id = socrus.411
	title = socrus.411.t
	desc = socrus.411.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy4
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = { has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_oskab_modifier } }
				remove_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_oskab_modifier }
				clr_state_flag = oskab_state
			}
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = { has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_CA_modifier } }
				remove_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_CA_modifier }
				clr_state_flag = alash_state
			}
			every_core_state = {
				limit = {
					is_owned_by = ROOT
					has_active_resistance = yes
				}
				force_enable_resistance = { occupier = RUS clear = yes }
			}
			589 = { #Semireche
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = CA_turkestan_victorious }
					remove_core_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.411 option socrus.411.a"
		name = socrus.411.a
		ai_chance = { base = 5 }
		add_stability = 0.1
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { BUK = { has_cosmetic_tag = TRK_RUS } } } #Puppeted united CA after Central Asia war
			set_autonomy = {
				target = KAZ
				autonomy_state = union_republic
			}
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					is_core_of = KAZ
					NOT = {
						state = 581 #Uralsk
						state = 583 #Petropavlovsk
						state = 588 #Pavlodar
					}
				}
				transfer_state_to = KAZ
				remove_core_of = RUS
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				KAZ = {
					drop_cosmetic_tag = yes
					set_country_flag = CA_able_to_repair #Unlocks postwar unification tree
					remove_ideas = {
						KAZ_ethnic_tensions_0
						KAZ_alash_militias_0
					}
					add_ideas = {
						central_asia_economic_destruction_start
						central_asia_disorganized_military_0
					}
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			787 = { remove_core_of = MNR } #Terek
		}
		release_puppet = MNR
		set_autonomy = {
			target = MNR
			autonomy_state = union_republic
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_nationalise_oil_completed } }
				MNR = {
					give_resource_rights = { state = 232 receiver = GER } #Dagestan
					give_resource_rights = { state = 961 receiver = GER } #Chechenya
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				BUK = { exists = no }
			}
			release_puppet = BUK
			set_autonomy = {
				target = BUK
				autonomy_state = union_republic
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				BUK = { is_subject_of = RUS }
			}
			BUK = { get_current_government_type = yes }
			set_autonomy = {
				target = BUK
				autonomy_state = union_republic
			}
			BUK = { restore_previous_government_type = yes }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				KHI = { exists = no }
			}
			release_puppet = KHI
			set_autonomy = {
				target = KHI
				autonomy_state = union_republic
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				KHI = { is_subject_of = RUS }
			}
			set_autonomy = {
				target = KHI
				autonomy_state = union_republic
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				TRK = { exists = no }
			}
			release_puppet = TRK
			set_autonomy = {
				target = TRK
				autonomy_state = union_republic
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				TRK = { is_subject_of = RUS }
			}
			set_autonomy = {
				target = TRK
				autonomy_state = union_republic
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.411 option socrus.411.b"
		name = socrus.411.b
		ai_chance = { base = 10 }
		#### Fire World News Event
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { BUK = { has_cosmetic_tag = TRK_RUS } } } #Puppeted united CA after Central Asia war
			set_autonomy = {
				target = KAZ
				autonomy_state = union_republic
			}
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					is_core_of = KAZ
					NOT = {
						state = 581 #Uralsk
						state = 583 #Petropavlovsk
						state = 588 #Pavlodar
					}
				}
				transfer_state_to = KAZ
				remove_core_of = RUS
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				KAZ = {
					drop_cosmetic_tag = yes
					set_country_flag = CA_able_to_repair #Unlocks postwar unification tree
					remove_ideas = {
						KAZ_ethnic_tensions_0
						KAZ_alash_militias_0
					}
					add_ideas = {
						central_asia_economic_destruction_start
						central_asia_disorganized_military_0
					}
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { every_subject_country = { drop_cosmetic_tag = yes } }
		if = {
			limit = {
				BUK = { exists = no }
			}
			release_puppet = BUK
			set_autonomy = {
				target = BUK
				autonomy_state = union_republic
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				BUK = { is_subject_of = RUS }
			}
			BUK = { get_current_government_type = yes }
			set_autonomy = {
				target = BUK
				autonomy_state = union_republic
			}
			BUK = { restore_previous_government_type = yes }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				KHI = { exists = no }
			}
			release_puppet = KHI
			set_autonomy = {
				target = KHI
				autonomy_state = union_republic
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				KHI = { is_subject_of = RUS }
			}
			set_autonomy = {
				target = KHI
				autonomy_state = union_republic
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				TRK = { exists = no }
			}
			release_puppet = TRK
			set_autonomy = {
				target = TRK
				autonomy_state = union_republic
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				TRK = { is_subject_of = RUS }
			}
			set_autonomy = {
				target = TRK
				autonomy_state = union_republic
			}
		}
	}
}
