country_event = { #Cooperation with Borotbysts
	id = socrus.413
	title = socrus.413.t
	desc = socrus.413.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_oleksandr_shumskyi

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.413 option socrus.413.a"
		name = socrus.413.a
		set_country_flag = UKR_borotbyst_help_large
		add_political_power = -100
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_cooperate_with_borotbyst_tt
		effect_tooltip = {
			UKR = {
				add_timed_idea = {
					idea = RUS_UKR_borotbyst_sabotage_large
					days = 500
				}
			}
			add_intel = {
				target = UKR
				civilian_intel = 50
				army_intel = 50
				navy_intel = 50
				airforce_intel = 50
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.413 option socrus.413.b"
		name = socrus.413.b
		set_country_flag = UKR_borotbyst_help_medium
		add_political_power = -50
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_cooperate_with_borotbyst_tt
		effect_tooltip = {
			UKR = {
				add_timed_idea = {
					idea = RUS_UKR_borotbyst_sabotage_medium
					days = 500
				}
			}
			add_intel = {
				target = UKR
				civilian_intel = 50
				army_intel = 50
				navy_intel = 50
				airforce_intel = 50
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.413 option socrus.413.c"
		name = socrus.413.c
		set_country_flag = UKR_borotbyst_help_small
		add_political_power = -25
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_cooperate_with_borotbyst_tt
		UKR = {
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_UKR_borotbyst_sabotage_medium
				days = 500
			}
		}
	}
}

	id = socrus.414
	title = socrus.414.t
	desc = socrus.414.d

	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_oleksandr_shumskyi

		name = socrus.414.a

			limit = {
				RUS = { has_country_flag = UKR_borotbyst_help_large }
			}
			RUS = {
				add_intel = {
					target = UKR
					civilian_intel = 50
					army_intel = 50
					navy_intel = 50
					airforce_intel = 50
				}
			}
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_UKR_borotbyst_sabotage_large
				days = 500
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = { has_country_flag = UKR_borotbyst_help_medium }
			}
			RUS = {
				add_intel = {
					target = UKR
					civilian_intel = 50
					army_intel = 50
					navy_intel = 50
					airforce_intel = 50
				}
			}
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_UKR_borotbyst_sabotage_medium
				days = 500
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = { has_country_flag = UKR_borotbyst_help_small }
			}
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_UKR_borotbyst_sabotage_medium
				days = 500
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #POL socialist uprising guaranteed
	id = socrus.415
	title = socrus.415.t
	desc = socrus.415.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			is_in_faction_with = GER
			is_in_faction_with = AUS
		}
		UKR = {
			OR = {
				has_capitulated = yes
				is_in_faction_with = RUS
			}
		}
		BLR = {
			OR = {
				has_capitulated = yes
				is_in_faction_with = RUS
			}
		}
		BAT = { has_capitulated = yes }
		has_war_with = RUS
	}

	option = { #Based
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event socrus.415 option socrus.415.a"
		name = socrus.415.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_active_mission = POL_syndicalist_threat }
			}
			activate_mission = POL_syndicalist_threat
		}
		set_country_flag = POL_socialist_uprising_guaranteed
		set_temp_variable = { POL_influence_change = 100 }
		POL_add_syndicalist_influence = yes
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		custom_effect_tooltip = socrus.415.a.tt
	}
}

		add_one_random_civilian_factory = yes
	}

### Boldyrev's Free Russia Events ###

country_event = { #An Opportunity for Germany
	id = freerus.2
	title = freerus.2.t
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_boldyrev
	desc = freerus.2.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		RUS = {
			OR = {
				has_government = national_populist
				has_socialist_government = yes
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event freerus.2 option freerus.2.a"
		name = freerus.2.a
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_enables_boldyrev_tt
		set_global_flag = RSA_enabled
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS = { country_event = freerus.3 } #Boldyrev in Berlin
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event freerus.2 option freerus.2.b"
		name = freerus.2.b
		trigger = { is_ai = no }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_disables_boldyrev_tt
		add_manpower = 12500
	}
}

country_event = { #Boldyrev Issues Liberation Manifesto
	id = freerus.3
	title = freerus.3.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS_savinkov = yes }
		text = freerus.3.d.szrs
	}

		trigger = { has_socialist_government = yes }
		text = freerus.3.d.soc
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_boldyrev
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		is_subject = no
		OR = {
			has_government = national_populist
			has_socialist_government = yes
		}
		has_global_flag = RSA_enabled
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event freerus.3 option freerus.3.a"
		name = freerus.3.a
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_RSA_spawn_tt
	}

country_event = { #Boldyrev's Trial
	id = freerus.5
	title = freerus.5.t
	desc = freerus.5.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_trial_2
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			MNR = { MNR_sultan_klych_girey = { set_nationality = MNR } } #In case he was moved to RSA by rsa.10
			RSA = {
				every_character = {
					limit = {
						is_unit_leader = yes
					}
					set_character_flag = RUS_RSA_general
					set_nationality = RUS
					demote_leader = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event freerus.5 option freerus.5.a"
		name = freerus.5.a #No Mercy for traitors! Execute them all!
		RUS_vasily_boldyrev = { kill_character = yes }
		every_character = {
			limit = {
				has_character_flag = RUS_RSA_general
				NOT = { is_character = RUS_vasily_boldyrev }
			}
			kill_character = yes
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST_left = no }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
			RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = -1 }
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
		else = {
			set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = 4 }
			change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event freerus.5 option freerus.5.b"
		name = freerus.5.b
		retire_character = RUS_vasily_boldyrev
		custom_effect_tooltip = available_general
		show_unit_leaders_tooltip = RUS_vladimir_potapenko
		show_unit_leaders_tooltip = RUS_leonid_kotelnikov
		show_unit_leaders_tooltip = RUS_dmitry_lelyushenko
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		add_political_power = -40
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_savinkov = yes }
			add_power_balance_value = {
				id = RUS_power_balance
				value = -0.05
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST_right = no }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
			RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			every_character = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						is_character = RUS_vladimir_potapenko
						is_character = RUS_leonid_kotelnikov
						is_character = RUS_dmitry_lelyushenko
					}
					has_character_flag = RUS_RSA_general
				}
				retire = yes
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event freerus.5 option freerus.5.c"
		name = freerus.5.c
		retire_character = RUS_vasily_boldyrev
		every_character = {
			limit = {
				has_character_flag = RUS_RSA_general
				NOT = { is_character = RUS_vasily_boldyrev }
			}
			retire = yes
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		add_political_power = -20
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_savinkov = yes }
			add_power_balance_value = {
				id = RUS_power_balance
				value = -0.05
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST_right = no }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
			RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Boldyrev activated by Germany
	id = freerus.10
	title = freerus.10.t
	desc = freerus.10.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_boldyrev
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_socialist_government = yes
			has_government = national_populist
		}
		has_global_flag = RSA_enabled
	}
	immediate = {
		RSA = {
			hidden_effect = {
				RUS = { transfer_technology = yes }
				RSA_setup_boldyrev = yes
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					is_ai = no
					has_war_with = RUS
					OR = {
						tag = GER
						tag = GEO
						tag = AZR
						tag = FIN
						has_autonomy_state = oststaat
						has_autonomy_state = oststaat_autonomous
						AND = {
							tag = UKR
							is_in_faction_with = AUS
						}
					}
				}
				country_event = freerus.11
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event freerus.10 option freerus.10.a"
		name = freerus.10.a #Boldyrev is a traitor to Russia!
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event freerus.10 option freerus.10.b"
		name = freerus.10.b #Boldyrev is a goddamn hero
		trigger = { is_ai = no }
		RSA = {
			change_tag_from = ROOT
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Negotiate with Boldyrev?
	id = freerus.20
	title = freerus.20.t
	desc = freerus.20.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_boldyrev
	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		is_subject = no
		NOT = { controls_state = 219 } #Moscow
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event freerus.20 option freerus.20.a"
		name = freerus.20.a #Put end to this war...
		ai_chance = { base = 10 }
		RSA = { country_event = freerus.21 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event freerus.20 option freerus.20.b"
		name = freerus.20.b #Never!
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		#continue the war
		RSA = { country_event = freerus.22 }
	}
}

country_event = { #For Boldyrev: Unification proposed
	id = freerus.21
	title = freerus.21.t
	desc = freerus.21.d
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event freerus.21 option freerus.21.a"
		name = freerus.21.a
		GER = {
			if = {
				limit = { RUS = { has_government = national_populist } }
				RUS = { country_event = russia.918 } #Death of Savinkov
			}
			else = {
				country_event = rusfor.1300
			}
		}
	}
}

unit_leader_event = { #Restoration of 1922 Constitution
	id = freerus.40
	title = freerus.40.t
	desc = freerus.40.d
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event freerus.40 option freerus.40.a"
		name = freerus.40.a
		set_stability = 0
		hidden_effect = { add_research_slot_until_five = yes }
		complete_national_focus = RUS_democracy_restored
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_confidence_votes_law
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_electoral_threshold_law
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_defensive_democracy_law
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_judicial_review_law
		set_country_flag = RUS_confidence_votes_law
		set_country_flag = RUS_electoral_threshold_law
		set_country_flag = RUS_judicial_review_law
		set_country_flag = RUS_defensive_democracy_law
		country_event = { id = freerus.41 days = 5 }
	}
}

country_event = { #Boldyrevites found their party
	id = freerus.42
	title = {
		trigger = { has_global_flag = RUS_socrus_happened }
		text = freerus.42.t.nat
	}
	title = {
		trigger = { NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_socrus_happened } }
		text = freerus.42.t.dem
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_global_flag = RUS_socrus_happened }
		text = freerus.42.d.nat
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_socrus_happened } }
		text = freerus.42.d.dem
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = RUS_socrus_happened }
				country_event = { id = freerus.43 days = 7 }
				RUS_vasily_boldyrev = {
					add_country_leader_role = {
						country_leader = {
							desc = RUS_vasily_boldyrev_leader_desc
							ideology = market_liberal_subtype
							traits = { RUS_marshal_of_old_republic }
						}
						promote_leader = yes
					}
					add_country_leader_role = {
						country_leader = {
							desc = RUS_vasily_boldyrev_leader_desc
							ideology = social_conservative_subtype
							traits = { RUS_marshal_of_old_republic }
						}
						promote_leader = yes
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				country_event = { id = freerus.44 days = 7 }
				RUS_vasily_boldyrev = {
					add_country_leader_role = {
						country_leader = {
							desc = RUS_vasily_boldyrev_leader_desc
							ideology = social_liberal_subtype
							traits = { RUS_marshal_of_old_republic }
						}
						promote_leader = yes
					}
					add_country_leader_role = {
						country_leader = {
							desc = RUS_vasily_boldyrev_leader_desc
							ideology = social_democrat_subtype
							traits = { RUS_marshal_of_old_republic }
						}
						promote_leader = yes
					}
				}
			}
			GER = { country_event = { id = freerus.46 days = 10 } }
			country_event = { id = freerus.45 days = 40 } #First Elections of Free Russia
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event freerus.42 option freerus.42.a"
		name = freerus.42.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RSA_path option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RSA_path option = RSA_PATH_SOCLIB } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RSA_path option = RSA_PATH_MARLIB } }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = RUS_socrus_happened }
			set_country_flag = RUS_marlib_boldyrev
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_marlib_boldyrev_tt
			add_popularity = { ideology = market_liberal popularity = 0.15 }
			add_popularity = { ideology = social_conservative popularity = 0.05 }
			effect_tooltip = {
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = market_liberal
					name = RSA_market_liberal2_party
					long_name = RSA_market_liberal2_party_long_tt
				}
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = social_conservative
					name = RSA_market_liberal2_party
					long_name = RSA_market_liberal2_party_long_tt
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = market_liberal
					name = RSA_market_liberal2_party
					long_name = RSA_market_liberal2_party_long
				}
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = social_conservative
					name = RSA_market_liberal2_party
					long_name = RSA_market_liberal2_party_long
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			set_country_flag = RUS_soclib_boldyrev
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_soclib_boldyrev_tt
			add_popularity = { ideology = social_liberal popularity = 0.15 }
			add_popularity = { ideology = social_democrat popularity = 0.05 }
			effect_tooltip = {
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = social_liberal
					name = RSA_social_liberal2_party
					long_name = RSA_social_liberal2_party_long_tt
				}
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = social_democrat
					name = RSA_social_liberal2_party
					long_name = RSA_social_liberal2_party_long_tt
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = social_liberal
					name = RSA_social_liberal2_party
					long_name = RSA_social_liberal2_party_long
				}
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = social_democrat
					name = RSA_social_liberal2_party
					long_name = RSA_social_liberal2_party_long
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event freerus.42 option freerus.42.b"
		name = freerus.42.b
		trigger = { NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_socrus_happened } }
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 6
				GER = { has_government = social_democrat }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RSA_path option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RSA_path option = RSA_PATH_SOCDEM } }
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_socdem_boldyrev
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_socdem_boldyrev_tt
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_democrat popularity = 0.15 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_liberal popularity = 0.05 }
		effect_tooltip = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = social_democrat
				name = RSA_social_liberal2_party
				long_name = RSA_social_liberal2_party_long_tt
			}
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = social_liberal
				name = RSA_social_liberal2_party
				long_name = RSA_social_liberal2_party_long_tt
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = social_democrat
				name = RSA_social_liberal2_party
				long_name = RSA_social_liberal2_party_long
			}
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = social_liberal
				name = RSA_social_liberal2_party
				long_name = RSA_social_liberal2_party_long
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event freerus.42 option freerus.42.c"
		name = freerus.42.c
		trigger = { has_global_flag = RUS_socrus_happened }
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				GER = { has_authoritarian_government = yes }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RSA_path option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RSA_path option = RSA_PATH_SOCCON } }
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_soccon_boldyrev
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_soccon_boldyrev_tt
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_conservative popularity = 0.15 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = market_liberal popularity = 0.05 }
		effect_tooltip = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = social_conservative
				name = RSA_market_liberal2_party
				long_name = RSA_market_liberal2_party_long_tt
			}
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = market_liberal
				name = RSA_market_liberal2_party
				long_name = RSA_market_liberal2_party_long_tt
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = social_conservative
				name = RSA_market_liberal2_party
				long_name = RSA_market_liberal2_party_long
			}
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = market_liberal
				name = RSA_market_liberal2_party
				long_name = RSA_market_liberal2_party_long
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Elections
	id = freerus.45
	title = freerus.45.t
	desc = freerus.45.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { RUS_boldyrev = yes }
	immediate = {
		set_country_flag = RUS_had_first_election
		hidden_effect = {
			complete_national_focus = RUS_elections
			country_event = { id = freerus.47 days = 14 }
			### Add news event
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event freerus.45 option freerus.45.a"
		name = freerus.45.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 75
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = { rule = RSA_path option = DEFAULT }
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = GER_supports_opposition
					has_country_flag = GER_supports_monarchy
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = { rule = RSA_path option = RSA_PATH_OPPOSITION }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_socdem_boldyrev }
			RUS_vasily_boldyrev = { promote_character = { ideology = social_democrat_subtype } }
			meta_effect = {
				text = {
					set_politics = {
						ruling_party = social_democrat
						last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
						election_frequency = 60
						elections_allowed = yes
					}
				}
				CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
			}
			set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:social_liberal }
			add_to_coalition = yes
			set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:radical_socialist }
			add_to_coalition = yes
			add_advisor_role = {
				character = RUS_gergard_zeller
				activate = yes
				advisor = {
					slot = second_in_command
					idea_token = RUS_gergard_zeller_sic
					desc = RUS_gergard_zeller_advisor_desc
					traits = { KR_determined_democrat }
					can_be_fired = no
				}
			}
			activate_advisor = RUS_aleksandr_verkhovsky_army_chief
			complete_national_focus = RUS_socdems
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_soclib_boldyrev }
			RUS_vasily_boldyrev = { promote_character = { ideology = social_liberal_subtype } }
			meta_effect = {
				text = {
					set_politics = {
						ruling_party = social_liberal
						last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
						election_frequency = 60
						elections_allowed = yes
					}
				}
				CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
			}
			set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:social_democrat }
			add_to_coalition = yes
			set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:market_liberal }
			add_to_coalition = yes
			activate_advisor = RUS_nikolay_martyanov_sic
			activate_advisor = RUS_aleksandr_verkhovsky_army_chief
			complete_national_focus = RUS_soclibs
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_marlib_boldyrev }
			RUS_vasily_boldyrev = { promote_character = { ideology = market_liberal_subtype } }
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = market_liberal
				elections_allowed = yes
				election_frequency = 60
			}
			set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:social_liberal }
			add_to_coalition = yes
			set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:social_conservative }
			add_to_coalition = yes
			activate_advisor = RUS_nikolay_nekrasov_sic
			activate_advisor = RUS_aleksandr_verkhovsky_army_chief
			complete_national_focus = RUS_marlibs
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_soccon_boldyrev }
			RUS_vasily_boldyrev = { promote_character = { ideology = social_conservative_subtype } }
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = social_conservative
				elections_allowed = yes
				election_frequency = 60
			}
			set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:market_liberal }
			add_to_coalition = yes
			set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:paternal_autocrat }
			add_to_coalition = yes
			activate_advisor = RUS_georgy_vernadsky_sic
			activate_advisor = RUS_aleksandr_verkhovsky_army_chief
			complete_national_focus = RUS_soccons
		}
		RUS_increase_democracy = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_vasily_boldyrev = {
				set_portraits = {
					civilian = {
						large = GFX_portrait_RUS_vasily_boldyrev_civilian_large
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event freerus.45 option freerus.45.b"
		name = freerus.45.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 25
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = { rule = RSA_path option = DEFAULT }
				has_country_flag = GER_supports_boldyrev
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RSA_path option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = RSA_path option = RSA_PATH_OPPOSITION } }
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_disables_boldyrev_ai_tt
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		### Warning: DISABLES BOLDYREV CONTENT, AI option
		hidden_effect = { RUS_setup_postwar_parties = yes }
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = GER_supports_monarchy }
			RUS_create_vladimir = yes
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { has_cosmetic_tag = RUS_empire } }
				drop_cosmetic_tag = yes
				set_cosmetic_tag = RUS_empire
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { has_idea = RUS_imperial_popularity_1 } }
				add_ideas = RUS_imperial_popularity_1
			}
			RUS_create_postwar_monarchy = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_socrus_happened } #Liberal opposition victory
				GER = { has_government = social_democrat }
			}
			RUS_create_postwar_soclib = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_socrus_happened } #Liberal opposition victory
				GER = { NOT = { has_government = social_democrat } }
			}
			RUS_create_postwar_marlib = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = RUS_socrus_happened #Conservative opposition victory
			}
			RUS_create_postwar_soccon = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Recreate Autonomies
	id = freerus.47
	title = freerus.47.t
	desc = freerus.47.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		any_owned_state = { is_core_of = MNR }
		NOT = { country_exists = MNR }
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event freerus.47 option freerus.47.a"
		name = freerus.47.a
		add_stability = 0.05
		### Create Caucasus Autonomy
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					state = 233
					state = 961
					state = 232
					state = 787
				}
				NOT = {
					has_state_flag = north_caucasus_state
					has_state_flag = kalmyk_state
					has_state_flag = kabard_state
					has_state_flag = chechen_state
				}
				is_owned_by = RSA
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_state_flag = oskab_state }
				remove_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_oskab_modifier }
				clr_state_flag = oskab_state
			}
			add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_oskab_modifier_autonomy }
			set_state_flag = north_caucasus_state
		}
		### Restore Alash Autonomy
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { country_exists = KAZ } }
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						state = 402
						state = 404
						state = 587
						state = 590
						state = 810
						state = 880
					}
					is_owned_by = RSA
					NOT = { has_state_flag = alash_state }
				}
				set_state_flag = alash_state
				add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_CA_modifier }
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Our new bloc
	id = freerus.51
	title = freerus.51.t
	desc = freerus.51.d
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event freerus.51 option freerus.51.a"
		name = freerus.51.a
		add_threat = 10
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					OR = {
						tag = ENT
						tag = JAP
					}
					is_faction_leader = yes
				}
			}
			FROM = { add_to_faction = ROOT }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { FROM = { owns_state = 361 } } #Washington DC
			var:361.owner = {
				create_faction = north_pacific_agreement
				add_to_faction = ROOT
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_from_tech_sharing_group = german_research
			remove_from_tech_sharing_group = russian_research
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Korpus Polski w Rosji
	id = rusfor.1
	title = rusfor.1.t
	desc = rusfor.1.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_intro
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_socialist_government = no
		has_country_flag = RUS_korpus_polski
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.1 option rusfor.1.a"
		name = rusfor.1.a
		division_template = {
			name = "Korpus Polski w Rosji"
			division_names_group = RUS_INF_01
			regiments = {
				infantry = { x = 0 y = 0 }
				infantry = { x = 0 y = 1 }
				infantry = { x = 0 y = 2 }
				infantry = { x = 0 y = 3 }
				infantry = { x = 1 y = 0 }
				infantry = { x = 1 y = 1 }
				infantry = { x = 1 y = 2 }
				infantry = { x = 1 y = 3 }
				artillery_brigade = { x = 2 y = 0 }
				medium_armor = { x = 3 y = 0 }
				medium_armor = { x = 3 y = 1 }
			}
			support = {
				mot_recon = { x = 0 y = 0 }
				engineer = { x = 0 y = 1 }
				signal_company = { x = 0 y = 2 }
			}
		}
		random_owned_controlled_state = {
			prioritize = { 219 }
			limit = { valid_state_for_spawning_friendly_unit = yes }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_korpus_polski_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				create_unit = {
					division = "name = \"I Korpus Polski w Rosji\" division_template = \"Korpus Polski w Rosji\" start_experience_factor = 0.4 start_equipment_factor = 1"
					owner = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_korpus_polski
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.1 option rusfor.1.b"
		name = rusfor.1.b
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		add_manpower = 7500
	}
}

		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.9 option rusfor.8.a"
		name = rusfor.8.a

			division_template = {
				name = "Cuerpo de Voluntarios Ruso"
				division_names_group = RUS_CAV_01
				regiments = {
					cavalry = { x = 0 y = 0 }

					cavalry = { x = 0 y = 3 }
					cavalry = { x = 1 y = 0 }
					cavalry = { x = 1 y = 1 }
					cavalry = { x = 1 y = 2 }
					cavalry = { x = 1 y = 3 }
				}
				support = {
					assault_battalion = { x = 0 y = 0 }
					artillery = { x = 0 y = 1 }
					engineer = { x = 0 y = 2 }
				}
			}
		}
		add_manpower = 55000
		if = {
			limit = { RUS = { has_government = national_populist } }
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = infantry_equipment
				amount = 600
			}
			capital_scope = {
				create_unit = {
					division = "name = \"Cuerpo de Voluntarios Ruso\" division_template = \"Cuerpo de Voluntarios Ruso\" start_experience_factor = 0.7"
					owner = ROOT
				}
			}
			add_popularity = { ideology = national_populist popularity = 0.04 }
		}
		else = {
			capital_scope = {
				create_unit = {
					division = "name = \"Cuerpo de Voluntarios Ruso\" division_template = \"Cuerpo de Voluntarios Ruso\" start_experience_factor = 0.5"
					owner = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}

			21 = { #Marseille
				add_building_construction = {
					type = land_facility

					instant_build = yes
					province = 11834 #Marseille

				category = armor

		}
		else = {

				category = armor
			}
		}
	}

country_event = { #Russia requests Military Access
	id = rusfor.12
	title = rusfor.12.t
	desc = rusfor.12.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Sure
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.12 option rusfor.12.a"
		name = rusfor.12.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				THIS = { tag = FIN }
				has_government = national_populist
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				OR = {
					has_right_democratic_government = yes
					has_authoritarian_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
		RUS = {
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = PREV
				relation = military_access
				active = yes
			}
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = PREV
				relation = docking_rights
				active = yes
			}
			give_guarantee = PREV
			add_opinion_modifier = {
				target = PREV
				modifier = KR_approves_of_govt
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = rusfor.13 days = 3 random_days = 3 } }
		}
		diplomatic_relation = {
			country = RUS
			relation = non_aggression_pact
			active = yes
		}
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = RUS
			modifier = KR_approves_of_govt
		}
		if = {
			limit = { country_exists = INT }
			every_other_country = {
				limit = { is_in_faction_with = INT }
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					target = ROOT
					modifier = KR_disapproves_of_govt
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { #Nope
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.12 option rusfor.12.b"
		name = rusfor.12.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_left_democratic_government = yes
				RUS = { has_left_democratic_government = no }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				tag = SCA
			}
		}
		RUS = {
			add_opinion_modifier = {
				target = PREV
				modifier = KR_disapproves_of_govt
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = rusfor.14 days = 3 random_days = 3 } }
		}
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = RUS
			modifier = KR_disapproves_of_govt
		}
	}
}

### Finnish Border Clash ###

country_event = { #Testing the Eagle
	id = rusfor.21
	title = rusfor.21.t
	desc = rusfor.21.d
	trigger = {
		RUS_savinkov = yes
		FIN = { is_in_faction_with = GER }
		NOT = {
			OR = {
				has_war_with = FIN
				FIN = { exists = no }
			}
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.21 option rusfor.21.a"
		name = rusfor.21.a #Make the necessary preparations
		add_political_power = -15
		activate_mission = RUS_FIN_clash
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.21 option rusfor.21.b"
		name = rusfor.21.b #Sounds pointless
	}
}

	desc = rusfor.22.d

		set_border_war_data = {
			attacker = 216
			defender = 146
			attacker_modifier = 0.1
		}
	}
}

### Pressure Finland ###
country_event = { #Demands to Finland
	id = rusfor.30
	title = rusfor.30.t
	desc = rusfor.30.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_finland
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		FIN = {
			owns_state = 146
			NOT = { has_war_with = RUS }
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.30 option rusfor.30.a"
		name = rusfor.30.a #Pro-Russian neutrality
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = FIN_forpol option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = FIN_forpol option = FIN_FORPOL_NEUT } }
				has_left_democratic_government = no
				NOT = { FIN = { is_ally_with = INT } }
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_demanded_treaty
		hidden_effect = {
			FIN = { country_event = { id = rusfor.31 days = 14 } }
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.30 option rusfor.30.b"
		name = rusfor.30.b #Territorial concessions
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_left_democratic_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				FIN = { is_ally_with = INT }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				FIN = { is_ally_with = SWE }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				var:146.owner = { tag = SCA }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = { rule = FIN_forpol option = FIN_FORPOL_NEUT }
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_demanded_karelia
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_power_change = -5 }
		RUS_change_projection = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			FIN = { country_event = { id = rusfor.31 days = 14 } }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Russia's Demands #for FIN
	id = rusfor.31
	title = {
		trigger = { RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_treaty } }
		text = rusfor.31.t.yya
	}
	title = {
		trigger = { RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_karelia } }
		text = rusfor.31.t.karelia
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_treaty } }
		text = rusfor.31.d.yya
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_karelia } }
		text = rusfor.31.d.karelia
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_finland
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.31 option rusfor.31.a"
		name = rusfor.31.a #If they want a fight, they'll get it!
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_karelia }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_war = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_treaty }
				has_game_rule = { rule = FIN_forpol option = FIN_FORPOL_NEUT }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = { rule = FIN_forpol option = FIN_FORPOL_GER }
			}
		}
		add_war_support = 0.15
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_will_declare_war_on_ROOT
		RUS = {
			country_event = { id = rusfor.39 days = 3 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.31 option rusfor.31.b"
		name = rusfor.31.b #Appeal to Germany for diplomatic help
		trigger = {
			has_socialist_government = no
			GER = {
				exists = yes
				has_variable = RUS.RUS_german_economic_influence
				NOT = {
					has_war_with = FIN
					has_war_with = RUS
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_karelia }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_treaty }
				has_game_rule = { rule = FIN_forpol option = FIN_FORPOL_NEUT }
			}
		}
		GER = { country_event = rusfor.34 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.31 option rusfor.31.c"
		name = rusfor.31.c #Accept the demands
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_karelia }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = FIN_forpol option = FIN_FORPOL_GER } }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 20
				RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_treaty }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				has_war = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_treaty } }
			set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -5 }
			change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
			RUS = { country_event = { id = rusfor.32 days = 1 } }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_karelia } }
			set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -10 }
			change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
			effect_tooltip = { 146 = { transfer_state_to = RUS } }
			RUS = { country_event = { id = rusfor.33 days = 1 } }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Friendship treaty with Russia
	id = rusfor.32
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_finland
	title = rusfor.32.t
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.32.d.finland
		trigger = { tag = FIN }
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.32.d.russia
		trigger = { tag = RUS }
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.32 option rusfor.32.a"
		name = rusfor.32.a #Could have been worse
		trigger = { tag = FIN }
		set_country_flag = FIN_YYA #for future use
		effect_tooltip = {
			RUS = { give_guarantee = FIN }
			give_military_access = ROOT
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = ROOT
				relation = docking_rights
				active = yes
			}
			add_ideas = RUS_FIN_neutrality
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.32 option rusfor.32.b"
		name = rusfor.32.b #Welcome back
		trigger = { tag = RUS }
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = 2 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		give_guarantee = FIN
		FIN = {
			give_military_access = ROOT
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = ROOT
				relation = docking_rights
				active = yes
			}
			add_ideas = RUS_FIN_neutrality
		}
		hidden_effect = { FIN = { country_event = rusfor.32 } }
	}
}

		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.33 option rusfor.33.a"
		name = rusfor.33.a
		146 = { #Vyborg
			transfer_state_to = ROOT
			add_claim_by = ROOT
			enable_state_integration_50_compliance = yes
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_power_change = 5 }
		RUS_change_projection = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_popular_anger = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			FIN = { country_event = rusfla.155 } #Flight of the Karelians
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Finland appeals for German help
	id = rusfor.34
	title = rusfor.34.t
	desc = rusfor.34.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_finland

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.34 option rusfor.34.a"
		name = rusfor.34.a #Make the offer
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				FIN = { is_monarchy = yes }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				check_variable = { RUS_german_economic_influence > 4 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				check_variable = { RUS_german_economic_influence > 5 }
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_germany_helped_finland
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_will_sacrifice_influence_FIN
		RUS = {
			country_event = { id = rusfor.36 days = 3 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.34 option rusfor.34.b"
		name = rusfor.34.b #No, they are on their own
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				check_variable = { RUS_german_economic_influence < 3 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				check_variable = { RUS_german_economic_influence < 2 }
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_germany_refused_finland
		FIN = {
			add_opinion_modifier = { target = ROOT modifier = KR_disapproves_of_govt }
			country_event = { id = rusfor.35 days = 3 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Germans refuse to help
	id = rusfor.35
	title = rusfor.35.t
	desc = rusfor.35.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy4

	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		owns_state = 146
		NOT = { has_war_with = RUS }
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.35 option rusfor.35.a"
		name = rusfor.35.a #Refuse the Russians anyway
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_karelia }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_war = yes
			}
		}
		add_war_support = 0.15
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_will_declare_war_on_ROOT
		RUS = {
			country_event = { id = rusfor.39 days = 3 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.35 option rusfor.35.b"
		name = rusfor.35.b #Give in and hand over Vyborg
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_karelia }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_treaty }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				has_war = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_treaty } }
			set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -5 }
			change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
			RUS = { country_event = { id = rusfor.32 days = 1 } }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_karelia } }
			set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -15 }
			change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
			effect_tooltip = { 146 = { transfer_state_to = RUS } }
			RUS = { country_event = { id = rusfor.33 days = 1 } }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Germans intervene in dispute
	id = rusfor.36
	title = rusfor.36.t
	desc = rusfor.36.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy4

	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		FIN = {
			owns_state = 146
			NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
		}
		GER = {
			exists = yes
			is_valid_peace_target = yes
			NOT = {
				has_war_with = FIN
				has_war_with = RUS
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.36 option rusfor.36.a"
		name = rusfor.36.a #We'll accept this compromise
		trigger = {
			has_variable = RUS.RUS_german_economic_influence
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				is_monarchy = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				check_variable = { RUS_popular_anger > 4 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				check_variable = { RUS_popular_anger > 5 }
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 25
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_influence_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_german_economic_influence = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_popular_anger = yes
		GER = { country_event = rusfor.37 }
		FIN = { country_event = rusfor.37 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.36 option rusfor.36.b"
		name = rusfor.36.b #Refuse and push the demand
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				check_variable = { RUS_popular_anger < 3 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				check_variable = { RUS_popular_anger < 2 }
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -25
		add_war_support = 0.05
		GER = { country_event = rusfor.38 }
		FIN = { country_event = rusfor.38 }
	}
}

country_event = { #Germany arranges compromise
	id = rusfor.37
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy3

	title = {
		text = rusfor.37.t.finland
		trigger = { tag = FIN }
	}
	title = {
		text = rusfor.37.t.germany
		trigger = { tag = GER }
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.37.d.finland
		trigger = { tag = FIN }
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.37.d.germany
		trigger = { tag = GER }
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.37 option rusfor.37.a"
		name = rusfor.37.a
		if = {
			limit = { tag = FIN }
			add_opinion_modifier = { target = GER modifier = KR_pleased }
			add_political_power = 25
		}
		else = {
			add_political_power = 25
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Russians refuse German compromise
	id = rusfor.38
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_conference1

	title = {
		text = rusfor.38.t.finland
		trigger = { tag = FIN }
	}
	title = {
		text = rusfor.38.t.germany
		trigger = { tag = GER }
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.38.d.finland
		trigger = { tag = FIN }
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.38.d.germany
		trigger = { tag = GER }
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.38 option rusfor.38.a"
		name = rusfor.38.a #Refuse the Russians anyway
		trigger = { tag = FIN }
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_karelia }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_war = yes
			}
		}
		add_war_support = 0.15
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_will_declare_war_on_ROOT
		RUS = {
			country_event = { id = rusfor.39 days = 3 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.38 option rusfor.38.b"
		name = rusfor.38.b #Give in to Russia's demands
		trigger = { tag = FIN }
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_karelia }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_treaty }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				has_war = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_treaty } }
			set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -5 }
			change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
			RUS = { country_event = { id = rusfor.32 days = 1 } }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_karelia } }
			set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -15 }
			change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
			effect_tooltip = { 146 = { transfer_state_to = RUS } }
			RUS = { country_event = { id = rusfor.33 days = 1 } }
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.38 option rusfor.38.c"
		name = rusfor.38.c #We expect no less from these warmongers
		trigger = { tag = GER }
		add_opinion_modifier = { target = RUS modifier = KR_disapproves_of_govt }
	}
}

country_event = { #Finland refuses demands
	id = rusfor.39
	title = rusfor.39.t
	desc = rusfor.39.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army_1
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.39 option rusfor.39.a"
		name = rusfor.39.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				FIN = { is_in_faction = no }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				any_enemy_country = { is_actual_major = yes }
			}
		}
		declare_war_on = {
			target = FIN
			type = take_claimed_state
			generator = { 146 }
		}
		activate_mission = RUS_defeat_finland
		hidden_effect = {
			add_ai_strategy = {
				type = prepare_for_war
				id = FIN
				value = -1000
			}
			FIN = {
				activate_mission = FIN_survive_russia
				add_ideas = FIN_war_for_survival
				add_ai_strategy = {
					type = prepare_for_war
					id = RUS
					value = -1000
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.39 option rusfor.39.b"
		name = rusfor.39.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 100
				FIN = { is_in_faction = no }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 100
				any_enemy_country = { is_actual_major = yes }
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Russians are winning
	id = rusfor.40
	title = rusfor.40.t
	desc = rusfor.40.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army2

	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		tag = FIN
		is_valid_peace_target = yes
		RUS = {
			has_war_with = ROOT
			is_valid_peace_target = yes
		}
		surrender_progress > 0.30
		if = {
			limit = { owns_state = 146 }
			NOT = { controls_state = 146 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = { surrender_progress > 0.20 }
			}
			surrender_progress > 0.40
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 1
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.40 option rusfor.40.a"
		name = rusfor.40.a #We have no choice
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				GER = { exists = no }
			}
		}
		RUS = { country_event = rusfor.41 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.40 option rusfor.40.b"
		name = rusfor.40.b #Never! We will fight to the last man!
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				GER = { exists = yes }
			}
		}
		add_war_support = -0.20
		add_stability = -0.10
	}
}

country_event = { #Finland sues for peace
	id = rusfor.41
	title = rusfor.41.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { GER = { exists = yes } }
		text = rusfor.41.d
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { GER = { exists = no } }
		text = rusfor.41.d2
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army2
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_war_with = FIN
		FIN = {
			exists = yes
			has_capitulated = no
			is_in_faction = no
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.41 option rusfor.41.a"
		name = rusfor.41.a #Accept their surrender
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				FIN = { is_ai = yes }
				GER = { exists = no }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { RUS_popular_anger > 1 } }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
			RUS_change_popular_anger = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { RUS_military_anger > 1 } }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
			RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_attack target = FIN }
			set_truce = { target = FIN days = 365 }
		}
		FIN = {
			effect_tooltip = {
				every_owned_state = {
					limit = { is_claim_or_core_of_ROOT = yes }
					ROOT = { transfer_state = PREV }
				}
			}
			country_event = rusfor.42
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.41 option rusfor.41.b"
		name = rusfor.41.b #Refuse - onwards to Helsinki!
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_variable = RUS.RUS_german_economic_influence
				GER = {
					is_faction_leader = yes
					NOT = {
						has_war_with = FIN
						has_war_with = ROOT
						has_country_flag = RUS_germany_refused_finland
						has_country_flag = RUS_germany_helped_finland
					}
				}
				GER = { exists = no }
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				RUS_savinkov = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				RUS_is_expansionist = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				FIN = { is_ai = no }
			}
		}
		FIN = { country_event = rusfor.43 }
	}
}

country_event = { #Russians agree to peace
	id = rusfor.42
	title = rusfor.42.t
	desc = rusfor.42.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy3

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.42 option rusfor.42.a"
		name = rusfor.42.a
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_claim_or_core_of_FROM = yes
					state = 146 #Karelia
				}
			}
			FROM = { transfer_state = PREV }
		}
		146 = { enable_state_integration_50_compliance = yes }
		effect_tooltip = { RUS = { white_peace_with_ROOT = yes } }
		hidden_effect = {
			every_enemy_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_ally_with = RUS
						is_ally_with = INT
					}
				}
				white_peace_with_ROOT = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_idea = FIN_war_for_survival }
				remove_ideas = FIN_war_for_survival
			}
			country_event = { id = rusfla.155 days = 10 } #Flight of the Karelians
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Finland is winning the war
	id = rusfor.48
	title = rusfor.48.t
	desc = rusfor.48.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army2

	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		is_valid_peace_target = yes
		FIN = {
			has_war_with = ROOT
			is_valid_peace_target = yes
			NOT = { surrender_progress > 0.40 }
			if = {
				limit = { owns_state = 146 }
				controls_state = 146
			}
		}
		surrender_progress > 0.10
		if = {
			limit = { owns_state = 195 }
			FIN = { controls_state = 195 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owns_state = 213 }
			FIN = { controls_state = 213 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owns_state = 215 }
			FIN = { controls_state = 215 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owns_state = 216 }
			FIN = { controls_state = 216 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owns_state = 722 }
			FIN = { controls_state = 722 }
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 1
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.48 option rusfor.48.a"
		name = rusfor.48.a
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -5 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		add_political_power = -150
		if = {
			limit = {
				146 = {
					is_owned_by = FIN
					is_claimed_by = RUS
				}
			}
			146 = { remove_claim_by = RUS }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { RUS_popular_anger > 0 } }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 2 }
			RUS_change_popular_anger = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { RUS_military_anger > 0 } }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 2 }
			RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		}
		FIN = { country_event = rusfor.49 }
		effect_tooltip = {
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_core_of = FIN
						is_claimed_by = FIN
						state = 146 #Viipuri
						state = 213 #Murmansk
						state = 215 #Kem
						state = 216 #Petrozavodsk
						state = 722 #Petsamo
					}
				}
				FIN = { transfer_state = PREV }
			}
		}
	}
}

			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.49.d.timeout
		trigger = {

		}
	}

				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_winter_war_timeout }
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 100
		RUS = {
			white_peace_with_ROOT = yes
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_core_of = ROOT
						is_claimed_by = ROOT
						state = 146 #Viipuri
						state = 213 #Murmansk
						state = 215 #Kem
						state = 216 #Petrozavodsk
						state = 722 #Petsamo
					}
				}
				FIN = { transfer_state = PREV }
			}
		}
	}
	option = {

			RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_winter_war_timeout }
		}

		RUS = {
			clr_country_flag = RUS_winter_war_timeout
			white_peace_with_ROOT = yes
		}
	}

country_event = { #Russia offers alliance to FIN
	id = rusfor.51
	title = rusfor.51.t
	desc = rusfor.51.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_FIN_parliament_house

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.51 option rusfor.51.a"
		name = rusfor.51.a #Agree
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 100
				OR = {
					AND = {
						FIN = { has_left_democratic_government = yes }
						RUS = {
							has_elected_government = yes
							is_monarchy = no
							NOT = { has_country_leader = { character = RUS_ivan_solonevich } }
						}
					}
					AND = {
						FIN = { has_completed_focus = FIN_mannerheims_ascendancy }
						RUS = {
							is_monarchy = yes
							RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = no }
						}
					}
				}
				SCA_nordic_council_available = no
				var:141.owner = { has_socialist_government = no } # Stockholm
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -30
		effect_tooltip = { RUS = { add_to_faction = FIN } }
		FROM = { country_event = { id = rusfor.71 hours = 8 } }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.51 option rusfor.51.b"
		name = rusfor.51.b #No
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					AND = {
						FIN = { has_left_democratic_government = yes }
						RUS = {
							has_elected_government = yes
							is_monarchy = no
							NOT = { has_country_leader = { character = RUS_ivan_solonevich } }
						}
					}
					AND = {
						FIN = { has_completed_focus = FIN_mannerheims_ascendancy }
						RUS = {
							is_monarchy = yes
							RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = no }
						}
					}
				}
				SCA_nordic_council_available = no
				var:141.owner = { has_socialist_government = no } # Stockholm
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = { id = rusfor.52 hours = 8 }
		}
	}
}

		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.54 option rusfor.54.a"
		name = rusfor.54.a
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -5 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		add_political_power = -100
		if = {
			limit = {
				329 = {
					is_owned_by = MON
					is_claimed_by = RUS
				}
			}
			329 = { remove_claim_by = RUS }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { RUS_popular_anger > 0 } }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
			RUS_change_popular_anger = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { RUS_military_anger > 0 } }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
			RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		}
		MON = { white_peace_with_ROOT = yes }
	}
}

country_event = { #Russian-Entente Alliance suggested for ENT
	id = rusfor.64
	title = rusfor.64.t
	desc = rusfor.64.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_CAN_commons2
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.64 option rusfor.64.a"
		name = rusfor.64.a
		ai_chance = { base = 100 }
		set_global_flag = RUS_ENT_merge
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_ENT_merge_tt
		FROM = { country_event = { id = rusfor.65 hours = 8 } } #Russian-Entente Alliance
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.64 option rusfor.64.a"
		name = rusfor.64.a
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		FROM = { country_event = { id = rusfor.75 hours = 8 } } #Country refuses
	}
}

country_event = { #Russian-Entente Alliance
	id = rusfor.65
	title = rusfor.65.t
	desc = rusfor.65.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_CAN_commons2

	trigger = {
		has_global_flag = RUS_ENT_merge
		ENT = { is_faction_leader = yes }
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.65 option rusfor.65.a"
		name = rusfor.65.a
		GEX = {
			if = {
				limit = { is_in_faction_with = ENT }
				remove_puppet_and_leave_faction = yes
			}
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					is_in_faction_with = ENT
					is_subject = no
				}
				ROOT = { add_to_faction = PREV }
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
			set_faction_name = RUS_entente
			custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
			custom_effect_tooltip = CAN_joins_iedc
			CAN_transfer_iedc_leadership = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_dismantle_economic_treaty = yes
			every_other_country = {
				limit = {
					is_ally_with = ROOT
					is_subject = no
				}
				display_individual_scopes = yes
				set_global_flag = TEMPORARY_DISABLED_FACTION_POPUP
				ENT = { add_to_faction = PREV }
			}
			ENT = { add_to_faction = ROOT }
			set_country_flag = CAN_joined_iedc
			clr_country_flag = CAN_invited_to_iedc
			clr_country_flag = CAN_refused_iedc
			set_temp_variable = { sphere_target = ROOT }
			event_target:iedc_leader = { add_to_economic_sphere = yes }
			save_event_target_as = entente_transfer_to
			CAN_transfer_entente_leader = yes
			set_faction_name = RUS_entente
		}
	}
}

### Generic diplomacy events ###

country_event = { #Russia offers us an alliance
	id = rusfor.70
	title = rusfor.70.t
	desc = rusfor.70.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kremlin_1
	trigger = {
		NOT = { has_war_with = FROM }
		FROM = {
			is_faction_leader = yes
			OR = {
				both_socialist_or_both_not_socialist = yes
				RUS_VST_right = yes
				RUS_is_spiridonist = yes
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.70 option rusfor.70.a"
		name = rusfor.70.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				FROM = {
					any_owned_state = { is_core_of = ROOT }
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				tag = BPL
				has_global_flag = SER_keeping_the_pact
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					AND = {
						tag = EST
						NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = EST_forpol option = DEFAULT } }
						NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = EST_forpol option = EST_FORPOL_RUS } }
					}
					AND = {
						tag = ETH
						NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = ETH_forpol option = DEFAULT } }
					}
					AND = {
						tag = GRE
						NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = GRE_forpol option = DEFAULT } }
						NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = GRE_forpol option = GRE_FORPOL_RUS } }
					}
					AND = {
						tag = IRE
						has_game_rule = { rule = IRE_forpol option = IRE_FORPOL_NEUT }
						has_war = no
					}
					AND = {
						tag = IRQ
						NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = IRQ_forpol option = DEFAULT } }
					}
					AND = {
						tag = LAT
						NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = LAT_forpol option = DEFAULT } }
						NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = LAT_forpol option = LAT_FORPOL_RUS } }
					}
					AND = {
						tag = PRF
						NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = PRF_forpol option = DEFAULT } }
						NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = PRF_forpol option = PRF_FORPOL_RUS } }
					}
					AND = {
						tag = SYR
						NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = SYR_forpol option = DEFAULT } }
					}
					AND = {
						tag = TUR
						NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = TUR_forpol option = DEFAULT } }
						NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = TUR_forpol option = TUR_FORPOL_RUS } }
						NOT = {
							AND = {
								has_game_rule = { rule = TUR_forpol option = TUR_FORPOL_BPL }
								has_global_flag = BPL_joined_MA
							}
						}
					}
					AND = {
						is_in_faction_with = BPL
						OR = {
							has_game_rule = { rule = BPL_dissolution option = BPL_DISSOLUTION_KEEP }
							has_game_rule = { rule = BPL_dissolution option = BPL_DISSOLUTION_GRE_KEEP }
							AND = {
								OR = {
									has_game_rule = { rule = BPL_dissolution option = BPL_DISSOLUTION_AUS_BEATEN }
									has_game_rule = { rule = BPL_dissolution option = BPL_DISSOLUTION_GRE_AUS_BEATEN }
								}
								OR = {
									AUS = { is_faction_leader = yes }
									AUS = {
										is_faction_leader = no
										has_country_flag = AUS_intervened_in_weltkrieg
									}
								}
								NOT = { AUS = { exists = no } }
								NOT = { AUS = { is_subject = yes } }
							}
							has_game_rule = { rule = BPL_dissolution option = BPL_DISSOLUTION_INT_BEATEN }
							has_game_rule = { rule = BPL_dissolution option = BPL_DISSOLUTION_GRE_INT_BEATEN }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		GER = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_non_aggression_pact_with = ROOT }
				diplomatic_relation = {
					country = ROOT
					relation = non_aggression_pact
					active = no
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_guaranteed = ROOT }
				diplomatic_relation = {
					country = ROOT
					relation = guarantee
					active = no
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { gives_military_access_to = ROOT }
				diplomatic_relation = {
					country = ROOT
					relation = military_access
					active = no
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { gives_military_access_to = GER }
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = GER
				relation = military_access
				active = no
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { tag = LAT }
			LAT_join_RUS = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				tag = SER
				SER = { has_elected_government = yes }
				RUS = { has_elected_government = yes }
			}
			FROM = { country_event = { id = rusfla.83 days = 1 } }

		}
		if = {
			limit = { tag = BPL }
			FROM = { save_event_target_as = future_serbian_ally }
			belgrade_pact_is_disbanded = yes
			set_global_flag = BPL_joined_MA
		}
		FROM = { country_event = { id = rusfor.71 hours = 8 } } #Country accepts
		if = { #Used for Right-VST faction
			limit = {
				RUS = { has_socialist_government = yes }
				ROOT = { has_socialist_government = no }
			}
			add_ideas = RUS_diplo_socialist_influence
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.70 option rusfor.70.b"
		name = rusfor.70.b
		trigger = {
			FROM = {
				any_owned_state = { is_core_of = ROOT }
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				tag = BPL
				has_global_flag = SER_keeping_the_pact
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				is_in_faction_with = BPL
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = BPL_dissolution option = BPL_DISSOLUTION_KEEP }
					has_game_rule = { rule = BPL_dissolution option = BPL_DISSOLUTION_GRE_KEEP }
					AND = {
						OR = {
							has_game_rule = { rule = BPL_dissolution option = BPL_DISSOLUTION_AUS_BEATEN }
							has_game_rule = { rule = BPL_dissolution option = BPL_DISSOLUTION_GRE_AUS_BEATEN }
						}
						OR = {
							AUS = { is_faction_leader = yes }
							AUS = {
								is_faction_leader = no
								has_country_flag = AUS_intervened_in_weltkrieg
							}
						}
						NOT = { AUS = { exists = no } }
						NOT = { AUS = { is_subject = yes } }
					}
					has_game_rule = { rule = BPL_dissolution option = BPL_DISSOLUTION_INT_BEATEN }
					has_game_rule = { rule = BPL_dissolution option = BPL_DISSOLUTION_GRE_INT_BEATEN }
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_country_flag = TUR_is_ottomans }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				num_divisions < 25
			}
		}
		FROM = { country_event = { id = rusfor.72 hours = 8 } }
		if = { #Used for Right-VST faction
			limit = {
				RUS = { has_socialist_government = yes }
				ROOT = { has_socialist_government = no }
			}
			effect_tooltip = { add_ideas = RUS_diplo_socialist_influence }
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.70 option rusfor.70.c"
		name = rusfor.70.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 100
				tag = BPL
				has_global_flag = SER_keeping_the_pact
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 100
				OR = {
					AND = {
						tag = EST
						NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = EST_forpol option = DEFAULT } }
						NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = EST_forpol option = EST_FORPOL_RUS } }
					}
					AND = {
						tag = ETH
						NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = ETH_forpol option = DEFAULT } }
					}
					AND = {
						tag = GRE
						NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = GRE_forpol option = DEFAULT } }
						NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = GRE_forpol option = GRE_FORPOL_RUS } }
					}
					AND = {
						tag = IRE
						has_game_rule = { rule = IRE_forpol option = IRE_FORPOL_SITUATIONAL }
						has_war = no
					}
					AND = {
						tag = IRQ
						NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = IRQ_forpol option = DEFAULT } }
					}
					AND = {
						tag = LAT
						NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = LAT_forpol option = DEFAULT } }
						NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = LAT_forpol option = LAT_FORPOL_RUS } }
					}
					AND = {
						tag = PRF
						NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = PRF_forpol option = DEFAULT } }
						NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = PRF_forpol option = PRF_FORPOL_RUS } }
					}
					AND = {
						tag = SYR
						NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = SYR_forpol option = DEFAULT } }
					}
					AND = {
						tag = TUR
						NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = TUR_forpol option = DEFAULT } }
						NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = TUR_forpol option = TUR_FORPOL_RUS } }
						NOT = {
							AND = {
								has_game_rule = { rule = TUR_forpol option = TUR_FORPOL_BPL }
								has_global_flag = BPL_joined_MA
							}
						}
					}
					AND = {
						is_in_faction_with = BPL
						OR = {
							has_game_rule = { rule = BPL_dissolution option = BPL_DISSOLUTION_KEEP }
							has_game_rule = { rule = BPL_dissolution option = BPL_DISSOLUTION_GRE_KEEP }
							AND = {
								OR = {
									has_game_rule = { rule = BPL_dissolution option = BPL_DISSOLUTION_AUS_BEATEN }
									has_game_rule = { rule = BPL_dissolution option = BPL_DISSOLUTION_GRE_AUS_BEATEN }
								}
								OR = {
									AUS = { is_faction_leader = yes }
									AUS = {
										is_faction_leader = no
										has_country_flag = AUS_intervened_in_weltkrieg
									}
								}
								NOT = { AUS = { exists = no } }
								NOT = { AUS = { is_subject = yes } }
							}
							has_game_rule = { rule = BPL_dissolution option = BPL_DISSOLUTION_INT_BEATEN }
							has_game_rule = { rule = BPL_dissolution option = BPL_DISSOLUTION_GRE_INT_BEATEN }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = { country_event = { id = rusfor.75 hours = 8 } }
	}
}

country_event = { #Country accepts
	id = rusfor.71
	title = rusfor.71.t
	desc = rusfor.71.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy1

	trigger = {
		FROM = {
			is_valid_peace_target = yes
			has_capitulated = no
			NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.71 option rusfor.71.a"
		name = rusfor.71.a
		FROM = {
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = { is_claimed_by = ROOT }
				remove_claim_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		add_to_faction = FROM
	}
}

country_event = { #Country wants their claims back
	id = rusfor.72
	title = rusfor.72.t
	desc = rusfor.72.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy1

	trigger = {
		is_faction_leader = yes
		NOT = { has_war_with = FROM }
		FROM = {
			is_valid_peace_target = yes
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.72 option rusfor.72.a"
		name = rusfor.72.a
		ai_chance = { base = 100 }
		effect_tooltip = {
			add_to_faction = FROM
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = { is_core_of = FROM }
				transfer_state_to = FROM
			}
			FROM = {
				every_core_state = {
					remove_core_of = ROOT
					remove_claim_by = ROOT
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = { tag = LAT }
					has_idea = LAT_leave_russia
				}
				remove_ideas = LAT_leave_russia
			}
		}
		FROM = { country_event = rusfor.73 }
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.72 option rusfor.72.b"
		name = rusfor.72.b
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		set_country_flag = RUS_alliance_refused_@FROM
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = FROM
			modifier = KR_hates_govt
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { tag = TUR }
				has_completed_focus = RUS_new_brother
			}
			uncomplete_national_focus = { focus = RUS_new_brother }
		}
		FROM = { country_event = rusfor.74 }
	}
}

country_event = { #Russia accepts
	id = rusfor.73
	title = rusfor.73.t
	desc = rusfor.73.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy1

	trigger = {
		is_valid_peace_target = yes
		NOT = { has_war_with = FROM }
		FROM = { is_faction_leader = yes }
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.73 option rusfor.71.a"
		name = rusfor.71.a
		FROM = {
			add_to_faction = ROOT
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = { is_core_of = ROOT }
				transfer_state_to = ROOT
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					ROOT = { original_tag = LAT }
					has_idea = LAT_leave_russia
				}
				remove_ideas = LAT_leave_russia
			}
		}
		every_core_state = {
			remove_core_of = FROM
			remove_claim_by = FROM
		}
		if = { #Used for Right-VST faction
			limit = {
				RUS = { has_socialist_government = yes }
				ROOT = { has_socialist_government = no }
			}
			add_ideas = RUS_diplo_socialist_influence
		}
	}
}

		name = rusfor.74.a
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = FROM
			modifier = KR_hates_govt
		}
	}
}

	is_triggered_only = yes

			target = FROM
			modifier = KR_disapproves_of_govt
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Russia invites us to economic council
	id = rusfor.76
	title = rusfor.76.t
	desc = rusfor.76.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy1
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.76 option rusfor.76.a"
		name = rusfor.76.a
		ai_chance = { base = 10 }
		RUS_add_to_economic_treaty = yes
		every_subject_country = {
			RUS_add_to_economic_treaty = yes
		}
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = FROM
			modifier = KR_approves_of_govt
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.76 option rusfor.76.b"
		name = rusfor.76.b
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = FROM
			modifier = KR_disapproves_of_govt
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_refused_moscow_treaty
	}
}

		set_temp_variable = { RUS_power_change = 2 }
		RUS_change_projection = yes
	}
}

	id = rusfor.78

	is_triggered_only = yes

		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.78 option rusfor.78.a"
		name = rusfor.78.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 2
				RUS_savinkov = yes
			}
		}
		send_embargo = FROM
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.78 option rusfor.78.b"
		name = rusfor.78.b
	}
}

country_event = { #Leaving Econ Sphere
	id = rusfor.79
	title = rusfor.79.t
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.79.left_economic_council
		trigger = { country_exists = MEC }
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.79.end_of_economic_council
		trigger = { NOT = { country_exists = MEC } }
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy1

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.79 option rusfor.79.a"
		name = rusfor.79.a
	}
}

#Other Foreign Policy Events

country_event = { #Russia demands Territories
	id = rusfor.80
	title = rusfor.80.t
	desc = rusfor.80.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kremlin_1
	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		FROM = {
			is_faction_leader = yes
			can_declare_war_on = ROOT
		}
		OR = {
			owns_state = 418 #Ashkhabad
			418 = { owner = { is_subject_of = ROOT } }
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.80 option rusfor.80.a"
		name = rusfor.80.a #accept
		ai_chance = { base = 40 }
		event_option_tooltip = rusfor.81.a
		FROM = {
			country_event = { id = rusfor.81 days = 2 random_days = 2 }
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.80 option rusfor.80.b"
		name = rusfor.80.b #Never!
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				is_in_faction = yes
				has_war = no
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				FROM = {
					any_enemy_country = { is_actual_major = yes }
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				owns_state = 229 #Azerbaijan
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 40
				tag = TUR
				NOT = { has_non_aggression_pact_with = FROM }
			}
			modifier = { #Don't start war over only Ashkhabad
				factor = 0
				PER = {
					owns_state = 418 #Ashkhabad
					NOT = { owns_state = 229 } #Azerbaijan
				}
				num_subjects < 1
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_will_declare_war_on_ROOT
		FROM = {
			country_event = { id = rusfor.82 days = 2 random_days = 2 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Iran accepts!
	id = rusfor.81
	title = rusfor.81.t
	desc = rusfor.81.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.81 option rusfor.81.a"
		name = rusfor.81.a #Hurray!
		FROM = {
			every_subject_country = {
				display_individual_scopes = yes
				limit = {
					OR = {
						original_tag = GEO
						original_tag = ARM
						original_tag = AZR
						is_central_asian_tag = yes
					}
				}
				ROOT = { annex_country = { target = PREV } }
			}
		}
		418 = { #Ashkhabad
			transfer_state_to = var:584.owner #Karakum, either RUS or their CA puppet
		}
		diplomatic_relation = {
			country = FROM
			relation = non_aggression_pact
		}
		if = {
			limit = { FROM = { NOT = { original_tag = PER } } }
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = PER
				relation = non_aggression_pact
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_power_change = 5 }
		RUS_change_projection = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #Iran refuses
	id = rusfor.82
	title = rusfor.82.t
	desc = rusfor.82.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.82 option rusfor.86.a"
		name = rusfor.86.a #Then it is war
		declare_war_on = {
			target = FROM
			type = annex_everything
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.82 option rusfor.86.b"
		name = rusfor.86.b #Back down
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
	}
}

country_event = { #Russian demands ROM
	id = rusfor.85
	title = rusfor.85.t

	desc = {
		text = rusfor.85.d.ROM
		trigger = { original_tag = ROM }
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.85.d.ROM_overlord
		trigger = { NOT = { original_tag = ROM } }
	}

	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kremlin_1

	trigger = {
		ROM = { owns_state = 78 } #Bessarabia
		OR = {
			FROM = { can_declare_war_on = ROOT }
			ROM = {
				is_subject = yes
				overlord = { is_ally_with = FROM }
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			NOT = { has_non_aggression_pact_with = ROOT }
			NOT = { has_non_aggression_pact_with = ROM }
			NOT = { has_guaranteed = ROOT }
			NOT = { has_guaranteed = ROM }
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.85 option rusfor.85.a"
		name = rusfor.85.a #accept
		ai_chance = {
			base = 5
			modifier = {
				factor = 40
				is_in_faction = no
				RUS = {
					NOT = {
						surrender_progress > 0
						any_enemy_country = { is_actual_major = yes }
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				tag = ROM
				has_government = national_populist
				has_idea = ROM_great_game
				NOT = { is_ally_with = RUS }
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -50
		effect_tooltip = {
			ROM = {
				every_owned_state = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							is_core_of = FROM
							is_claimed_by = FROM
							state = 78 #Bessarabia
						}
					}
					transfer_state_to = FROM
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = { id = rusfor.87 days = 2 random_days = 2 }
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.85 option rusfor.85.b"
		name = rusfor.85.b #Never!
		trigger = {
			NOT = { is_subject_of = FROM }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 95
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				any_enemy_country = {
					OR = {
						is_actual_major = yes
						is_neighbor_of = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				add = -15
				RUS = {
					NOT = {
						surrender_progress > 0
						any_enemy_country = { is_actual_major = yes }
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				is_ally_with = FROM
			}
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			if = {
				limit = { is_ally_with = FROM }
				leave_faction = yes
				peace_out_non_neighbours_after_leaving_faction = yes
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_will_declare_war_on_ROOT
		FROM = {
			country_event = { id = rusfor.86 days = 2 random_days = 2 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { # Romania refuses!
	id = rusfor.86
	title = rusfor.86.t

	desc = {
		text = rusfor.86.d
		trigger = { NOT = { is_ally_with = FROM } }
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.86.d.ally
		trigger = { is_ally_with = FROM }
	}

	picture = GFX_report_event_ROM_guards

	trigger = {
		ROM = { owns_state = 78 } #Bessarabia
		OR = {
			can_declare_war_on = FROM
			ROM = {
				is_subject = yes
				overlord = { is_ally_with = ROOT }
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_non_aggression_pact_with = FROM }
		NOT = { has_non_aggression_pact_with = ROM }
		NOT = { has_guaranteed = FROM }
		NOT = { has_guaranteed = ROM }
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Then it is war
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.86 option rusfor.86.a"
		name = rusfor.86.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				is_ally_with = FROM
			}
		}
	}

	option = { #Back down
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.86 option rusfor.86.b"
		name = rusfor.86.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 100
				is_ally_with = FROM
			}
		}
		remove_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_Demand_Bessarabia target = ROM }
	}
}

country_event = { #Transfer of the territory
	id = rusfor.87
	title = rusfor.87.t

	desc = {
		text = rusfor.87.d
		trigger = { NOT = { is_ally_with = FROM } }
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.87.d.ally
		trigger = { is_ally_with = FROM }
	}

	trigger = {
		ROM = { owns_state = 78 } #Bessarabia
		OR = {
			can_declare_war_on = FROM
			ROM = {
				is_subject = yes
				overlord = { is_ally_with = ROOT }
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_non_aggression_pact_with = FROM }
		NOT = { has_non_aggression_pact_with = ROM }
		NOT = { has_guaranteed = FROM }
		NOT = { has_guaranteed = ROM }
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Another victory for Russian diplomacy!
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.87 option rusfor.87.a"
		name = rusfor.87.a
		remove_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_Demand_Bessarabia target = ROM }
		ROM = {
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_core_of = ROOT
						is_claimed_by = ROOT
						state = 78 #Bessarabia
					}
				}
				transfer_state_to = ROOT
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { is_ally_with = ROOT } }
				diplomatic_relation = {
					country = ROOT
					relation = non_aggression_pact
				}
			}
			add_opinion_modifier = {
				target = ROOT
				modifier = KR_outraged
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					NOT = { original_tag = ROM }
					NOT = { is_ally_with = ROOT }
				}
			}
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = FROM
				relation = non_aggression_pact
			}
			reverse_add_opinion_modifier = {
				target = FROM
				modifier = KR_hates_govt
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_power_change = 5 }
		RUS_change_projection = yes
	}
}

	id = rusfor.90
	title = rusfor.90.t

	desc = {
		text = rusfor.90.d.TUR
		trigger = { tag = TUR }
	}
