		text = rusfor.90.d.TUR_overlord
		trigger = { NOT = { tag = TUR } }
	}

	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kremlin_1

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.90 option rusfor.90.a"
		name = rusfor.90.a #accept
		ai_chance = {
			base = 5
			modifier = {
				factor = 40
				is_in_faction = no
				RUS = {
					NOT = {
						surrender_progress > 0
						any_enemy_country = { is_actual_major = yes }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -50
		effect_tooltip = {
			TUR = {
				every_owned_state = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							is_core_of = FROM
							state = 230 #Yerevan
							state = 585 #Batumi
							state = 1000 #Kars
						}
					}
					transfer_state_to = FROM
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = { id = rusfor.92 days = 2 random_days = 2 }
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.90 option rusfor.85.b"
		name = rusfor.85.b #Never!
		ai_chance = {
			base = 95
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				any_enemy_country = {
					OR = {
						is_actual_major = yes
						is_neighbor_of = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				add = -15
				RUS = {
					NOT = {
						surrender_progress > 0
						any_enemy_country = { is_actual_major = yes }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_will_declare_war_on_ROOT
		FROM = {
			country_event = { id = rusfor.91 days = 2 random_days = 2 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { # TUR refuses
	id = rusfor.91
	title = rusfor.91.t
	desc = rusfor.91.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_ROM_guards

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.91 option rusfor.91.a"
		name = rusfor.91.a #Then it is war
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.91 option rusfor.91.b"
		name = rusfor.91.b #Back down
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		remove_decision = RUS_Demand_Armenia
		clr_country_flag = RUS_demanding_armenia
	}
}

country_event = { #Transfer of the territory
	id = rusfor.92
	title = rusfor.92.t
	desc = rusfor.92.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.92 option rusfor.92.a"
		name = rusfor.92.a #Another victory for Russian diplomacy!
		remove_decision = RUS_Demand_Armenia
		clr_country_flag = RUS_demanding_armenia
		TUR = {
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = { is_core_of = ROOT }
				transfer_state_to = ROOT
			}
			if = {
				limit = { owns_state = 230 }
				230 = { transfer_state_to = ROOT }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { owns_state = 585 }
				if = {
					limit = { is_in_faction_with = GEO }
					585 = { transfer_state_to = GEO }
				}
				else = {
					585 = { transfer_state_to = ROOT }
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { owns_state = 1000 }
				if = {
					limit = { is_in_faction_with = ARM }
					1000 = { transfer_state_to = ARM }
				}
				else = {
					1000 = { transfer_state_to = ROOT }
				}
			}
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = ROOT
				relation = non_aggression_pact
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { FROM = { NOT = { original_tag = TUR } } }
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = FROM
				relation = non_aggression_pact
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_power_change = 5 }
		RUS_change_projection = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #Ultimatum for Galicia AUS owns it
	id = rusfor.95
	title = rusfor.95.t
	desc = rusfor.95.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kremlin_1

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.95 option rusfor.95.a"
		name = rusfor.95.a #Accept
		ai_chance = { base = 15 }
		add_political_power = -100
		if = {
			limit = { has_subject = GAL }
			if = {
				limit = {
					GAL = { owns_state = 73 }
				}
				transfer_state = 73
			}
			set_autonomy = {
				target = GAL
				autonomy_state = autonomy_free
			}
			remove_from_faction = GAL
			GAL = {
				drop_cosmetic_tag = yes
				country_event = { id = rusfor.98 random_hours = 24 days = 1 }
			}
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = { is_galicia = yes }
				transfer_state_to = FROM
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = { id = rusfor.96 days = 2 random_days = 2 }
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.95 option rusfor.95.b"
		name = rusfor.95.b #refuse
		ai_chance = { base = 75 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_will_declare_war_on_ROOT
		FROM = {
			country_event = { id = rusfor.97 days = 2 random_days = 2 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #AUS accepts
	id = rusfor.96
	title = rusfor.96.t
	desc = rusfor.96.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.96 option rusfor.96.a"
		name = rusfor.96.a #great
		remove_decision = RUS_Demand_Galicia
		if = {
			limit = { GAL = { at_war_with_or_justifying_wargoal_against_ROOT = no } }
			annex_country = {
				target = GAL
				transfer_troops = no
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = { is_galicia = yes }
				transfer_state_to = ROOT
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_power_change = 5 }
		RUS_change_projection = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #AUS betrayed us
	id = rusfor.98
	title = rusfor.98.t
	desc = rusfor.98.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.98 option rusfor.98.a"
		name = rusfor.98.a #there is nothing we can do...
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.98 option rusfor.98.b"
		name = rusfor.98.b #resist
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		leave_faction = yes
		for_each_scope_loop = {
			array = ROOT.guarantor_array
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = ROOT
				relation = guarantee
				active = no
			}
		}
		RUS = {
			country_event = { id = rusfor.99 random_hours = 24 days = 1 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #GAL attacks
	id = rusfor.99
	title = rusfor.99.t
	desc = rusfor.99.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.99 option rusfor.99.a"
		name = rusfor.99.a #we will show them!
		create_wargoal = {
			target = FROM
			type = annex_everything
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #ROM-RUS peace deal
	id = rusfor.101
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army_1

	title = {
		text = rusfor.101.t.victory
		trigger = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM }
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.101.d.victory
		trigger = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM }
	}

	title = {
		text = rusfor.101.t.defeat
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.101.d.defeat
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM }
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		tag = ROM
		has_war_with = var:global.russia
		owns_state = 78 #Bessarabia
		is_valid_peace_target = yes
		var:global.russia = { is_valid_peace_target = yes }
		OR = {
			#Romania loses
			surrender_progress > 0.15
			var:global.russia = {
				controls_state = 78 #Bessarabia
				controls_state = 79 #Moldavia
			}
			#Romania wins
			var:global.russia = { surrender_progress > 0.15 }
			controls_state = 202 #Kiev
			controls_state = 226 #Ekaterinoslav
			AND = {
				controls_state = 192 #Odessa
				controls_state = 198 #Vinnitsa
				OR = {
					controls_state = 197 #Kherson
					controls_state = 199 #Proskurov
					controls_state = 203 #Cherkasy
				}
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_ROM_offered_peace }
	}

	immediate = {
		set_global_flag = { flag = RUS_ROM_offered_peace days = 90 value = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					surrender_progress > 0.25
					RUS = {
						controls_state = 78 #Bessarabia
						controls_state = 79 #Moldavia
					}
				}
			}
			set_global_flag = { flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM days = 60 value = 1 }
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.101 option rusfor.101.a"
		name = rusfor.101.a #We have no choice; send word to Moscow.
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM }
		}
		var:global.russia = {
			country_event = { id = rusfor.102 days = 1 random_hours = 24 }
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.101 option rusfor.101.b"
		name = rusfor.101.b #We can still win this!
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM }
			is_ai = no
		}
		add_stability = -0.1
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.101 option rusfor.101.c"
		name = rusfor.101.c #We prevail!
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM
		}
		var:global.russia = {
			country_event = { id = rusfor.102 days = 1 random_hours = 24 }
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.101 option rusfor.101.d"
		name = rusfor.101.d #No, they must be taught a lesson.
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM
			is_ai = no
		}
		add_stability = -0.1
	}
}

country_event = { #Peace with Romania?
	id = rusfor.102

	title = {
		text = rusfor.102.t.victory
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.102.d.victory
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM }
		}
	}

	title = {
		text = rusfor.102.t.defeat
		trigger = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM }
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.102.d.defeat
		trigger = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM }
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		has_global_flag = RUS_war_for_bessarabia
		is_valid_peace_target = yes
		has_war_with = FROM
		FROM = { is_valid_peace_target = yes }
	}

	immediate = {
		clr_global_flag = RUS_war_for_bessarabia
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.102 option rusfor.102.a"
		name = rusfor.102.a #Accept; no point in wasting any more Russian lives.
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM }
		}
		FROM = { country_event = rusfor.103 }
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.102 option rusfor.102.b"
		name = rusfor.102.b #Refuse; they must be taught a lesson!
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM }
			is_ai = no
		}
		add_political_power = -50
		FROM = { country_event = rusfor.104 }
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.102 option rusfor.102.c"
		name = rusfor.102.c #Reach out to the Romanians; this humiliation must end.
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM
		}
		FROM = { country_event = rusfor.103 }
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.102 option rusfor.102.d"
		name = rusfor.102.d #To hell with them! We will reach Kishinev at all costs!
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM
			is_ai = no
		}
		add_stability = -0.15
		FROM = { country_event = rusfor.104 }
	}
}

country_event = { #Treaty of Chisinau
	id = rusfor.103
	title = rusfor.103.t

	desc = {
		text = rusfor.103.d.victory
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.103.d.defeat
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM }
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.103 option rusfor.103.a"
		name = rusfor.103.a #United just to be torn asunder again...
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM }
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_core_of = FROM
					is_claimed_by = FROM
					state = 78 #Bessarabia
					AND = {
						state = 80 #Cernauti
						FROM = { RUS_is_expansionist = yes }
					}
				}
			}
			transfer_state_to = FROM
		}
		FROM = {
			white_peace_with_ROOT = yes
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = ROOT
				relation = non_aggression_pact
			}
			set_truce = { target = ROOT days = 730 }
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.103 option rusfor.103.b"
		name = rusfor.103.b
		trigger = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM }
		FROM = {
			remove_state_claim = 78 #Bessarabia
			white_peace_with_ROOT = yes
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = ROOT
				relation = non_aggression_pact
			}
			set_truce = { target = ROOT days = 730 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #FROM accepts trade deal (for RUS)
	id = rusfor.106
	title = rusfor.106.t
	desc = rusfor.106.d
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Splendid
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.106 option rusfor.106.a"
		name = rusfor.106.a
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_INT_deal_2 }
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = RUS_INT_deal_2
				add_idea = RUS_INT_deal_3
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_ideas = RUS_INT_deal_2
			custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_power_change = 5 }
		RUS_change_projection = yes
		FROM = {
			add_opinion_modifier = {
				modifier = KR_approves_of_govt
				target = FROM
			}
		}
	}
}

			}

					add_intel = {
						target = BLR
						civilian_intel = 40
						army_intel = 40
						navy_intel = 40
						airforce_intel = 40
					}
				}
				add_intel = {
					target = BLR
					civilian_intel = 40
					army_intel = 40
					navy_intel = 40
					airforce_intel = 40
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { tag = BAT }
				effect_tooltip = {
					RUS = {
						add_intel = {
							target = BAT
							civilian_intel = 50
							army_intel = 50
							navy_intel = 50
							airforce_intel = 50
						}
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { tag = LIT }
				effect_tooltip = {
					RUS = {
						set_temp_variable = { LIT_threat_change = 5 }
						LIT_change_LAF_threat = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Russians Propose Trade Deal
	id = rusfor.113
	title = rusfor.113.t
	desc = rusfor.113.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = { #Accept
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.113 option rusfor.113.a"
		name = rusfor.113.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_american_tag = yes
					is_chinese_tag = yes
					tag = JAP
				}
			}
			add_political_power = 40
			if = {
				limit = { has_dlc_aat = yes }
				add_cic = 300
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_political_power = 20
			if = {
				limit = { has_dlc_aat = yes }
				add_cic = 150
			}
		}
		add_one_random_civilian_factory = yes
		if = {
			limit = { has_completed_focus = RUS_pacific_trade }
			FROM = { country_event = rusfor.116 }
		}
		else = {
			FROM = { country_event = rusfor.114 }
		}
	}
	option = { #Refuse
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.113 option rusfor.113.b"
		name = rusfor.113.b
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		FROM = { country_event = rusfor.115 }
	}
}

country_event = { #They have accepted.
	id = rusfor.114
	title = rusfor.114.t
	desc = rusfor.114.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.114 option rusfor.114.a"
		name = rusfor.114.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { is_american_tag = yes }
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_trade_deal_major_tt
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_export_pp = 0.02 }
			subtract_from_variable = { RUS_state_export_cg = 0.06 }
			add_tech_bonus = {
				name = RUS_new_refineries
				bonus = 0.33
				uses = 1
				category = synth_resources
			}
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = motorized_equipment
				amount = 500
				producer = USA
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					OR = {
						tag = CAN
						tag = GBR
						tag = GBP
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_trade_deal_moderate_tt
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_export_pp = 0.02 }
			subtract_from_variable = { RUS_state_export_cg = 0.04 }
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
				type = convoy
				amount = 100
				producer = CAN
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					OR = {
						is_indian_tag = yes
						tag = SAF
						tag = AST
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_trade_deal_small_tt
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_export_pp = 0.02 }
			subtract_from_variable = { RUS_state_export_cg = 0.02 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					OR = {
						tag = JAP
						is_chinese_tag = yes
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_trade_deal_major_tt
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_export_pp = 0.04 }
			subtract_from_variable = { RUS_state_export_cg = 0.06 }
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { tag = CHN } }
				408 = { add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 1 }
				409 = { add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 1 }
				657 = { add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 1 }
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { is_danubian_tag = yes }
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_trade_deal_moderate_tt
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_export_pp = 0.02 }
			subtract_from_variable = { RUS_state_export_cg = 0.04 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					OR = {
						is_italian_tag = yes
						tag = NFA
						tag = FRP
						tag = TUR
					}
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_trade_deal_moderate_tt
			add_to_variable = { RUS_state_export_pp = 0.02 }
			subtract_from_variable = { RUS_state_export_cg = 0.04 }
		}
	}
}

				add_ideas = RUS_ruskapa

					target = ENT
					modifier = RUS_ruskapa_deal

				RUS_change_german_economic_influence = yes
			}
		}

				country_event = { id = rusfor.118 days = 5 }
			}
		}
	}
	option = {

		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		hidden_effect = {

			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Decision for approach to China
	id = rusfor.125
	title = rusfor.125.t
	desc = rusfor.125.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_FNG_railway_map
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Wargoals against all China tags
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.125 option rusfor.125.a"
		name = rusfor.125.a
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					var:650.owner = { is_ally_with = JAP } #Chonqing
					NOT = { country_exists = CUF }
				}
				var:608.owner = { #Beijing
					has_socialist_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				RUS_savinkov = yes
				var:608.owner = { #Beijing
					has_socialist_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
		add_named_threat = {
			threat = 5
			name = rusfor.125.a
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = { is_chinese_tag = yes }
			ROOT = {
				create_wargoal = {
					type = topple_government
					target = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { #Trade deal
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.125 option rusfor.125.b"
		name = rusfor.125.b
		add_political_power = 50
		activate_targeted_decision = { target = CHN decision = RUS_trade_deal_china }
		LEC_remove_from_legation_council = yes
	}
}

	}
}

country_event = { #Russia Approachs... And Presents...
	id = rusfor.128
	title = rusfor.128.t
	desc = rusfor.128.desc
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kremlin4

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS = { country_event = { id = rusfor.129 days = 30 } } #Outcome of the Vladivostok Conference
		}
	}

	option = { #Sure
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.128 option rusfor.128.a"
		name = rusfor.128.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 25
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_idea = RUS_chinese_military_mission_idea
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_idea = RUS_china_trade_deal
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_opinion = {
					target = RUS
					value > 100
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				has_democratic_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					ETS = { is_ally_with = RUS }
					617 = { is_owned_by = RUS } #Dihua
				}
			}
		}
		set_global_flag = RUS_CHN_postwar_agreement
	}
	option = { #Gib Mongol claims
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.128 option rusfor.128.b"
		name = rusfor.128.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					ETS = { is_ally_with = RUS }
					617 = { is_owned_by = RUS } #Dihua
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_authoritarian_government = yes
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				MON = { is_ally_with = RUS }
				330 = { is_owned_by = RUS } #Mongolia
			}
		}
		set_global_flag = RUS_CHN_demand_mongolia
	}
	option = { #Gib East Turkestan
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.128 option rusfor.128.c"
		name = rusfor.128.c
		ai_chance = { base = 50 }
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				ETS = { is_ally_with = RUS }
				617 = { is_owned_by = RUS } #Dihua
			}
		}
		set_global_flag = RUS_CHN_demand_xinjiang
	}
	option = { #Gib Mongol claims and all of East Turkestan
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.128 option rusfor.128.e"
		name = rusfor.128.e
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_authoritarian_government = yes
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				MON = { is_ally_with = RUS }
				330 = { is_owned_by = RUS } #Mongolia
			}
			OR = {
				ETS = { is_ally_with = RUS }
				617 = { is_owned_by = RUS } #Dihua
			}
		}
		set_global_flag = RUS_CHN_demand_mongolia
		set_global_flag = RUS_CHN_demand_xinjiang
	}
	option = { #How about no?
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.128 option rusfor.128.f"
		name = rusfor.128.f
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		set_global_flag = RUS_CHN_no_agreement
	}
}

country_event = { #Outcome of the Vladivostok Conference
	id = rusfor.129
	title = rusfor.129.t
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.129.desc1
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = RUS_CHN_postwar_agreement
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.129.desc2
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = RUS_CHN_demand_mongolia
			NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_CHN_demand_xinjiang }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.129.desc3
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = RUS_CHN_demand_xinjiang
			NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_CHN_demand_mongolia }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.129.desc4
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = RUS_CHN_demand_mongolia
			has_global_flag = RUS_CHN_demand_xinjiang
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.129.desc5
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = RUS_CHN_no_agreement
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Cool
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.129 option rusfor.129.a"
		name = rusfor.129.a
		trigger = { has_global_flag = RUS_CHN_postwar_agreement }
		diplomatic_relation = {
			country = FROM relation = non_aggression_pact active = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_chinese_military_mission_idea }
			remove_ideas = RUS_chinese_military_mission_idea
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_china_trade_deal }
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = RUS_china_trade_deal
				add_idea = RUS_china_trade_deal_2
			}
			CHN = {
				swap_ideas = {
					remove_idea = RUS_china_trade_deal
					add_idea = RUS_china_trade_deal_2
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_ideas = RUS_china_trade_deal
			CHN = {
				add_ideas = RUS_china_trade_deal
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				MON = { exists = yes }
				is_in_faction = no
			}
			CHN = { give_guarantee = MON }
			give_guarantee = MON
		}
		clr_global_flag = RUS_CHN_postwar_agreement
	}
	option = { #Sure
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.129 option rusfor.129.b"
		name = rusfor.129.b
		ai_chance = { base = 50 }
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_global_flag = RUS_CHN_demand_mongolia
				has_global_flag = RUS_CHN_demand_xinjiang
			}
		}
		diplomatic_relation = {
			country = FROM relation = non_aggression_pact active = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_chinese_military_mission_idea }
			remove_ideas = RUS_chinese_military_mission_idea
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_china_trade_deal }
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = RUS_china_trade_deal
				add_idea = RUS_china_trade_deal_2
			}
			CHN = {
				swap_ideas = {
					remove_idea = RUS_china_trade_deal
					add_idea = RUS_china_trade_deal_2
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_ideas = RUS_china_trade_deal
			CHN = {
				add_ideas = RUS_china_trade_deal
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = RUS_CHN_demand_xinjiang
				ETS = { is_ally_with = RUS }
			}
			ETS = { remove_puppet_and_leave_faction = yes }
			CHN = { puppet = ETS }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = RUS_CHN_demand_xinjiang
				ETS = { exists = no }
				617 = { is_owned_by = RUS } #Dihua
			}
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = { is_core_of = SIK }
				transfer_state_to = CHN
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = RUS_CHN_demand_mongolia
				MON = { is_ally_with = RUS }
			}
			MON = { remove_puppet_and_leave_faction = yes }
			CHN = { puppet = MON }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = RUS_CHN_demand_mongolia
				ETS = { exists = no }
				330 = { is_owned_by = RUS } #Mongolia
			}
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = { is_core_of = MON }
				transfer_state_to = CHN
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { MON = { owns_state = 612 } } #Northern Chahar
			transfer_state = 612
		}
		if = {
			limit = { MON = { owns_state = 621 } } #Suiyuan
			transfer_state = 621
		}
		if = {
			limit = { MON = { owns_state = 348 } } #Ningxia
			transfer_state = 348
		}
		if = {
			limit = { MON = { owns_state = 616 } } #Ordos
			transfer_state = 616
		}
		clr_global_flag = RUS_CHN_demand_mongolia
		clr_global_flag = RUS_CHN_demand_xinjiang
	}
	option = { #Nope
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.129 option rusfor.129.c"
		name = rusfor.129.c
		ai_chance = { base = 50 }
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_global_flag = RUS_CHN_demand_mongolia
				has_global_flag = RUS_CHN_demand_xinjiang
			}
		}
		clr_global_flag = RUS_CHN_demand_mongolia
		clr_global_flag = RUS_CHN_demand_xinjiang
	}
	option = { #China tells us to go away
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.129 option rusfor.129.d"
		name = rusfor.129.d
		trigger = { has_global_flag = RUS_CHN_no_agreement }
		clr_global_flag = RUS_CHN_no_agreement
	}
}

country_event = { #Time for a Truce? #CHN offers peace
	id = rusfor.130
	title = rusfor.130.t
	desc = rusfor.130.d
	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		is_chinese_tag = yes #to limit checks a bit
		tag = CHN
		var:566.owner = { #Irkutsk
			has_war_with = ROOT
			tag = var:global.russia
			is_valid_peace_target = yes
		}
		is_valid_peace_target = yes
		var:566.owner = { surrender_progress > 0.15 }
		count_triggers = {
			amount = 2
			408 = { #Vladivostok
				owner = { is_ally_with = 566.owner }
				controller = { is_ally_with = ROOT }
			}
			566 = { #Irkutsk
				owner = { is_ally_with = 566.owner }
				controller = { is_ally_with = ROOT }
			}
			407 = { #Tashkent
				owner = { is_ally_with = 566.owner }
				controller = { is_ally_with = ROOT }
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 14
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.130 option rusfor.130.a"
		name = rusfor.130.a
		var:566.owner = { country_event = rusfor.132 }
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.130 option rusfor.130.b"
		name = rusfor.130.b
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		add_war_support = -0.2
	}
}

country_event = { #Time for a Truce? #JAP offers peace
	id = rusfor.131
	title = rusfor.131.t
	desc = rusfor.131.d
	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		original_tag = JAP
		var:566.owner = { #Irkutsk
			has_war_with = ROOT
			tag = var:global.russia
			is_valid_peace_target = yes
		}
		is_valid_peace_target = yes
		var:566.owner = { surrender_progress > 0.15 }
		count_triggers = {
			amount = 2
			408 = { #Vladivostok
				owner = { is_ally_with = 566.owner }
				controller = { is_ally_with = ROOT }
			}
			566 = { #Irkutsk
				owner = { is_ally_with = 566.owner }
				controller = { is_ally_with = ROOT }
			}
			407 = { #Tashkent
				owner = { is_ally_with = 566.owner }
				controller = { is_ally_with = ROOT }
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 14
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.131 option rusfor.131.a"
		name = rusfor.131.a
		var:566.owner = { country_event = rusfor.132 }
	}

country_event = { #Time for a Truce? #RUS receives peace
	id = rusfor.132
	title = rusfor.132.t
	desc = rusfor.132.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.132 option rusfor.132.a"
		name = rusfor.132.a
		if = {
			limit = { FROM = { original_tag = JAP } }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_lose_to_japan_tt
			FROM = { country_event = rusfor.133 }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { FROM = { original_tag = MON } }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_lose_to_mongolia_tt
			FROM = { country_event = rusfor.1350 }
		}
		else = {
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_lose_to_china_tt
			FROM = { country_event = rusfor.135 }
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.132 option rusfor.132.b"
		name = rusfor.132.b
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		add_war_support = -0.2
		FROM = { country_event = rusfor.134 }
	}
}
country_event = { #End of the Second Russo-Japanese War (can only fire if FER does not exist)
	id = rusfor.133
	title = rusfor.133.t
	desc = rusfor.133.d
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.133 option rusfor.133.a"
		name = rusfor.133.a
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { owns_state = 577 } } #North Sakhalin
			transfer_state = 577
		}
		set_temp_variable = { target = ROOT }
		if = {
			limit = { #Larger FER if Japan controls China
				var:608.owner = { is_ally_with = ROOT } #Beijing
				var:884.owner = { is_ally_with = ROOT } #Xing'an
			}
			every_state = {
				limit = {
					owner = { is_ally_with = FROM }
					OR = {
						is_core_of = ROOT
						is_claimed_by = ROOT
						is_mongolia = yes
						AND = {
							CHN = { is_subject_of = JAP }
							is_claimed_by = CHN
						}
						region = 148 #Primorye
						region = 260 #Amur
						region = 259 #Transbaikal
						region = 149 #Russian Far East
						state = 644 #Northeastern Siberia
					}
				}
				transfer_state_during_war = yes
			}
		}
		else = {
			every_state = {
				limit = {
					owner = { is_ally_with = FROM }
					OR = {
						is_core_of = ROOT
						is_claimed_by = ROOT
						region = 148 #Primorye
						region = 260 #Amur
					}
				}
				transfer_state_during_war = yes
			}
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			FROM = {
				white_peace_with_ROOT = yes
				set_truce = { target = FROM days = 1095 }
			}
			every_enemy_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_ally_with = FROM
						has_guaranteed = FROM
						is_guaranteed_by = FROM
					}
					NOT = { tag = FROM }
				}
				white_peace_with_ROOT = yes
				set_truce = { target = FROM days = 1095 }
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			add_state_claim = 577
			FROM = { white_peace_with_ROOT = yes }
			every_enemy_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_ally_with = FROM
						has_guaranteed = FROM
						is_guaranteed_by = FROM
					}
					is_valid_peace_target_against_PREV = yes
				}
				white_peace_with_ROOT = yes
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_ally_with = FROM
						has_guaranteed = FROM
						is_guaranteed_by = FROM
					}
				}
				diplomatic_relation = {
					country = PREV
					relation = non_aggression_pact
				}
				set_truce = { target = FROM days = 1095 }
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Second Treaty of Aigun #for CHN
	id = rusfor.135
	title = rusfor.135.t
	desc = rusfor.135.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.135 option rusfor.135.a"
		name = rusfor.135.a
		set_temp_variable = { target = ROOT }
		every_state = {
			limit = {
				owner = { is_ally_with = FROM }
				OR = {
					is_core_of = ROOT
					is_claimed_by = ROOT #Only transfer Outer Manchuria if China has claims on it
					is_core_china = yes
					is_mongolia = yes
					is_xinjiang = yes
					is_tibet = yes
					state = 329 #Tuva
				}
			}
			transfer_state_during_war = yes
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			FROM = {
				white_peace_with_ROOT = yes
				set_truce = { target = FROM days = 1095 }
			}
			every_enemy_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_ally_with = FROM
						has_guaranteed = FROM
						is_guaranteed_by = FROM
					}
					NOT = { tag = FROM }
				}
				white_peace_with_ROOT = yes
				set_truce = { target = FROM days = 1095 }
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			FROM = { white_peace_with_ROOT = yes }
			every_enemy_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_ally_with = FROM
						has_guaranteed = FROM
						is_guaranteed_by = FROM
					}
					is_valid_peace_target_against_PREV = yes
				}
				white_peace_with_ROOT = yes
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_ally_with = FROM
						has_guaranteed = FROM
						is_guaranteed_by = FROM
					}
				}
				diplomatic_relation = {
					country = PREV
					relation = non_aggression_pact
				}
				set_truce = { target = FROM days = 1095 }
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #End of the Russo-Mongolian War
	id = rusfor.1350
	title = rusfor.1350.t
	desc = rusfor.1350.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.1350 option rusfor.1350.a"
		name = rusfor.1350.a
		set_temp_variable = { target = ROOT }
		every_state = {
			limit = {
				owner = { is_ally_with = FROM }
				OR = {
					is_core_of = ROOT
					is_claimed_by = ROOT
					is_mongolia = yes
					state = 329 #Tuva
				}
			}
			transfer_state_during_war = yes
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			FROM = {
				white_peace_with_ROOT = yes
				set_truce = { target = FROM days = 1095 }
			}
			every_enemy_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_ally_with = FROM
						has_guaranteed = FROM
						is_guaranteed_by = FROM
					}
					NOT = { tag = FROM }
				}
				white_peace_with_ROOT = yes
				set_truce = { target = FROM days = 1095 }
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			FROM = { white_peace_with_ROOT = yes }
			every_enemy_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_ally_with = FROM
						has_guaranteed = FROM
						is_guaranteed_by = FROM
					}
					is_valid_peace_target_against_PREV = yes
				}
				white_peace_with_ROOT = yes
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_ally_with = FROM
						has_guaranteed = FROM
						is_guaranteed_by = FROM
					}
				}
				diplomatic_relation = {
					country = PREV
					relation = non_aggression_pact
				}
				set_truce = { target = FROM days = 1095 }
			}
		}
	}
}

### Post-WK2 Foreign Policy ###

country_event = { #Russia Demands Our Subjugation
	id = rusfor.150
	title = rusfor.150.t
	desc = rusfor.150.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_border

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.150 option rusfor.150.a"
		name = rusfor.150.a #Yes
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				add = 70
				is_in_faction = no
				FROM = {
					surrender_progress < 0.01
					NOT = { any_enemy_country = { is_actual_major = yes } }
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_socialist_government = yes
			}
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_claim_or_core_of_FROM = yes
						any_of = {
							array = FROM.faction_members
							OR = {
								is_claimed_by = var:v
								is_core_of = var:v
							}
						}
						any_of = {
							array = FROM.subjects
							OR = {
								is_claimed_by = var:v
								is_core_of = var:v
							}
						}
					}
				}
				FROM = { transfer_state = PREV }
			}
			FROM = { puppet = ROOT }
		}
		FROM = { country_event = { id = rusfor.151 days = 2 } }
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.150 option rusfor.150.b"
		name = rusfor.150.b #No
		ai_chance = {
			base = 80
			modifier = {
				add = -70
				is_in_faction = no
				FROM = {
					surrender_progress < 0.01
					NOT = { any_enemy_country = { is_actual_major = yes } }
				}
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_will_declare_war_on_ROOT
		FROM = { country_event = { id = rusfor.152 days = 2 } }
	}
}

country_event = { #FROM Accepts
	id = rusfor.151
	title = rusfor.151.t
	desc = rusfor.151.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_border

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.151 option rusfor.151.a"
		name = rusfor.151.a
		remove_targeted_decision = { target = FROM decision = RUS_subjugate_eastern_europe }
		FROM = {
			get_current_government_type = yes
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_claim_or_core_of_ROOT = yes
						any_of = {
							array = ROOT.faction_members
							OR = {
								is_claimed_by = var:v
								is_core_of = var:v
							}
						}
						any_of = {
							array = ROOT.subjects
							OR = {
								is_claimed_by = var:v
								is_core_of = var:v
							}
						}
					}
				}
				ROOT = { transfer_state = PREV }
			}
		}
		set_autonomy = {
			target = FROM
			autonomy_state = autonomous_puppet
		}
		hidden_effect = { FROM = { restore_previous_government_type = yes } }
	}
}

country_event = { #FROM Refuses
	id = rusfor.152
	title = rusfor.152.t
	desc = rusfor.152.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.152 option rusfor.152.a"
		name = rusfor.152.a #War
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.152 option rusfor.152.b"
		name = rusfor.152.b #Back down
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		remove_targeted_decision = { target = FROM decision = RUS_subjugate_eastern_europe }
		FROM = {
			set_country_flag = RUS_cannot_subjugate
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Anti Internationale Pact Event
	id = rusfor.202
	title = rusfor.202.t
	desc = rusfor.202.d

	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_october

	option = { #We shall join the crusade against the reds
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.202 option rusfor.202.a"
		name = rusfor.202.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_opinion = {
					target = FROM
					value > 20
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 6
				is_ally_with = ENT
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 4
				has_authoritarian_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_right_democratic_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				has_left_democratic_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					tag = SCA
					tag = SWI
					AND = {
						tag = IRE
						OR = {
							has_guarantor = yes
							has_country_flag = IRE_got_guarantee_USA
							has_country_flag = IRE_got_guarantee_TEX
							has_country_flag = IRE_got_guarantee_PSA
							has_country_flag = IRE_got_guarantee_NEE
						}
						NOT = { is_guaranteed_by = RUS }
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				tag = IRE
				has_game_rule = { rule = IRE_forpol option = IRE_FORPOL_NEUT }
				has_war = no
			}
		}
		add_ideas = RUS_anti_internationale_pact
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { is_guaranteed_by = RUS } }
			RUS = { give_guarantee = ROOT }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			FRA = { country_event = rusfor.203 }
			RUS = { country_event = rusfor.203 }
		}
	}
	option = { #None of our business
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.202 option rusfor.202.c"
		name = rusfor.202.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 5
			modifier = {
				factor = 4
				has_opinion = {
					target = INT
					value > 20
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				is_subject_of = FROM
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				is_ally_with = FROM
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_left_democratic_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				RUS = { has_authoritarian_government = yes }
				has_democratic_government = yes
				NOT = {
					is_ally_with = ENT
					is_ally_with = RUS
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			FROM = { country_event = { id = rusfor.75 hours = 8 } }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Tilsit Conference Demands
	id = rusfor.207
	title = rusfor.207.t
	desc = rusfor.207.desc

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Demand mutual guarantees to remaining neutral countries in Europe (clause a)
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.207 option rusfor.207.a"
		name = rusfor.207.a
		trigger = { RUS = { NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_clause_a_agreed } } }
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				has_authoritarian_government = no
				NOT = { has_government = totalist }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { tag = RUS }
			if = {
				limit = { ENG = { is_ai = no } }
				ENG = {
					country_event = { id = rusfor.208 days = 1 }
				}
			}
			else = {
				FRA = {
					country_event = { id = rusfor.208 days = 1 }
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_power_change = -5 }
			RUS_change_projection = yes
		}
		else = {
			RUS = { country_event = { id = rusfor.208 days = 1 } }
		}
	}
	option = { #Demand White Peace with Entente (clause b)
		trigger = {
			RUS = { NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_clause_b_agreed } }
			tag = RUS
			ENT = { exists = yes }
		}
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.207 option rusfor.207.b"
		name = rusfor.207.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 3
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				OR = {
					is_monarchy = yes
					RUS_savinkov = yes
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { tag = RUS }
			custom_effect_tooltip = rusfor.207.b.tt
			custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
			if = {
				limit = { ENG = { is_ai = no } }
				ENG = { country_event = { id = rusfor.211 days = 1 } }
			}
			else = {
				FRA = { country_event = { id = rusfor.211 days = 1 } }
			}
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_power_change = -5 }
			RUS_change_projection = yes
		}
		else = {
			RUS = { country_event = { id = rusfor.211 days = 1 } }
		}
	}
	option = { #Demand Mutual Army Limits (clause c)
		trigger = { RUS = { NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_clause_c_agreed } } }
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.207 option rusfor.207.c"
		name = rusfor.207.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 5
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				has_left_democratic_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 4
				OR = {
					has_government = syndicalist
					has_government = radical_socialist
				}
			}
		}
		show_ideas_tooltip = RUS_army_limits
		if = {
			limit = { tag = RUS }
			if = {
				limit = { ENG = { is_ai = no } }
				ENG = { country_event = { id = rusfor.212 days = 1 } }
			}
			else = {
				FRA = { country_event = { id = rusfor.212 days = 1 } }
			}
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_power_change = -5 }
			RUS_change_projection = yes
		}
		else = {
			RUS = { country_event = { id = rusfor.212 days = 1 } }
		}
	}
	option = { #Demand Embargo of Entente (clause d)
		trigger = {
			RUS = { NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_clause_d_agreed } }
			OR = {
				tag = FRA
				tag = ENG
			}
			ENT = { exists = yes }
		}
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.207 option rusfor.207.d"
		name = rusfor.207.d
		ai_chance = { base = 10 }
		if = {
			limit = { tag = RUS }
			if = {
				limit = { ENG = { is_ai = no } }
				ENG = { country_event = { id = rusfor.213 days = 1 } }
			}
			else = {
				FRA = { country_event = { id = rusfor.213 days = 1 } }
			}
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_power_change = -5 }
			RUS_change_projection = yes
		}
		else = {
			RUS = { country_event = { id = rusfor.213 days = 1 } }
		}
	}
	option = { #That's all for now
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.207 option rusfor.207.e"
		name = rusfor.207.e
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_clause_a_agreed }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_clause_b_agreed }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_clause_c_agreed }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 20
				RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_clause_d_agreed }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { tag = RUS }
			if = {
				limit = {
					ENG = { is_ai = no }
					FRA = { is_ai = yes }
				}
				ENG = { country_event = { id = rusfor.207 days = 1 } }
			}
			else = {
				FRA = { country_event = { id = rusfor.207 days = 1 } }
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					tag = ENG
					tag = FRA
				}
			}
			country_event = { id = rusfor.214 days = 1 }
			RUS = { country_event = { id = rusfor.214 days = 1 } }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Other party demands mutual guarantees to remaining neutral countries in Europe (clause a)
	id = rusfor.208
	title = rusfor.208.t
	desc = rusfor.208.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Sure
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.208 option rusfor.208.a"
		name = rusfor.208.a
		ai_chance = { base = 45 }
		RUS = { set_country_flag = RUS_clause_a_agreed }
		RUS = { set_country_flag = RUS_clause_a_agreed_response }
		hidden_effect = {
			FROM = { country_event = { id = rusfor.209 days = 1 } }
		}
	}
	option = { #Nope we're out
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.208 option rusfor.208.b"
		name = rusfor.208.b
		ai_chance = { base = 5 }
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = rusfor.210 days = 1 }
			FROM = { country_event = { id = rusfor.210 days = 1 } }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { # Russian/3I notification of agreement for clauses
	id = rusfor.209
	title = {
		text = rusfor.209.t1
		trigger = { RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_clause_a_agreed_response } }
	}
	title = {
		text = rusfor.209.t2
		trigger = { RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_clause_b_agreed_response } }
	}
	title = {
		text = rusfor.209.t3
		trigger = { RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_clause_c_agreed_response } }
	}
	title = {
		text = rusfor.209.t4
		trigger = { RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_clause_d_agreed_response } }
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.209.d1
		trigger = { RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_clause_a_agreed_response } }
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.209.d2
		trigger = { RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_clause_b_agreed_response } }
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.209.d3
		trigger = { RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_clause_c_agreed_response } }
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.209.d4
		trigger = { RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_clause_d_agreed_response } }
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Wonderful
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.209 option rusfor.209.a"
		name = rusfor.209.a
		RUS = { clr_country_flag = RUS_clause_a_agreed_response }
		RUS = { clr_country_flag = RUS_clause_b_agreed_response }
		RUS = { clr_country_flag = RUS_clause_c_agreed_response }
		RUS = { clr_country_flag = RUS_clause_d_agreed_response }
		if = {
			limit = { tag = RUS }
			RUS = { country_event = { id = rusfor.207 days = 1 } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { tag = ENG }
			ENG = { country_event = { id = rusfor.207 days = 1 } }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { tag = FRA }
			FRA = { country_event = { id = rusfor.207 days = 1 } }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Other party demands white peace with Entente (clause b)
	id = rusfor.211
	title = rusfor.211.t
	desc = rusfor.211.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Sure
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.211 option rusfor.211.a"
		name = rusfor.211.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 5
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				CSA = { is_ally_with = INT }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 5
				strength_ratio = { tag = RUS ratio < 0.3 }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 5
				OR = {
					USA = { is_ally_with = IMP }
					AUS = { is_ally_with = IMP }
					NEE = { is_ally_with = IMP }
					CSA = { exists = no }
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 5
				INT = {
					any_neighbor_country = { is_in_faction_with = RUS }
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 5
				GRU = { is_in_faction_with = RUS }
				OR = {
					51 = { #Eastern Rhineland
						owner = {
							is_ally_with = RUS
						}
					}
					55 = { #Hesse
						owner = {
							is_ally_with = RUS
						}
					}
					781 = { #Western Rhineland
						owner = {
							is_ally_with = RUS
						}
					}
					8 = { #Luxembourg
						owner = {
							is_ally_with = RUS
						}
					}
					741 = { #Verviers
						owner = {
							is_ally_with = RUS
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		RUS = { set_country_flag = RUS_clause_b_agreed }
		RUS = { set_country_flag = RUS_clause_b_agreed_response }
		hidden_effect = {
			FROM = { country_event = { id = rusfor.209 days = 1 } }
		}
	}
	option = { #Nope we're out
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.211 option rusfor.211.b"
		name = rusfor.211.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				add = -5
				OR = {
					USA = { is_ally_with = IMP }
					AUS = { is_ally_with = IMP }
					NEE = { is_ally_with = IMP }
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			FROM = { country_event = { id = rusfor.210 days = 1 } }
		}
	}
}

		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.212 option rusfor.212.b"
		name = rusfor.212.b
		ai_chance = { base = 10 }
		hidden_effect = {
			FROM = { country_event = { id = rusfor.210 days = 1 } }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Other party demands embargo and cutting of relations with Entente (clause d)
	id = rusfor.213
	title = rusfor.213.t
	desc = rusfor.213.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Sure
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.213 option rusfor.213.a"
		name = rusfor.213.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				OR = {
					has_left_democratic_government = yes
					RUS_maklakov = yes
				}
			}
		}
		RUS = { set_country_flag = RUS_clause_d_agreed }
		RUS = { set_country_flag = RUS_clause_d_agreed_response }
		hidden_effect = {
			FROM = { country_event = { id = rusfor.209 days = 1 } }
		}
	}
	option = { #Nope we're out
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.213 option rusfor.213.b"
		name = rusfor.213.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				is_monarchy = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				RUS_savinkov = yes
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			FROM = { country_event = { id = rusfor.210 days = 1 } }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Tilsit Succeeds
	id = rusfor.214
	title = rusfor.214.t
	desc = rusfor.214.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.214 option rusfor.214.a"
		name = rusfor.214.a
		if = {
			limit = { tag = RUS }
			every_other_country = {
				limit = { is_ally_with = INT }
				diplomatic_relation = {
					country = PREV
					relation = non_aggression_pact
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_power_change = 10 }
			RUS_change_projection = yes
			hidden_effect = { news_event = { id = rusnews.26 days = 1 } }
		}
		if = { #Executes clause a
			limit = { RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_clause_a_agreed } }
			if = {
				limit = { tag = RUS }
				every_other_country = {
					limit = {
						is_in_europe = yes
						NOT = { is_in_faction_with = RUS }
						NOT = { is_in_faction_with = INT }
						NOT = { is_in_faction_with = ENT }
						NOT = { is_guaranteed_by = RUS }
					}
					add_to_array = { RUS.RUS_guarantee_countries = THIS }
					for_each_loop = {
						array = RUS.RUS_guarantee_countries
						value = v
						RUS = { give_guarantee = v }
					}
				}
				RUS = { set_country_flag = clause_a_done_3I }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						tag = ENG
						tag = FRA
					}
				}
				every_other_country = {
					limit = {
						is_in_europe = yes
						NOT = { is_in_faction_with = RUS }
						NOT = { is_in_faction_with = FRA }
						NOT = { is_guaranteed_by = ENG }
					}
					add_to_array = { ENG.ENG_guarantee_countries = THIS }
					for_each_loop = {
						array = ENG.ENG_guarantee_countries
						value = v
						ENG = { give_guarantee = v }
					}
				}
				every_other_country = {
					limit = {
						is_in_europe = yes
						NOT = { is_in_faction_with = RUS }
						NOT = { is_in_faction_with = FRA }
						NOT = { is_guaranteed_by = FRA }
					}
					add_to_array = { FRA.FRA_guarantee_countries = THIS }
					for_each_loop = {
						array = FRA.FRA_guarantee_countries
						value = v
						FRA = { give_guarantee = v }
					}
				}
				RUS = { set_country_flag = RUS_clause_a_done }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_clause_a_done }
					RUS = { has_country_flag = clause_a_done_3I }
				}
				RUS = { clr_country_flag = RUS_clause_a_agreed }
				RUS = { clr_country_flag = RUS_clause_a_done }
				RUS = { clr_country_flag = clause_a_done_3I }
			}
		}
		if = { #Executes clause b
			limit = { RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_clause_b_agreed } }
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					is_ally_with = ENT
					has_war_with = INT
					OR = {
						AND = {
							has_capitulated = yes
							any_owned_state = {
								OR = {
									controller = { is_ally_with = INT }
									any_neighbor_state = { controller = { is_ally_with = INT } }
								}
								impassable = no
							}
						}
						AND = {
							has_civil_war = yes
							any_enemy_country = {
								civilwar_target = PREV
								is_ally_with = INT
							}
						}
						AND = {
							any_home_area_neighbor_country = {
								is_ally_with = INT
								has_war_with = PREV
								same_continent_as_PREV = yes
								has_capitulated = no
							}
						}
						AND = {
							any_home_area_neighbor_country = {
								is_ally_with = INT
								has_war_with = PREV
								has_capitulated = no
							}
							meta_trigger = {
								text = {
									[ORIGINAL_CAPITAL] = { controller = { is_ally_with = INT } }
								}
								ORIGINAL_CAPITAL = "[THIS.OriginalCapital.GetId]"
							}
						}
					}
				}
				leave_faction = yes
				peace_out_non_neighbours_after_leaving_faction = yes
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					is_ally_with = INT
					has_war_with = ENT
					OR = {
						AND = {
							has_capitulated = yes
							any_owned_state = {
								OR = {
									controller = { is_ally_with = ENT }
									any_neighbor_state = { controller = { is_ally_with = ENT } }
								}
								impassable = no
							}
						}
						AND = {
							has_civil_war = yes
							any_enemy_country = {
								civilwar_target = PREV
								is_ally_with = ENT
							}
						}
						AND = {
							any_home_area_neighbor_country = {
								is_ally_with = ENT
								has_war_with = PREV
								same_continent_as_PREV = yes
								has_capitulated = no
							}
						}
						AND = {
							any_home_area_neighbor_country = {
								is_ally_with = INT
								has_war_with = PREV
								has_capitulated = no
							}
							meta_trigger = {
								text = {
									[ORIGINAL_CAPITAL] = { controller = { is_ally_with = ENT } }
								}
								ORIGINAL_CAPITAL = "[THIS.OriginalCapital.GetId]"
							}
						}
					}
				}
				leave_faction = yes
				peace_out_non_neighbours_after_leaving_faction = yes
			}
			INT = {
				ENT = { white_peace_with_PREV = yes }
				for_each_scope_loop = {
					array = faction_members
					for_each_scope_loop = {
						array = ENT.faction_members
						diplomatic_relation = {
							country = PREV
							relation = non_aggression_pact
						}
						set_truce = { target = PREV days = 365 }
					}
				}
			}
			RUS = { clr_country_flag = RUS_clause_b_agreed }
			set_global_flag = tilsit_peace_success
		}
		if = { #Executes clause c
			limit = { RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_clause_c_agreed } }
			if = {
				limit = { tag = RUS }
				RUS = { add_ideas = RUS_army_limits }
				RUS = { set_country_flag = RUS_clause_c_done }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						tag = FRA
						tag = ENG
					}
				}
				ENG = { add_ideas = RUS_army_limits }
				FRA = { add_ideas = RUS_army_limits }
				RUS = { set_country_flag = clause_c_done_3I }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_clause_c_done }
					RUS = { has_country_flag = clause_c_done_3I }
				}
				RUS = { clr_country_flag = RUS_clause_c_agreed }
				RUS = { clr_country_flag = RUS_clause_c_done }
				RUS = { clr_country_flag = clause_c_done_3I }
			}
		}
		if = { #Executes clause d
			limit = { RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_clause_d_agreed } }
			if = {
				limit = { tag = RUS }
				every_other_country = {
					limit = { is_ally_with = ENT }
					RUS = { send_embargo = PREV }
				}
			}
			RUS = { clr_country_flag = RUS_clause_d_agreed }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Russia invites socialist country in INT to alliance
	id = rusfor.250
	title = rusfor.250.t
	desc = rusfor.250.d
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Yes
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.250 option rusfor.250.a"
		name = rusfor.250.a
		leave_faction = yes
		FROM = {
			country_event = rusfor.251
		}
		INT = {
			country_event = rusfor.253
		}
	}
	option = { #Yes
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.250 option rusfor.250.b"
		name = rusfor.250.b
		FROM = {
			country_event = rusfor.252
		}
	}
}

	id = rusfor.251

	desc = rusfor.251.d

		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.251 option rusfor.251.a"

		add_to_faction = FROM
	}
}

country_event = { #INT is notified
	id = rusfor.253
	title = rusfor.253.t
	desc = rusfor.253.d
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Sanction them
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.253 option rusfor.253.a"
		name = rusfor.253.a
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = FROM
			modifier = KR_disapproves_of_govt
		}
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = RUS
			modifier = KR_disapproves_of_govt
		}
		send_embargo = FROM
		send_embargo = RUS
	}
	option = { #Kill them
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.253 option rusfor.253.b"
		name = rusfor.253.b
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		create_wargoal = {
			type = annex_everything
			target = FROM
		}
	}
}

### TREATY OF MOSCOW ###
country_event = { #For GER - hidden event to fire peace
	id = rusfor.1299
	hidden = yes

	trigger = {
		original_tag = GER
		has_war_with = RUS
		RUS = {
			surrender_progress > 0.5
			OR = {
				is_faction_leader = yes
				is_in_faction_with = INT
			}
		}
		surrender_progress < 0.3
		is_faction_leader = yes
		OR = {
			RUS = { surrender_progress > 0.95 }
			NOT = {
				219 = { is_controlled_by = RUS } #Moscow
				195 = { is_controlled_by = RUS } #Petrograd
				217 = { is_controlled_by = RUS } #Tsaritsyn
			}
		}
	}

	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.1299 option 1"
		if = {
			limit = { RUS = { has_government = national_populist } }
			RUS = { country_event = russia.918 } #Death of Savinkov
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = { has_socialist_government = yes }
			}
			RUS = { country_event = socrus.430 }
		}
		else = {
			country_event = rusfor.1300
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #For GER - ask for peace with RUS
	id = rusfor.1300
	title = rusfor.1300.t
	desc = rusfor.1300.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_conference1

	trigger = {
		has_war_with = RUS
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #yea
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.1300 option rusfor.1300.a"
		name = rusfor.1300.a
		ai_chance = { base = 100 }
		RUS = { country_event = { id = rusfor.1301 days = 2 } }
	}

	option = { #no
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.1300 option rusfor.1300.b"
		name = rusfor.1300.b
		add_war_support = -0.1
		RUS = {
			add_ideas = RUS_patriotic_war_3
		}
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
	}
}

country_event = { #RUS gets event
	id = rusfor.1301
	title = rusfor.1301.t
	desc = rusfor.1301.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy1

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Yes
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.1301 option rusfor.1301.a"
		name = rusfor.1301.a
		event_option_tooltip = rusfor.1302.a
		GER = { country_event = rusfor.1302 }
	}

	option = { #No
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.1301 option rusfor.1301.b"
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		name = rusfor.1301.b
		add_stability = -0.2
		add_war_support = -0.2
	}
}

country_event = { #GER gets event
	id = rusfor.1302
	title = rusfor.1302.t
	desc = rusfor.1302.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy1

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Yes
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.1302 option rusfor.1302.a"
		name = rusfor.1302.a
		RUS = {
			every_other_country = {
				limit = {
					is_in_faction_with = PREV
					is_central_asian_tag = no
					has_capitulated = no
				}
				if = {
					limit = { is_subject_of = PREV }
					remove_puppet_and_leave_faction = yes
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = { is_subject = no }
					leave_faction = yes
				}
				peace_out_non_neighbours_after_leaving_faction = yes
				hidden_effect = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							OR = {
								tag = MON
								tag = MNR
							}
							is_subject = no
							has_socialist_government = yes
						}
						set_politics = {
							ruling_party = authoritarian_democrat
							elections_allowed = no
						}
						set_political_party = { ideology = totalist popularity = 0 }
						set_political_party = { ideology = radical_socialist popularity = 0 }
						set_political_party = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = 0 }
					}
				}
			}
			RUS_dismantle_economic_treaty = yes
			every_country = {
				limit = { is_in_tech_sharing_group = russian_research }
				remove_from_tech_sharing_group = russian_research
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { RUS_set_up_peace_conference_with_germany = yes }
		start_peace_conference = {
			tag = RUS
			score_factor = 1
			winner_scope = ALL
			loser_scope = FACTION
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #For player-led German allies: peace or no?
	id = rusfor.1303
	title = rusfor.1303.t
	desc = rusfor.1303.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy1

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Yes
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.1303 option rusfor.1303.a"
		name = rusfor.1303.a
		set_country_flag = GER_accepts_peace
		RUS_fire_next_moscow_treaty_event = yes
	}

	option = { #No
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.1303 option rusfor.1303.b"
		name = rusfor.1303.b
		ai_chance = { base = 0 } #just in case
		every_other_country = {
			limit = {
				is_ai = no
				is_ally_with = GER
			}
			country_event = rusfor.1304
		}
		RUS = { country_event = rusfor.1304 }
		hidden_effect = {
			every_possible_country = { clr_country_flag = GER_accepts_peace }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Notification for other players that peace fell through
	id = rusfor.1304
	title = rusfor.1304.t

	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1304.d.reichspakt
		trigger = { NOT = { original_tag = RUS } }
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1304.d.russia
		trigger = { original_tag = RUS }
	}

	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy1

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Yes
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.1304 option rusfor.1304.a"
		name = rusfor.1304.a
	}
}

country_event = { #Invite the KMT to the Moscow Accord
	id = rusfor.1309
	title = rusfor.1309.t
	desc = rusfor.1309.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #Yes
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.1309 option rusfor.1309.a"
		name = rusfor.1309.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				NOT = {  #KMT will accept if RUS doesn't enroach on the frontiers
					MON = { is_subject_of = RUS }
					RUS = { owns_state = 330 }
					RUS = { owns_state = 716 }
					RUS = { owns_state = 885 }
				}
			}
		}

		FROM = {
			add_to_faction = ROOT
			country_event = { id = rusfor.1310 days = 2 } #The Chinese accept
		}
	}
	option = { #No
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.1309 option rusfor.1309.b"
		name = rusfor.1309.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				OR = {
					MON = { is_subject_of = RUS }
					RUS = { owns_state = 330 }
				}
				OR = {
					RUS = { owns_state = 716 }
					RUS = { owns_state = 885 }
				}
			}
		}

		FROM = {
			country_event = { id = rusfor.1311 days = 2 } #The Chinese say no
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #The Chinese say yes
	id = rusfor.1310
	title = rusfor.1310.t
	desc = rusfor.1310.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #Yes
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.1310 option rusfor.1310.a"
		name = rusfor.1310.a
	}
}

	id = rusfor.1311
	title = rusfor.1311.t
	desc = rusfor.1311.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = { #Yes
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.1311 option rusfor.1311.a"
		name = rusfor.1311.a
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = FROM
			modifier = KR_displeased
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Korean Volunteers in Manchuria
	id = rusfor.1312
	title = rusfor.1312.t
	desc = rusfor.1312.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_korean_army_flavor

	trigger = {
		has_socialist_government = yes
		has_war_with = JAP
		KOR = { any_core_state = { is_controlled_by = ROOT } }
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.1312 option rusfor.1312.a"
		name = rusfor.1312.a
		add_manpower = 1500
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { has_template = "Koreyskaya Dobrovolchesskaya Brigada" } }
				division_template = {
					name = "Koreyskaya Dobrovolchesskaya Brigada" #Northeast Anti-Japanese Allied Forces Teaching Brigade"
					division_names_group = RUS_MVD_01
					regiments = {
						irregular_infantry = { x = 0 y = 0 }
						irregular_infantry = { x = 0 y = 1 }
						irregular_infantry = { x = 0 y = 2 }
						irregular_infantry = { x = 1 y = 0 }
						irregular_infantry = { x = 1 y = 1 }
						irregular_infantry = { x = 1 y = 2 }
						irregular_infantry = { x = 2 y = 0 }
						irregular_infantry = { x = 2 y = 1 }
						irregular_infantry = { x = 2 y = 2 }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		random_controlled_state = { #Gwanbuk
			limit = { is_core_of = KOR }
			create_unit = {
				division = "name = \"88ya Otdelnaya Strelkovaja Brigada\" division_template = \"Koreyskaya Dobrovolchesskaya Brigada\" start_experience_factor = 0.2"
				owner = ROOT
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #For AUS - remain committed to Ukraine?
	id = rusfor.1400
	title = rusfor.1400.t
	desc = rusfor.1400.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.1400 option rusfor.1400.a"
		name = rusfor.1400.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 30
			modifier = {
				add = 5
				has_government = social_democrat
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 5
				has_idea = AUS_new_administration
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 5
				GER = { has_authoritarian_government = yes }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 5
				RUS = { has_elected_government = yes }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = { rule = UKR_forpol option = UKR_FORPOL_AUS }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				UKR = { is_ai = no }
			}
		}
		UKR = { country_event = { id = rusfor.1401 days = 1 } }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.1400 option rusfor.1400.b"
		name = rusfor.1400.b
		ai_chance = { base = 20 }
	}
}

	id = rusfla.16
	title = rusfla.16.t
	desc = rusfla.16.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kirill
	trigger = { has_government = national_populist }
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.16 option rusfla.16.a"
		name = rusfla.16.a #Exile them
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_socialist_ai
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_republic_ai
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_empire_ai
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 25
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_pyotr_wrangel = { is_army_chief = yes } }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
			RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		}
		else = {
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
			RUS_change_popular_anger = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.16 option rusfla.16.b"
		name = rusfla.16.b #They are of no consequence
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 100
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -5 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
	}
}

	desc = rusfla.19.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_savitsky
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { has_government = national_populist }

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.19 option rusfla.19.a"
		name = rusfla.19.a #Ensure they get their words heard
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_old_svobodnik_ai
						power_balance_value = { id = RUS_power_balance value > 0.15 }
					}
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_solidarist_ai
						power_balance_value = { id = RUS_power_balance value > -0.30 }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -10
		add_power_balance_value = {
			id = RUS_power_balance
			value = 0.05
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.19 option rusfla.19.b"
		name = rusfla.19.b #Do not let them get any ideas
		ai_chance = { base = 100 }
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -0.01 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
	}

country_event = { #Kurchatov Petition
	id = rusfla.23
	title = rusfla.23.t
	desc = rusfla.23.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_soviet_soldiers_tank

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.23 option rusfla.23.a"
		name = rusfla.23.a #Russia shall wield this superweapon
		trigger = { NOT = { has_government = national_populist } }
		if = {
			limit = {
				controls_province = 11394 #Sarov
				253 = { #Vladimir
					is_owned_and_controlled_by = ROOT
					can_construct_building = nuclear_facility
				}
			}
			253 = { #Vladimir
				add_building_construction = {
					type = nuclear_facility
					level = 1
					province = 11394 #Sarov
					instant_build = yes
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			random_owned_controlled_state = {
				prioritize = { 248 252 253 }
				limit = {
					is_core_of = ROOT
					can_construct_building = nuclear_facility
				}
				construct_building_in_random_province = { nuclear_facility = 1 }
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.23 option rusfla.23.b"
		name = rusfla.23.b #Radical solution to the question of terror
		trigger = { has_government = national_populist }
		if = {
			limit = {
				controls_province = 11394 #Sarov
				253 = { #Vladimir
					is_owned_and_controlled_by = ROOT
					can_construct_building = nuclear_facility
				}
			}
			253 = { #Vladimir
				add_building_construction = {
					type = nuclear_facility
					level = 1
					province = 11394 #Sarov
					instant_build = yes
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			random_owned_controlled_state = {
				prioritize = { 248 252 253 }
				limit = {
					is_core_of = ROOT
					can_construct_building = nuclear_facility
				}
				construct_building_in_random_province = { nuclear_facility = 1 }
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Churchill Iron Curtain speech
	id = rusfla.26
	title = rusfla.26.t
	desc = rusfla.26.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_conference2

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		FRA = { is_faction_leader = yes }
		ENT = { is_faction_leader = yes }
		is_subject = no
		has_socialist_government = no
		NOT = {
			has_war_with = INT
			has_war_with = ENT
			is_ally_with = INT
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.26 option rusfla.26.a"
		name = rusfla.26.a
		add_stability = 0.05
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_idea = RUS_cold_war } }
			add_ideas = RUS_cold_war
		}
		else = {
			add_war_support = 0.05
		}
		ENT = {
			country_event = rusfla.27
		}
		INT = {
			country_event = rusfla.27
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Churchill Iron Curtain speech
	id = rusfla.27
	title = rusfla.26.t
	desc = rusfla.26.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.27 option rusfla.26.a"
		name = rusfla.26.a
		add_stability = 0.05
		add_ideas = RUS_cold_war
	}
}

country_event = { #History of the Protocols of the Elders of Zion
	id = rusfla.28
	title = rusfla.28.t
	desc = rusfla.28.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_protocols

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.28 option rusfla.28.a"
		name = rusfla.28.a #The government must act
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_government = national_populist
				has_completed_focus = RUS_authdems
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -25
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_left_anger }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
			RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_authoritarian_government = yes
					has_government = social_conservative
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = 3 }
			change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.28 option rusfla.28.b"
		name = rusfla.28.b #Blame freedom of press and conscience
		add_stability = -0.02
		if = {
			limit = { has_government = national_populist }
			add_popularity = { ideology = national_populist popularity = 0.02 }
		}
		else = {
			add_popularity = { ideology = authoritarian_democrat popularity = 0.03 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Establishment of the Border Zone
	id = rusfla.30
	title = rusfla.30.t
	desc = rusfla.30.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_border

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.30 option rusfla.30.a"
		name = rusfla.30.a #Block it
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 50
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
				has_political_power > 80
			}
		}
		trigger = { has_authoritarian_government = no }
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = 3 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_military_anger_dem }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
			RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		}
		else = {
			add_political_power = -40
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.30 option rusfla.30.b"
		name = rusfla.30.b #Harsh, but necessary
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 50
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.02
		if = {
			limit = { has_left_democratic_government = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -4 }
		}
		else = {
			set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -2 }
		}
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.30 option rusfla.30.c"
		name = rusfla.30.c #Next step, removing suspicious residents
		trigger = { has_authoritarian_government = yes }
		add_stability = 0.02
		country_event = { id = rusfla.31 days = 14 }
	}
}

country_event = { #The Fate of the Veterans' Organisations
	id = rusfla.34
	title = rusfla.34.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_government = national_populist }
		text = rusfla.34.d.szrs
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS_is_demrus = yes }
		text = rusfla.34.d.dem
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_socialist_government = yes }
		text = rusfla.34.d.soc
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_partisans1

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.34 option rusfla.34.a"
		name = rusfla.34.a
		trigger = { has_government = national_populist }
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_old_svobodnik_ai
						power_balance_value = { id = RUS_power_balance value > 0.10 }
					}
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_solidarist_ai
						power_balance_value = { id = RUS_power_balance value > -0.35 }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -40
		add_popularity = { ideology = national_populist popularity = 0.05 }
		add_power_balance_value = {
			id = RUS_power_balance
			value = 0.1
			tooltip_side = RUS_ideocrat
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.34 option rusfla.34.b"
		name = rusfla.34.b
		trigger = { has_government = national_populist }
		ai_chance = { base = 100 }
		add_stability = 0.02
		add_popularity = { ideology = national_populist popularity = 0.02 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.34 option rusfla.34.c"
		name = rusfla.34.c
		trigger = { RUS_is_demrus = yes }
		ai_chance = { base = 100 }
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		add_stability = 0.01
		add_popularity = { ideology = national_populist popularity = -0.04 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = paternal_autocrat popularity = -0.02 }
		country_event = { id = rusfla.35 days = 3 } #The Volunteer March
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.34 option rusfla.34.e"
		name = rusfla.34.e
		trigger = { RUS_is_demrus = yes }
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_active_mission = RUS_demands_from_unions_monarchy
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.02
		add_popularity = { ideology = national_populist popularity = 0.02 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.34 option rusfla.34.f"
		name = rusfla.34.f
		trigger = { has_socialist_government = yes }
		ai_chance = { base = 100 }
		add_political_power = -15
		add_popularity = { ideology = national_populist popularity = -0.03 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = paternal_autocrat popularity = -0.03 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = authoritarian_democrat popularity = -0.02 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = social_conservative popularity = -0.02 }
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = -3 }
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_government = syndicalist }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
			RUS_SDS_relation = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
			RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = rusfla.35 days = 3 } #The Volunteer March
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.34 option rusfla.34.g"
		name = rusfla.34.g
		trigger = { has_socialist_government = yes }
		ai_chance = { base = 100 }
		RUS_increase_antisoc_resistance = yes
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = 1 }
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_government = syndicalist }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = 1 }
			RUS_SDS_relation = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
			RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		}
		add_popularity = { ideology = authoritarian_democrat popularity = 0.05 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = paternal_autocrat popularity = 0.05 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = national_populist popularity = 0.05 }
		set_country_flag = RUS_allowed_veterans_unions
	}
}
