country_event = { #Doubts over the Alekseyev Conspiracy
	id = rusfla.38
	title = rusfla.38.t
	desc = rusfla.38.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_soviet_congress

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.38 option rusfla.38.a"
		name = rusfla.38.a
		add_political_power = -20
		if = {
			limit = { has_government = radical_socialist }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_maximalist_influence_change = 2 }
			RUS_maximalist_influence = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_is_spiridonist = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_spiridonist_influence_change = -2 }
			RUS_add_faith = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_government = syndicalist }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_relation_change = -1 }
			RUS_SDS_relation = yes
			RUS_PSR_relation = yes
			RUS_RKP_relation = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST_centre = no }
			RUS_VST_centre_relation = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST_left = no }
			RUS_VST_left_relation = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST_right = no }
			RUS_VST_right_relation = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.38 option rusfla.38.b"
		name = rusfla.38.b
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -10 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
	}
}
country_event = { #Wave of White Sabotage
	id = rusfla.39
	title = rusfla.39.t
	desc = rusfla.39.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_partisans1

	trigger = {
		has_socialist_government = yes
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.39 option rusfla.39.a"
		name = rusfla.39.a
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_white_sabotage = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_allowed_veterans_unions }
			add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_white_sabotage = 2 }
			clr_country_flag = RUS_allowed_veterans_unions
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_5 }
			add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_white_sabotage = 5 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_4 }
			add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_white_sabotage = 4 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_3 }
			add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_white_sabotage = 3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_2 }
			add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_white_sabotage = 2 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_1 }
			add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_white_sabotage = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_lack_of_officers }
			add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_white_sabotage = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_lack_of_officers_2 }
			add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_white_sabotage = 2 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_lack_of_officers_3 }
			add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_white_sabotage = 3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_reeducation_camps }
			add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_white_sabotage = -1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_stability < 0.5 }
			add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_white_sabotage = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_stability < 0 }
			add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_white_sabotage = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_completed_focus = RUS_state_surveillance
					has_completed_focus = RUS_triumph_of_the_idea
				}
			}
			add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_white_sabotage = -1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_yakov_blyumkin = { is_hired_as_advisor = yes } }
			add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_white_sabotage = -2 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_VST = yes }
			add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_white_sabotage = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { is_in_coalition_with_totalist = yes }
			add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_white_sabotage = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_reeducation_camps_2 }
			add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_white_sabotage = -2 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_variable = RUS_faith }
			if = {
				limit = { check_variable = { RUS_faith < 50 } }
				add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_white_sabotage = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { check_variable = { RUS_faith < 25 } }
				add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_white_sabotage = 1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { check_variable = { RUS_faith > 50 } }
				add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_white_sabotage = -1 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { check_variable = { RUS_faith > 75 } }
				add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_white_sabotage = -1 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { RUS_white_sabotage > 8 } }
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_white_sabotage_5
				days = 365
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { RUS_white_sabotage > 4 } }
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_white_sabotage_4
				days = 365
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { RUS_white_sabotage > 4 } }
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_white_sabotage_3
				days = 365
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { RUS_white_sabotage > 2 } }
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_white_sabotage_2
				days = 365
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_white_sabotage_1
				days = 365
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #The Green International Divided
	id = rusfla.40
	title = rusfla.40.t
	desc = rusfla.40.d
	trigger = {
		RUS_savinkov = yes
		SER = { is_faction_leader = yes } #TEMP TRIGGER
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_conference3
	mean_time_to_happen = { months = 2 }
	fire_only_once = yes
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.40 option rusfla.40.a"
		name = rusfla.40.a
		random_list = { #Add variety based on national situations; democratic countries prefer the first option
			10 = {
				news_event = rusnews.20 #The Green International Falls to Radicalism
			}
			10 = {
				news_event = rusnews.21 #Creation of the Peasant International
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Growing Militarism
	id = rusfla.42
	title = rusfla.42.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS_is_demrus = yes }
		text = rusfla.42.d.dem
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_government = national_populist }
		text = rusfla.42.d
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_tank1
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { has_socialist_government = no }

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.42 option rusfla.42.a"
		name = rusfla.42.a
		add_war_support = 0.05
		if = {
			limit = { has_left_democratic_government = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -3 }
			change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { RUS_military_anger > 5 } }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
			RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Ataman Challenges Vozhd
	id = rusfla.46
	title = rusfla.46.t
	desc = rusfla.46.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_krasnov
	trigger = {
		RUS_savinkov = yes
		NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_abolished_cossack_hosts }
		has_character = RUS_pyotr_krasnov
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.46 option rusfla.46.a"
		name = rusfla.46.a
		trigger = { RUS_pavel_agyeyev = { is_hired_as_advisor = no } }
		add_ideas = RUS_cossack_resistance
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_remove_krasnov_tt
		retire_character = RUS_pyotr_krasnov
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.46 option rusfla.46.b"
		name = rusfla.46.b
		add_political_power = -50
		add_popularity = { ideology = authoritarian_democrat popularity = 0.05 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = national_populist popularity = -0.05 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.46 option rusfla.46.c"
		name = rusfla.46.c
		trigger = { RUS_pavel_agyeyev = { is_hired_as_advisor = yes } }
		add_trait = {
			character = RUS_pavel_agyeyev
			slot = political_advisor
			trait = RUS_cossack_ataman
		}
		add_political_power = 50
		add_popularity = { ideology = authoritarian_democrat popularity = -0.05 }
		retire_character = RUS_pyotr_krasnov
	}
}
country_event = { #Reactionary Monarchy Inside the Republic
	id = rusfla.47
	title = rusfla.47.t
	desc = rusfla.47.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_krasnov
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_left_democratic_government = yes
			has_government = market_liberal
		}
		NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_abolished_cossack_hosts }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.47 option rusfla.47.a"
		name = rusfla.47.a
		add_stability = 0.03
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		if = {
			limit = { has_active_mission = RUS_political_apathy }
			add_to_variable = { RUS_apathy_var = 1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_apathy_increase_tt
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.47 option rusfla.47.b"
		name = rusfla.47.b
		add_political_power = 20
		retire_character = RUS_pyotr_krasnov
		add_popularity = { ideology = paternal_autocrat popularity = -0.04 }
		add_popularity = { ideology = authoritarian_democrat popularity = -0.04 }
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_right_anger = yes
		if = {
			limit = { has_active_mission = RUS_bold_promises }
			add_days_mission_timeout = {
				mission = RUS_bold_promises
				days = 45
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_active_mission = RUS_titov_SR_demands }
			add_days_mission_timeout = {
				mission = RUS_titov_SR_demands
				days = 45
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_active_mission = RUS_political_apathy }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_apathy_decrease_tt
			add_to_variable = { RUS_apathy_var = -1 }
		}
	}
}

	id = rusfla.52
	title = rusfla.52.t
	desc = rusfla.52.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { RUS_solonevich = yes }
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_moscow

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.52 option rusfla.52.a"
		name = rusfla.52.a
		RUS_ivan_solonevich = {
			add_country_leader_role = {
				promote_leader = yes
				country_leader = {
					desc = RUS_ivan_solonevich_leader_desc
					ideology = authoritarian_democrat_subtype
				}
			}
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = authoritarian_democrat
			elections_allowed = yes
		}
		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:national_populist }
		add_to_coalition = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_left_anger = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = rusfla.53 days = 4 } }
	}
}

			RUS_restore_VPP = yes
		}

			ruling_party = social_conservative
			elections_allowed = yes

		set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:market_liberal }

		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = ruselections.50 days = 3 }  #President's agenda
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = national_populist
				long_name = RUS_national_populist2_party_long
				name = RUS_national_populist2_party
			}
		}
	}
}

	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kolchak

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.76 option rusfla.76.a"
		name = rusfla.76.a
		navy_experience = 20
		RUS_aleksandr_kolchak = {
			add_unit_leader_trait = media_personality
			gain_xp = 50
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_aleksandr_kolchak_navy_chief
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_power_change = 10 }
		RUS_change_projection = yes
		clr_country_flag = RUS_kolchak_expedition
	}
}
country_event = { #The Sannikov Flyover
	id = rusfla.77
	title = rusfla.77.t
	desc = rusfla.77.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { has_character = RUS_aleksandr_kolchak }
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kolchak

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.77 option rusfla.77.a"
		name = rusfla.77.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_tech = improved_small_airframe
					has_tech = improved_medium_airframe
					has_tech = improved_large_airframe
					has_tech = fighter2
					has_tech = CAS2
					has_tech = heavy_fighter2
					has_tech = naval_bomber2
					has_tech = tactical_bomber2
					has_tech = scout_plane2
					has_completed_focus = RUS_the_flying_tank
					has_completed_focus = RUS_polikarpov_fighters
					has_completed_focus = RUS_enter_hundred
					has_completed_focus = RUS_over_the_northern_skies
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = rusfla.78 days = 25 } }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_polar_tt
		}
		else = {
			hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = rusfla.75 days = 300 } }
			set_country_flag = RUS_kolchak_died_plane_crash
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_polar_tt
		}

	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.77 option rusfla.77.b"
		name = rusfla.77.b
		hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = rusfla.75 days = 300 } }
		set_country_flag = RUS_kolchak_died_trying
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_polar_tt
	}
}

country_event = { #Russian Military Exercises in Kursk
	id = rusfla.84
	title = rusfla.84.t
	desc = rusfla.84.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army2
	trigger = {
		has_socialist_government = no
	}

	option = { #Moderate
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.84 option rusfla.84.a"
		name = rusfla.84.a
		ai_chance = { base = 33 }
		add_political_power = -30
		add_command_power = -50
		set_country_flag = RUS_moderate_exercise
		country_event = { id = rusfla.85 days = 1 }
	}
	option = { #Large
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.84 option rusfla.84.b"
		name = rusfla.84.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 33
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
				check_variable = { RUS_popular_anger > 2 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
				check_variable = { RUS_popular_anger < 2 }
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -50
		add_command_power = -70
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
		RUS_change_popular_anger = yes
		set_country_flag = RUS_large_exercise
		country_event = { id = rusfla.85 days = 1 }
	}
	option = { #Small
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.84 option rusfla.84.c"
		name = rusfla.84.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 33
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai
				check_variable = { RUS_military_anger > 1 }
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		set_country_flag = RUS_small_exercise
		country_event = { id = rusfla.85 days = 1 }
	}
}

			base = 0

				add = 50
				has_country_flag = RUS_savinkov_ai

				}

				factor = 0

country_event = { #Military Exercises
	id = rusfla.88
	title = {
		text = rusfla.88.t1
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_small_exercise }
	}
	title = {
		text = rusfla.88.t2
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_moderate_exercise }
	}
	title = {
		text = rusfla.88.t3
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_large_exercise }
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfla.88.d1
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_small_exercise }
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfla.88.d2
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_moderate_exercise }
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfla.88.d3
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_large_exercise }
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army2

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.88 option rusfla.88.a"
		name = rusfla.88.a
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_small_exercise }
			army_experience = 20
			add_tech_bonus = {
				name = RUS_kursk_exercises
				bonus = 0.25
				uses = 2
				category = armor
			}
			add_doctrine_cost_reduction = {
				name = RUS_kursk_exercises
				cost_reduction = 0.5
				uses = 1
				category = land_doctrine
			}
			add_named_threat = {
				threat = 3
				name = RUS_kursk_exercises
			}
			clr_country_flag = RUS_small_exercise
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_moderate_exercise }
			army_experience = 40
			add_tech_bonus = {
				name = RUS_kursk_exercises
				bonus = 0.5
				uses = 2
				category = armor
			}
			add_doctrine_cost_reduction = {
				name = RUS_kursk_exercises
				cost_reduction = 0.75
				uses = 1
				category = land_doctrine
			}
			add_named_threat = {
				threat = 4
				name = RUS_kursk_exercises
			}
			clr_country_flag = RUS_moderate_exercise
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_large_exercise }
			army_experience = 60
			add_tech_bonus = {
				name = RUS_kursk_exercises
				bonus = 0.5
				uses = 2
				category = armor
			}
			add_doctrine_cost_reduction = {
				name = RUS_kursk_exercises
				cost_reduction = 0.95
				uses = 1
				category = land_doctrine
			}
			add_named_threat = {
				threat = 5
				name = RUS_kursk_exercises
			}
			clr_country_flag = RUS_large_exercise
		}
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_power_change = 5 }
		RUS_change_projection = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #Solonevich Attacked!
	id = rusfla.90
	title = rusfla.90.t
	desc = rusfla.90.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_solonevich
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			RUS_solonevich = yes
			RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = yes }
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.90 option rusfla.90.a"
		name = rusfla.90.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_ai
					RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = yes }
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_start
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = rusfla.92 #Solonevich Fights
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = allow_sound_events_flag }
				scoped_play_song = "kazachya_pesnya"
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = rusfla.90.a.tt
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.90 option rusfla.90.b"
		name = rusfla.90.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_dmitry_ai
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = rusfla.91 #Solonevich Leaves
		}
	}
}

	id = rusfla.91
	title = rusfla.91.t
	desc = rusfla.91.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_solonevich

		OR = {
			RUS_solonevich = yes
			RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = yes }
		}
	}

		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.91 option rusfla.91.a"
		name = rusfla.91.a
		add_stability = -0.01
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_punished }
				clr_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_punished
				set_portraits = {
					character = RUS_ivan_solonevich
					civilian = { large = GFX_portrait_RUS_ivan_solonevich_civilian_large }
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Solonevich Fig
	id = rusfla.92
	title = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_start }
		text = rusfla.92.t.fight
	}
	title = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_knockout }
		text = rusfla.92.t.knockout
	}
	title = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_successful_atk }
		text = rusfla.92.t.successful_atk
	}
	title = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_counter_atk }
		text = rusfla.92.t.counter_atk
	}
	title = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_fail }
		text = rusfla.92.t.fail
	}
	title = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_parry }
		text = rusfla.92.t.parry
	}
	title = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_heal }
		text = rusfla.92.t.heal
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_start }
		text = rusfla.92.d.fight
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_knockout }
		text = rusfla.92.d.knockout
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_successful_atk }
		text = rusfla.92.d.successful_atk
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_counter_atk }
		text = rusfla.92.d.counter_atk
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_fail }
		text = rusfla.92.d.fail
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_parry }
		text = rusfla.92.d.parry
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_heal }
		text = rusfla.92.d.heal
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_solonevich
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			RUS_solonevich = yes
			RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = yes }
		}
	}
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_start }
			set_variable = { RUS_solonevich_hp = 6 }
			set_variable = { RUS_assailant_hp = 8 }
			clr_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_start
		}
	}

	option = { #Aggressive Stance
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.92 option rusfla.92.a"
		name = rusfla.92.a
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { RUS_solonevich_hp > 0 }
			check_variable = { RUS_assailant_hp > 0 }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_dmitry_ai }
		}
		RUS_solonevich_fight_bold = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = rusfla.92
			country_event = rusfla.93
		}
	}
	option = { #Careful Stance
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.92 option rusfla.92.b"
		name = rusfla.92.b
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { RUS_solonevich_hp > 0 }
			check_variable = { RUS_assailant_hp > 0 }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_dmitry_ai }
		}
		RUS_solonevich_fight_careful = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = rusfla.92
			country_event = rusfla.93
		}
	}
	option = { #Leave the fight
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.92 option rusfla.92.c"
		name = rusfla.92.c
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { RUS_solonevich_hp = 1 }
			check_variable = { RUS_assailant_hp > 0 }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_dmitry_ai }
		}
		random_list = {
			10 = {
				set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -2 }
				change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
				country_event = rusfla.91
			}
			5 = { country_event = rusfla.96 }
		}
	}
	option = { #Victory!
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.92 option rusfla.92.e"
		name = rusfla.92.e
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { RUS_solonevich_hp > -1 }
			check_variable = { RUS_assailant_hp = 0 }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_dmitry_ai }
		}
		hidden_effect = { country_event = rusfla.94 }
	}
	option = { #Death!
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.92 option rusfla.92.f"
		name = rusfla.92.f
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					check_variable = { RUS_solonevich_hp = 0 }
					check_variable = { RUS_assailant_hp > 0 }
				}
				has_country_flag = RUS_dmitry_ai
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { country_event = rusfla.96 }
	}
}
country_event = { #Solonevich Fights 2 #Needed for mechanical reasons
	id = rusfla.93
	title = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_start }
		text = rusfla.92.t.fight
	}
	title = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_knockout }
		text = rusfla.92.t.knockout
	}
	title = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_successful_atk }
		text = rusfla.92.t.successful_atk
	}
	title = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_counter_atk }
		text = rusfla.92.t.counter_atk
	}
	title = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_fail }
		text = rusfla.92.t.fail
	}
	title = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_parry }
		text = rusfla.92.t.parry
	}
	title = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_heal }
		text = rusfla.92.t.heal
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_start }
		text = rusfla.92.d.fight
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_knockout }
		text = rusfla.92.d.knockout
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_successful_atk }
		text = rusfla.92.d.successful_atk
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_counter_atk }
		text = rusfla.92.d.counter_atk
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_fail }
		text = rusfla.92.d.fail
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_parry }
		text = rusfla.92.d.parry
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_heal }
		text = rusfla.92.d.heal
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_solonevich_2
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			RUS_solonevich = yes
			RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = yes }
		}
	}
	option = { #Aggressive Stance
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.93 option rusfla.92.a"
		name = rusfla.92.a
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { RUS_solonevich_hp > 0 }
			check_variable = { RUS_assailant_hp > 0 }
		}
		RUS_solonevich_fight_bold = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = rusfla.92
			country_event = rusfla.93
		}
	}
	option = { #Careful Stance
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.93 option rusfla.92.b"
		name = rusfla.92.b
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { RUS_solonevich_hp > 0 }
			check_variable = { RUS_assailant_hp > 0 }
		}
		RUS_solonevich_fight_careful = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = rusfla.92
			country_event = rusfla.93
		}
	}
	option = { #Leave the fight
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.93 option rusfla.92.c"
		name = rusfla.92.c
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { RUS_solonevich_hp = 1 }
			check_variable = { RUS_assailant_hp > 0 }
		}
		random_list = {
			10 = {
				set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -2 }
				change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
				country_event = rusfla.91
			}
			5 = { country_event = rusfla.96 }
		}
	}
	option = { #Victory!
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.93 option rusfla.92.e"
		name = rusfla.92.e
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { RUS_solonevich_hp > 0 }
			check_variable = { RUS_assailant_hp = 0 }
		}
	}
	option = { #Death!
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.93 option rusfla.92.f"
		name = rusfla.92.f
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { RUS_solonevich_hp = 0 }
			check_variable = { RUS_assailant_hp > 0 }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = rusfla.96
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Solonevich Victorious
	id = rusfla.94
	title = rusfla.94.t
	desc = rusfla.94.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_solonevich_2
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			RUS_solonevich = yes
			RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = yes }
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.94 option rusfla.94.a"
		name = rusfla.94.a
		army_experience = 1
		clear_variable = RUS_solonevich_hp
		clear_variable = RUS_assailant_hp
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = rusfla.95 days = 3 }
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_punished }
				clr_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_punished
				set_portraits = {
					character = RUS_ivan_solonevich
					civilian = { large = GFX_portrait_RUS_ivan_solonevich_civilian_large }
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Solonevich Interview
	id = rusfla.95
	title = rusfla.95.t
	desc = rusfla.95.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			RUS_solonevich = yes
			RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = yes }
		}
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_solonevich_2

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.95 option rusfla.95.a"
		name = rusfla.95.a
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_solonevich = yes }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_solonevich_reelection_tt
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_military_anger_dem
				check_variable = { RUS_military_anger > 0 }
			}
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = -1 }
			RUS_change_military_anger = yes
			add_war_support = 0.03
		}
		else = {
			add_war_support = 0.06
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.95 option rusfla.95.b"
		name = rusfla.95.b
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_solonevich = yes }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_solonevich_reelection_tt
		}
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = 5 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.95 option rusfla.95.c"
		name = rusfla.95.c
		if = {
			limit = { RUS_solonevich = yes }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_solonevich_reelection_tt
		}
		add_political_power = 40
	}
}
country_event = { #Solonevich Dies!
	id = rusfla.96
	title = rusfla.96.t
	desc = rusfla.96.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_solonevich_2
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			RUS_solonevich = yes
			RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = yes }
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.96 option rusfla.96.a"
		name = rusfla.96.a
		#Oh no!
		add_stability = -0.1
		RUS_ivan_solonevich = { kill_character = yes }
		if = {
			limit = { is_monarchy = no }
			promote_character = {
				character = RUS_dmitry_romanov
				ideology = social_conservative_subtype
			}
		}
		else = {
			activate_advisor = RUS_aleksandr_golitsyn_sic
		}
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		set_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_dead
		hidden_effect = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = social_conservative
				name = RUS_social_conservative_party
				long_name = RUS_social_conservative_party_long
			}
			country_event = { id = rusfla.98 days = 14 } #The Funeral
			country_event = { id = ruselections.50 days = 14 } #President's agenda
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_punished }
				clr_country_flag = RUS_solonevich_punished
				set_portraits = {
					character = RUS_ivan_solonevich
					civilian = { large = GFX_portrait_RUS_ivan_solonevich_civilian_large }
				}
			}
			remove_ideas = {
				RUS_party_versus_president
				RUS_party_versus_president_2
				RUS_party_versus_president_3
				RUS_party_versus_president_4
				RUS_party_versus_president_5
			}
		}
		clear_variable = RUS_solonevich_hp
		clear_variable = RUS_assailant_hp
	}
}

country_event = { #An Unreliable Ally
	id = rusfla.121
	title = rusfla.121.t
	desc = rusfla.121.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_POL_sejm

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.121 option rusfla.121.a"
		name = rusfla.121.a
	}
}

country_event = { #A New, Old Order in Kyiv
	id = rusfla.122
	title = rusfla.122.t
	desc = rusfla.122.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_central_rada
	trigger = {
		UKR = { has_government = social_democrat }
		has_socialist_government = no
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.122 option rusfla.122.a"
		name = rusfla.122.a
	}
}

country_event = { #The American Kolchak
	id = rusfla.123
	title = rusfla.123.t
	desc = rusfla.123.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_USA_macarthur
	trigger = {
		has_socialist_government = no
		USA = {
			has_country_leader = { character = USA_douglas_macarthur }
			has_war_with = CSA
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.123 option rusfla.123.a"
		name = rusfla.123.a
		add_war_support = 0.01
		add_popularity = { ideology = paternal_autocrat popularity = 0.01 }
	}
}

country_event = { #Treaty of Dresden
	id = rusfla.124
	title = rusfla.124.t
	desc = rusfla.124.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy1
	trigger = {
		any_subject_country = {
			is_german_tag = yes
			owns_state = 65 #Saxony
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.124 option rusfla.124.a"
		name = rusfla.124.a
		add_offsite_building = { type = industrial_complex level = 1 }
		hidden_effect = { country_event = { id = rusfla.150 days = 150 random_days = 150 } }
	}
}

country_event = { #Tsar meets Maria
	id = rusfla.125
	title = rusfla.125.t
	desc = rusfla.125.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		is_monarchy = yes
		has_country_flag = RUS_maria_marriage
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_vladimir

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.125 option rusfla.125.a"
		name = rusfla.125.a
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_idea = RUS_imperial_popularity_1
				has_idea = RUS_imperial_popularity_2
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.01
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.125 option rusfla.125.b"
		name = rusfla.125.b
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_idea = RUS_imperial_popularity_3
				has_idea = RUS_imperial_popularity_4
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.01
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.125 option rusfla.125.c"
		name = rusfla.125.c
		trigger = {
			has_idea = RUS_imperial_popularity_5
		}
		add_stability = 0.01
	}
}

country_event = { #Tsar marries Maria
	id = rusfla.126
	title = rusfla.126.t
	desc = rusfla.126.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		is_monarchy = yes
		has_country_flag = RUS_maria_marriage
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_vladimir
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = rusfla.127 days = 250 random_days = 200 }
			clr_country_flag = RUS_maria_marriage
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.126 option rusfla.126.a"
		name = rusfla.126.a
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_idea = RUS_imperial_popularity_1
				has_idea = RUS_imperial_popularity_2
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.01
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.126 option rusfla.126.b"
		name = rusfla.126.b
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_idea = RUS_imperial_popularity_3
				has_idea = RUS_imperial_popularity_4
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.01
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.126 option rusfla.126.c"
		name = rusfla.126.c
		trigger = {
			has_idea = RUS_imperial_popularity_5
		}
		add_stability = 0.01
	}
}

country_event = { #Vladimir has a child
	id = rusfla.127
	title = rusfla.127.t
	desc = rusfla.127.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_vladimir

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.127 option rusfla.127.a"
		name = rusfla.127.a
		add_stability = 0.01
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.127 option rusfla.127.b"
		name = rusfla.127.b
		add_war_support = 0.01
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.127 option rusfla.127.c"
		name = rusfla.127.c
		add_political_power = 20
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.127 option rusfla.127.e"
		name = rusfla.127.e
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_conservative
			popularity = 0.03
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Vladimir marries Leonida
	id = rusfla.128
	title = rusfla.128.t
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_georgian_monarchy
				GEO = {
					has_country_leader = { character = GEO_giorgi_bagration_mukhraneli }
					is_ally_with = RUS
				}
			}
		}
		text = rusfla.128.d.alternate
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_georgian_monarchy
				GEO = {
					has_country_leader = { character = GEO_giorgi_bagration_mukhraneli }
					is_ally_with = RUS
				}
			}
		}
		text = rusfla.128.d
	}
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		is_monarchy = yes
		has_country_flag = RUS_leonida_marriage
	}
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = rusfla.127 days = 250 random_days = 200 }
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.128 option rusfla.128.a"
		name = rusfla.128.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_georgian_monarchy
				GEO = {
					has_country_leader = { character = GEO_giorgi_bagration_mukhraneli }
					is_ally_with = RUS
				}
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.02
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.128 option rusfla.128.b"
		name = rusfla.128.b
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_georgian_monarchy
				GEO = {
					has_country_leader = { character = GEO_giorgi_bagration_mukhraneli }
					is_ally_with = RUS
				}
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.01
	}
}

country_event = { #Table of Ranks
	id = rusfla.129
	title = {
		trigger = { has_government = national_populist }
		text = rusfla.129.t
	}
	title = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_government = national_populist }
			is_monarchy = no
		}
		text = rusfla.129.t2
	}
	title = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_government = national_populist }
			is_monarchy = yes
		}
		text = rusfla.129.t3
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_government = national_populist }
		text = rusfla.129.d
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_government = national_populist }
			is_monarchy = no
		}
		text = rusfla.129.d2
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_government = national_populist }
			is_monarchy = yes
		}
		text = rusfla.129.d3
	}
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_table
	trigger = {
		has_socialist_government = no
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.129 option rusfla.129.a"
		name = rusfla.129.a
		trigger = { has_government = national_populist }
		add_stability = 0.02
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.129 option rusfla.129.b"
		name = rusfla.129.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_government = national_populist }
			is_monarchy = no
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = market_liberal
			popularity = 0.02
		}
		add_political_power = 15
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.129 option rusfla.129.c"
		name = rusfla.129.c
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_government = national_populist }
			is_monarchy = no
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_liberal
			popularity = 0.02
		}
		add_stability = 0.015
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.129 option rusfla.129.e"
		name = rusfla.129.e
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_government = national_populist }
			is_monarchy = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.129 option rusfla.129.f"
		name = rusfla.129.f
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_government = national_populist }
			is_monarchy = yes
		}
		set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = 0.03 }
		change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		add_stability = -0.01
	}
}

	id = rusfla.130
	title = {
		trigger = { controls_all_owned_states = yes }
		text = rusfla.130.t
	}
	title = {
		trigger = { surrender_progress > 0 }
		text = rusfla.130.t2
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { controls_all_owned_states = yes }
		text = rusfla.130.d
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { surrender_progress > 0 }
		text = rusfla.130.d
	}
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

		has_socialist_government = no
		has_war_with = GER

		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.130 option rusfla.130.a"

	}
}

country_event = { #Beginning Operation Ekaterina
	id = rusfla.131
	title = rusfla.131.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_government = national_populist }
		text = rusfla.131.d
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_elected_government = yes
			is_monarchy = no
		}
		text = rusfla.131.d2
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			is_monarchy = yes
		}
		text = rusfla.131.d3
	}
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy2
	trigger = {
		NOT = {
			AND = {
				RUS = { has_elected_government = yes }
				UKR = { has_elected_government = yes }
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.131 option rusfla.131.a"
		name = rusfla.131.a
	}
}

country_event = { #Victory in the Second Weltkrieg
	id = rusfla.134
	title = {
		trigger = { RUS_savinkov = yes }
		text = rusfla.134.t
	}
	title = {
		trigger = {
			RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = yes }
			is_monarchy = yes
		}
		text = rusfla.134.t2
	}
	title = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_right_democratic_government = yes
				has_left_democratic_government = yes
			}
		}
		text = rusfla.134.t3
	}
	title = {
		trigger = { RUS_wrangel_path = yes }
		text = rusfla.134.t4
	}
	title = {
		trigger = { has_socialist_government = yes }
		text = rusfla.134.t5
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS_savinkov = yes }
		text = rusfla.134.d
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = yes }
			is_monarchy = yes
		}
		text = rusfla.134.d2
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_left_democratic_government = yes
		}
		text = rusfla.134.d3
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			has_right_democratic_government = yes
		}
		text = rusfla.134.d4
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS_wrangel_path = yes }
		text = rusfla.134.d5
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { has_socialist_government = yes }
		text = rusfla.134.d6
	}
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_parade

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = { remove_ideas = RUS_surrender_limit_idea }
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.134 option rusfla.134.a"
		name = rusfla.134.a
		trigger = { RUS_savinkov = yes }
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = allow_sound_events_flag }
				scoped_play_song = "slavsya"
			}
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = national_populist
			popularity = 0.01
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.134 option rusfla.134.b"
		name = rusfla.134.b
		trigger = {
			RUS_ivan_solonevich = { is_second_in_command = yes }
			is_monarchy = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = allow_sound_events_flag }
				scoped_play_song = "slavsya"
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.134 option rusfla.134.c"
		name = rusfla.134.c
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_elected_government = yes
				has_socialist_government = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_socialist_government = no }
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = allow_sound_events_flag }
					scoped_play_song = "slavsya"
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_global_flag = allow_sound_events_flag }
					scoped_play_song = "workers_marseillaise"
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_government = radical_socialist
				NOT = {
					RUS_is_spiridonist = yes
					RUS_is_maximalist = yes
				}
			}
			country_event = { id = socrus.203 days = 5 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.134 option rusfla.134.e"
		name = rusfla.134.e
		trigger = { RUS_wrangel_path = yes }
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = allow_sound_events_flag }
				scoped_play_song = "slavsya"
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #He is Back
	id = rusfla.136
	title = rusfla.136.t
	desc = rusfla.136.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kornilov
	trigger = {
		RUS_is_demrus = yes
		has_war_with = GER
		NOT = {
			has_completed_focus = RUS_republicanisation_of_army
			#Don't trigger this if your war is going really easily
			controls_state = 5 #East Prussia
			10 = { is_controlled_by_ROOT_or_ally = yes } #Warsaw
			is_ally_with = POL
		}
		XXA = { has_character = RUS_lavr_kornilov }
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.136 option rusfla.136.a"
		name = rusfla.136.a
		RUS_lavr_kornilov = { set_nationality = ROOT }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_kornilov_temp_tt
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_country_leader_role = {
				character = RUS_lavr_kornilov ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.136 option rusfla.136.b"
		name = rusfla.136.b
		add_war_support = 0.08
		add_political_power = 30
		add_popularity = { ideology = paternal_autocrat popularity = 0.06 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.136 option rusfla.136.c"
		name = rusfla.136.c
		add_war_support = 0.01
	}
}

	title = rusfla.139.t
	desc = rusfla.139.d
	fire_only_once = yes

		original_tag = RUS
		has_country_flag = RUS_started_WK3
		INT = { exists = no }
	}

		days = 3
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.139 option rusfla.139.a"
		name = rusfla.139.a
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = allow_sound_events_flag }

			}
		}
	}

country_event = { #Leadup to the Death of Purpose
	id = rusfla.140
	title = rusfla.140.t
	desc = rusfla.140.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_savinkov2
	trigger = {
		NOT = { has_war_with = INT }
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.140 option rusfla.140.a"
		name = rusfla.140.a
	}
}

country_event = { #European Democracy Question
	id = rusfla.143
	title = rusfla.143.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { INT = { exists = yes } }
		text = rusfla.143.d
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { INT = { exists = no } }
		text = rusfla.143.d2
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_UKR_election

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.143 option rusfla.143.a"
		name = rusfla.143.a
		trigger = { INT = { exists = yes } }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_european_democracy_1_tt
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					POL = { is_subject_of = RUS }
				}
				country_event = { id = rusfla.119 days = 50 random_days = 30 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					POL = {
						NOT = { is_subject_of = RUS }
						has_government = national_populist
					}
				}
				country_event = { id = rusfla.121 days = 50 random_days = 30 }
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					is_subject_of = RUS
					is_ai = yes
					is_in_europe = yes
					NOT = { tag = GRU }
				}
				country_event = demrus.151
			}
			RUS_postwar_distribute_dem_popularities = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.143 option rusfla.143.b"
		name = rusfla.143.b
		set_country_flag = RUS_controlled_european_democracy
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_european_democracy_2_tt
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					POL = { is_subject_of = RUS }
				}
				country_event = { id = rusfla.119 days = 230 random_days = 30 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					POL = {
						NOT = { is_subject_of = RUS }
						has_government = national_populist
					}
				}
				country_event = { id = rusfla.121 days = 200 random_days = 30 }
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					is_subject_of = RUS
					is_ai = yes
					is_in_europe = yes
					NOT = { tag = GRU }
				}
				country_event = demrus.151
			}
			RUS_postwar_distribute_dem_popularities = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.143 option rusfla.143.c"
		name = rusfla.143.c
		trigger = { INT = { exists = no } }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_european_democracy_1_tt
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					POL = { is_subject_of = RUS }
				}
				country_event = { id = rusfla.119 days = 50 random_days = 30 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					POL = {
						NOT = { is_subject_of = RUS }
						has_government = national_populist
					}
				}
				country_event = { id = rusfla.121 days = 50 random_days = 30 }
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					is_subject_of = RUS
					is_ai = yes
					is_in_europe = yes
					NOT = { tag = GRU }
				}

			}

country_event = { #Empire of the Middle-Earth
	id = rusfla.145
	title = rusfla.145.t
	desc = rusfla.145.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_FNG_railway_map

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.145 option rusfla.145.a"
		name = rusfla.145.a
		add_war_support = 0.01
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.145 option rusfla.145.b"
		name = rusfla.145.b
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		every_state = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_manchuria = yes
					is_mongolia = yes
					is_xinjiang = yes
					is_central_asia = yes
					region = 134 #Transcaucasia
					state = 745 #Dalian
				}
				NOT = {
					is_claimed_by = ROOT
					is_core_of = ROOT
				}
			}
			add_claim_by = ROOT
			if = {
				limit = {
					THIS = {
						is_claimed_by = ROOT
						NOT = { is_owned_by = ROOT }
						controller = {
							OR = {
								is_subject_of = RUS
								has_country_leader = { character = MON_roman_ungern_sternberg }
							}
							is_ai = yes
						}
					}
				}
				transfer_state_to = ROOT
			}
			else = {
				custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_annex_puppet_tt
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Daughters of the Motherland
	id = rusfla.161
	title = rusfla.161.t
	desc = rusfla.161.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_SRI_female_red_guards
	trigger = { has_war = yes }

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.161 option rusfla.161.a"
		name = rusfla.161.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 4
				has_socialist_government = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_socialist_government = yes }
			add_stability = -0.02
		}
		else = {
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
			RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_demrus = yes
				OR = {
					has_right_democratic_government = yes
					has_authoritarian_government = yes
				}
			}
			set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -3 }
			change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			division_template = {
				name = "Zhenskaya Dobrovolnaya Pekhotnaya Divizya"
				division_names_group = RUS_INF_01
				regiments = {
					infantry = { x = 0 y = 0 }
					infantry = { x = 0 y = 1 }
					infantry = { x = 0 y = 2 }
					infantry = { x = 1 y = 0 }
					infantry = { x = 1 y = 1 }
					infantry = { x = 1 y = 2 }
					infantry = { x = 2 y = 0 }
					infantry = { x = 2 y = 1 }
					infantry = { x = 2 y = 2 }
					artillery_brigade = { x = 3 y = 0 }
					artillery_brigade = { x = 3 y = 1 }
					artillery_brigade = { x = 3 y = 2 }
				}
				support = {
					artillery = { x = 0 y = 0 }
					engineer = { x = 0 y = 1 }
				}
			}
		}
		random_owned_controlled_state = {
			prioritize = { 219 }
			limit = { valid_state_for_spawning_friendly_unit = yes }
			create_unit = {
				division = "name = \"Zhenskaya Dobrovolnaya Pekhotnaya Divizya\" division_template = \"Zhenskaya Dobrovolnaya Pekhotnaya Divizya\" start_experience_factor = 0.2 start_equipment_factor = 1"
				owner = ROOT
			}
		}
		set_rule = { can_generate_female_aces = yes }
		if = {
			limit = { has_socialist_government = yes }
			set_rule = { can_generate_female_unit_leaders = yes }
			add_ideas = RUS_night_witches_idea
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.161 option rusfla.161.b"
		name = rusfla.161.b
		ai_chance = { base = 40 }
		add_political_power = -20
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_demrus = yes
				amount_taken_ideas = {
					amount < 3
					slots = { political_advisor }
				}
				RUS_maria_zakharchenko = { is_hired_as_advisor = no }
			}
			activate_advisor = RUS_maria_zakharchenko_advisor
		}
		add_manpower = 86500
		set_rule = { can_generate_female_aces = yes }
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_completed_focus = RUS_with_small_blood } }
			enable_tech_improved_field_hospitals = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.161 option rusfla.161.c"
		name = rusfla.161.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 40
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.25
				has_socialist_government = yes
			}
		}
		add_war_support = -0.01
		if = {
			limit = { has_socialist_government = yes }
			set_temp_variable = { ideology_change_var = -5 }
			change_ruling_party_popularity = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #By This Sign, Conquer
	id = rusfla.162
	title = rusfla.162.t
	desc = rusfla.162.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_white_army
	trigger = { has_socialist_government = no }

	option = {

		name = rusfla.162.b

	}

	}

		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.170 option rusfla.170.b"
		name = rusfla.170.b
		trigger = { has_left_democratic_government = yes }
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		add_political_power = 30
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_anger_change = 1 }
		RUS_change_military_anger = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_is_demrus = yes
				is_monarchy = no
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_counts_as_mil_republicanisation
			add_to_variable = { RUS_republicanisation = 1 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Germans Beg for Peace
	id = rusfla.172
	title = rusfla.172.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS_savinkov = no }
		text = rusfla.172.d
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS_savinkov = yes }
		text = rusfla.172.d2
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_conference3

	trigger = {
		has_socialist_government = no
		GER = {
			has_war_with = ROOT
			has_war_with = INT
			surrender_progress > 0.2
			any_owned_state = {
				is_core_of = PREV
				is_controlled_by = ROOT
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.172 option rusfla.172.a"
		name = rusfla.172.a
		trigger = { NOT = { has_government = national_populist } }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfla.172 option rusfla.172.b"
		name = rusfla.172.b
		trigger = { has_government = national_populist }
	}
}

### MIO Effects and Modifiers ###
country_event = { #Event for giving funds to LAZ from NAZ (doesn't want to give it when coded in RUS_organization)
	id = russia.1001

	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1001 option 1"
		mio:RUS_laz_organisation = {
			add_mio_funds = 1000
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Event for constructing random buildings from OSOAVIA
	id = russia.1002

	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1002 option 1"
		RUS_Gamayun_Factories = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				mio:RUS_gamayun_organisation = {
					is_mio_trait_completed = gamayun_upgrade_1_4
				}
				mio:RUS_gamayun_organisation = {
					has_mio_policy_active = RUS_mio_policy_buy_out_land_holdings
				}
			}
			ROOT = {
				country_event = { id = russia.1002 days = 60 random_days = 40 }
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					mio:RUS_gamayun_organisation = {
						is_mio_trait_completed = gamayun_upgrade_1_4
					}
					mio:RUS_gamayun_organisation = {
						has_mio_policy_active = RUS_mio_policy_buy_out_land_holdings
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					mio:RUS_gamayun_organisation = {
						is_mio_trait_completed = gamayun_upgrade_1_4
					}
					mio:RUS_gamayun_organisation = {
						has_mio_policy_active = RUS_mio_policy_buy_out_land_holdings
					}
				}
			}
			ROOT = {
				country_event = { id = russia.1002 days = 110 random_days = 40 }
			}
		}
		else = {
			ROOT = {
				country_event = { id = russia.1002 days = 160 random_days = 40 }
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Event for giving random funds to MIOs from Obukhov MIO
	id = russia.1008

	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1008 option 1"
		trigger = {
			mio:RUS_obukhov_organisation = {
				has_mio_policy_active = RUS_mio_policy_private_assistance_obukhov
			}
		}
		RUS_private_assistance = yes
		country_event = { id = russia.1008 days = 30 }
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = russia.1012

	trigger = {
		mio:RUS_toz_organisation = {
			has_mio_policy_active = RUS_mio_policy_dedicated_experimental_research_centres
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1012 option 1"
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_has_TOZ_attack_medal = yes
				RUS_has_TOZ_defense_medal = no
				RUS_has_TOZ_org_medal = no
				RUS_has_TOZ_breakthrough_medal = no
			}
			random_country_division = {
				limit = { unit_organization > 0.02 }
				add_history_entry = {
					key = RUS_TOZ_Medal_Award
					subject = "RUS_TOZ_Medal_Award"
					allow = yes
				}
				add_unit_medal_to_latest_entry = {
					unit_medals = RUS_TOZ_Medal_a
				}
				set_unit_organization = 0.01
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_has_TOZ_attack_medal = yes
				RUS_has_TOZ_defense_medal = no
				RUS_has_TOZ_org_medal = yes
				RUS_has_TOZ_breakthrough_medal = no
			}
			random_country_division = {
				limit = { unit_organization > 0.02 }
				add_history_entry = {
					key = RUS_TOZ_Medal_Award
					subject = "RUS_TOZ_Medal_Award"
					allow = yes
				}
				add_unit_medal_to_latest_entry = {
					unit_medals = RUS_TOZ_Medal_ac
				}
				set_unit_organization = 0.01
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_has_TOZ_attack_medal = yes
				RUS_has_TOZ_defense_medal = yes
				RUS_has_TOZ_org_medal = yes
				RUS_has_TOZ_breakthrough_medal = no
			}
			random_country_division = {
				limit = { unit_organization > 0.02 }
				add_history_entry = {
					key = RUS_TOZ_Medal_Award
					subject = "RUS_TOZ_Medal_Award"
					allow = yes
				}
				add_unit_medal_to_latest_entry = {
					unit_medals = RUS_TOZ_Medal_abc
				}
				set_unit_organization = 0.01
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_has_TOZ_attack_medal = yes
				RUS_has_TOZ_defense_medal = yes
				RUS_has_TOZ_org_medal = yes
				RUS_has_TOZ_breakthrough_medal = yes
			}
			random_country_division = {
				limit = { unit_organization > 0.02 }
				add_history_entry = {
					key = RUS_TOZ_Medal_Award
					subject = "RUS_TOZ_Medal_Award"
					allow = yes
				}
				add_unit_medal_to_latest_entry = {
					unit_medals = RUS_TOZ_Medal_abcd
				}
				set_unit_organization = 0.01
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_has_TOZ_attack_medal = yes
				RUS_has_TOZ_defense_medal = yes
				RUS_has_TOZ_org_medal = no
				RUS_has_TOZ_breakthrough_medal = no
			}
			random_country_division = {
				limit = { unit_organization > 0.02 }
				add_history_entry = {
					key = RUS_TOZ_Medal_Award
					subject = "RUS_TOZ_Medal_Award"
					allow = yes
				}
				add_unit_medal_to_latest_entry = {
					unit_medals = RUS_TOZ_Medal_ab
				}
				set_unit_organization = 0.01
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_has_TOZ_attack_medal = no
				RUS_has_TOZ_defense_medal = yes
				RUS_has_TOZ_org_medal = no
				RUS_has_TOZ_breakthrough_medal = no
			}
			random_country_division = {
				limit = { unit_organization > 0.02 }
				add_history_entry = {
					key = RUS_TOZ_Medal_Award
					subject = "RUS_TOZ_Medal_Award"
					allow = yes
				}
				add_unit_medal_to_latest_entry = {
					unit_medals = RUS_TOZ_Medal_b
				}
				set_unit_organization = 0.01
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_has_TOZ_attack_medal = no
				RUS_has_TOZ_defense_medal = yes
				RUS_has_TOZ_org_medal = no
				RUS_has_TOZ_breakthrough_medal = yes
			}
			random_country_division = {
				limit = { unit_organization > 0.02 }
				add_history_entry = {
					key = RUS_TOZ_Medal_Award
					subject = "RUS_TOZ_Medal_Award"
					allow = yes
				}
				add_unit_medal_to_latest_entry = {
					unit_medals = RUS_TOZ_Medal_bd
				}
				set_unit_organization = 0.01
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_has_TOZ_attack_medal = yes
				RUS_has_TOZ_defense_medal = yes
				RUS_has_TOZ_org_medal = no
				RUS_has_TOZ_breakthrough_medal = yes
			}
			random_country_division = {
				limit = { unit_organization > 0.02 }
				add_history_entry = {
					key = RUS_TOZ_Medal_Award
					subject = "RUS_TOZ_Medal_Award"
					allow = yes
				}
				add_unit_medal_to_latest_entry = {
					unit_medals = RUS_TOZ_Medal_abd
				}
				set_unit_organization = 0.01
			}
		}
		country_event = { id = russia.1012 days = 50 }
	}
}
### News Events

news_event = { #Viktor Chernov Assassinated!
	id = rusnews.1
	immediate = { log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusnews.1" }
	title = rusnews.1.t
	desc = rusnews.1.d
	picture = GFX_news_event_RUS_assassination_of_alexander_kerensky

	major = yes
	fire_for_sender = no
	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		wants_world_news = yes
	}

	show_major = {
		OR = {
			regional_europe_news = yes
			regional_asia_news = yes
			regional_middle_east_news = yes
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusnews.1.a
	}
}

	id = rusnews.2
	immediate = { log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusnews.2" }
	title = rusnews.2.t
	desc = rusnews.2.d
	picture = GFX_news_event_RUS_savinkov

	major = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		wants_world_news = yes
	}

	show_major = {
		NOT = { tag = RUS }
		OR = {
			regional_europe_news = yes
			regional_asia_news = yes
			is_ally_with = GER
			is_ally_with = RUS
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusnews.2.a
		trigger = { is_ally_with = GER }
	}
	option = {
		name = rusnews.2.b
		trigger = { is_ally_with = RUS }
	}
	option = {
		name = rusnews.2.c
		trigger = {
			has_socialist_government = yes
			NOT = {
				is_ally_with = GER
				is_ally_with = RUS
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusnews.2.e
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				is_ally_with = GER
				is_ally_with = RUS
				has_socialist_government = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

### Debug events ###

country_event = {
	id = russia.5000
	title = russia.test.t
	desc = russia.test.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		deactivate_advisor = RUS_vladimir_nabokov_natpop_advisor
		deactivate_advisor = RUS_vladimir_nabokov_dem_advisor
		clr_country_flag = RUS_lost_wk2
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.5000 option RUS_test_republic"
		name = RUS_test_republic
		RUS_anton_denikin = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype }
				promote_character = { ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype }
			}
			else = {
				add_country_leader_role = {
					country_leader = {
						desc = RUS_anton_denikin_leader_desc
						ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype
					}
					promote_leader = yes
				}
			}
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = paternal_autocrat
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		RUS_remove_savinkov = yes
		RUS_setup_demrus = yes
		add_ideas = RUS_republic_under_watch
		set_variable = { RUS_target_army_size = num_divisions }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_target_army_size = 5 }
		set_variable = { RUS_military_demands_var = 120 }
		activate_mission = RUS_military_demands
		country_event = russia.5003
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.5000 option RUS_test_monarchy"
		name = RUS_test_monarchy
		country_event = russia.5007
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.5000 option RUS_test_socrus-sr"
		name = RUS_test_socrus-sr
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = radical_socialist
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		RUS_initialise_socrus = yes

			promote_character = { ideology = radical_socialist_subtype }
		}

		complete_national_focus = RUS_russian_congress

			RUS_mikhail_tukhachevsky = {
				set_nationality = PREV.PREV
				set_portraits = {
					army = {
						large = GFX_portrait_RUS_mikhail_tukhachevsky_army_large
						small = GFX_portrait_RUS_mikhail_tukhachevsky_army_small
					}
				}
			}
			RUS_vasily_blyukher = { set_nationality = PREV.PREV }
			RUS_boris_shaposhnikov = { set_nationality = PREV.PREV }
			RUS_kirill_meretskov = { set_nationality = PREV.PREV }
			RUS_semyon_timoshenko = { set_nationality = PREV.PREV }
			RUS_mikhail_frunze = { set_nationality = PREV.PREV }
			RUS_iosif_stalin = { set_nationality = PREV.PREV }
			RUS_aleksandr_yegorov = { set_nationality = PREV.PREV }
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_exiles_have_returned
		add_ideas = RUS_white_army_red_baron
		add_ideas = RUS_anti_socialist_resistance_3
		add_ideas = RUS_workers_control
		set_cosmetic_tag = RUS_soc
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.5000 option RUS_test_socrus-vst"
		name = RUS_test_socrus-vst
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = syndicalist

		complete_national_focus = RUS_russian_congress

				set_nationality = PREV.PREV

						large = GFX_portrait_RUS_mikhail_tukhachevsky_army_large

					}
				}
			}
			RUS_vasily_blyukher = { set_nationality = PREV.PREV }
			RUS_boris_shaposhnikov = { set_nationality = PREV.PREV }
			RUS_kirill_meretskov = { set_nationality = PREV.PREV }

		set_cosmetic_tag = RUS_soc
	}

		name = RUS_test_far_eastern_army
		set_country_flag = RUS_underfunded_vladivostok
		set_country_flag = RUS_ussuri_unrest

		}

		set_variable = { var = rkp_var value = 4 }
		set_variable = { var = sr_var value = 5 }
		set_variable = { var = vst_left_var value = 4 }
		set_variable = { var = vst_right_var value = 7 }
		set_variable = { var = vst_centre_unity value = 6 }
	}

		set_variable = { var = vst_left_var value = 5 }
		set_variable = { var = vst_centre_var value = 5 }

		set_variable = { var = vst_centre_var value = 7 }

country_event = {
	id = russia.5007
	title = russia.test.t
	desc = russia.test.d
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.5007 option RUS_test_soclib"
		name = RUS_test_soclib
		clr_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_path
		RUS_remove_savinkov = yes
		RUS_create_monarchy = yes
		RUS_setup_demrus = yes
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = social_liberal
			elections_allowed = yes
		}
		RUS_ilya_fondaminsky = { unit_leader_event = ruselections.38 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.5007 option RUS_test_marlib"
		name = RUS_test_marlib
		clr_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_path
		RUS_remove_savinkov = yes
		RUS_create_monarchy = yes
		RUS_setup_demrus = yes
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = market_liberal
			elections_allowed = yes
		}
		country_event = ruselections.39
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.5007 option RUS_test_soccon"
		name = RUS_test_soccon
		clr_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_path
		RUS_remove_savinkov = yes
		RUS_create_monarchy = yes
		RUS_setup_demrus = yes
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = social_conservative
			elections_allowed = yes
		}
		country_event = ruselections.40
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.5007 option RUS_test_wrangel"
		name = RUS_test_wrangel
		RUS_pyotr_wrangel = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype }
				promote_character = { ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype }
			}
			else = {
				add_country_leader_role = {
					country_leader = {
						desc = RUS_pyotr_wrangel_leader_desc
						ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype
					}
					promote_leader = yes
				}
			}
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = paternal_autocrat
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		RUS_remove_savinkov = yes
		set_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_path
		RUS_create_monarchy = yes
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		complete_national_focus = RUS_black_baron
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			long_name = RUS_authoritarian_democrat_party_long
			name = RUS_authoritarian_democrat_party
		}
		activate_advisor = RUS_vasily_shulgin_sic
	}
}

country_event = { # Balkan War for potential Power Projection
	id = rusfor.256
	title = rusfor.256.t
	desc = rusfor.256.d

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		original_tag = RUS
		has_global_flag = balkan_war_ended
		SER = { owns_state = 767 } #Nish
		has_country_flag = RUS_belgrade_support_volunteers
		has_socialist_government = no
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.256 option rusfor.256.a"
		name = rusfor.256.a
		clr_country_flag = RUS_belgrade_support_volunteers
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_power_change = 10 }
		RUS_change_projection = yes
		army_experience = 10
	}
}

country_event = { # China reunifying for Power Projection
	id = rusfor.262
	title = rusfor.262.t
	desc = rusfor.262.d

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		original_tag = RUS
		has_country_flag = RUS_China_support_volunteers
		any_country = {
			has_idea = RUS_chinese_military_mission_idea
			OR = {
				has_idea = QIE_united_china_idea
				has_idea = unite_china_justification_idea
			}
		}
		has_socialist_government = no
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.262 option rusfor.262.a"
		name = rusfor.262.a
		clr_country_flag = RUS_China_support_volunteers
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_power_change = 20 }
		RUS_change_projection = yes
		add_political_power = 40
	}
}

country_event = { # Iranian aid
	id = rusfor.263
	title = rusfor.263.t
	desc = rusfor.263.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.263 option rusfor.263.a"
		name = rusfor.263.a
		ai_chance = { base = 1 }
		add_ideas = RUS_PER_aid
		RUS = {
			add_relation_modifier = {
				target = PER
				modifier = volunteer_limit_plus_two
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.263 option rusfor.263.b"
		name = rusfor.263.b
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
	}
}
